Yesu an'jhobhili, “Mbweha bhana mal'ende ni fidege fya angani bhaj'he ni fiota, lakini mwana ghwa Adamu aj'helepi ni sehemu j'ha kugoneka mutu bhwakhe.”
Mwanafunzi j'hongi an'jobhili, “Bwana, niruhusiaghe oti nilotaghe kun'siela tata ghwangu.”
Lakini Yesu an'jobhili, “Un'kesiaghe, na ubhalekai bhafu bhasyelayi bhafu bha j'hinu.”
Yesu bho aj'hingili mu bhuatu, bhanafunzi bhakankesya mu bhuatu.
Langai, lyaj'handili linyegha libhaa panani pa bahari, kiasi kwamba bhuatu bhwafunikibhu ni manyegha. Lakini Yesu agonili lugono.
Bhanafunzi bhakahida kwa muene ni kunjumusya bhakaj'ha bhijobha, “Bwana, tuokolayi tete, twilota kufwa!”
Yesu akabhajobhela, kwa ndabha j'ha kiki mwitila, muenga j'ha muj'he ni imani idusu?” Ndipo akaj'humuka ni kubhubesya mp'ongo ni bahari. Kisha kukabhwa ni bhutulivu m'mbaha,
bhagosi bhakamuliki ni mshangao m'baha bhakajobha, “Oj'ho ghwa namna gani, kwamba hata mp'ongo ni bahari figudeme kwa muene?”
Bhwakati Yesu ahidili lubhafu longilwa nchi j'ha Magadala, bhagosi bhabhele bha bhatawalibhu ni pepo bhabhonene naku. Bhakaj'ha bhihomela kumakaburi na bhakaj'ha bhibhomba vurugu sana, kiasi kwamba aj'he lepi msafiri ghwa kubhwesya kup'heta nj'hela j'hela.
Langaghe, bhakwesili sauti ni kujobha, “Tuj'he ni kiki kya kubhomba kwa bhebhe, mwana ghwa K'yara? Uhidili apa kututesya kabla j'ha bhwakati kufika?”
Henu likundi libhaha lya maghorobhi aj'hele likidima, paj'helelepi patali ni pabhaj'hele,
pepo bhaj'handelili kulalamika kwa Yesu ni kujobha, “Ikaj'hiaghe wibetakutuamuru kubhoka, tulongosiaghe mu likundi lya maghorobhi.”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Mlotaghe!” Pepo bhakabhoka ni kubanga kwa maghorobhi. Na langaghe, likundi lyoha lyaselili kuhomela kukid'onda kuserelela ku bahari na lyoha lyafwelili mu masi.
Bhagosi bhabhaj'hele bhidima maghorobhi bhajumbili. Na bho bhalotili kumjini bhakaj'helesya khila khenu, hususani kyakyatokili kwa bhagosi bhabhatawalibhu ni mapepo.
Langaghe, mji bhuoha ukahida kubhonana ni Yesu. Bho bhabhuene, bhakan'sihi abhokai mu mkoa ghwa bhene.
Yesu akaj'hingila mu liboti, akalobhokha na akafika mu mji ghwa atameghe.
Langaghe bhandetili munu j'haapozili agonili mu ligodoro. bho ajhibhuene imani j'ha bhene, Yesu akan'jobhela munu j'ha apoozili, “Mwanabhangu, uj'hiaghe ni furaha, Dhambi sa j'hobhi lisamehibhu”
Langaghe, Baadhi j'ha bhalimu bha sheria bhakajobhesana bhene kwa bhene, “Munu oj'ho ikufuru”
Yesu akaghamanya mabhuasu gha bhene na akajobha, “Kwa ndabha j'ha kiki mwibhuasya maovu mu mioyo ghinu?
Khelekhu kya kij'hoj'hofu kujobha, 'Dhambi sa j'hobhi simalikusamehebhwa' au kujobha, 'Uj'hemaghe na ugendayi?'
Lakini mmanyaghe j'he kuj'ha Mwana ghwa Adamu aj'he ni bhuwezo bhwa kusamee dhambi...” aghajobhi agha kwa j'hola amalikupooza, “J'hemai. tolayi ligodoro lya j'hobhi, na ulotaj'hi kunyumba kwa j'hobhi”
Ndipo munu j'hola akaj'hema ni kubhoka kulota kunyumba kwa muene.
Makutano bho bhaghabhuene agha, bhashangale ni kunsifu K'yara, ambaj'he abhapelili bhuwezo obhu bhanu.
Na Yesu bho ip'heta kuh'omela apu ambwene munu ambaj'he akutibhu kwa lihina lya Mathayo, ambaj'he aj'hele atamili sehemu j'ha bhatoza ushuru. Ni muene akan'jobhela, “Nikhesiayi nene” Ni muene aj'hema nu kunkesya.
Ni Yesu bho atamili ili aliayi kyakulya mugati mu nyumba bhakahida bhatoza ushuru bhingi ni bhanu bhaovu bhakashiriki pamonga ni Yesu ni bhanafunzi bha muene.
Ndipo Mafarisayo bho bhaghabhuene agha bhakabhajobhela bhanafunzi “Kwandabha j'ha kiki mwalimu ghwa j'homu ilya kyakulya ni bhatoza ushuru ni bhanu bhaovu pamonga?”
Yesu bho ap'heliki ni afya j'hinofu bhilonda lepi n'ganga, isipokuj'ha kwa bhala bhabhine tu.
J'hikabhalondeka mul'otaghe mukwimanyisiaghe maana j'hiake, “Niganili rehema na siyo dhabihu” Kwa kuj'ha nahidili, si kwa bhenye haki kutubu, lakini kwa bhabhajhe ni dhambi.
Ndipo bhanafunzi bha Yohana bhakahida kwa muene ni kujobha, “Kwa ndabha j'ha kiki tete ni mafarisayo twifunga, lakini bhanafunzi bha j'hobhi bhifunga lepi?”
Yesu akabhajobhela, Je bhasindikizaji bha harusi bhibhwesya kuj'ha ni huzuni pindi Bwana arusi paijha pamonga nabhu? Lakini magono ghihida ambapo Bwana arusi ibetakutolibhwa kuh'oma kwa bhene, na ndipo pabhibetakufunga.
Aj'helepi munu j'haibheka kipandi kya ngobho mpya mu ngobho j'ha muandi, kiraka kibetakubhosibhwa kuh'oma mu ngobho ni kakachulilu kabhaa kibetakutokela.
Bhaj'helepi bhanu bha bhibheka mvinyo mpya mu khenu kya mvinyo bhwa muandi, ikaj'hiaghe bhibeta kubhomba, ngosi j'hihatuka, mvinyo bhwibhokha ni ngozi j'hij'honangheka. Badala j'hiakhe, bhibheka mvinyo mpya mu ngozi mpya na fyoha fibetakuj'ha salama.
Bhwakati Yesu bho aj'hele akabhajobhela mambo agha, langaghe, afisa akahida akasujudu mb'ele j'ha muene, Nu muene akajobha, “Mwalibhangu afuili henu naha, lakini hidayi na ubhekai kibhoko kya j'hobhi panani pa muene nu muene ibetakuishi kabhele.
Ndipo Yesu akaj'hema ni kun'kesya ni bhanafunzi bha muene pia.
Langaghe, n'dala ambaj'he aj'hele ihoma muasi kwa muda ghwa miaka mibhele, akahida karibu ni Yesu na akakamula sehemu j'ha pindo lya livazi lyake.
Kwa kuj'ha ajobhili, “Kama nibetakukamula livazi la muene, ni nene nibekukabha uponyaji.”
Yesu asanuiki ni kundanga ni kun'jobhela.” Mwalibhangu, kip'elayi muoyo, imani j'ha bhebhe j'hikubhombili uponayi,” Na muda bhobhuobhu n'dala akakabha kupona.
Na Yesu bho afikiri pa nyumba j'ha afisa abhabhuene bhalehobha tarumbeta ni bhumati bhwa bhanu bhakaj'ha bhipiga makhelele.
Ni muene akajobha, “Mubhokaj'hi apa, kwa ndabha mwali oj'ho afwilepi agonili. Lakini bhene bhakaheka ni kunkebehi.
Na bhala bhana bho bhah'omesibhu kwibhala, ni akaj'hingila kugati ni kunkamula kibhokho ni n'dala akaj'humuka.
Ni habari e'se sikaj'henela katika mji bhuoha.
Ndipo Yesu bho ip'heta kuhoma pala, bhagosi bhabhele fipofu bhakankesya. Bhakaj'handelela kukwesya sauti bhakaj'ha bhijobha, “Twis'oma uturehemu, Mwana ghwa Daudi.”
Pindi Yesu bho afikiri mu nyumba, bhala fipofu bhakahida kwa muene, Yesu akabhajobhela, “Mwikyera kuj'ha nibhwesya kubhomba?” Na bhene bhakan'jobhela “Ena, Bwana”
Ndipo Yesu akakamula mihu gha bhene ni kujobha “Na j'hibhombekai naha kwa muenga kama imani j'ha muenga kyaij'hele”
Na mihu gha bhene ghakafumbuka. Ndipo Yesu akasisitisya akabhaamuru nikujobha “Mulangayi munu j'hej'hioha j'hola asimanyi kuhusu lijambo e'le.”
Lakini bhanu abha bhabhele bhakabhoka ni kutangasya habari e'se sehemu syoha sya mji.
Ndipo bhala bhagosi bhabhele bhobhikwilotela, Langayi, munu mmonga bubu ambaj'he apagewa ni mapepo alitibhu kwa Yesu.
Ni pepo bhambokili, yola munu bubu aj'handa kulongela. Bhumati bhusyangasibhwa ni kujobha “Ej'he j'hibhwaj'hi lepi kuh'omela mu Israeli.
Lakini mafarisayo bhakaj'ha bhijobha “Kwa bhabhaha bha pepo, akabhabhenga mapepo”
Yesu akalota mu miji ghioha ni vijiji. Nu muene akaj'hendelela kumanyisya mu masinagogi, akihubiri injili j'ha bhufalme, ni kuponesya bhubhine bhwa kila aina ni bhudhaifu bhwa aina syoha.
Bhwakati ilola bhumati, kwa ndabha bhasumbuikhi ni kudumuka mioyo. Bhaj'hele kama makondoo ghaghadulili n'dimaji.
Nu muene akabhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene. “Mavuno ndo mingi, lakini bhabhomba mambo bhadebe.
Henu manyata mun'somaghe Bwana ghwa mavuno, ili abhatumaghe bhabhomba mbombo mu mavuno ghakhe.
Yesu akabhakhuta bhanafunzi bha muene kumi na bhabhele pamonga ni kubhapela mamlaka juu j'ha pepo bhachafu, kubhakemela ni kubhabhenga ni kuponesya aina syoha sya maradhi ni aina syoha sya bhubhine.
Mahina kumi na mabhele ndo agha. Lya kubhwandelu simeoni (ambaj'he pia ikutibhwa Petro), ni Andrea n'dombobhe, Yakobo mwana ghwa Zebedayo, ni Yohana ndombomunu:
Philipo, ni Bartelemayo, Thomaso, ni Mathayo mtoza ushuru, Yakhobo mwana ghwa Alfayo, ni Tadeo,
Simoni mkananayo, ni Yuda iskariote, ambaj'he ansaliti.
Abha kumi ni bhabhele Yesu abhatumili. Nu muene akabhaj'helekesya akajobha “Musiloti sehemu kwa bhitama mataifa na musijhingili mu miji ghya bhasamalia.
Badala j'hiakhe, mlotaghe kwa makondoo ghaghaj'haghili gha nyumba j'ha Israeli.
Na pamwilota muhubinaghe ni kujobha bhufalme bhwa mbinguni bhukaribiri.'
Mubhaponyaghe bha bhine, mubhafufulaghe bhafu, mutakasiaghe bhenye bhokhoma na mubhengai pepo. Mupokhiri mebhu, mupisiaghe mebhu.
Musitoli dhahabu, almasi au shaba mu pochi syinu.
Usitoli nkoba mu safuari j'hinu, au nghobho sya ziada, firatu au ndonga, kwa kuj'ha mmbombambombo ilondeka kukabha kyakulya kya muene.
Mji bhobhuaha bhola au kijiji kya mwibeta kuj'hingila, mulondayi ambaye ilondeka na mtamayi pala mpaka pa mwibhokha.
Pamwibeta kuj'hingila mu nyumba muponesiaghe,
endapo nyumba j'hilondeka amani j'hinu j'hisyalaghe pala, lakini kama nyumba j'hilondeka lepi, amani j'ha muenga j'hibhokaghe pamonga namu.
Na kwa bhala bhabhapokili lepi muenga au kubhap'helekesya malobhi ghinu, bhwakati mwibhoka mu nyumba au mji obhu, mwikipolosiayi mafumbo gha nyayo sya muenga mahala apu.
Kweli nikabhajobhela, j'hibetakuj'ha j'ha kustahimili zaidi miji ghya Sodoma ni Gomorah ligono lya hukumu kuliko mji obhu.
Langai, nikabhalaghisya kama kondoo pagati pa mbwamwitu, kwa henu, muj'hiaghe ni bherevu kama liyoko ni bhapole kama nj'hebha.
Muj'hiaghe bhaangalifu ni bhanu, bhibetakubhap'eleka mu mabaraza, na bhibetakubhatobha mu masinagogi.
Na mwibetakuletibhwa m'bele j'ha bhabhaha ni bhafalme kwa ndabha j'hangu, kama bhushuhuda kwa bhene ni kwa mataifa.
Pindi pabhibetakubhashutumu, musij'hi ni bhuogha jinsi gani au kiki kya kulongela, kwa kuj'ha k'henu kya kujobha mwibekupelibhwa kwa bhwakati bhobhuobhu.
Kwa kuj'ha sio muenga mwamwibeta kulongela, lakini Roho ghwa Tata j'hinu ibetakulongela, mugati mwinu.
Ndongo ibetakunjinukila ndongomunu kunkoma, ni tata kwa mwanabhe. Bhana bhibetakuj'hinuka dhidi j'ha bhazazi, ni kubhasababishila kufwa.
Namu nibetakudadibhwa ni kila munu kwandabha j'ha lihina lya nene. Lakini j'hej'hioha j'hola j'haibetakuvumilila mpaka kumwishu munu oyu ibetakuokolibhwa.
Pindi bhikabhatesya mu mji obhu, mujumbilayi mji ghwa ghifuatila, kwa kuwele nikabhajobhela mwibetalepi kuj'ha mulotilli mu miji ghioha ghya Israeli kabla ya mwana ghwa Adamu kukerebhuka.
Mwanafunzi nkholo lepi kuliko mwalimu ghwa muene, bhwala n'tumwa j'haaj'hele panani pa Bwana ghuake.
J'hitosya kwa mwanafunzi kuj'ha kama mwalimu ghwa muene ni n'tumishi kuj'ha kama Bwana ghwakhe. Ikaj'hiaghe bhankutili Bwana ghwa nyumba Belzabuli, ni kwa kiasi gani zaidi bhibetakubhakashfu bha nyumba j'hiakhe!
Hivyo basi musij'hi ni bhuogha kwa bhene, kwa kuj'ha lij'helepi lijambo ambalyo libetalepi kufunulibhwa na lij'hele lepi lyalikifighili ambalyo libetakwifigha.
Khela kyanikabhajobhela mu ngisi, musijobhi mu nuru, na kyamukakipeleka kwa bhulaini mu m'bolokhoto syinu, mukitangasiaghe mkaj'hiaghe panani pa nyumba.
Musibhatili bhala ambabho bhikhoma m'bhele lakini bhaj'helepi ni bhuwezo bhwa kukhoma roho. Badala j'hiakhe, mwuntilaghe j'hola ambaj'he j'haibhwesya kuj'hangamisya m'b'ele ni roho khola kuzimu.
Je kasuku bhabhele bhigolesibhwa lepi kwa senti idebe? Hata ivyo aj'helepi j'ha ibhwesya kubina pasi bila Tata j'hinu kumanya.
Lakini hata idadi j'ha njuwili sa muenga sibhalangibhu.
Musij'hi ni hofu, kwa kuj'ha muj'he ni thamani zaidi kuliko kasuku bhingi.
Hivyo basi khila mmonga j'haibetakunikiri mb'ele sya bhanu, nani pia nibetakunkiri mbele sya Tata ghwangu j'haaj'hele kumbinguni.
Lakini muene j'haibetakunibela nene mbele sya bhanu, nani pia nibetakumb'ela mbele j'ha Tata ghwangu j'ha aj'hele kumbinguni.
Musifikiriri kuj'ha nihidili kuleta amani pa duniani. Nikahidi lepi kuleta amani, lakini bhupanga.
Kwa kuj'ha nahidili kumb'heka munu apinganaj'hi ni tata ghwake, ni binti dhidi j'ha nyinamunu, ni nkuwibhi dhidi j'ha mkwe ghwa muene.
Adui ghwa bhanu bhibhetakuj'ha bhala bha kunyumba kwa muene.
Muene j'ha an'ganili tata au mabhu zaidi kuliko nene oj'hu nikandondalepi. Na muene j'ha an'ganili nsongolo au mmenja zaidi kuliko nene oj'hu nikandondalepi.
Muene ambaj'he ibetalepi kup'enda nsalaba ni kunikhesya nene oj'hu nikandonda lepi.
Muene j'haibetakulonda maisha ibetakughaj'hasya. Lakini muene j'haibetakughaj'hasya maisha kwa ndabha j'hangu ibetakughakabha.
Muene j'haibetakubhakaribisya anikaribisi nene, ni muene j'haibetakunikaribisya nene an'karibisi muene j'ha anitumili nene.
Nu muene j'haibetakunkaribisya nabii kwa ndabha ndo nabii ibetakupokela thawabu j'ha nabii. Nu muene j'haibetakun'karibisya mwenye haki kwa ndabha ndo munu ghwa haki ibetakupokela thawabu kwa munu ghwa haki.
J'hoj'hioha j'haibetakumpela mmonga ghwa bhadebe abha, hata kikombi kya masi gha kunywa masisimu, kwa ndabha muene ndo mwanafunzi, kweli nikabhajobhela, muene ibhwesyalepi kudula kwa nj'hela j'hoj'hioha thawabu j'hiakhe.
Ikabhwa baada j'ha Yesu kumala kubhaj'helekesya bhanafunzi bha muene kumi na bhabhele abhokhili pala kulota kumanyisya ni kuhubiri mu miji ghiabhu,
ni Yohana bho aj'he kuligereza bho ap'heliki aj'hele panani pa matendo gha Kristu, alaghisye bhujumbe kup'etela bhanafunzi bha muene,
na bhakankota, “Bhebhe ndo j'hola j'ha ihida, au aj'hele j'hongi twilondeka kundendela?”
Yesu ajibili nikujobha kwa bhene “'Mulotayi mukan'jobhilayi Yohana ghala gha mukaghabhona ni kughap'heleka.
Bhanu bhabhilolalepi bhibeta kulola, viwete bhibeta kutakasibhwa, bhana bhabhipeleke lepi bhib'eta kup'eleka kabhele, bhana bhabhafuili bhibetakufufulibhwa kukabha bhuhai, na bhanu bhabhilonda bhihubiriwa habari jhinofu.
Na abarikibhu jhola jhaibhonalepi shaka juu jha nene.
Pindi bhanu abha bhobhabhokili, Yesu akaj'handa kujobha ni bhumati kuhusu Yohana, “Kiki mwalotili kulola kulijangwa__lidete lihugunisibhwa ni mp'ongo?
Lakini kiki mwalotili kubhona__munu j'haafuele mavazi mololo? Hakika, bhala bhabhifuala mavazi mololo bhitama mu nyumba sya bhafalme.
Lakini mwabhokhili kulola kiki-Nabii? Ena, nikabhajobhela, na zaidi j'ha Nabii.
Oj'ho ndo aj'handikibhu, 'Langai, nikandaghisya mjumbe ghwangu mbele j'ha uso bhuakhu, ambaj'he ibetakuandala nj'hela j'ha bhebhe mbele j'ha bhebhe.
Nene nikabhajobhela bhukweli, kati j'ha bhabhahogoliki ni bhadala aj'helepi j'haaj'he m'mbaha kuliko Yohana Mbatizaji. Lakini aj'hele n'debe mu bhufalme bhwa mbinguni ndo mmbaha kuliko muene.
Kuhoma magono gha Yohana Mbatizaji mpaka henu, bhufalme bhwa mbinguni ni bhwa ngofu, na bhanu bhenye ngofu, bhikautola kwa ngofu.
Kwa kuj'ja manabii ni sheria, imekuwa bhakitabiri mpaka kwa Yohana.
Na kama muj'hela tayari kuj'hetekela, oj'ho ndo Eliya, j'hoola j'haihida.
J'haaj'hele ni mbolokhoto sya kup'heleka na ap'helekai.
Nikil'eng'enesiayi ni kiki kizazi e'khe? ni mfwanu ghwa bhana bhabhikhina maeneo gha pa soko, babhitama ni kukutana
ni kujobha, 'Twabhakhobhili zamori na mwakinilepi. Twaombolizi, na mwal'elililepi.'
Kwa kuj'ha Yohana ahidili bila kulya nkate au kunywa mvinyo, na bhakaj'ha bhijobha, 'Aj'he ni pepo.'
Mwana ghwa Adamu ahidili akaj'ha ilya ni kunywa na bhajobhili 'Langai, munu mlyaji ni n'defi, nkamu ghwa bhatoza ushuru na bhenye dhambi!' Lakini heshima j'hidhihirishibhwa kwa matendo ghakhe.”
Yesu aj'handili kuj'hikhemela miji ambamo baadhi j'ha matendo ghakhe gha ajabu ghabhombiki, kwa ndabha bhabeli kutubu,
Ole bhwakhu, Kolazini, Ole bhwakhu Bethsaida! Kama matendo mabhaha ngaghabhombiki Tiro ni Sidoni ghala ghaghabhombiki apa, ngabhaj'hele bhamali kutubu muandi kwa kufuala magunila ni kubakala malyenge.
Lakini j'hibetakuj'ha bhuvumilivu kwa Tiro ni Sidoni ligono lya hukumu kuliko kwa bhene.
Bhebhe, Kapernaum, ghwidhanila ghwibetakuj'hinulibhwa hadi kumbinguni? Lepi ghwibeta kuselesibhwa hadi pasi kuzimu. Kama kwa Sodoma ni kubhombibhwa matendo mabhaha, kama kyaghabhombiki kwa bhebhe, ngaj'hij'hele hadi lelu.
Bali nijobha kwa bhebhe kuj'ha j'hibetakuj'ha rahisi kwa nchi j'ha Sodoma kuj'hema ligono lya hukumu kuliko bhebhe.
Katika muda obho Yesu ajobhili, “Nikusifu bhebhe, Tata, Bwana ghwa Mbingu ni Nchi, kwa ndabha ghwabhafighili mambo agha bhenye hekima ni bhufalme, ni kiughafunula kwa bhasio ni elimu, kama bhana bhadebe.
Tata kwa kuj'ha j'hakupendisi naha pamihu pa bhebhe.
Mambo agha ghakabidhibhu kwa nene kuhoma kwa Tata. Na aj'helepi j'ha ammanyili mwana isipokuj'ha Tata, na aj'helepi j'haammanyili Mwana, na j'hej'hioha j'hola ambaj'he Mwana aj'he ni hamu j'ha kumfunulila.
Muhidai kwa nene, muenga mwebhobha mwamisumbulibhwa ni kuelemebhwa ni misighu misitu, nani nibetakukup'omosesya.
Mwikipelai nira j'hangu ni mwikifundisiaghe kuhoma kwa nene, kwa kuj'ha nene ne nyenyekevu na mololo ghwa muoyo na mwikabha kuj'homosekelu ka nafsi syenu.
Kwa kuj'ha nira j'hangu j'hilaini ni misighu ghiangu mipepe.
Bhwakati obhu Yesu alotili ligono lya sabato kup'hetela mumigonda. Bhanafunzi bha muene bha j'hele ni njala na bhakayanda kughadumula masuke ni kulya.
Lakini Mafarisayo bho bhabhuene aghu, bhakan'jobhela Yesu “Langai bhanafunzi bha j'hobhi bhifunja sheria bhibhomba ligono lyaliruhusibhu lepi ligono lya Sabato”
Lakini Yesu akabhajobhela, “Msomilepi jinsi Daudi kya abhombili, bhwakati aj'hele ni njala, pamonga ni bhana bha aj'he nabhu?
Namna kyaaj'hingili mgati mu nyumba j'ha K'yara ni mikate ghya bhonyesho, ambaghyo ghyaj'hele lepi halali kwa muene kulya ni bhala bhaaj'hele nabhu, ila halali kwa Makuhani?
Bado musomilepi mu sheria, kuj'ha ligono lya Sabato Makuhani mugati mu lihekalu j'hikainajisi Sabato, lakini bhaj'helepi ni hatia?
Lakini nijobha kwa muenga kuj'ha j'ha aj'he mmbaha kuliko hekalu aj'he apa.
Kama ngamumanyi ej'he j'himaanisha kiki; nilonda rehema na sio dhabihu ngamubhahukumuili lepi bhabhaduli hatia,
Kwa kuj'ha Mwana ghwa Adamu ndij'je Bwana ghwa Sabato.”
Kisha Yesu akabhoka pala akalota mu lisinagogi lyabhu.
Langaghe twaj'hele ni munu j'haapozili kibhoko. Mafarisayo bhakankota Yesu, bhakajobha. “'Je, ndo halali kuponesya ligono lya Sabato?” ili bhabhwesiaghe kumshtaki kwa kubhomba dhambi.
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Niani kati j'ha muenga, ambaj'he ikaj'hiaghe ni likondoo limonga, ligono e'lu likabina mu lil'ende ligono lya sabato, ibetalepi kun'kamula ni kumbosya kwa ngofu ligono lya sabato mulil'ende?
Je, k'heleku kyakij'hele ni thamani, zaidi hoti, si zaidi j'ha likondoo! Henu ni halali kubhomba manofu ligono lya Sabato.”
Kisha Yesu akabhajobhela munu y'ola, “Nyoosyaghe kibhoko” Akanyosya, na ukakabha afya, kama bhongi bhola.
Lakini Mafarisayo bhakap'hita kwibhala ni kupanga jinsi j'ha kunjangamisya bhakalota kwibhala kupanga kinyume kyake. Bhaj'hele bhilonda jinsi j'ha kun'koma.
Yesu bho aj'helibhu e'le akabhoka apu. Bhanu bhingi bhakan'kesya na akabhaponya bhoha.
Akabhalaghisya bhasihidi bhakambomba amanyikanai kwa bhangi,
kwamba j'hitimilayi j'hela kweli, j'haj'hikajobhibhu ni nabii Isaya, akajobha,
Langai, mtumishi bhwangu j'hanin'salili n'ganwa ghwangu, kwa muene nafsi j'ha nene j'hihobhwiki. Nibetakubheka Roho j'hangu panani pa muene, na ibetakutangasya hukumu kwa Mataifa.
Ibetalepi kuhangaika bhwala kulela kwa ngofu; bhwala j'hoj'hioha j'hola kup'heleka sauti j'ha muene mitaani. Ibetalepi kulidumula lidete lyalichubulibhu;
ibetalepi kusimisya bhutambi bhobhuoha bhwabhwihomesya liosi, mpaka pa mwibeta kuleta hukumu na j'hitolaghe.
Ni Mataifa bhibetakuj'ha ni bhujasiri mu lihina lyake.
Munu fulani kipofu ni bubu, j'haapagawa ni pepo aletibhu mbele j'ha Yesu. Amponyisi, pamonga ni matokeo gha munu bubu ajobhili ni kulola.
Makutano bhoha bhashangale ni kujobha, “J'hibhwesekana munu oj'ho muana ghwa Daudi?”
Lakini pindi Mafarisayo bho bhap'heliki muujiza obho bhakajobha, “Munu oj'ho ibhosya lepi pepo kwa ngofu sya muene isipokuj'ha kwa ngofu sya Belzebuli, m'baha ghwa pepo.
“Lakini Yesu amanyili fikra sya bhene na akabhajobhela, “Kila bhufalme bhwa bhugawanyiki bhuene bhwiharibika, ni khila mji au nyumba j'haj'higawanyika j'hiene j'hij'hema lepi.
Ikaj'hiaghe Syetani, ibetakumbosya Syetani, basi ikipinga mu nafsi j'ha muene.
Ni namna gani bhufalme bhwake bhwibeta kuj'hema? Na kama nibhosya pepo kwa ngofu sya Belizabuli, bhafuasi bhinu bhibetakubhosya kwa nj'hela j'ha niani? Kwa ndabha j'ha e'le bhibetakuj'ha mahakimu bhinu.
Na kama nibhosya pepo kwa ng'hofu sya Roho ghwa K'yara, basi bhufalme bhwa K'yara bhuhidili kwa muenga.
Na munu ibetakubhwesya bhuli kuj'hingila mu nyumba j'ha munu mwenye nghofu ni kuh'eja, bila kun'konga mwenye nghofu hosi? Ndipo ibetakuh'eja mali ghakhe kuhoma mugati mu nyumba.
J'hej'hoiha j'hola j'haabeli kuj'ha pamonga nani aj'he kinyume ni nene, ni j'haibetalepi kubhongan'ya pamonga nani oj'hu itabhwanya.
Kwa hiyo nijobha kwa muenga, kila dhambi ni kufuru bhana bhibetakusamehebhwa, ila kun'kufuru Roho Mtakatifu bhibetakusamehebhwalepi
. Na j'hej'hioha j'haijobha lilobhi kinyume kya Mwana ghwa Adamu, e'lu libetakusamehebhwa. Lakini j'hej'hioha j'hola j'haijobha kinyume ni Roho Mtakatifu, oj'hu ibetalepi kusamehebhwa mu bhulimwengu obho, na bhwala bhola bhwa bhwihida.
Ama ubhombaghe libehe kuj'ha linofu ni litunda lyake kuj'ha linofu, au uharibuaj'hi litunda ni libehe lyake, kwa kuj'ha libehe litambulisibhwa kwa litunda lyakhe.
Muenga kizazi kya liyoka, muenga bhaovu, mwebhwesya bhuli kujobha mambo manofu? Kwa kuj'ha kinywa kijobha kuhoma mu akiba j'ha ghaghaj'hele mu muoyo.
Munu nnofu mu akiba j'hinofu j'ha muoyo bhwake ghihoma manofu, na munu muovu mu akiba ovu j'ha muoyo bhwake ghwih'omesya kyakyaj'hele kiovu.
Nikabhajobhela kuj'ha mu ligono lya hukumu bhanu bhibetakuh'omesya hesabu j'ha khila lilobhi lyalij'helepi ni maana lyabhalijobhili.
Kwa kuj'ha malobhi gha j'hobhi ghwibetakubhalangibhwa haki ni kwa malobhi gha j'hobhi ghwibetahukumibhwa.”
Kisha baadhi j'ha bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo bhan'jibili Yesu bhakajobha” Mwalimu, tulondeghe kubhona ishara kuhoma kwa bhebhe.” Lakini Yesu akajibu ni kubhajobhela, “Kizazi kiovu na lya zinaa kilonda ishara.
Lakini j'hij'helepi ishara j'haj'hibetakupisibhwa kwa bhene isipokuj'ha j'hela ishara j'ha Yona nabii.
Kama vile nabii Yona kyaaj'hele mugati mu lileme lya somba m'baha kwa magono madatu pamusi ni pakilu, hivyo ndivyo Mwana ghwa Adamu kyaibetakuj'ha mugati mu mioyo ghya nchi kwa magono madatu pamusi ni pakilu.
Bhanu bha ninawi bhibetakuj'hema mbele j'ha hukumu pamonga ni kizazi kya bhanu abha ni bhibetakukihukumu. Kwa kuj'ha bhatubuili kwa mahubiri gha Yona, na langai, munu fulani m'baha kuliko Yona apa.
Malkia ghwa kusini ibetakujhinuka mu hukumu pamonga ni bhanu bha kizazi e'khe ni kukihukumu. Ahidili kuhoma miisho ghya dunia kuhida kup'heleka hekima j'ha Selemani, na langai, munu fulani m'baha kuliko Selemani aj'hele apa.
Bhwakati pepo bhachafu bhakamboka munu ghip'heta mahali papaj'helepi ni masi ilonda kup'homoseka, lakini akapabhona lepi.
Kisha ijobha, “Nibetakherebhuka mu nyumba j'hangu j'hanihomili.' Paikherebhuka akajhikholela nyumba j'hisafishibhu na ij'hele tayari.
Kisha huenda ni kubhaleta bhangi roho bhachafu saba bhabhaj'hele bhabhibhi zaidi kuliko muene, ghihida kutama ghoha pala. Ni hali j'hiakhe j'ha mwisho huwa j'hibhibhi kuliko j'ha kubhwandelu. Efe ndo kyaj'hibeta kuj'ha kwa kizazi ekhe kiovu.
Bhwakati Yesu ilongela ni bhumati langai, nyinamunu ni bhalongomunu bhakhaj'hema kwibhala, bhakaj'ha bhilonda kulongela nakhu.
Munu mmonga akan'jobhela, “Langai nyinuaku ni bhalongobhu bhaj'hemili kwibhala bhilonda kulongela ni bhebhe”.
Lakini Yesu ni kun'jobhela j'haan'jobheleghe, “Mabhu ndo niani? Ni bhalongobhangu ndo bha niani?”
Nu muene akanyosya kibhokho kya muene kwa bhanafunzi ni kujobha, “Langai abha ndo mabhu ni bhalongobhangu!
Kwa kuj'ha j'hej'hioha j'hola j'haibhomba mapenzi gha Tata ghwangu j'haaj'hele kumbinguni, munu oj'hu ndo ndongobhangu, n'dombo bhangu ni mabhu ghwa nene”.
Ligono e'lu Yesu abhokili pa nyumba ni kutama kando j'ha bahari.
Bhumati m'baha bhwakusanyiki ni kun'syonghoka, aj'hingili mugati mu bhuatu ni kutama. Bhumati bhuoha bhwa j'hemili kando j'ha bahari.
Kisha Yesu akajobha malobhi ghamehele kwa mifuano, Akajobha, “Langai, mpanzi alothili kubhiala.
Bho ibhiala baadhi j'ha mbeyu syabinili kando j'ha nj'hela ni fidege fikahida fikadonola.
Mbeyu seng'he syabinili panani pa muamba, ambapo syakabhili lepi bhud'hopi bhwa kutosha. Ghafla sikakhipula kwa ndabha bhud'hopi bhwaj'helepi ni kina.
Lakini lij'hobha bho liyakili syanyanyibhu kwandabha syaj'helepi ni mizizi, na syaj'homili.
Mbeyu s'enge syabinili mu bhud'hopi bhunofu, mbeyu senge syabinili mu mab'ehe gha mifwa. Mab'ehe ghenye mifwa j'halotili kunani ghikaip'eta.
Mbeyu s'enge syabinili mu bhud'hopi bhunofu ni kuhogola mbeyu, s'enge mara mia moja zaidi, s'enge sitini ni s'enge thelathini
J'haaj'hele ni mb'holokhoto na ap'elekai.
Bhanafunzi bhakahida ni kun'jobhela Yesu, “Kwa ndabha j'ha kiki ghwilongela ni makutano kwa mifano?”
Yesu akajibu akabhajobhela, “Mup'helibhu bhupendeleo bhwa mbinguni, bali bhene bhapelibhulepi.
Lakini j'hej'hioha j'haaj'henaku, kwa muene ibetakuj'hongesibhwa nesu, na ibetakukabha faida ibhaha nesu. Ila j'haabelikuj'ha naku hata khela kidebe kyaaj'henaku ipokibhwa. .
Hivyo nilongela nabhu kwa mifano kwa ndabha ingabhwa bhilola, bhasibhoni kweli. Na ingabhwa bhip'heleka, bhasip'heleki bhwala kumanya.
Bhunabii bhwa Isaya bhutimili kwa bhene, bhola bhwabhwijobha, “Pamwip'heleka mup'helekayi, lakini kwa namna j'hej'hioha mwibetalepi kuj'helebhwa; bhwakati pamwilola mubhwesiayi kulola, lakini kwa namna j'hej'hioha j'hela musimanyi.
Na mioyo ghya bhanu abha j'himalikuj'ha ngisi, ni figumu kup'heleka na bhafumbili mihu gha bhene, ili bhasibhwesi kulola kwa mihu gha bhene, au kup'heleka kwa mb'olokhoto sya bhene, au kumanya kwa mioyo ghya bhene, hivyo ngabhanisanikili kabhele na nganibhaponyisi.'
Bali mihu gha j'homu ghabarikibhu, kwa ndabha ghilola, ni mbolokhoto sya j'homu kwa kuj'ha sip'heleka.
Hakika nikabhajobhela manabii bhingi ni bhanu bhabhajhele ni haki bhaj'hele ni hamu j'ha kughabhona mambo ghala gha mkaghabhona, na bhabhwesilepi kughabhona. Bhanyonyweghe kup'heleka mambo agha gha mwip'heleka, bhashindilu kughap'heleka.
Henu mp'helekhesiayi mfuano ghwa mpanzi.
Bhwakati j'hej'hioha pa ip'heleka lilobhi lya mfalme na asilimanyi, ndipo mwovu ihida ni kukitola kyakimalikuj'ha kimali kubhyalibhwa mugati mu n'teema ghwakhe. Ej'he ndo mbeyu j'hela j'haj'habhyalibhu kando j'ha nj'hela.
Muene j'ha abhyalibhu mu miamba ndo j'hola j'haip'heleka lilobhi ni kulijamb'elela nyata kwa kuhobhoka.
Bado aj'helepi ni mizizi mugati mwake, ila isindamala kwa muda bhudebe. Bhwakati matatisu au malombosi paghihida kwandabha j'ha lilobhi ikwikungufula ghafla.
Jhaabhyalibhu kati j'ha mabehe ghya mifwa oj'ho ndo j'hola j'haap'heliki lilobhi lakini malombosi gha bhulimwengu ni bhusiobhi bhwa bhutajiri bhukalisiobha lela lilobhi lisihidi likahogola matunda.
J'haabhyalibhu mu bhud'opi bhunofu, oj'ho ndo j'hola j'haip'heleka lilobhi ni kulimanya. Oj'ho ndo j'hola j'haihogola matunda ni kuj'hendelela kuhogola limonga zaidi j'ha mara mia, s'enge sitini, s'enge thelathini.”
Yesu akabhap'ela mfuano bhongi. Akajobha, “Bhufalme bha kumbinguni bhwifananisibhwa ni munu j'ha abhiele mbeyu sinofu mu n'gonda ghwake.
Lakini bhanu bho bhisinjila, adui akahida akabhiala mag'ug'u pagati pa ngano kisha akabhoka.
Baadaye ngano bho j'himelili ni kuhomesya mazao ghake, ndipo mag'ug'u ghakaj'ha ghihomisi na ghene.
Ni bhatumishi bha n'kolo nyumba bhakahida bhakan'jobhela, 'Bwana, ghwabhiele lepi mbeyu j'hinofu mu n'gonda? J'hij'hebhuli henu lij'hele ni maghogho?
Akabhajobhela, Adui abhombili e'le.' Bhatumishi bhakan'jobhela, “Kwa hiyo ghwilonda tulotaj'hi tukaghabhosi?”
N'kolo n'gonda akajobha, 'Lepi, bhwakati mwidupula maghogho mwibeta kudupula pamonga ni ngano.
Mughalekai ghakholayi pamonga hadi bhwakati bhwa mavuno. Bhwakati bhwa mavuno nibetakujobha kwa bhavunaji, 'Kwanza mughadupulayi maghogho na mughakonga matita matita ni kughanyanya, lakini mukhonganiayi ngano mu lighala lyangu.””
Kisha Yesu akabhahomesela mfuano bhongi. Akajobha, “Bhufalme bhwa mbinguni bhwifanana ni mbeyu j'ha haradali ambaj'ho munu aitolili ni kuj'hibhiala mu n'gonda ghuake.
Mbeyu ej'he kwa hakika ndo j'hidebe kuliko mbeyu s'enge sioha. Lakini paj'himela j'hiha m'baha kuliko mimea ghenge ghioha ghwa bustani, ghwij'ha lib'ehe, kiasi kwamba fidege fya kunani fihida ni kujenga fiseiswi mu matafi ghake.”
Akabhajobhela mfuano bhongi kabhele.”Bufalme bhwa mbinguni ni kama chachu j'hela j'haj'hitabhwalibhu ni n'dala ni kuj'hichanganya kwa fipemo fidatu kwa sembe mpaka fiumukai.
Agha ghoha Yesu aghajobhili mu bhumati kwa mifuanu. Na bila mifuano ajobhilepi khenu kwa bhene.
E'j'he j'haj'hele kuj'ha khela kyakimali kujobhibhwa kup'hetela kwa nabii kibhwesiaghe kutimila, pala paajobhili, “Nibetakufumbula kinywa kyangu mu mifuano. Nibetakujobha mambo ghala ghaghaj'hele gha figheme kuhomela misingi ghya bhulimwengu”.
Kisha Yesu abhaleka makutano ni kulota kunyumba. Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'kesya ni kujobha, “Tufafanulilayi mfano ghwa maghogho gha mun'gonda.
Yesu ajibili ni kujobha, “J'haibhiala mbeyu j'hinofu ndo Mwana ghwa Adamu.
N'gonda ndo bhulimwengu; ni mbeyu j'hinofu ndo abha bhana bhufalme. Maghogho ndo bhana bha j'hola mwovu, na adui j'haasibhiele ndo ibilisi.
Na mavuno ndo mwisu ghwa bhulimwengu, na bhavunaji ndo malaika.
Kama vile maghogho kyaghibhonganibhwa ni kunyanyibhwa muoto, efyo ndivyo kyaj'hibeta kuj'ha mwisu ghwa bhulimwengu.
Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakubhalaghisya malaika bha muene, ni kubhonganiya kuhoma mu bhufalme bhuakhe mambo ghoha ghaghasababisibhu dhambi ni bhala bha bhibhomba maasi.
Bhibetakubhatagha bhoha mu litanuru lya muoto, ambako kubeta kuj'ha ni kilelu ni kusiagha minu.
Ndipo bhanu bhenye haki babhibetakung'ara kama lijobha mu Bhufalme bhwa Tata j'habhu. Muene j'ha aj'hele ni mbolokhoto na ap'helekai.
Bhufalme bhwa mbinguni ni kama hazina j'haj'hifighibhu mu n'gonda. Munu kama ajhibuene ni kuj'hifigha. Mu furaha j'hiakhe akalota kuhemelesya fyoha fya aj'he nafu, ni kuhemela n'gonda.
Kabhele, bhufalme bhwa mbinguni ni kama munu j'ha thamani.
Bhwakati bho aj'hibhuene j'hela j'haj'hij'hele ni thamani, akalota akahemelesya kila khenu kyaaj'henaku na akaj'hihemela.
Bhufalme bhwa mbinguni ni kama nkwabhu bhwabhujele mmasi, na kwamba ghwibhonganisya fiumbe fya kila aina.
Bhobhamemili bhavuvi bhaufutili pa lubhafu. Kisha bhakatama pasi bhakabhonganiya fenu finofu mugati mu k'henu, lakini fya fibelikuj'ha ni thamani fyataghibhu kutali.
J'hibeta kuj'ha namna ej'he mu mwisu ghwa dunia. Malaika bhibetakuhida ni kubhatenga bhanu bhaovu kuh'oma miongoni mwa bhenye haki.
Ni kubhatagha mugati mu litanuru lya muoto, ambako kubetakuj'ha ni maombolezo ni kusiagha minu.
Mughamanyili mambo ghoha agha? Bhanafunzi bhan'jibili,
“Ena.”Kisha Yesu akabhajobhela, “Khila mwandishi ambaj'he aj'hele mwanafunzi ghwa bhufalme ibhwaningana ni n'kolo nyumba j'haihomesya fenu mu hazina j'ha muene fipya ni filala.”
Ikaj'ha Yesu bho amalili mifano ghioha eghu, akabhoka pa sehemu ej'hu.
Kisha Yesu akafika mu mkoa ghwa muene na akabhafundisya bhanu mu masinagogi. Matokeo ghake ni kuj'ha bhasyangele ni kujobha, “Ndaku munu oj'ho pa akabhili hekima ej'he ni miujiza eghe?
Munu oj'ho si mwana ghwa seremala? Mariamu nyinamunu lepi? ni bhalongomunu Yakobo, Yusufu, Simoni ni Yuda?
Ni bhalomb'omuni tuj'henabhu apa patete? Basi munu oj'ho aghakabhili ndaku ghoha agha?”.
Akabhadadisya. Lakini Yesu akabhajobhela, “Nabii ikosalepi kuj'ha ni heshima isipokuj'ha kwa bhene ni nchi j'ha bhene.
Na abhwesilepi kubhomba miujiza mingi kwa ndabha bhaj'helepi ni imani naku.
Kwa bhwakati obhu, Herode ap'heliki habari juu j'ha Yesu.
Akabhajobhela bhatumishi bha muene, “Oj'ho ndo Yohana Mbatizaji afufuiki kuhoma kwa bhafu. Kwa hiyo ngofu ise sijhele juu j'hiakhe.”
Kwa kuj'ha Herode aj'hele akamuili Yohana akankonga ni kun'tagha gerezani kwa ndabha ya Herodia, n'dala ghwa Filipo kaka j'hiake.
Kwa kuj'ha Yohana an'jobhili, “Si halali kun'tola muene kuj'ha n'dala munu.”
Herode ngaan'komili lakini abhatilili bhanu kwa ndabha bhambwene Yohana kuj'ha nabii.
Lakini ligono lya kuhogoleka Herode bho afikili mwali Herodia amoghili pagati pa bhanu ni kumfurahisya Herode.
Katika kujibu kili ahidili kwa kulapa kuj'ha ibetakumpela kyokyoha kyaibetakus'oma.
Baada j'ha kushauribhwa ni nyinamunu, akajobha, “Nipelayi neno apa mutu bhwa Yohana Mbatizaji.”
Mfalme aj'hele ni sikitiko kwa maombi gha binti, lakini kwa ndabha j'ha bhoha bha bhaj'hele chakulani pamonga nu muene aamuiri kuj'ha j'hilondeka j'hibhombekaghe.
Alaghisye Yohana aletibhwaghe kuhomela gerezani
ili adumulibhwaghe mutu na kyaletibhu nu lisinia nu kupelibhwa binti na akakipeleka kwa nyinamunu.
Kisha bhanafunzi bha muene bhakahida kuutola m'bele ni kubhusiela, baada j'ha e'le bhakalota kun'jobhela Yesu.
Ni muene Yesu bho ap'heliki agha, akakitenga kuhoma mahali pala akapakama mu mashua akalota sehemu j'haj'hitengibhu. Bhwakati bhumati bhumanyili kwaalotili, bhankesili kwa mag'olo kuhoma mijini.
Kisha Yesu akahida mbele j'ha bhene akabhubhona bhumati m'baha. Akabhabhonera k'hesa ni kubhaponya bhubhina bhwabho
Kimihi bho kifikiri, bhanafunzi bhakahida kwa muene nikujobha, “E'j'he sehemu j'ha jangwa ni ligono tayari limalili kulota. Bhatabhwanyisiayi makutano ili bhalota kufijijini bhakahemelayi fyakulya kwandabha j'ha bhene.
Lakini Yesu akabhajobhela, “Bhaj'helepi ni haja j'ha kul'ota. Mubhap'elayi muenga kyakulya”
Bhakan'jobhela, “Lepi tuj'henaj'hu mikate mihanu ni somba sibhele tu.”
Yesu akajobha, Mughiletayi kwa nene.”
Kisha Yesu akamuru bhumati kutama pasi pa manyasi. Akalota mikate mihano ni somba sibhele. Akalanga kunani kumbinguni, akabariki ni kumetula mikate akabhapela bhanafunzi. Bhanafunzi bhakaupela umati.
Bhakalya bhoha na bhakatupilwa. Kisha bhakafibhonganiya fipaku kumi na fibhele.
Bhala bhabhalili bhakadiribhhu kuj'ha bhagosi elfu tano bila j'ha kubhalangibhwa bhadala ni bhana.
Mara moja akabhaamuru bhanafunzi bhaj'hingilayi mugati mu mashua, bhwakati bhobhuobhu muene akabhalagha bhumati bhalota nabhu.
Baada j'ha kubhulagha bhumati ni kwilotela, akakuela panani pa kid'honda kus'oma muene. Bwakati ij'hele kimihi aj'hele okhu muene.
Lakini henu mashua ij'hele katikati j'ha bahari jhidengadenga kwandabha j'ha manyegha, kwani mp'ongo bhwaj'hele bhwa mpisho
Bhwakati pakilu kya zamu j'ha nne Yesu abhakaribiri, akaj'haigenda panani pa masi.
Bhwakati bhanafunzi bha muene bha mbwene igenda panani pa masi gha bahari, bhakahofu ni kujobha, “E'le lij'hogij'hogi” ni kukwesya sauti katika hali j'ha bhuogha.
Yesu akabhajobhela mara moja, akajobha, “Mwikipelayi muoyo! ndo nene! musitili.”
Petro akan'jibu kwa kujobha, “Bwana, kama ndo bhebhe, niamuruayi nihidai panani pa masi kwa bhebhe.”
Yesu akajobha, “Hidayi.” Hivyo Petro akapita mugati mu mashua ni kugenda panani pa masi kul'ota kwa Yesu.
Lakini Petro bho abhuene manyegha, akatila, ni kubhwanja kujhibhila, pasi, akakuta sauti ni kujobha, “Bwana, niokolayi!”
Yesu manyata akanyosya kibhoko kya muene akanjinula Petro ni kuj'obhela, “Bhebhe mwenye imani j'hidebe, kwa ndabha j'ha kiki likaj'hele ni bhuogha?”
Ndipo Yesu ni Petro bho bhaj'hingili mu mashua, mp'ongo ukagudama kubhuma.
Bhanafunzi mashuani bhakamwabudu Yesu ni kujobha, “Kuweli bhebhe ndo Mwana ghwa K'yara.”
Na bho bhamalili kulobhoka, bhakafika mu nchi j'ha Genesareti.
Ni bhanu pa lieneo lela bhobhammanyili Yesu, bhalaghisye bhujumbe kila sehemu sya kando, ni kundeta khila j'haaj'hele n'tamu.
Bhakan'sihi kuj'ha bhabhwesiaghe kukamula pindo lya livazi lya muene, na bhingi bhabhakamuili bhaponyisibhu.
Ndipo Mafarisayo ni bhaandishi bhakahida kwa Yesu kuh'omela Yerusalemu. Ni kujobha,
“kwandabha j'ha kiki bhanafunzi bhikaghaharifu mapokelelu gha bhaseya? Kwa kuj'ha bhisamba lepi mabhokho gha bhene pa bhilya kyakulya.”
Yesu akabhajibu ni kubhajobhela, “Namu__kwa ndabha j'hakiki mukajhiharifu sheria j'ha Bwana kwa ndabha j'ha mapokelelu ghinu?
Kwa kuj'ha K'yara ajobhili, 'Uniheshimuaghe dadij'hu ni ndebhuaku; na 'J'haijobha bhuovu kwa dadij'he ni ndebhuakhe, hakika ifwa.'
Lakini muenga mwijobha, 'Khila j'haikombola dadij'he ni nyina, “'Kila msaada ambabho j'ha alondeghe kukabha kwa nene henu j'hibetakujha kuh'oma kwa K'yara,”'
“Munu oj'ho aj'helepi ni haja j'ha kun'heshimu dadij'he. Mu namna ej'he mulitenguili lilobhi lya K'yara kwa ndabha j'ha mapokelelu ghinu.
Enyi bhanafiki, ni vyema kama Isaya kyaatabiri juu j'ha muenga bho ajobhili,
'Bhanu abha bhakaniheshimu nene kwa milomo ghiabhu, lakini mioyo ghiabhu ghij'hele patali nani.
Bhaakaniabudu bure, kwa ndabha bhifundisya mafundisu ghaghaj'hele malaghisu gha bhanadamu.”'
Ndipo akabhakuta makutano ni kubhajobhela, “Mup'elekisiaghe ni kumanya__
Kij'helepi khenu kyakij'hingila mundomo mwa munu ni kumbomba najisi. Bali khela kyakih'oma mundomo, akebhai ndo najisi kwa munu.”
Ndipo bhanafunzi bhakandotela ni kujobha ni Yesu, “Je!, Umanyili Mafarisayo bho bhalipheliki lilobhi lela bha dadili?”
Yesu akabhajibu ni kujobha, “Khila mmea ambabho dadij'hangu ghwa mbinguni abhubhiele lepi bhwibeta kubhosibhwa.
Bhalekayi bhene, bhene bhalongosi fipofu. Kama munu kipofu akandongosya kipofu nyinu, bhoha bhabhele bhibetakudumbukila mu lilende.”
Petro akajibu ni kun'jobhela Yesu,” Tuj'helesiaghe mfano obho kwa tete,
Yesu akajibu, “Namu pia bado mwij'helebhwa lepi?
Muenga mumanyi lepi khila kyakhilota mundomo kup'etela mulileme ni kulota kuchoro?
Lakini fenu fyoha fyafihomela mundomo fihomela mugati mumuoyo. Ndivyo fenu fyafikampela munu bhunajisi.
Kwa kuj'ha mu muoyo ghihoma mabhwasu mabhibhi, bhukomaji, bhuzinzi, bhuasherati, bhuheji, bhushuhuda bhwa bhudesi, ni malighu.
Agha ndo mambo gha ghakamp'ela munu bhunajisi. Lakini kulya bila kusamba mabhokho kukambomba lepi munu kuj'ha najisi.”
Ndipo Yesu ibhoka mahala pala ni kwitenga kulotela pande sya miji ghya Tiro ni Sidoni.
Langai akahida n'dala Mkanani kuhomela lubhafu o'lu. Akakwesya sauti akajobha, “Unihurumilayi, Bwana, Mwana ghwa Daudi; binti j'hangu itesibhwa sana ni pepo.”
Lakini Yesu an'jibilepi lilobhi. Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakahida bhakan'sihi, bhakaj'ha bhijobha, “M'mbosiaghe alotaghe o'khu, mana akatuj'hweghela tu apa.”
Yesu akabhajibu ni kujobha, Nalaghisibhulepi kwa munu j'hej'hioha isipokuj'ha kwa kondoo bhabhaj'hangili mu nyumba j'ha Israeli.”
Lakini akahida ni kuj'hinama mbele j'ha muene, akajobha, “Bwana nisaidilayi.”
Akan'jibu ni kujobha, “Khinofu lepi kulota kyakulya kwa bhana ni kus'opela mabwa,”
Akajobha, “Ena, Bwana, hata mabwa madebe ghilya kyakulya kyakibina pameza mwa Bwana ghwabhi.”
Ndipo Yesu akajibu ni kujobha “N'dala, imani j'ha bhebhe m'baha. Na j'hibhombekaghe kwa bhebhe kama kyaghwilonda.” Ni binti ghwa muene amalikupontisibhwa bhwakati bhobhuobhu.
Yesu akabhoka mahala pala ni kulota karibu ni bahari j'ha Galilaya. Kisha akalota panani pa kid'onda ni kutama okhu.
Likundi libhaha kwa muene. Ni kundetela fiwete, fipofu, bubu, filema ni bhangi bhingi, bhabhaj'hele bhatamu. Bhabhakhili mu magholo gha Yesu na akabhaponya.
Nao bhumati bhukasyangala bho bhabhabhuene mabubu bhilongela, ni vilema bhakaj'ha bhasima, fiwete bhigenda, ni fipofu bhilola. Bhan'sifuili K'yara ghwa Israeli.
Yesu akabhakuta bhanafunzi bha muene ni kujobha, “'Nibhabhonili huruma bhumati, kwandabha bhaj'hele nani kwa magono madatu bila kilya khenu kyokioha khela. Nikabhalagha lepi bhalotayi kwa bhene bila kulya bhasije bhakazimila mu nj'hela.”
Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'jobhela, “Ndaku twibhwesya kukabha mikate ghya kutosya apa pa nyika ghya kushibisha umati m'baha obho?”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Muj'he ni mikate mil'enga?” Bhakajobha, “Saba, ni somba sidusu sudebe.”
Yesu akabhaamuru bhumati bhutamaghe pasi.
Akaghileta mikate j'hela saba ni somba, ni baada j'ha kushukuru, akaj'himetula ni kubhapela bhanafunzi.
Bhanafunzi bhakabhap'hela bhumati. Bhanu bhoha bhakalya ni kutosheka. Na bhakabhonganya mabaki gha vipandi fya fyakulya fyafibakili fipandifipandi, fyamemili fikapu saba.
Bhoha bhabhalili bhaj'hele bhagosi elfu nne bila bhadala ni bhana.
Kisha Yesu akabhulagha bhumati bhakilotilayi na akaj'hingila mu mashua ni kulota sehemu sya Magadani.
Mafarisayo ni Masadukayo bhakahida ni kunjera Yesu abhalasiaghe ishara j'haj'hihomela kunani.
Lakini Yesu akabhajibu ni kubhajobhela kuj'ha “Ikaj'hiaghe kimihi mwijobha kuj'ha hali j'ha hewa j'hinofu, kwa kuj'ha anga lidung'u.
Ni lukhela mwijobha 'Hali j'ha hewa lelu j'hinofu lepi kwa kuj'ha anga lidung'u ni mabhengu ghaj'hifuniki anga lioha.' Mmanyiri kufasiri mwonekanu ghwa anga, lakini j'hij'helepi kufasiri ishara sya bhwakati.
Kizazi kiovu ni kya bhuzinzi kilonda ishara, lakini j'hij'helepi ishara j'hej'hioha j'haj'hibetakupelibhwa, isipokughwa j'hala Yona. Kisha Yesu akabhaleka ni kubhoka.
Bhanafunzi bhakahida lubhafu lwa bhubhele, lakini bhaj'hele bhaj'habhilu kutola mikate.
Yesu akabhajobhela “Mwikitahadharishiayi na muj'helayi makini ni chachu j'ha Mafarisayo ni Masadukayo.”
Bhanafunzi bhakahojiana miongoni mwa bhene ni kujobha. “Kwa ndabha tukalotili lepi mikate.”
Yesu akalitambula e'lu ni kujobha, “Enyi j'ha muj'hele ni imani j'hidusu, kwa ndabha j'ha kiki mwibhuasya ni kujobhesana miongoni mwa j'humu ni kujobha kuj'ha kwa ndabha mkatolili ni kujobha kuj'ha kwa ndabha mkatolili lepi mikate?
Je bado mmanyili lepi bhwala mwikhomboka lepi j'hela mikate mihanu kwa bhanu elfu tano, ni fikapu filenga fyamwabhongene?
Au mikate saba kwa bhanu elfu nne, na fikapu lilenga mwafitolili?
J'hij'hebhuli hata mwej'helebhwa lepi kuja nizungumzileghe lepi kuhusiana ni mikate? Mukitunzaj'hi na mkitahadhariaj'hi ni chachu j'ha Mafarisayo ni Masadukayo.”
Kisha bhakamanya kuj'ha abhajobhilaghe lepi juu j'ha kujihadhari ni mikate j'haij'hele ni chachu, bali kujihadhari ni mafundisyo gha Mafarisayo ni Masadukayo.
Bhwakati Yesu afikiri sehemu sya Kaisaria j'ha Filipi, akabhakhota bhanafunzi bha muene, akajobha, “Bhanu bhijobha kuj'ha Mwana ghwa Munu niani?”
Bhaakajobha,” Bhangi bhijobha kuj'ha ni Yohana Mbatizaji; bhangi, Eliya; na bhangi Yeremia, au mmonga kati j'ha manabii.
Akabhajobhela, muenga mwijobha nene na niani?
Akajibu Simoni Petro akajobha, “Bhebhe ndo Kristu Mwana ghwa K'yara j'ha aj'he hai”
Yesu akan'jibu ni kun'jobhela, “Ubarikibhu bhebhe, Simoni Bar Yona, kwa kuj'ha muasi ni nyama fikakufunulili lepi e'le, bali Dadi j'hangu j'ha aj'he kumbinguni.
Nani pia nikabhajobhela kuj'ha bhebhe Petro, na panani pa muamba obhu nibetakulijenga likanisa lya nene. Miliangu ghya kuzimi ghib'hetalepi kulilenda.
Nibetakupela bhebhe fungulu sya bhufalme bhwa mbinguni. Kyokyoha kyaghwibetakukifunga pa duniani kibetakuj'ha kifungibhu kumbinguni, na kyokyoha kyakibetakufungulibhwa pa duniani basi kibeta kifungulibhu kumbinguni.”
Kisha Yesu akabhaamuru bhanafunzi bhasin'jobhela munu j'hej'hioha kuj'ha muene aj'hele Kristu.
Kuhomela bhwakati obhu Yesu akayanda kubhajobhela bhanafunzi kuj'ha ni lazima alotayi Yerusalemu, kutesibhwa kwa mambo mingi mu mabhoko gha bhaseya ni bhakholo bha makuhani ni bhaandishi, kukhomibhwa ni kufufuka ligono lya tatu.
Kisha Petro akan'tola Yesu palubhafu ni kum'besya kwa kujobha, “Jambo e'le na lij'helayi patali nabhi, Bwana, ej'he j'hikatakuh'omela kwa bhebhe.
Lakini Yesu akasanuka ni kun'jobhela Petro, “Kherukayi kunyuma j'ha nene syetani! Bhebhe ndo kizuizi kwa nene, kwa ndabha ghwijali lepi mambo gha K'yara, bali mambo gha bhanadamu.”
Kisha Yesu akabhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene, “Kama munu j'hej'hioha j'hailonda kunikesya nene ni lazima akibelai muene, atolai nsalaba ghwa muene na anifatayi.
Kwa kuj'ha j'hailonda kughaokola maisha gha muene akaghayasya na kwa yeyioha j'haibetakuyasya maisha gha muene kwa ndabha j'ha nene ibeta kughaokola.
Je! Khenu gani kyaibetakubhosya munu katika kusanusiana ni maisha gha muene?
Kwa kuj'ha Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakuhida mu bhutukufu bhwa Dadi munu ni malaika ghwake. Nu muene ibetakundepa khila munu kul'engana ni matendo gha muene.
Kweli nikabhajobhela kuna baadhi j'ha muenga mwamuj'hemili apa ambabho bhibetalepi kubhonja mauti mpaka pabhibetakumbona Mwana ghwa Adamu kya ihida mu bhufalme bhwa muene.
Magono sita baadaye Yesu abhatolili pamonga nu muene Petro, ni Yakobo, ni Yohana ndongomunu, na akabhatola mpaka panani pa kid'onda kitali bhabhu bhene.
Abadilisibhu mb'ele j'ha bhene. Pamihu pa muene pang'areghe kama lij'hobha, ni ngobho sya muene syabhonekene kung'ara kama nuru.
Langai, pala bhakatokili Musa ni Eliya bhakaj'habhilongela nakhu.
Petro akajibu ni kun'jobhela Yesu, “Bwana, ni kinofu kwa tete kuj'ha mahali apa. Kama ghwinoghela, nibetakujenga fibanda fidatu - kimonga kya bhebhe, ni kimonga kwa ndabha j'ha Musa, ni kimonga kwa ndabha j'ha Eliya.”
Bhwakati ilongela, langai libhengu libhalafu likabhafunika na langai, na j'hikah'omela sauti mulibhengu, j'hijobha, “Oj'ho ndo Mwanabhangu n'ganwa j'han'hobhwiki naghu. Mump'elekisiaghe muene.”
Bhanafunzi bho bhap'heliki aghu bhakabina kifudifudi na bhakatila sana.
Kisha Yesu akahida akabhakamula ni kujobha, “Muj'hinukayi musitili.”
Ni bhene bhakaj'hinula nyuso sya bhene kunani lakini bhambwene lepi munu isipokuj'ha Yesu muene.
Na bhobhiselela pa kid'onda, Yesu akalaghisya, akajobha, “Musih'omesi habari ya maono agha mpaka Mwana ghwa Adamu paibetakufufuka kuhoma kwa bhafu.”
Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'kota bhakajobha, “Kwa ndabha j'ha kiki bhaandishi bhijobha kuj'ha Eliya ibetakuhida hoti?
Yesu akabhajibu nikujobha, “Eliya ibetakuhida kweli na ibetakukherebhusya mambo ghoha.
Lakini nikabhajobhela muenga, Eliya amali kuhida, lakini bhakammanyi lepi. Baada j'hiake, bhambombili mambo gha bhitonda bhene. Na efyo ndo Mwana ghwa Adamu kyaibetakutesibhwa mu mabhokho gha bhene.
Ndipo bhanafunzi bhakatambula kuj'ha alongeleghe habari sya Yohana Mbatizaji.
Bhobhafikiri mu bhumati bhwa bhanu munu mmonga akabhalotela, akapiga magoti mbele sya muene, ni kun'jobhela,
“Bwana, un'hurumilayi mwanabhangu, maana aj'hele ni kifafa ni kuteseka sana. Kwa kuj'ha mara nyingi ibina mu muoto au mu masi.
Nandetili kwa bhanafunzi bha jhobi, lakini bhabhwesilepi kumponya.
Yesu akajibu akajobha, “Enyi kizazi kyaibetakukiera na kyakiharibiki nibetakutama ni muenga mpaka? Nibeta kuvumililana ni muenga mpaka ndali? Mundetayi apa kwa nene.”
Yesu akam'b'enga, ni pepo likabhoka. Nsongolo aponyisibhu kuh'omela lisaa lela.
Kisha bhanafunzi bhakan'kesya Yesu kwa siri ni kun'kota, “Kwa ndabha j'ha kiki twabhwesilepi kumb'enga?”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Kwa ndabha j'ha imani j'hinu ndebe. Kweli nikabhajobhela, kama mwibetakuj'ha ni imani hata ndebe kama punje j'ha mbeyu ya haradali, mwibeta kubhwesya kuujobhela kid'onda ek'he, kihamaghe kuhomela pala kilotayi khola, ni bhuene bhwibeta kuhama na kubetakujha lepi ni khenu kyokyoha khela kya kushindikanika kwa muenga.
Bhwakati bhajele bado Galilaya, Yesu akabhajobhela Bhanafunzi bha muene, “Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakubhakibhwa mu mabhoko gha bhanu.
Na bhibetakun'koma, na ligono lya tatu ibetakufufuka.” Bhanafunzi bhahuzuniki sana.
Na bhene bho bhafikiri Kapenaumu, bhanu bhabhikhonganiya kodi j'ha nusu shekheli bhakandotela Petro ni kujobha, “Je mwalimu ghwa muenga e'lepa kodi j'ha nusu shekheli?”
Akajobha, “Ena” Lakini Petro bho aj'hingili mugati mu nyumba, Yesu akalongela ni Petro h'oti ni kujobha, “Ghwifikirira kiki Simoni? Bhafalme bha dunia, bhipokela kodi au bhshuru kuhomela kwa niani? Kwa bhala bhabhikabhatabhwala kuh'oma kwa bhahesya?
Na bhwakati Petro ajobhili, “Kuhoma kwa bhahesya” Yesu akabhajobhela, hivyo bhatawalibhwa bhabhosibhu mu bhul'epaji.
Lakini tusihidi kubhabhomba bhatoza ushuru bhakabhomba dhambi, lotaghe kubahari, sopayi ndobhani, na ulayi somba hosi. Baada ya kuufungula ndomo bhwake, ghibeta kuj'hikholela mo'la shekeli j'himonga. J'hitolayi na ubhapelayi bhatoza ushuru kwa ndabha j'ha nene ni bhebhe.
Muda bhobhuobhu bhanafunzi bhakahida kwa Yesu ni kun'jobhela, “Niani mbaha mu bhufalme bhwa mbinguni?”
Yesu akankuta mwana n'debe akambheka pagati pa bhene, ni kujobha,
“Kweli nikabhajobhela, kama mtubwi lepi ni kujha kama bhana bhadebe mwibetalepi kujhingila mu ufalme bhwa K'yara.
Hiyo j'hej'hioha j'haikiselesya kama mwana n'debe, munu ojhu ibetakujha mmbaha mu ufalme bhwa K'yara kumbinguni.
Na yeyote j'ha ikanjamb'elela muana n'debe kwa lihina lya nene an'jamb'elili nene.
Lakini j'hej'hioha j'haibetakusababisya mmonga kati j'ha bhadebe abha bhabhakaniamini kuasi, ibetakuj'ha kinofu kwa munu oj'hu liganga likholo lya kusyaghila likakhongibhwa mu nsingu mwa muene, ni kusopibhwa kul'osi kunyanja.
Ole kwa dunia kwa ndabha j'ha bhwakati bhwa kudadisibhwa! kwa kuj'ha haina budi kwa nyakati esu kuhida, lakini ole ghwake kwa munu j'hola nyakati e'su sideta kuhida kwa ndabha j'ha muene!
kama kibhoko kya bhebhe au kigolo kikakusababishilayi kudada, uudumulayi ni kuutagha patali nabhi. Kinofu zaidi kwa bhebhe kujhingila mu bhuzima bila kibhoko au kilema, kuliko kutaghibhwa mu muoto bhwa milele akaj'helayi ni mabhoko ghoha ni magolo ghoha.
Kama lihu lya j'hobhi likakudadisiayi ulibhosiayi na ulitaghai kutali nabhi. Na kinofu zaidi kwa bhebhe uj'hingilayi hosi mu bhusima ni lihu limonga, kuliko kutaghibhwa mu muoto bhwa milele ukaj'helayi ni mihu ghoha.
Mulangayi kuj'ha musihidi mukan'jimula mmonga wa abha bhadebe. Kwa ndabha nikabhajobhela kuj'ha kumbinguni bhajhele malaika bha bhene magono ghoha bhakabhulanga bhuso bhwa Tata ghwangu j'haaj'hele kumbinguni.
(Zingatilayi: Malobhi ghaghibhonekana kama gha mstari ghwa 11, “Kwa kuj'ha Mwana ghwa Adamu ahidili kuokola khela kyakyaj'haghili” ghabhonekene lepi mu nakala bora sya muandi).
Mwifikirira kiki? Ikaj'hiaghe munu aj'he ni likondoo mia moja, na limonga likajhagha, je ibetakughaleka tisini na tisa kukid'onda ni kulota kulonda limonga lyalijhaghili?
Na akamalayi kulikabha, kweli nikabhajobhela akamfurahia kuliko bhala tisini na tisa bhabhabeli kujhagha.
Fefuefu, sio mapenzi gha Tata ghwinu g'hwa mbinguni kuj'ha mmonga ghwa bhadebe abha ajhangamilayi.
Kama ndongobhu akakuselayi, lotayi, kandasiayi dosari j'haj'hiyele kati ya bhebhe ni muene akaj'helayi muene. Kama ibetakup'helekesya bhwibeta kiujha unkerebhwisi ndongobhu.
Lakini kama ibetakubela kup'elekesya ntolayi ndongobhu mmonga au bhabhele zaidi pamonga ni bhebhe kwa kuj'ha kwa vinywa fya mashahidi bhabhele au bhadatu kila lilobhi libhwesya kuthibitishibhwa.
Na kama ibetakubhapuuzila kubhap'helekesya, lijobhelayi kanisa khenu ekhu, kama ibetakupuuzila kabhele kulip'helekesya kanisa, basi na aj'helayi kama munu bhwa mataifa ni mtoza ushuru.
Kweli nikabhajobhela, kyokyoha khela kyamwibeta kukidenda kuduniani ni kumbinguni kid'endibhu. na kyokyoha khela kya mwibeta kukidendulila ku duniani ni kumbinguni kid'endulibhu.
Kabhele nikabhajobhela kama bhanu bhabhele kati j'ha muenga bhakubaliene juu jha khenu kyokyoha khela pa duniani kyabhis'oma, e'lu Tata ghwa nene ghwa kumbinguni ibetakulibhomba.
Kwa kuj'ha bhabhele au bhadatu bhakakusanyikayi pamonga kwa lihina lya nene, Nene njele pagati pa bhene.
Kabhele Petro akahida ni kun'jobhela Yesu, “Bwana, ni mara silenga ndongo bhangu akanikosela ni nene nikan'samehe? Hata mara jha saba?”
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Nikujobhela lepi mara saba, lakini hata sabini mara saba.
Kwa ndabha ejhu bhufalme bhwa mbinguni ni sawa ni mfalme mmonga jhaalondeghe kwisahihisha hesabu kuhoma kwa bhatumwa bha muene.
Bho abhwanji kusahihisha hesabu, mtumwa mmonga akaletibhwa kwa muene ambajhe an'dajheghe talanta elfu kumi.
Kwa kujha ajhelepi ni njela jha kulepa, bwana ghwa muene akalaghisya aghosibhwayi, n'dala munu pamonga ni bhana munu ni khila khenu kyaajhe nakhu, ni mal'epu ghabhombekayi.
Hivyo mtumwa akabina, akapiga magoti m'bele jha muene, akajobha, 'Bwana, uj'helayi ni bhuvumilivu pamonga ni nene, na nibetakulepa khila khenu.'
Hivyo bwana ghwa j'hola n'tumwa, kwa kuj'ha asukumibhu sana ni huruma andekhesili ni kun'samehe lideni e'lu
Lakini n'tumwa j'hola akabhoka ni kunkabha mmonga kati j'ha bhatumwa bhajhinu, jhaajhele akan'dai denari mia. Akamfuta, akankaba pa nkoromelu, ni kun'jobhela, 'Nil'epai khela kyanikudai.'
Lakini y'ola n'tumwa njinu akabina ni kun'sihi sana akajobha, 'Ujhelayi ni bhuvumilivu nani, na nibetakul'epa.'
Lakini n'tumwa j'hola ghwa kubhwandelu abelili. Badala j'hiake, akalota ni kun'tagha gerezani, mpaka pa ibeta kundepa khela kyaakan'dai.
Na bho bhabhuene bhatumwa bhajhinu khela kya kitokili. Bhasikitishibu sana. Bhakahida ni kun'jobhela bwana ghwa bhene kila khenu kya kyah'omili.
Ndipo y'ola bwana ghwa mtumwa j'hola akan'kuta, ni kun'jobhela, 'Ewe n'tumwa mwovu, nikakusamehe bhebhe lideni lyangu lyoha kwa ndabha ukan'somili muni.
Je! Ulondekaghelepi kujha ni huruma kwa n'tumwa njinu, kama nene kyanikuhurumili bhebhe?
Bwana ghwa muene akadada ni kun'kabidhi kwa bhala bhatesaji mpaka pa ibetakulepa kiasi kyoha kyaadaibhweghe.
Efyo ndo dadi j'hangu ghwa kumbinguni kyaibetakubhabhombela, kama kila mmonga ghwinu ibetalepi kun'samehe ndongo munu kuhomela ghwa muene.”
J'hatokili bho Yesu amalili kudongela malobhi aghu, akabhoka Galilaya, ni kulota mpakani mwa Yudea mbele j'ha kih'olo Jordani.
Bhumati mbaha bhukan'kesya ni kubhaponyesya okhu.
Mafarisayo bhakan'hidila, bhakan'jaribu, bhakan'jobhela, “Je ni halali kwa munu kundeka n'dala munu kwa ndabha yeyioha?”
Yesu akajibu nikujobha, “Mwas'omili lepi, kwamba muene j'haabhabhombili kubhwandelu abhabhombili n'gosi ni n'dala?
Na kabhele akajobha, 'Kwa ndabha ejhu n'gosi ibetakundeka dadimunu ni nyinamunu ni n'dalamunu, na bhene bhabhele bhibhetakujha m'bele bhumonga?'
Efyo sio bhabhele kabhele, bali m'b'ele bhumonga. Basi, khela ambakyo akiunganisi K'yara, munu jhejhioha y'ola asikitenganisi.”
Bhakan'jobhela, “Henu kwa ndabha j'ha kiki Musa atuamuiri kuhomesya hati j'ha talaka ni kundeka?”
Akabhajobhela, “Kwa bhugumu bhwa mioyo ghinu Musa abharuhusili kubhaleka bhadala bhinu, lakini kuhomela kubhwandelu jhajhelepi naha.
Nikabhajobhela, kujha jhejhioha j'hola j'haibetakundeka n'dala munu isipokuj'ha kwa ndabha j'ha uzinzi, na kun'gega yongi, amalikuzini. Na n'gosi j'haibetakun'gega n'dala j'haalekibhu amalikuzini.”
Bhanafunzi bhakan'jobhela Yesu, “Kama ndo ncha kwa n'gosi ni n'dala kinofu lepi kugega.”
Lakini Yesu akabhajobhela, “Sio khila munu ibhwesya kughapokela mafundisu agha, bali ni kwa bhala tu bhabharuhusibhu kupokela. Kwa kuj'ha bhajhele bhatowashi bhabhahogoliki kuhomela mu maleme gha bhanyinabhabhi.
Na kabhele bhajhele bhatowashi bhabhabhombibhu ni bhanu. Na bhajhele matowashi bhabhikifwanyisya matowashi kwandabha j'ha bhufalme bhwa kumbinguni. J'haibhwesya kupokela mafundisu agha na aghapokelayi.”
Kisha akaletibhwa baadhi j'ha bhana bhadebe ili abhabhekelayi mabhoko panani pa bhene ni kus'oma, lakini bhanafunzi bha muene bhakabhakemela.
Bali Yesu akajobha, “Bharuhusuaghe bhana bhadebe, bhwala musibhabesi kuhida kwa nene, kwa ndabha bhufalme bhwa mbinguni ni wa bhanu kama abhu.
Ni muene akabheka mabhoko panani pa bhene, kisha akabhoka pala.
Langai munu mmonga akahida kwa Yesu ni kujobha, “Mwalimu, khenu gani kinofu kyanilondeka kubhomba ili nikabhai bhusima bhwa milele?”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Kwa ndabha j'ha kiki ukanikota khenu gani kinofu? Aj'he mmonga tu j'ha ajhe n'nofu, lakini kama ghwilonda kukabha bhusima bhwa milele, sikamulayi sheria sya K'yara.”
Munu yola akan'kota, “Sheria syene seleku?” Yesu akajobha, “Usikomi, usibhushuhudili bhudesi,
bhaheshimuaghe dadiwaku ni nyinuaku, na un'ganai jirani ghwa j'hobhi kama nafsi j'ha bhebhe.”
Munu yola akan'jobhela, “Mambo ghoha aghu nimalili kughatii. Bado nilonda kiki?
“Yesu akan'jobhela. “Kama ghwilonda kuj'ha n'kamilifu, lotayi, ukagolisiayi fenu fyoha fya ujhe nafu, na ubhapelayi maskini, na ghwibetakuj'ha ni hazina kumbinguni. Kisha hidayi unikhesiayi.”
Lakini n'songolo y'ola bho apeliki ghala ghaan'jobhili akabhoka kwa huzuni, kwa ndabha aj'hele imiliki mali simehele.
Yesu akabhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene, “Kweli nikabhajobhela, ni vigumu kwa munu tajiri kuj'hingila mu bhufalme bhwa mbinguni.
Kabhele nikabhakobhela, ni rahisi kwa ngamia kup'heta mu lilende sya sindanu, kuliko kwa munu tajiri kuj'hingila mu bhufalme bhwa K'yara.”
Bhanafunzi bhobhap'eliki aghu, bhakashangala sana ni kujobha, “Ndo j'holekhu basi jhaibeta kuokoka?”
Yesu akabhalanga ni kujobha, “Kwa mwanadamu e'lu libhwesekana lepi, lakini kwa K'yara ghoha ghibhwesekana.”
Kisha Petro akan'jibu ni kun'jobhela, “Langai tulekayi fyoha ni kukukesya bhebhe. Khenu gani twibetakukabha?”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Kweli nikabhajobhela, muene j'haibeta kunikesya nene, munu bhuzao mpya bhwakati Mwana ghwa Adamu pa ibeta kutama mu kiti kya enzi kya bhutukufu bhwakhe, namu mwibetakutama panani pa kiti kya enzi kumi na mbili, kugha hukumu makabila kumi na mabhele gha Israeli.
Kila mmonga bhinu j'ha alekili nyumba, kaka, dada. tata, mabhu, bhana, au n'gonda kwa ndabha j'ha lihina lya nene, ibeta kupokela mara mia ni kubhurithi bhuzima bhwa milele.
Lakini bhingi bha bhajhele bhakubhwandelu henu, bhibetakujha bha mwishu, na bhabhaj'hele bha mwishu bhibheta kujha bha kubhwandelu.
Kwa ndabha bhufalme bhwa kumbinguni bhwifwanana ni mmiliki ghwa n'gonda, jha ajhumuiki lukhela na mapema ili kuajili bhabhombambombo mu n'gonda bhwa muene bhwa mizabibu.
Baada j'ha kujha akubaliene ni bhabhomba mbombo dinari jhimonga kwa kutwa, akabhatuma kulola kun'gonda ghwa mizabibu.
Akalota kabhele baada j'ha masaa madatu ivi na akabhabhona bhabhombambombo bhangi bhajhele bhajhemili bila mbombo mu lieneo lya soko.
Akabhajobhela, 'Muenga pia, mlotayi kun'gonda lya mizabibu, na kyokioha kya kij'hele halali nibetakubhapela.' Hivyo bhakalota kubhomba mbombo.
Akalota kabhele baada jha masaa sita ni kabhele katika saa jha tisa, na abhombili mebhu.
Mara j'henge kabhele mnamo saa kumi na moja, akalota ni kubhakolela bhangi bhajhemili bila mbombo. Akabhajobhela, 'kwa ndabha jhakiki mujhemili apa bila mbombo j'hoj'hioha j'hela kwa ligono lyoha?
Bhakan'jobhela, kwa ndabha ajhelepi munu jhejhioha j'hola j'haatuajiri. Akabhajobhela, 'Ni muenga mulotayi mu n'gonda ghwa mizabibu.'
Bhwakati bhwa kimihi bho bhufikiri, n'kolo n'gonda ghwa mizabibu akan'jobhela msimamizi ghwa muene, 'Ubhakutayi bhabhombambombo na ubhalepayi mishahara, kwa kubhwanja ni bhwa mwishu hadi ghwa kubhwandelu.'
Bhobhahidili bhabhaajiribhu saa kumi na moja, kila mmonga ghwa bhene apelibhu dinari.
Bho bhahidili bhabhomba mbomo bha kubhwandelu bhafikirileghe kujha bhibeta kukabha zaidi, lakini bhapokili pia kila munu dinari jhimonga kwa kila munu.
Baada jha kupokela malipo gha bhene, bhandalamikili mmiliki ghwa n'gonda.
Bhakajobha, “Abha bhabhombambombo bha mwishu bhabhombili lisaa limonga tu kubhombambombo, lakini ubhalenganisi ni tete, tete tup'hendili misighu ligono lyoha ni kupya ni lifukhe.'
Lakini n'kolo n'gonda akajibu ni kujobha kwa mmonga ghwa bhene, 'Rafiki, nabhombili lepi khenu kibhibhi. Je! tukakubaliene lepi ni nene dinari j'himonga?
Pokelayi khela kya kijhele halali jha bhebhe naubho kayi. turahe ya nene kubhap'hela abha bhabhomba mbombo bhabhaajiribhu kumwishu sawasawa ni muenga.
Je! hakilepi kwa nene kubhomba khela kyanilonda ni mali syangu? au lihu lya bhebhe liovu kwa ndabha nene ne mwema?
Efyo ghwa mwishu ij'ha ghwa kubhwandelu nighwa kubhwandelu ijha ghwa mwishu”
Yesu bho ikwela kulota Yerusalemu, akabhatola bhanafynzibha muene kumi na bhabhale palubhafu, na mun'jhela akabhajibhela,
Langai twilota Yerusalemu, ni Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakujha mmabhoko gha bhakuu bha makuhani ni bhaandishi.
Na bhibetakun'hukumula kifo na bhibetakumbosya kwa bhanu bha mataifa ili kundhihaki, kun'tobha ni kunsulubisya. Lakini ligono lya tatu ibetakufufuka.”
Kisha mabhu ghwa bhana bha Zebedayo ahidili kwa Yesu ni bhana munu. Apigili magoti mbele jha muene ni kun'soma khenu kuhoma kwa muene.
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Ghwilonda kiki?” Akanijobhela, “Amuru kujha abha bhanabhangu bhabhele bhatamayi, mmonga kibhoko kya kulia ni mmonga kibhoko kya bhebhe kya kushoto mu bhufalme bhwa jhobhi.”
Lakini Yesu akan'jibu ni kujobha, “Ukimanyili lepi khela kyaghwis'oma. Je! Ghwibhwesya kukinyuela kikombi ambakyo nibetakunywela?” bhakan'jobhela, “Twibhwesya.”
Akabhajobhela, “Kikombi kya nene hakika mwibeta kukinywela. Lakini kutama kibhoko kya nene kya kulia ni kibhoko kya nene kya kushoto sio jukumu la nene kubhap'hela, lakini ni kwa bhala ambabho bhamalili kuandalibhwa ni dadiyangu.”
Bhanafunzi bhangi kumi bho bhapeliki naha, bhakahuzunishwa sana ni bhala bhanu bhabhele.
Lakini Yesu akabhakuta bhene ni kubhajobhela, “Mmanyili kujha bhatawala bha mataifa bhakabhalisya, ni bhabhaha bha bhene bhibetakelesya mamlaka juu jha bhene.
Lakini isijhi naha kwa muenga. Badala yake, yeyote atakayetaka kuwa mkubwa miongoni mwenu lazima awe mtumishi wenu.
Na jhaibeta kujha ghwa kubhuandu kati jha muenga lazima ajhiaghe n'tumishi ghwa muenga.
Kama vile Mwana ghwa Adamu ahidilepi kutumikibhwa, bali kutumika, ni kuhomesya bhuhai bhwake kujha bhukhombozi kwa bhingi.”
Bhwakati bhihomela Yeriko, bhumati m'baha bhwa n'kesisi.
Na bhabhabhuene fipofu mbabhele bhatamili kando j'ha barabara. Bho bhapeliki kuj'ha Yesu ipeta, bhakakuesya sauti ni kujobha, “Bwana, Mwana ghwa Daudi, utuhurumilayi.”
Lakini bhumati ukabhakhemela, ni kubhajobhela mgudamayi. Hata ivyo, bhene bhakazidi kukwesya sauti ni kujobha, “Bwana, Mwana ghwa Daudi, utuhurumilayi.”
Kisha Yesu akajhema na akabhakuta ni kubhakota, “Mwilonda nibhambombilayi kiki?”
Bhakan'jobhela, “Bwana kuj'ha mihu gha tete ghabhwesiaghe, kulola.”
Basi Yesu, akajha avutibhu ni huruma, akaghagusa mihu gha bhene, mara ej'hu bhakapokela bhuwezo bhwa kulola na bhakan'kesya.
Yesu ni bhanafunzi bha muene bhakalota karibu ni Yerusalemu na bhakalota mpaka Bethfage, mu kid'onda kya mizeituni, kisha Yesu akabhatuma bhanafunzi bhabhele,
akabhajobhela, “Mulotayi mu kijiji kyakifwatila, na mara jhimonga mwibetakun'kolela punda akhongibhu pala, ni mwanaounda pamonga ni muene. mubhakhongai ni kubhaleta kwa nene.
Ikajhiaghe munu jhojhuoha akabhajobhela khenu kyokyoha kuhusu elu, mwibeta kujobha, `Bwana akabhalonda, ` na munu ojhu mara moja akabharuhusu mhidai pamonga nabhu”
Jambo e'le lyatokili na lela lyajobhibhu kup'elela kwa nabii lazima litimisibhwayi. Akabhajobhela,
Mubhabholayi binti Sayuni, langai, mfalme bhwaku ihida kwa muenga, mnyenyekevu na ihida akwelili punda, ni kubheka ngobho sya bhene ni mwana punda n'gosi, mwana punda n'debe.
Kisha bhanafunzi bhakabhoka ni kubhomba jinsi Yesu kya abhalaghisi.
Bhakandeta punda ni mwanapunda, ni kubheka ngobho sya bhene panani, nu muene Yesu akatama pala.
Bhingi mu mkusanyiku bhatandesye ngobho sya bhene munj'hela, ni bhangi bhadumuili matawi mu mabehe ni kutandasya mu barabara.
Bhumati bhwa bhudongolili Yesu ni bhala bhabhan'kesisi bhakwesi sauti, bhikajha bhijobha,”Hosana kwa mwana ghwa Daudi! Ni mbarikibhwa j'ha ihida kwa lihina lya Bwana. Hosana juu zaidi!”
Yesu bho afikiri Yerusalemu, mji bhuoha bhwanyimwiki ni kujobha, “Ojho ndo niani?
“Bhumati bhukajibu, “Ojho ndo Yesu Nabii, kuhoma Nazareti ya Galilaya.”
Kisha Yesu akajhingila mu lihekalu lya Mungu au K'yara. akabhabhenga kwibhala bhoha bhabhajhele bhigola ni kugolesya mu lihekalu. Pia abinisi ni kup'hendade meza sya bhabadilishaji bha fedha ni fiti fya bhahemelesaji bha nj'hebha.
Akabhajobhela, “Jhilembibhwa, `'Nyumba jhangu jhikutibhwa nyumba jha maombi, `lakini muenga mujhibhakhili pango lya bhanyang`anyi.”
kisha fipofu ni filema bhakahida mu lihekalu, nu muene akaponesya.
Lakini bhwakati bhakholo bha makuhani ni bhaalembesi bho bhaghabhuene maajabu ghaaghabhombili, na bhobhapeliki bhana bhijhwegha mulihekalu ni kujobha, “Hosana kwa Mwana ghwa Daudi,” bhakamuliki ni ligoga.
Bhakan'jobhela, “Ukip'heliki khela kyakijobhibhwa ni bhanu abha?” Yesu akabhajobhela, “Ena! Lakini bhamanyi lepi kusoma, 'Kuhoma ku milomo ghya bhana na bhana bhadebe bhabhijhonga muj'he ni sifa kamili?”
Kisha Yesu akabhaleka ni kulota kwibhala jha mji mu Bethania ni kugona okhu.
Lukhela bho ikerebhuka ku mjini ajhele ni njala.
Abhubhuene libehe kandokando j'ha barabara, akabhulotela, lakini akabhilepi khenu juu jhiakhe isipokujha matondo. Akabhujobhela, “Kusijhi ni matunda mu libehe o'mo daima kabhele.” Na mara ejhu libehe lela likayoma.
Bhanafunzi bho bhabhuene, bhakastaajabu ni kujobha, “Jhijhebhuli libehe lij'homili mara moja?”
Yesu akajibu ni kubhajobhela, “Kweli nikabhajobhela, kama mkajhelayi ni imani bila bhugha, mwibetalepi kubhomba khela kya kibhombiki mu libehe e'lu tu, lakini mwibeta kukijobhela ata ekibaha kid'onda utolibhwayi ni kutaghibhwa mu bahari, na jhibetakubhombeka.
Kyokyoha kyamwibeta kus'oma kwa sala, khoni mwikiera.”
Yesu bho afikili mu lihekalu, bhabhaha bha makuhani ni bhaseya bha bhanu bhakan'hidila bhwakati imanyisya ni kun'kota, “Ni kwa mamlaka gani ghwibhomba mambo agha?
Yesu akajibu ni kubhajobhela, “Ni nene kabhele nikabhokhota limonga. kama mwibeta kunijobhela, nani mebhu nikabhajobhela ni kwa mamlaka gani nibhomba mambo agha.
Bhubatizo bhwa Yohana- bhwahomili ndaku, kumbinguni au kwa mwanadamu?” Bhakahojiana bhene, bhakajobha, tukajobha bhukah'omili kumbinguni, `ibetakutujobhela, kwa ndabha jhakiki mukamwamini lepi?`
Lakini tukajobhai, `bhwah'omilik kwa mwanadamu, `tukabhatila makhutano, kwa ndabha bhoha bhakan'kiera Yohana kama nabii.”
Kisha bhakan'jibu Yesu ni kujobha, “Tumanyi lepi” Akabhajobhela pia, “Bhwala nene nikabhajobhela lepi ni kwa mamlaka gani nibhomba mambo agha.
Lakini mwifikiri kiki? Munu jhaajhele ni bhana bhabhele. Akalota kwa mmonga ni kun'jobhela, `Mwanabhangu, lotayi kabhomba mbombo mu n'gonda ghwa mizabibu lelu.
`Mwanamunu akan'jibu ni kujobha, `nilotalepi,' Lakini baadaye akalota akabadilisha mabhuasu gha muene na akalota.
Na Munu yolayola akalota kwa mwana ghwa pili ni kun'jobhela mabhwa. Mwana jhola akajibu ni kujobha, `nilota, bwana', lakini akalotalepi.
Jholoki kati j'ha bhana bhabhele j'haabhombili matakwa gha tata ghuake? Bhakajobha, “Mwana ghwa kubhwandelu.” Yesu akabhajobhela, “Kweli nikabhajobhela, bhabhonganiya ushuru ni makahaba bhibetakujhingila mu bhufalme bhwa K'yara kabla jha muenga kujhingila.
Kwa ndabha Yohana ahidili kwa nj'hela j'hinofu, lakini mwabelili kun'kiera, bhwakati bhabhonganiya bhushuru ni makahaba bhan'kyeriri. Na muenga, bho mubhuene e'lu likheteka, mwabhwesilepi kutubu ili baadaye mun'kieraghe.
Mup'helekisiaghe mfuano bhongi. Kwa jhele ni munu n'kolo lieneo libhaha lya ardhi. Abhiere mizabibu akajhibhekhela bhuzio, akatengenesya ni khenu kya kukamulila divai, akajenga ni mnara ghwa bhalinzi, na akalikodisya kwa bhatunza zabibu. Kisha akalota mu nchi jhenge.
Bhwakati bhwa mavuno ghya mizabibu bho bhukaribili, abhatumili baadhi jha bhatumishi kwa bhakulima bha mizabibu kutola mizabibu ghya bhene.
Lakini bhakulima bha mizabibu bhakabhalota bhatumishi bha muene, bhakan'tobha mmonga, kwa maganga.
Kwa mara jhenge, Mmiliki akabhatuma bhatumishi bhangi, bhingi zaidi jha bhala bha kubhwandelu, lakini bhakulima bha mizabibu bhakabhakhetela mabhu.
Baada j'ha apu bwana j'hola akan'tuma kwa bhene mwana munu, akajobha, `'Mwibetakun'heshimu mwanabhangu.'`
Lakini bhakulima bha mizabibu bho bhambwene n'songolo jhola, bhakajobhesana `'Ojho ndo mrithi, Muhidayi, tunkemayi na tumilikiayi urithi.'
`Hivyo bhakan'tola, bhakan'tagha kubhala ku n'gonda ghwa mizabibu ni kun'koma.
Je mmiliki ghwa migonda ghya mizabibu paibetakuhida, ibetakubhabhomba bhuli au kiki bhakulima bha mizabibu?”
Bhakan'jobhela, “Ibetakubhaharibu bhanu abhu bhaovu mu njela jha bhukali zaidi, na kisha ibetakulikodisya kwa bhakulima bhangi n'gonda ghwa mizabibu, bhanu ambabho bhibeta kulepa kwandabha jha mizabibu pa jhibeta kufunda.”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Mwas'omi lepi mu maandiko, 'Liganga lya bhalibelili waashi lijhele liganda likholu lya msingi. E'le lyahomili kwa Bwana, na jhishangasya pamihu pa tete?'
Hivyo nikabhajobhela, Bhufalme bhwa K'yara bhwibeta kuletibhwa kuh'omela kwa muenga ni kupelibhwa taifa lyalijali matunda ghake.
Jhojhioha jhaibeta kubina panani pa liganga e'lu ibetakubomolibhwa fipandi fipandi. Lakini kwa jhejhioha lyalibetakum'banila, libeta kun'siagha.”
Bhabhaha bha makuhani ni Mafarisayo bho bhap'eliki mifano ghiake bhakabhona kujha akabhazungumzila bhene.
Lakini khila kya bhalondeghe kunyosya kibhoko kunani kwa muene, bhatilili makutano, kwa ndabha bhanu bhambwene kama nabii.
Yesu ajobhili nabhu kabhele mu mifuanu, akajobha,
“Bhufalme bhwa kumbinguni bhwighwaningana ni mfalme jha ajhandele sherehe jha harusi jha mwanabhe.
Akabhatuma bhatumishi bha muene kubhakaribisya bhabhaalikibhu kuhida kusherehe jha harusi, lakini bhafiki lepi.
Mfalme abhatumili kabhele bhatumishi bhangi, akajobha. “Mubhajobhilayi bhoha bhabhaalikibhu, Mulangayi, niandele kyakulya. Fahali ni litoli lyanene lya linenipi bhachinjili ni mambo ghoha ghayele tayari, Muhidayi ku sherehe jha harusi.”
Lakini bhanu abhu bhazingatili lepi kwa dhati mualiko bhwa muene. Baadhi jha bhene bhakherebhuiki mu mig'onda ghya bhene, ni bhangi bhakherebhuiki mu sehemu sya biashara sya bhene.
Bhangi bhabhajhinukili bhatumishi bha mfalme ni kubhaaibisya ni kubhakhoma.
Lakini mfalme adadili. Atumili jeshi lya muene, akabhakoma bhala bhakomaji ni kubhukosya mji ghwa bhene ni muoto.
Kisha akabhajobhela bhatumishi bha muene, “Harusi iyele tayari, lakini bhabhaalikibhu bhalondekeghe lepi.
Henu mulotayi ku makutano gha njhela mbaha, mubhaalikayi bhanu bhingi kadiri kya jhilondeka bhahidai ku sherehe jha harusi.”
Bhatumishi bhakalota njhela mbaha ni kubhakaribisya bhanu bhoha bhabhabhuene, bhema ni au bhanofu ni bhabhibhi. Henu bhukumbi bhwa harusi bhwa memili bhahesya.
Lakini mfalme bho ajhingili kubhalanga bhahesya ambwene munu mmonga ambajhe afwali lepi ligwanda rasmi lya harusi!
Mfalme akan'kota, 'Ndongo bhangu, ghwabhwesi bhuli kufika apa mugati bila ligwanda lya harusi?' Na munu ojhu an'jibili lepi khenu kyokyoha khela.
Ndipo mfalme akabhajobhela bhatumishi bha muene, “Mun'kongoyi munu ojho mabhoko ni magolo mun'taghai kwibhala mu kitila, ekhu ambako kubeta kujha ni kilelu ni kusiagha minu.
Kwa kujha bhanu bhingi bhikutibhwa, lakini bhateule bhadebe.”
Ndipo Mafarisayo bhakabhoka ni kupanga jinsi jha kun'kamula Yesu mu malobhi gha muene.
Ndipo bhakabhatuma bhanafunzi bha bhene ni Maherode. Na bhakan'jobhela Yesu, “Mwalimu, tumanyili kujobha bhebhe ndo munu ghwa bhukweli, na ghwimanyisya matakwa gha Mungu mu bhukweli. Ghwijali lepi maoni gha munu jhongi na ghwilasya lepi bhupendelelu kwa bhanu.
Henu tujobhilayi ghwifikilila kiki? Je, bhukweli kulepa kodi kwa Kaisari au lepi?”
Yesu akamanya bhuovu bhwa bhene na akajobha, “Kwandabha jhakiki mkanijaribu, muenga bhanafiki?
Mimilasiayi hela jhejhitumika kulep'hela kodi.” Ndipo bhakandetela dinari.
Yesu akabhakhota, “Sura ni lihina ele lya niani?”
Bhakan'jibu, “fya Kaisari.” Ndipo Yesu akabhajobhela, “Mumpelayi Kaisari fenu fyafijhele fya muene ni fya K'yara mumpelayi K'yara.”
Bho bhap'heliki naha bhakashangala. Kisha bhakandeka ni kwilotela.
Ligono elu baadhi jha Masadukayo bhakahida kwa Yesu, bhala bhabhijobha kujha bhujhelepi bhufufuo bhwa bhafu. Bhakan'kota,
bhakajhabhijobha, “Mwalimu, Musa ajobhili, Ikajhiyi munu afuili bila kuhogola bhana, ndongo munu na andisiayi n'dala ojhu na ampelayi muana kwa ndabha jha ndongo munu.
Bhajhele bhalongo saba. ghwa kuanda agegili na kisha afuili bila kuhogola bhana. Akandekela n'dala ndongomunu.
Kisha ndongomunu ghwa pili nu muene aketili mebhu, kisha yola ghwa tatu, ikajha mebhu hadi jhola ghwa saba.
Baada jha kubhomba aghu bhoha, yola n'dala nu muene akafwa.
Henu katika bhufufuo n'dala ojhu ibetakujha n'dala ghwa niani kati jha bhanu abhu saba? Kwa ndabha bhoha bhan'gegili.”
Lakini Yesu abhajibili ni kubhajobhela, “Mwikosela, kwa ndabha mumanyilepi mayandiku ni nghofu sya K'yara.
Kwa kujha mu bhufufuo, bhanu bhigega lepi bhwala kugegikibhwa. Badala jhiaki bhanu bhijha kama malaika okhu kumbinguni.
Lakini kuhusu bhufufuo bhwa bhafu, mubhwayi lepi kusoma khela ambakyo K'yara akijobhili kwa muenga, ajobhili,
Nene ndo K'yara ghwa Ibrahimu, K'yara ghwa Isaka, na K'yara ghwa Yakobo? K'yara si K'yara ghwa bhafu, bali ni K'yara ghwa bhajhe bhasima.'”
Bhwakati likusanyiku bho bhapeliki ele, bhaghasyangele mafundiso agha muene.
Lakini Mafarisayo bho bhapheliki kujha Yesu abhagudamisi Masadukayo, bhakibhongeniye bhoha kwa pamonga.
Mmonga ghwa bhene, ajhele mwana sheria, an'kotili liswali kwa kun'jaribu.
“Mwalimu, amri jheleku ijhele mbaha kuliko syoha mu sheria?”
Yesu akan'jibu, “Lazima un'ganayi Bwana kwa n'tema ghuoha ghwa bhebhe, kwa roho jhiakhu jhioha ni kwa luhala lwakhu luoha.
Ejhe ndo amri mbaha na jha kuanza.
Na jha bhubhele jhiwaningana ni ejhu- Ni lazima kun'gana jirani ghwa jhobhi kama kyawikigana ghwa muene.
Sheria syoha ni manabii bhitegemela amri ese sibhele.”
Ni Mafarisayo bhajhele bhakona bhakusanyiki pamonga, Yesu akabhakota liswali.
Akajobha, “Je, Mwifikirila kiki kwa ndabha jha Kristu? Muene muana ghwa niani?” Nibhene bhakan'jibu, “Ni muana ghwa Daudi.”
Yesu akabhajibu, “Ni kwa namna gani Daudi mu Roho akan'kuta Bwana, akajobha,
'Bwana an'jobhili Bwana bhangu, “Tamayi kibhokho kya nene kyakulia, hadi panibetakubhabhomba maadui bhakhu bhabhekibhuayi pasi pa magolo gha jhobhi.”'?”
Kama Daudi akan'kuta Kristu “Bwana,” jinsi jhelekhu ibetakujha mwanamunu?”
Ajhelepi jhaabhwesili kunjibu lilobhi kabhele, na ajhele lepi jhaathubutuwili kabhele kun'kota maswali zaidi tangia ligono elu ni kujhandelela.
Baadaye akalongela ni bhumati bhwa bhanafunzi bha muene ni bhanu. Akajobha,
“Bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo bhitamila kiti kya Musa.
Henu kyokyoha khela kyabhakaa munu kubhomba, mubhombayi khoni mukabhachungusya. Lakini msijhesi matendo gha bhene, kwa ndabha bhene bhitamka mambo gha bhibhomba lepi.
Kweli, bhene bhikhonga misighu ghyaghitopa ambaghyo ni figumu kup'henda, na kisha bhakabhap'endesya bhanu mu mabega gha bhene. Lakini bhene bhihegelesya lepi hata kikonji kujhip'henda.
Matendo ghoha agha ghakaghabhomba ili bhalangibhuajhi ni bhanu. Kwa ndabha bhene bhipanula masanduku gha bhene na bhijhongesya mapindo gha mavazi gha bhene.
Bhene bhip'hendelela kutama maeneo gha kifahari mu sherehe ni mu fiti fya heshima mugati mu masinagogi,
ni kusalimibhwa kwa heshima maeneo gha pa soko, ni kukutibhwa “Bhalimu” ni bhanu.
Lakini muenga mwilondeka lepi kukutibhwa “Bhalimi,” kwa ndabha mujhenaku Mwalimu mmonga tu, yaani Kristu na muenga mwebhoha lukholo.
Musin'kuti munu jhojhioha jhola pa duniani apa kujha dadi jhinu, kwa kujha myenaku dadi yinu, mmonga tu, nu muene ajhele kumbinguni.
Bhwala musihidi kukutibhwa 'bhalimu,' kwa kujha mjhenaku Mwalimu tu, yaani Kristu.
Bali jhaajhe mbaha mugati mwa muenga ibetakujha n'tumishib ghwa muenga. Jhejhioha jhola jhaikwikuesya ibetaselesibhwa.
Na jhejhioha jha ibetakwiselesya ibetakukwesibhwa.
Lakini ole bhwinu bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo, bhanafiki! Mkabhafungila bhanu bhufalme bhwa mbinguni. Namu mwibhwesya lepi kujhingila, na mkabharuhusu lepi bha bhijhingila kubhomba aghu.
Mwilobhoka kwiselya jha bahari ni kufika kummbomba munu mmonga jhaiamini ghala gha mughamanyisi, na paijha kama muenga, mwibhomba mara mbili mwana ghwa jehanamu kama muenga mwebhene kyamujhele.
Ole bhinu muenga bhalongosi bhabhilola lepi, muenga mwijobha, Jhejhioha jha ilapa ku lihekalu khenu lepi. Lakini jhailapa kwa dhabahu jha hekalu, afungibhu kwa kiapo kya muene.
Muenga fipofu bhapumbafu, kheleku kibhaha kuliko khenge, dhahabu au lihekalu ambalyo libhabhekili bhakfu dhahabu kwa K'yara?
Na, j'hejhioha jhailapa kwa madhabahu, khenu lepi. Bali jhailapa kwa sadaka jhaijhele panani pa muene, afungibhu ni kiapo kya muene.
Muenga bhanu fipofu, khelekhu kibhaha kuliko khenge, sadaka au madhabahu ambagho ghibheka bhakfu sadaka syasipisibhwa kwa K'yara?
Henu, muene jhailapa kwa madhabahu ilapa kwa ejhu ni kwa fenu fyoha fyafijhele panani pa muene.
Nu muene jhailapa kwa hekalu, ilapa kwa elu na kwa muene jhaitama mugati mwa muene.
Nu muene jhailapa kwa mbingu, ilapa kwa kya enzi kya K'yara ni kwa muene jhaitama kunani kwa muene.
Ole bhinu, bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo, bhanafiki! Kwa kujha mwilepa zaka kwa bizali, mnaanaa ni nchicha, lakini mwilepa mambo masitu gha sheria- haki, rehema, ni imani. Lakini agha mwilondeka kujha mughabhombili, na siyo kuleka ghangi bila kughatekelesya.
Muenga bhalongosi fipofu, muenga ambabho mwichuja lenu lidusu mwimila ngamia!
Ole bhinu, bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo, bhanafiki kwa kujha mwisuka kwibhala ku fikombe ni kwibhala ku sahani, lakini mugati mumemili dhuluma ni kutokujha ni kiasi.
Muenga Mafarisayo fipofu, musukayi hoti mugati mu kikombi ni musahani, ili lubhafu lwa kwibhala nu luene lujhelayi kinofu pia.
Ole bhinu, bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo, bhanafiki! kwa ndabha mwiwaningana ni makaburi ghaghabakibhu chokaa, ambagho kwa kwibhala ghibhonekana manofu, lakini kwa mugati ghamemili mafupa gha bhafu ni khila khenu kyakijhele kichafu.
Fefuefu, namu kwa kwibhala mwibhonekana bhenye haki mbele sa bhanu, lakini kwa mugati mumemili bhunafiki ni bhudhalimu.
Ole bhinu, bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo, bhanafiki! kwa kujha mwijenga makaburi gha manabii ni kughapamba makaburi gha bhenye haki.
Muenga mwijobha, kama tungeishi magono gha tata ghwitu, ngatujhelepi pamonga nabhu kujhitisya lilopa lya manabii.
Henu, mwishuhudila mwebhene kujha muenga ndo bhana bha abhu bha bhakomili manabii.
Pia muenga mwikamilisya kumemesya sehemu jhajhilondeka dhambi sya bha tata jhinu.
Muenga mayoka, bhana bha vipiribao, kibhuli mkajhiyepa hukumu jha jehanamu?
Henu, langayi, nikabhatuma kwa muenga manabii, bhanu bhabhajhe ni hekima, ni bhaandishi. Baadhi jha bhene bhibeta kubhakhoma ni kubhasulubisya. Na baadhi jha bhene mwibetakubhatobha mgati mu masinagogi gha muenga ni kubhabhenga kuh'omela mji umonga hadi bhongi.
Matokeo ni kwamba panani pa muenga pibeta kuhomela lilopa lyoha lya bhenye haki syasijhitisibhu pa duniani, kujhandila kilo pa lya Habili jhaajhe ni haki hadi kwa lilopa lya Zakaria mwana ghwa Barakia, jha mwan'komili kati jha patakatifu ni madhabahu.
Bhukweli, nikabhajobhela, mambo agha ghoha ghibetakukikabha kizazi e'khe.
Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, bhebhe jhaukabhakhoma manabii ni kubhahomelela maganga bhala ambabho bhatumwa bha bhebhe! mara silenga nibhabhongeniye bhana bha bhebhe pamonga kama vile n'ng'oko kya ikafibhonganiya fyana fya muene pasi pa mababatilu gha muene, lakini ghwabelili!
Langai, nyumba jha jhobhi jhisiele bhukhebha.
Nani nikujobhela, Kujhandila henu ni kujhendelela ghwibeta lepi kunibhona, hadi paghibeta kujobha, 'Abarikibhu muene jhaibetakuhida ku lihina lya Bwana.'”
Yesu ahomili mu lihekalu ni kwibhokhela. Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakandotela ni kundasya majengo gha hekalu.
Lakini abhajibili ni kubhajobhela, “Je, mukaghabhona lepi mambo ghoha agha? Bhukweli nikabhajobhela, lijhelepi liganda lya lise'ele panani pa l'enge bila kubomolibhwa.”
Na bhoatamili pa Kid'onda kya Mizeituni, bhanafunzi bha muene bhakandotela kwa faragha ni kujobha, “Tujobhilayi, mambo agha ghibetakuh'omela ndali? Khenu khelekhu kibetakujha dalili jha kuhida kwa bhebhe ni mwisho ghwa dunia?”
Yesu abhajibili ni kubhajobhela, “Mujhelayi mkangamele asihidi munu kubhapotosha.
Kwandabha bhingi bhibetakuhida kwa lihina lya nene. Bhibeta kujobha, 'Nene ndo Kristu', na bhibetakubhakofya bhingi.
Mwibetakupel'eka ngondo ni taarifa sya ngondo. Mulangayi musihidi mkajha ni bhuogha, kwandabha mambo agha ghilondeka lepi kuh'omela; lakini mwisho bhola ghwibetakujha bado.
Kwa kujha taifa libetakujhinuka dhidi jha litaifa l'enge ni bhufalme dhidi jha bhufalme. Kubetakujha ni njala ni matetemeku gha n'dema mu sehemu mbalimbali.
Lakini mambo agha ghoha ni kubhwandelu tu ghwa bhuchungu bhwa kuhogola.
Ndipo bhibetakubhahomesya kwandabha jha malombosi ni kubhakhoma. mwibetakudadibhwa ni mataifa ghoha kwandabha jha lihina lya nene.
Ndipo bhingi bhibeta kwikungufula ni kusalitiana ni kudadilana bhene kwa bhene.
Manabii bhingi bha bhudesi bhibetakuhomela ni kubhakofya bhingi.
Kwandabha bhuovu bhwibetakujhongeseka, luganu lwa bhingi bhwibetakupola.
Lakini jhaibetakusindamala mpaka kumwishu, ibetakuokolibhwa.
Ejhu Injili jha bhufalme jhibetakuhubiribhwa mu bhulimwengu mzima kama bhushuhuda kwa mataifa ghoha. Na ndipo mwishu bhola bhwibetakufika.
Henu, pamwibetakubhona lichukizo lya bhuharibifu, lyalijobhibhu ni nabii Danieli lijhemili mahali patakatifu [jhaisoma ni jhaimanya],
ndipo bhabhajhele Yuda bhajumbilayi kukid'onda.
Ni jhola jha ajhele kunani ku paa lya nyumba asibhwesi kuselela pasi kutola khenu kyokyoha khela kuh'oma mugati mu nyumba jha muene,
nu muene jha ajhele kun'gonda asikerebhuki kutola liguanda lya muene.
Lakini ole bhinu ambabho bhabhajhe ni muana ni bhala bhabhijhong'esya mu magono aghu!
Musomayi kujha kujumba kwa muenga kusijhi bhwakati bhwa mepu bhwala ligono lya sabato.
Kwandabha kubetakujha ni dhiki mbaha ambayo jhibhwahilepi kujha tangia kubhombibhwa kwa bhulimwengu hadi henu, na bhwala jhibetalepi kujha kabhele.
Kama magono aghu ghabelikufupisibhwa, ajhelepi ambajhe ngaookuiki. Lakini kwa ndabha jha bhateule, magono aghu ghibetakufupisibhwa.
