Kisha jhikajhiayi munu jhejhioha ibetakubhajobhela 'Langayi, Kristu ajhele apa! au, 'Kristu ajhele khola' msikieli malobhi aghu.
Kwa ndabha Makristu gha bhudesi ni manabii bha bhudesi bhibetakuhida ni ishara mbaha ni maajabu, kwa ndabha jha kukofya, kama jhibhwesekana hata ni bhateule.
Mulangayi, ni bhatahadharishi kabla jha mambo aghu kuho'mela.
Henu, ikajhiagha bhibetakubhajobhela, “Kristu ajhele kulijangwa,' musiloti okhu ku lijangwa. Au, 'Mulangayi ajhele mugati mu nyumba,' musikieli malobhi aghu.
Kama vile radi kyajhimuliki kuh'omela mashariki ni kulasya hadi magharibi, naha ndo kyajhibetakujha kuhida kwa Mwana ghwa Adamu.
Popoha pala pa ujhele ufuili, okhu ndo tai kwa bhikwibhonganiya.
Lakini mara baada jha malombosi mabhaha gha magono ghala, lij'obha libetakujha ni ngisi, muwesi ghwibetalepi kuh'omesya mwanga ghwake, matondo ghibetakubina kuh'omela kunani, ni nghofu sya kumbinguni sibetakuhugunika.
Ndipo ishara jha Muana ghwa Adamu jhibetakubhonekana kunani, ni makabila ghoha gha pa duniani ghibetakuombolesya. Bhibetakumbona Mwana ghwa Adamu ihida mu mabhengu gha kunani kwa nghofu ni bhutukufu mmbaha.
Ibetakubhalaghisya malaika bha muene kwa sauti mbaha jha tarumbeta, na bhene bhibetakwibhonganiya pamonga ni bhateule bha muene kuhomela pande mbaha nne sya dunia, kuh'oma mwishu umonga bhwa mbingu hadi bhongi.
Mwikimanyisiayi lisomo kuh'omela ni libehe mulibehe. Mara tu litafi palibetakumela ni kuh'omesya matondo, mmanyili kujha kiangazi kihegelela.
Henu, pia, pamwibetakubhona mambo agha ghoha, mwilondeka kumanya kujha ihegelela, karibila ni kujhingila.
Bhukweli nikabhajobhela kizazi ekhe kibetalepi kup'heta, hadi mambo ghoha agha ghibetakujhahah'omili.
Mbingu ni nchi sibetakup'heta, lakini malobhi ghangu ghibetalepi kup'heta hata ligono limonga.
Lakini kuhusu ligono lela ni saa ajhelepi jha amanyili, hata malaika bha kumbinguni, bhwala Mwana, bali tete muene tu.
Kama vile kyaijhele mu ligono lya Nuhu, ndivyo kajhibetakujha kwa Mwana ghwa Adamu.
Kwa kujha mu magono aghu kabla jha gharika bhanu bhajhele bhilya ni kunywa, bhigega ni kugegikibhwa hadi ligono lela ambalyo Nuhu ajhingili mu safina,
na bhamanyili lepi khenu kyokyoha, khela hadi ghatika bho jhihidili ni kubhap'hendana bhoha - ndivyo kyajhibetakujha kuhida kwa Mwana ghwa Adamu.
Ndipo bhanu bhabhele bhibetakujha kun'gonda- mmonga ibetakulibhwa ni mmonga ibetakulekibhwa kunyuma.
Bhadala bhabhele bhibetakujha bhisiagha pamonga- mmonga ibetakutolibhwa, ni mmonga ibetakubakila.
Henu, mujhiayi mihu kwa ndabha mmanyilepi ligono bhwala lisaa lelekhu ambalyo ibetakuhida Bwana bhinu.
Lakini mmanyayi kujha, ikajhelayi bwana n'kolo nyumba ngaamanyi ni lisaa lelekhu mmeji ngaahidili, ngaakeshili ni kutokuruhusu nyumba jha muene kuvamibhwa.
Henu, pia mwilondeka kujha tayari, kwa kujha Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakuhida mu lisaa lyamtarajili lepi.
Henu niani jhaajhele n'kamilifu, n'tumwa jha ajhe ni luhala, ambajhe bwana ghwa muene ampelili madaraka gha panani kwa bhabhajhele panyumba jha muene ili abhapelayi kyakula kwa bhwakati bhwa bhwilondeka?
Abarikibhu n'tumishi ojhu, ambajhe bwana ghwa muene ibetakun'kolela ibhomba aghu bhwakati bhwabhwihida.
Bhukweli nikabhabhola kujha bwana ibetakumbeka panani pa khila khenu kya muene.
Lakini kama n'tumwa muovu akajobhayi mun'teema bhwa muene, 'Bwana ghwangu akabhili,'
na akajhanda kubhatobha bhatumishi bha muene, na akalya ni kugala fileo,
Bwana ghwa n'tumwa ojhu ibetakuhida mu magono ambagho ghaghitarajila lepi, ni lisaa ambalyo alimanyililepi.
Bwana ghwa muene ibetakun'dumula fipandi fibhele ni kumbekha mu nafasi jhimonga sawa ni bhanafiki, ambako kubetakujha ni khilelu ni kusiagha minu.
Ndipo bhufalme bhwa kumbinguni bhwibetakufananisibhwa ni bhanabhali kumi bhabhatolili taa sya bhene ni kulota kunjambelela bwana harusi.
Bhahanu miongoni mwa bhene bhajhele bhapumbafu na bhahanu bhangi bhajhele bherevu.
Bhanabhali bhapumbafu bhatolili taa sya bhene, bhatolili lepi mafuta ghoghoha ghala.
Bali bhanabhali bherevu bhatolili fenu fyafijhele ni mafuta pamonga ni taa sya bhene.
Hene bho bwana harusi akabhili kuhida bhoha bhakamuliki ni ligono na bhakagona.
Lakini bho jhijhingili ngisi pakilu pajhele ni njweghu, 'Langayi, bwana harusi! Muhomayi kwibhala kunjamb'elela.'
Ndipo abhu bhana bhali bhakajhumuka bhoha ni kubhwasya taa sya bhene.
Bhala bhapumbafu bhakabhajobhela bhala bherevu, 'mutupelayi sehemu jha mafuta gha muenga kwandabha taa syitu sisimika.'
Lakini bhala bherevu bhakabhajibu ni kubhajobhela, 'Kwa kujha ghibetalepi kututosya tete ni muenga badala jhiakhe mulotayi kwa bhabhihemetesya mkahemelayi kiasi kwa ndabha jha muenga.'
Bho bhatolili okhu kuhemela, Bwana harusi akahida, na bhoha bhajhele tayari bhakalota nakhu ku sherehe jha harusi, ni ndiangu ukadendibhwa.
Baadaye bhala bhana bhali bhangi pia bhakahida ni kujobha, 'Bwana, bwana, tudendulilayi.'
Lakini ajibili ni kujobha, 'Kweli nikabhajobhela, Nene nibhamanyili lepi.'
Henu mulangayi, kwandabha mumanyilepi ligono au lisaa.
Kwa kujha ni sawa ni munu jhaalondeghe kusafiri kulota nchi yenge. Akabhakuta bhatumwa bhwa muene ni kubhakabidhi bhutajiri bhwa muene.
Mmonga kati jha bhene ampelili talanta sihanu, jhongi ampelili sibhele, nu jhongi ampelili talanta jhimonga. Kila mmonga ampelili kul'engana ni bhuwezo bhwa muene, nu munu jhola akasafiri kwilotela.
Manyata jhola jhaajhambelili talanta sihanu alotili kusijhandisila ni kusihogolesya taanta sengi sihanu.
Vilevile jhola jhaapokili talanta sibhele asihogolisi senge sibhele.
Lakini n'tumwa j'haapokili talanta jhimonga, akilotili, akagima lilende pasi ni kufigha talanta jha bwana ghwa muene.
Na baada jha muda ufupi, bwana ghwa bhatumwa abhu akherebhwiki ni kutengenesiya mahesabu nabhu.
Jhola n'tumwa jhaapokili talanta sihanu ahidi ni kusileta kabhele senge sihanu, akajobha, 'Bwana, wanipelili talanta sihanu. Langayi, nikabhili faida jha talanta senge sihanu.'
Bwana ghwa muene akan'jobhela, 'Hongera, n'tumwa nnofu na mwaminifu! Ujhele mwaminofu kwa fenu fidebe. Nibetakupela madaraka kufenu fibhaha fingi. Jhingilayi mu furaha jha bwana ghwakhu!
N'tumwa jha apokili talanta sibhele akahida ni kujobha, 'Bwana, ghwanibelili talanta sibhele. Langayi, nikabhili kabhele faida jha talanta sijhele,'
Bwana ghwa muene akan'jobhela, 'Hongera, n'tumwa nnofu na mwaminifu! Ujhele ghwa mwaminifu kwa fenu fidebe. Nibetakupela madaraka juu jha fenu fingi. Jhingilayi mu furaha jha bwana bhwakhu.'
Baadajhe n'tumwa jhaapokili talanta jhimonga akahida ni kujobha, 'Bwana, nimanyili kujha bhebhe ghwe nkali. Ghwijhabhe ambapo upandilepi, na ghwivuna mahali ambapo usiyelili lepi.
Nene natilili nalotili kuifigha talanta jha jhobhi mu bhudongo. Langayi, ujhenajhu apa jhele jhaijhele jhajhobhi.'
Lakini bwana ghwake akajibu akajibu ni kujobha, 'Bhebhe n'tumwa mwovu na mzembe ghwamanyili kujha nijhabha mahali ambapo nipandilepi ni kuvuna mahali ambapo nisyelili lepi.
Henu ulondekeghe kubhapela hela jhangu bhanu bha benki, na bhwakati bhwa kubhujha kwa nene nganijhipokili jhela jha nene pamonga ni faida jhiakhe.
Henu munyakayi talanta ejhu na mumpelayi jhola jha ajhele ni talanta kumi.
Kila munu jha ajhenaku, ibetakujhongesibhwa zaidi-hata kwa kujhongesibhwa kabhele. Lakini kwa jhejhioha jhaibetalepi kujha naku na hata khela kya ajhe nakhu inyakibhwa.
Mun'sopayi kwibhala kukitita n'tumwa ojhu jhailondeka lepi, ambako kubetakujha ni kilelu ni kusiagha minu.'
Bwakati Mwana ghwa Adamu paibetakuhida mu bhutukufu bhwa muene, ni malaika bhoha pamonga nu muene, ndipo paibetakutama panani pa kiti kwa muene kya bhutukufu.
Mataifa ghoha ghibetakwibhongeniya mbele sya muene, nu muene ibetakubhatangenisya bhanu, kama vile n'chungaji kyaikabhatenganisya kondoo ni mmene.
Ibetakubheka kondoo kibhoko kyamuene kya kuume, bali mmene ibetakubhabheka kibhoko kya kushoto.
Kisha mfalme ibetakubhajobhela bhala bha bhajhele kibhoko kya kulia, 'Muhidayi, mwamubarikibhu ni tata ghwa ghwanene, mubhulithiayi bhufalme bhwabhujhandalibhu kwa ndabha jhinu kuhomela kubhakibhwa msingi bhwa bhulimwengu.
Kwa kujha najhele ni njala na mwanipelili kyakulya; Najhele na n'geni na mwanikaribisi;
Najhele ngholi, na mwanifwatiki nghobho; Najhele na n'tamu na mwan'tunzili; Najhele mu kifungu na mwahidili kunilota.
Ndipo bhenye haki bhibetakun'jibu ni kun'jobhela, 'Bwana, ndali twakubhwene ujhe ni njala ni kukulesya? Au kujha ni kiu na tukakupela masi?
Na ndali twakubhwene ghwe n'geni, na tukakukaribisya? Au ujhe ngholi na tukakufweka nghobho?
Na ndali tubetakubhona ghwiluala kama wiluala, au mu kifungu, tukahida kulola?
Na mfalme ibetakubhajibu ni kubhajobhela, 'bhukweli nikabhajobhela, kyamkibhombili apa kwa mmonga ghwa bhalongo bhangu bhadebe, munibhombili nene.'
Ndipo ibetakubhajobhela abhu bhabhajhele kibhokho kya muene kya kushoto, 'Mubhokayi kwa nene, mwamulaanibhu, mulotayi mu muoto bhwa milele bhwabhujhandalibhu kwa ndabha jha lisyetani ni malaika bha muene,
kwa ndabha najhele ni njala lakini mwanijhimili kyakulya; najhele ni kiu lakini mwanjimili masi;
Najhele ne n'geni lakini mwabelili kunikaribisya; najhele ngholi lakini mwanipelili lepi nghobho; najhele nen'tamu na nikajhelayi mu kifungu, lakini mwan'tunzi lepi.'
Ndipo bhene pia bhibetakun'jibu ni kujobha, 'Bwana, ndali twakubhwene ujhele ni njala au kiu au n'geni, au ngholi, au n'tamu, au afungibhu, na twakuhudumili lepi?
Kisha ibetakubhajibu ni kubhajobhela, 'Kweli nikabhajobhela, khela ambakyo mwakibhombili lepi kwa mmonga ghwa abha bhadebe, munibhombilepi nene.'
Abha bhibetakulota mu adhabu jha milele bali bhenye haki mu bhusima bhwa milele.
Bhwakati Yesu amalili kujobha malobhi ghoha agha, akabhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene,
“Mmanyili kujha baada jha magono mabhele kubetakujha ni sikukuu jha pasaka, ni Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakuletibhwa ili asulubibhwayi.”
Baadaye bhabhaha bha makuhani ni bhaseya bha bhanu bhabhonene pamonga mu makao gha Kuhani Mbaha, jhaakutibhweghe Kayafa.
Kwa pamonga bhapangili njama jha kun'kamula Yesu kwa siri ni kun'koma.
Kwa kujha bhajobhili, “Isibhombeki bhwakati bhwa sikukuu, kusudi jhisijhi jhikajhaghasia mugati mwa bhanu,”
Bhwakati Yesu ajhele Bethania mu nyumba jha Simoni mkoma,
bho akinyosisi pa meza, n'dala mmonga akahida kwa muene akajha apendili nkebe ghwa alabasta jhajhijhela ni mafuta ghenye thamani mbaha, na aghamimini panani pa mutu bhwa muene.
Lakini bhanafunzi bha muene bhobhabhuene lijambo lala, bhakadada ni kujobha, “Kiki ndabha jha hasara ejhu?
Aghu ngaghabhwesi kugolesibhwa kwa kiasi kibhaha ni kupelibhwa maskini,”
Lakini Yesu, akajha amanyili elu, akabhajobhela, “Kwa ndabha jha kiki mkandombosya n'dala ojhu? Kwa kujha abhombili mambo manofu kwa nene.
Maskini mjhenabhu magono ghoha, lakini mwibeta lepi ni nene daima.
Kwa ndabha bho amimini mafuta agha panani pa mb'ele bhuangu, abhombili aghu kwandabha jha maziku ghangu.
Bhukuweli nikabhajobhela, popoha pala Injili ejhe jhibetakuhubiribhwa mu bhulimwengu mzima, khenu kya abhombili n'dala ojho, pia kibeta kujobhibhwa kwa ndabha jha kumbukumbu.”
Ndipo mmonga ghwa bhala kumi ni bhabhele, jhaakutibhweghe Yuda Iskarioti, alotili kwa bhabhaha bha makuhani
ni kujobha, “Mwibetakunipela kiki kama nin'saliti?” Bhakamp'emela Yuda fipandi thelathini fya fedha.
Tangia muda obhu akalonda muda ghwa kun'saliti.
Hata ligono lya kubhwandelu lya mikate ghya ghisopibhu lepi chachu, bhanafunzi bhakandotela Yesu ni kujobha, “Ndaku ghwilonda tukujhandalilayi uliaghi kyakulya kya Pasaka?”
Akabhajobhela, “Mulotayi kumjini kwa munu fulani na mun'jobhilayi, Mwalimu ijobha, “Muda ghwa nene ukaribili. Nibetakujhitimisya Pasaka pamonga ni bhanafunzi bhangu mu nyumba jha jhobhi.””
Bhanafunzi bhakabhomba kama Yesu kya abhabholili, na bhajhendele kyakulya kya Pasaka.
Bhojhifikili kimihi, atamili pamonga ni bhanafunzi kumi na bhabhele.
Bhobhiliya kyakulya, akajobha, “Kweli nikabhajobhela mmonga bhinu ibetakunisaliti.”
Bhahuzuniki sana, na khila mmonga akayanda kun'kota, “Je, hakika nenelepi, Bwana?”
Akabhajibu, “Y'ola ambajhe ijhina kibhoko kya muene pamonga ni nene mu bakuli ndo jhaibeta kun'saliti.
Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakubhoka, kama kyajhilembibhu. Lakini ole bhwake munu ambajhe ibetakun'saliti Mwana ghwa Adamu! Ngajhijhele kinofu kwa munu ojhu asihogoleki.”
Yuda, ambajhe an'saliti ajobhili, “Je!, Ndo nene Rabi?” Yesu akan'jobhela, “Ujobhili lijambo elu ghwa muene.”
Bho bhilya kyakulya, Yesu aupisili n'kate akabhubariki, ni kubhumetula. Akabhapela bhanafunzi bha muene akajobha, “Mutolayi, muliajhi. Obho ndo mb'ele bhwangu.”
Akapisya kikombi ni kubhombesya, akabhapela ni kujobha, “Munywajhi mwabhoha o'mo.
Kwa kujha ejhe ndo lilopa lya agano lyangu, jhejhijhitika kwa ndabha jha bhingi kwa n'samaha ghwa dhambi.
Lakini nikabhajobhela, nibetakunywa lepi matunda gha mzabibu obho hadi ligono lela panibetakunywa mpya pamonga namu mu bhufalme bhwa Tata ghwa nene.”
Bho bhamalili kujhemba lwembu, bhakabhoka kulota ku Kidonda kya Mizeituni.
Kisha Yesu akabhajobhela, “Pakilu apa mwebhoha mwibetakwikungufula kwandabha jha nene, kwa kujha jhijhandikibhu, Nibetakun'tobha n'chungaji ni kondoo mu likundi bhibetakutabhwanyika.
Lakini baada jha kufufuka kwa nene, nibetakubhalongolela kulota Galilaya.”
Lakini Petro akan'jobhela, “Hata kama bhoha bhibetakubela kwa ndabha jha mambo ghaghibeta kukabha, nene nibetalepi kubela.”
Yesu akan'jibu, “Bhukweli nikubhola, pakilu apa kabla jha likongobhe lyakona kubheka, ghwibeta kunilela mara sidatu.”
Petro akan'jobhela, “hata kama ngajhilondekeghe kufwa ni bhebhe, nganikubelili lepi.” Ni bhanafunzi bhangi bhoha bhajobhili mebhu.
Baadaye Yesu akalota nabhu mahali pa pikutibhwa Gethsemane na abhajobhili bhanafunzi bha muene, “Mutamanyi apa bhwakati nilota okhu nikus'oma.”
Akan'tola Petro ni bhana bhabhele bha Zebedayo na akajhanda kwilombosya ni kwilamu.
Kisha akabhajobhela, “Roho jha nene ijhele ni malombosi mabhaha sana, hata kiasi kya kufwa. Musyalayi apa na mukeshayi pamonga nani.”
Akalota palongolo kidogo, akabina kifudifudi, ni kus'oma. Akajobha, “Tata ghwangu kama jhibhwesekana, kikombi ekhe nikijhepajhi. Isjhi kama kyanilonda nene, bali kyaghwilonda bhebhe.”
Akabhalotela bhanafunzi na abhakolili bhagonili lugono na akan'jobhela Petro, “Kwandabha ya kiki mshindilu kukesha nani kwa lisaa limonga?
Mukeshajhi ni kus'oma kusudi musijhingili majaribuni. Roho i radhi, lakini mb'ele dhaifu.”
Akalota mara jha bhubhele ni kus'oma. akajobha, “Tata ghwangu, kama lijambo e'le libhwesya lepi kujhepukika na ni lazima ninywajhi kikombi ekhe, mapenzi ghwa jhobhi ghatimitajhi.”
Akakerebhuka kabhele ni kubhakholela bhagonili lugono, kwa kujha mihu gha bhene gha jhele masitu.
Kisha akabhaleka kabhele akabhoka. Akas'oma mara jha tatu akajobha malobhi ghalaghala.
Baadaye Yesu akabhalotela, “Bado mugonili tu ni kup'omoseka? Mulangayi, saa jhikaribili, na Mwana ghwa Adamu isalitibhwa mumabhokho gha bhenye dhambi.
Mujhumukayi tubhoki. Mulangayi, jhola jhaibetakunisaliti ikaribila.”
Bhwakati badop ilongela, Yuda mmonga kati jha bhala kumi ni bhabhele, akahida. Likundi libhaha lya bhanu lyafikiri pamonga naku likajhalihomela kwa bha bhaha bha makuhani ni bhaseya bha bhanu. Bhahidili ni mapanga ni mabonga.
Kabhele munu jhaalondejhe kun'saliti Yesu abhapelili ishara, akajobha, “Jhola jhanibetakumbusu, ndo muene. Mun'kamulayi.”
Mara ejhu akahida kwa Yesu ni kujobha, “Salamu, Mwalimu!” Akajhanda kumbusu.
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Ndongo bhangu, libhombajhi lela ambalyo likuletili.” Ndipo bhakahida, ni kun'sosolela Yesu fibhoko, ni kun'kamula.
Langajhi, munu mmonga jha ajhele pamonga ni Yesu, anyosisi kibhokho kya muene akachomola bhupanga bhwake ni kun'tobha n'tumishi ghwa kuhani mbaha, ni kun'dumula mb'olokhot'o jhiakhe.
Ndipo Yesu akan'jobhela, kerebhusijhi bhupanga bhwa jhobhi paubhutolili, kwa kujha bhoha bha bhutumila bhupanga bhibetakujhangamisibhwa kwa bhupanga.
Mwidhanila nihotolalepi kun'kuta Tata ghwangu, nu muene akanitumila majeshi zaidi jha kumi na mabhele gha malaika?
Lakini basi jinsi jhelekhu majhandikhu ngaghabhwesili kutimisibhwa, efe ndo jhilondeka kuh'omela?”
Bhwakati obhu Yesu akabhajobhela bhumati, “Je! Muhidili ni mapanga ni mabonga kunikamula kama n'nyang'anyi? Khila ligono natamili mu lihekalu kumanyisya, na mkanikamuili lepi!
Lakini ghoha agha ghabhombiki ili majhandiku gha manabii ghatimilajhi.” Ndipo bhanafunzi bha muene bhakandeka ni kujumba.
Bhala bhabhan'kamuili Yesu bhampeliki kwa Kayafa, Kuhani Mbaha, mahali ambapo bhaandishi ni bhaseya bhajhele bhakibhongeniye pamonga.
Lakini Petro amfwatili kumbele kwa patali hadi mu bhukumbi bhwa Kuhani Mbaha. Akajhingila mugati ni kutama pamonga ni bhalinzi alangajhi kyakibetakuh'omela.
Basi bhabhaha bha makuhani ni libaraza lyoha bhajhele bhilonda bhushahidi bhwa bhudesi dhidi jha Yesu, kusudi bhabhwesiajhi kun'koma.
Ingabhwa bhakitokisi mashahidi bhingi, Lakini bhakabhilepi sababu jhojhioha jhila. Lakini baadajhe mashahidi bhabhele bhakitokesya palongolo
ni kujobha, “Munu ojho ajobhili, “Nibhwesya kulib'omola lihekalu lya K'yara ni kulijenga kabhele kwa magono madatu.”
Kuhani Mbaha akajhema ni kun'kota, “Gwibhwesyalepi kujibu? Abha bhikushuhudila kiki dhidi jha bhebhe?”
Lakini Yesu akatama kimya kuhani Mbaha akan'jobhela, “Kama K'yara kyaiishi, nikuamuru utubholajhi, kama bhebhe ndo Kristu, Mwana ghwa K'yara.”
Yesu akan'jibu, “Bhebhe ghwe muene ujobhili lijambo elu. Lakini ni kujobhela, kuh'omela henu ni kujhendelela ghwibetakumbona Mwana ghwa Adamu atamili, kibhokho kya kulia kyenye nghofu, na ihida mu mabhengu gha kunani.”
Ndipo Kuhani Mbaha akararula maguanda gha muene ni kujobha, “Akufuiri! Je, twilonda kabhele bhushahidi bhwa kiki? Langayi, tajhari mup'eliki ikufuru.
Je! Mwibhwasya kiki? bhakan'jibu ni kujobha, “Jhilondeka kufwa.”
Kisha bhakamfunyila mata kumihu ni kun'tobha ngumi, ni makofi kwa mabhokho gha bhene,
ni kujobha, “Tulaghulilajhi, bhebhe Kristu. Niani akutobhili?”
Bhwakati obhu Petro ajhele atamili kwibhala mu bhukumbi, ni n'tumishi n'dala akandotela ni kujobha, “Bhebhe pia ukajhele pamonga ni Yesu ghwa Galilaya.”
Lakini akabela mbele jha bhene bhoha, akajobha, nimanyilepi khenu kyaukanijobhela.”
Bho alotili kwibhala pa ndiangu, n'tumishi jhongi n'dala bho ambwene akabhajobhela bhabhajhele apu kujha, “Munu ojho pia ajhele pamonga ni Yesu ghwa Nazareti.”
Akabela kabhele kwa kulapa, “Nene nimmanyilepi munu ojho.”
Muda bhufupi baadajhe bhala bhabhajhele bhajhemili karibu, bhakandotela ni kujobha ni Petro, “Kwa hakika bhebhe pia ndo mmonga bha muene, kwa kujha hata lafudhi jha jhobhi jhilasya.”
Ndipo akajhanda kulaani ni kulapa, “Nene nimmanyilepi munu ojho,” na mara ejhu likongobha likabheka.
Petro akakhomboka malobhi ghaabholibhu ni Yesu, “Kabla jha likongobhe kubheka ghwibeta kunibela mara sidatu.”
Muda ghwa lukhele bho bhufikili, bhabhaha bhoha bha makuhani ni bhaseya bhabhanu bhalili njama dhidi jha Yesu bhakabhajhi kun'koma.
Bhamfungili, bhakan'dongosya, ni kumfikisya kwa Liwali Pilato.
Kisha bhwakati Yuda, ambajhe an'saliti, bho abhuene Yesu amalili kuhukumulibhwa, ajutili ni kukhelebhusya fipandi thelathini fya fedha kwa bhabhaha bha makuhani ni bhaseya,
na akajobha, “Nibhombili dhambi kwa kujhisaliti damu jhajhibelikujha ni hatia.” Lakini bhakajibu,” Jhikatuhusu kiki tete? ghalangajhi aghu ghwe muene.”
Kisha akafitagha pasi fila fipandi thelathini fya fedha mu lihekalu ni kubhoka ni kulota kwinionga muene.
Mbaha ghwa makuhani afitolili fela fipandi thelathini fya fedha ni kujobha, “Halali lepi kujhibheke fedha ejhe mu hazina, kwandabha ni gharama jha lilopa.”
Bhakajadiliana kwa pamonga ni fedha ikatumika kuhemelela n'gonda ghwa mfinyanzi ghwa kusiela bhageni.
Kwa ndabha ejhe n'gonda obhu ghwibetakukutibhwa, “N'gonda ghwa lilopa” hadi lelu ejhe.
Kisha litobhi lela lya lyanenibhu ni nabii Yeremia lyatimili, kujobha, “Bhaletili fipandi thelathini fya fedha, gharama jha jhapangibhu ni bhanu bha Israeli kwa ndabha jha muene,
na bhajhitumili kun'gonda ghwa mfinyanzi, kama Bwana kyaanjelekisi.”
Henu Yesu ajhemili mbele jha liwali, ni liwali akan'kota, “Je! Bhebhe ndo mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi?” Yesu akan'jibu, “Bhebhe ghwijobha aghu.” Bjhebhe ghwijobha aghu.”
Lakini bho ashtakibhu ni bhabhaha bha makuhani ni bhaseya, ajibilepi khenu kyokioha khela.
Kisha Pilato akan'jobhela, “Ughapelikilepi mashitaka ghoha dhidi jha bhebhe?”
Laki ni an'bilepi hata lilobhi limonga, hivyo, hivyo liwali akajha ni mshangao.
Henu mu sikukuu jhajhele desturi jha liwali kumfungula mfungwa mmonga jha achagulibhu ni bhumati. Bhwakati obhu bhajhele bhafungwa sugu kama vile Baraba.
Henu bho bhakibhongeniye pamonga, Pilato abhakhotili, “Niani mwilonda tumbopolajhi kwa ndabha jha muenga?” Barabara au Yesu jhaikutibhwa Kristu?
Kwandabha amalili kumanya kujha bhankamuili kwandabha jha chuki.
Bwakati itanama pa kiti kya hukumu, n'dalamunu akan'tumila lilobhi ni kujobha, “Usibhombi lijambo lyolioha lela kwa munu ojhu jhaabelikujha ni hatia. Kwanda yakiki nitesibhu muni hata lelu mu ndoto kwa ndabha jha muene.
Ndipo bhabaha bha makuhani ni bhaseya bhabhashawishi makutano bhan'somajhi Baraba, ni Yesu akomibhwajhi.
Liwali abhakhotili, “Jholeku kati jha abha bhabhele mwilonda nene nibhalekelayi kwa muenga?” Bhoha bhakajibhu bhakajobha, “Baraba.”
Pilato akabhajobhela, Nin'kheta kiki Yesu jhaikutibhwa Kristu?” Bhoha bhakan'jibu, “Msulubisijhi.”
Ni muene akajobha, “Kwandabha jhakiki, likosa leleku lyaabhombili?” Lakini bhazidili kuwesya sauti hata panani muni, “Nsulubisiajhi.”
Henu bhwakati Pilato bhoabhuene ibwesyalepi kubhomba kyokyoha khela, lakini badala jhiake vurugu sikajhanda, akaleta masi akasamba mabhoko gha muene embele jha bhumati, ni kujobha, “Nene nijhelepi ni hatia juu jha lilopa lya munu ojho jhaabeli kujha ni hatia. Mughalangajhi agha mwebhene.”
Bhanu bhoha bhakajobha, Damu jha muene ijhelayi panani pa tete ni bhana bhitu.”
Kisha akambopelela Baraba kwa bhene, lakini akan'tobha mijeredi Yesu ni kun'kabidhi kwa bhene kulota kusubibhwa.
Kisha askari bha liwali bhakan'tola Yesu mpaka Praitorio ni likundi libhaha lya maaskari bhoha bhalkabhonganika.
Bhakanfula nghobho sya muene ni kunfwatika likanzu lya rangi jhidung'u.
Kisha bhakatenesya litaji lya mifwa ni kulibheka panani mutu ghwa muene, na bhambekili lilasi ku kibhokho kya muene kya kuume. Bhapigili magoti mbele jha muene ni kun'kejeli, bhakajobha, aaaaa'Salamu, Mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi?”
Na bhamfunyili mate, na bhaletili lisali ni kuntobha kumutu.
Bwakati bhakan'keli bhakamfula likanzu lela ni kunfwatika nghobho sya muene, ni kundongosya kulota kun'sulubisya.
Bho bhapili kwibhala, bhambwene munu kuhomela Krene lihina lya muene Simeoni, ambajhe bhandasimisi kulota naku ili abhweajhwi kuupenda n'salaba ghwa muene.
Bhabhafikiri mahali pa pikutibhwa Goligotha, maana jhiakhe, “Fuvu lya mutu.”
Bhampelili siki jhaichanyibhu ni nyongo anyuajhi. Lakini bho ajhibonjili abhwesilepi kunywa.
Bho bhikan'sulubisya, bhagabhene maguanda gha muene kwa kupigila kura.
Na bhakamata ni kundanga.
Panani pa mutu ghwa muene bhambekili mashtaka dhidi jha muene ghakajha ghisomeka, “Ojho ndo Yesu, mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi.”
Bhanyang'anyi bhabhele bhakasulubibhwa pamonga ni muene, mmonga upande bhwa kulia ni jhongi bhwa kushoto.
Bhala ambabho bhapeteghe bhakajhanda kun'dhiaki, bhakajha bhihugusya mitu ghya bhene
ni kujobha, “Bhebhe ndo ulondeghe kuliharibu lihekalu ni kulijenga magono madatu, ukiokolayi ghwemuene! Kama kueli bhebhe ndo mwana ghwa K'yara, selelajhi pasi ubhokayi pa n'salaba apu!”
Mu hali jhelajhela bhabhaha bha makuhani bhakajha bhakan'kashifu, pamonga ni bhaandishi ni bhaseya ni kujobha,
“Aokwili bhangi, lakini ibhwesya lepi kwiokola muene. Muene ndo mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi. Na aselelajhi pasi kuhomela pa n'salaba, ndipo pa tubetakumwamini.
An'tumainili K'yara. Lekajhi K'yara an'hokolajhi henu kama ilonda, kwandabha ajobhili, “Nene na mwana ghwa K'yara.”
Ni bhala bhanyang'anyi bhabhajhele bhasulubibhu pamonga ni muene pia bhakajobha malobhi gha kun'dhiaki.
Henu kuhomela saa sita kwajhele ni ngisi mu nchi jhiola hadi saa tisa.
Bhojhifikiri saa tisa, Yesu akalela kwa sauiti mbaha, “Eloi, Eloi lamathabakithani?” akajhaimaanisya, “K'yara ghwangu K'yara ghwangu, kwandabha jha kiki undekili?
Bhwakati obhu bhaadhi jha bhe bhene bhabhajhemili pala bhap'heliki bhakajobha, “Akan'kuta Eliya.”
Mara mmonga bhene akajumba kutola sifongo ni kujhimemesya kinywaji kikali, akajibheka panani pa libehe ni kumpela akabhai kunywa.
Na bhene bha bhabakili bhakajobha, “Mundekajhi muene, tulotayi kama Eliya ibetakuhida kumwokola.”
Kisha Yesu akalela kabhele kwa sauti mbaha na akaibhosya roho jha muene.
Langayi, Lipazia lya hekalu lyakachwiki sehemu sebhele kuh'omela panani hadi pasi. Ni ardhi jhikatetemeka ni miamba ikakayuka fipandi.
Makaburi ghakagupuka, ni mibhele ghya bhatakatifu bhingi bhabhajhele bhaginili lugono bhafufulibhu.
Bhahomili mu makaburi baada jha bhfufuo bhwa muene, bhajhingili mji mtakatifu, na bhakabhonekana ni bhingi.
Basi jhola akida ni bhala mbabho bhajele bhakandama Yesu bhabhwene litetemekhu ni mamabao ghaghajhele ghih'omela, bhamemesibhu ni bhuogha sana ni kujobha, “Bhukweli Ojho ajhele mwana ghwa K'yara.”
Bhadala bhingi bhabhajhele bhakamfuata Yesu kuh'omela Galilaya ili kun'hudumila bhajhele pala bhilanga kwa patali.
Miongoni mwa bhene Mariamu Magdarene, Mariamu nyinamunu Yakobo ni Joseph, ni mabhu ghwa bhana bha Zebedayo.
Bho jhifikiri kimihi ahidili munu tajiri kuh'omela Arimatahayo, jhaakutibhu Yusufu, ambajhe pia ajhele mwanafunzi ghwa Yesu.
Andotili Pilato ni kuus'oma mb'eele ghwayi.
Yusufu abhutolili mb'ele akauk'onga nghobho jha sufi safi,
na akaugoneka mu likaburi lipya lya muene lya alichongili mu muamba. Kisha akaviringisya liganga libhaha likagupika ndiangu bhwa likaburi na akabhoka.
Mariamu Mgdalena ni Mariamu jhongi bhajhele pala bhatamili kulanga likaburi.
Ligono lya lyafwatili ambalyo lyajhele ligono baada jha maandalio, bhabhaha bha makuhani ni Mafarisayo bhakibhongeniye pamonga kwa Pilato.
Bhakan'jobhela, Bwana, twikhomboka kujha bhwakati jhola n'siobhi ajhele hai, ajobhili, “Baada jha ligono lya tatu ibetakufufuka kabhele.'
Henu, laghisighi kujha likaburi lilendibhwajhi salama mpaka ligono lya tatu. Vinginevyo, bhanafunzi bha muene bhibhwesya kuhida kun'heja ni kujobha kwa bhanu, 'Afufuiki kuhoma kwa bhafu.' Ni bhudanganyifu bhwa mishu bhwibetakujha bhubhibhi kuliko bhola bhwa kubhuandelu.”
Pilato akabhajobhela, “Mulotayi bhalinzi. Mulotayi mukabhekayi hali jha bhusalama kama kyamwibhwesya.”
Efyo bhakalota ni kubhomba likaburi kujha salama, liganga lyagongibhu mhuri ni kubheka bhalinzi.
Baadaye kimihi ligono lya Sabato, lijobha bho libhahala kutolela ligono lya kuanza lya juma, Mariamu magadalena, nu jhola Mariamu jhongi bhahidili kulilola likaburi.
Langayi kwa jhela ni tetemeko libhaha, kwa ndabha malaika ghwa Bwana aselili ni kuliviringisya liganga lela, kisha akalitamula.
Sura jha muene jhajhele kama jha bhumeme ni maguanda ghake ghajhele mabhalafu kama theluji.
Bhalinzi bhala bhamemili ni hofu ni kujha kama bhafu.
Malaika jhola akabhafafanulila bhala bhadala akajobha, “Musitili kwa maana nimanyili mukandonda Yesu, jhaasulubhibhu.
Ajhelepi aoa, lakini afufuiki kama kyaabhajobhili. Muhidayi mulolayi ambapo Bwana agonili.
Mulotajhi manyata mukabhajobhilayi bhanafunzi bha muene, 'Afufuiki kuhomela bhafu, langajhi abhalongolili Galilaya. Okhu ndo mwibetakumbona.' Langajhi nene nibhajobhili.”
Bhadala bhala bhakabhoka pa likaburi pala manyata bhakajha ni hofu ni furaha mbaha, na bhakajumba kubhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene.
Langayi Yesu akabhonana nabhu ni kujobha, “Salamu.” bhala bhadala bhahidili ni kukamula magolo gha muene, na kisha bhakamwabudu.
Kisha Yesu akabhajobhela, “musitili, mulotayi mukabhajobhelayi bhalongobhangu bhalongolelayi Galilaya. Okhu bhibetakunibhona.
Bhwakati bhola bhadala bhakajha bhilota, langayi baadhi jha bhalinzi bhalotili ku mjini ni kubhajobhela bhabhaha bha makuhani ni bhaseya mambo ghoha ghaghajhele ghahomili.
Na bhene makuhani bho bhabhonene ni bhaseya ni kulijadili lijambo elu pamonga nabhu, bhahomisi kiasi kibhaha kya hela kwa bhala askari
ni kubhajobhela, “Mubhajobhilayi bhangi kujha, 'bhanafunzi bha Yesu bhahidili pakilu kuheja mb'ele ghwa Yesu bhwakati tete tugonili.'
Kama taarifa ejhe jhibetakunfikila liwali, tete twibeta kun'shawishi ni kubhabhosela muenga mashaka ghoha.”
Henu bhala askari bhasitola hela sela ni kubhomba kama kyabhajhelekesibhu. Habari ejhe jhikajhenela sana kwa Bhajhahudi na jhijhele naha hadi lelu.
Lakini bhala mitume kumi na moja bhakalota Galilaya, pa kidonda pala pa abhajhelekesi.
Ni bhene bho bhambwene, bhakamwabudu. Lakini baadhi jha bhene bhakabhona shaka.
Yesu akahida kwa bhene akabhajobhela, “Nipelibhu mamlaka ghoha paduniani ni kumbinguni.
Henu mulotajhi mukabhabhombayi malaika ghoha kujha bhanafunzi. Mubhabatisiajhi mu lihina lya Tata, ni la Muana, ni la Roho Mtakatifu.
Mubhamanyisiajhi kughati mambo ghoha ghanibhaamuriri, Na langajhi, nene nijhele pamonga namu daima, hata mpaka mwisho ghwa dunia.
Obho ndo mwanzo ghwa injili jha Yesu Kristo, mwana ghwa K'yara.
Kama kya jhilembibhu ni nabii Isaya, “Langayi, nikan'tume n'jumbe ghwa nene mbele jha jhobhi, mmonga jhaibetakutayarisya njela jha bhebhe.
Sauti jha munu jhikuta ku nyika, “Mujhikamilisiayi njela jha Bwana; musinyosiayi njela sya muene”.
Yohana ahidili, ni kubatisya nyikani ni kuhubili bhubatisu bhwa toba kwa n'samaha ghwa dhambi.
Nchi jhioha jha Yudea na bhanu bhoha bha Yerusalemu bhalotili kwa muene. Bhabatisibhu mu kih'olo Yordani, bhakajha bhibhungama dhambi sya bhene.
Yohana ajhele ifuala liguanda lya mangama gha ngamia ni nkanda ghwa ngozi mu nsana ghwa muene, na alijheghe nzige ni asali jha muda si.
Ahubiri ni kujobha, “Ajhele mmonga ihida badala jha nene na ajhe ni nghofo kuliko nene, na nijhelepi ni hadhi hata kujhinama pasi ni kukhonga mighojhi jha filatu fya muene.
Nene nabhabatisi kwa masi, lakini muene ibetakubhabatisya muenga kwa roho mtakatifu.”
Jhatokili mu magono aghu kujha Yesu ahidili kuh'oma Nazareti jha Galilaya na abatisibhu ni Yohana mu kih'olo Yordani.
Bhwakati Yesu ijhinuka kuh'oma mmasi, abhwene mbingu sigabhwanyiki bhwasi ni Roho akaselela pasi panani pa muene Kama njebha.
Ni sauti jha h'omili kumbinguni “Bhebhe ndo mwanabhangu jha nikuganili. Nipendesibhu sana ni bhene.”
Kisha mara moja Roho akandalimisya kulita nyikani.
Ajhele kunyikani magono arobaini, akajha ijaribibhwa ni lisyetani. Ajhele pamonga ni bhanyama bha kun'situ ni malaika bhan'hudumili.
Henu baada jha Yohana kukamulibhwa, Yesu akahida Galilaya kutangasya injili ya K'yara,
Akajobha, “Muda bhutimili, ni bhufalme bhwa K'yara bhukaribili. Mutubuajhi ni kujiamini injili”.
Na akajha ip'eta kando mu bahari jha Galilaya, ambwene Simoni ni Andrea ndongho ghwa Simoni bhakajha bhilo bha nkwabhu ghwa bhene mu bahari kwa kujha bhajhele bhavuvi.
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Muhidayi, munikesiajhi, na nibetakubhabhomba bhavuvi bha bhanu.”
Na mara jhe jhuejhu bhakaleka mikwabhu ghya bhene bhakankesya.
Bhwakati agendili patali kidogo, ambwene Yakobo mwana ghwa Zebedayo ni Yohana ndongo munu; Bhajhele mu bhuatu bhitengenesya nkuabhu.
Mara akabhakuta na bhene bhakandeka Dadi jha bhu Zebedayo mugati mu bhuatu ni bhatumishi bhabhakodibhu, bhakan'kesya.
Na bho bhafika kaperinaumu, ligono lya sabato Yesu akajhingila mu sinagogi ni kufundisya.
Bhakashangala tifundisu la muene, kwandabha ajhele akabhafundisya kama munu ambajhe ajhe ni mamlaka na siyo kama bhaandishi.
Bhwakati bhobhuobhu kwa jhele ni munu mu lisinagogi lya bhene jhaajhele ni roho jhibaya, na apigili kelele,
akajobha, “Tujhe ni kiki kya kubhomba ni bhebhe Yesu ghwa Nazareti? Uhidili kutujhangamisya? Nikumanyili ghe niani. Bhebhe ghwe n'takatifu pekee ghwa k'yara!”
Yesu akankemela pepo ni kujobha, “Gudamayi ni ubhokayi mugati omu!”
Ni roho jhichafu jhambinisi pasi ni kubhoka kwa muene bhwakati ilela kwa sauti jha panani.
Na bhanu bhoha bhashangala bhakajhandana kukotana kila mmonga, “Elehe kiki? Lifundisu lipya lyalijhele ni mamlaka? Hata liamuru pepo bhabhi naghughuken'tii”
Ni habari kuhusu muene mara jha jhuejhu sileasambala khila mahali mugati mu mkoa bhuoa bhwa Galilaya.
Na mara jhejhuejhu baada jha kuh'oma kwibhala lya sinagogi bhajhingili munyumba mwa Simoni ni Andrea bhakajha ni Yakobo ni Yohana.
Henu nkuwibhi ghwa Simoni ajhele agonili iluala bhutamu, mara jhejhuejhu bhakari jobhela Yesu habari sya muene.
Efyo akahida, akarikamula kibhokho, ni kunj'hinula kunani; bhutemu bhukabhoka kwa muene, na akajhanda kubhahudumila.
Kimihi kekuekhu lijhobha limali kujhibhela, bhakanditela kwa muene bhoha bhabhejhele bhatamu, au bhahajhe ni mapepo.
Mji bhuoha bhakibhongeniye pamonga pa ndiangu.
Abhapo ngisi bhingi bha bhajhe bhatamu bha bhutemu mbalimbali ni kubhosya pepo mingi bali anihusili lepi pepo kulongela kwandabha bhammanyili.
Ajhumuiki lukhela sana bhwakati jha jhele bado ngisi; abhokili akalota mahali pa faragha na as'omili okhu.
Simoni ni bhoha bhabhajhele pamonga ni muene bharikesisi.
Bhankabhili ni kun'jobhela, “khila mmonga ikulonda”
Akabhejobhela, “Tubhoki mahali pangi, kwibhala mu miji jha jhizunguka, ili nibhwesiajhi kuhubili okhu pia. Ndio sababu nihidili hapa.”
Akalota akajha ep'ete Galilaya jhioha, ihubiri mu masinagogi gha bhene ni kukemela pepo.
Jaajhele ni bhukoma mmonga akahida kwa muene. Akajha akan'sihi; Apigili magoti nikun'jobhela, “Kama ghwilonda, ghwibhwesya kunibhomba nijhiajhi kinofu.”
Akajha sukumibhwa ni huruma, Yesu akanyosya kibhoko Kya muene ni kurikamula, akan'jobhla, “Nilonda ujhelayi ghwe n'nofu.”
Mara jhejhuejhu bhukoma bhukabhoka, na ambombili kujha kinofu.
Yesu akan'sihi sana ni kun'jobhela alotajhi mara moja,
Akan'jobhela, “Hakikisia jhi ghwajo bha lepi litobhi kwa jhejhioha j'hola, lakini lotajhi, ukilasiajhi kwa kuhani, na uhomesiajhi dhabihu kwandabha jha bhutakaso ambabho Musa alaghisye, kama bhushuhuda kwa bhene.”
Lakini akalota ni kujha nda kumb'ola kila mmonga ni kujhenesya lilobhi zaidi hata Yesu abhwesi lepi kabhele kuj'hingila kun'jini kwa bhuhuru. Efyo atamili mahali pa faragha ni bhanu bha hidili kwa muene kuhomela kila mahali.
Bho akerebhiuki kaperinaumu baada jha magono madebe jhapelekiki kujha ajhele kunyumba.
Bhanu bhingi sana bhajhele bhakibhongeniye pala na jhajhelepi nafasi kabhele, jhela jhe pala pa ndiangu, ni Yesu ajobhili lilobhi kwa bhene.
Kisha baadhi jha bhangu bhahidili kwa muene bhandetili munu jha apozili; Bhanu bhancheche bha mp'endili.
Bhwakati bhashindilu kunkaribila kwa ndabha jha bhumati bhwa bhanu, bhabhosili paa panani pa mahali pa ajhele. Na bhobhamalili kutobola lil'ende, bhaselisi kitanda ambakyo munu jha apozili agonili.
Bhoajhibhwene imani jha bhene Yesu akan'jobhela munu jha apozili, “mwanabhangu, dhambi sya jhobhilimalikusamehebhwa.”
Lakini baadhi jha bhaandishi bhala bha bhatamili pala bhakinong'uinu mu mioyo jha bhene,
“Ibhwesyabhuli munu ojho kujobha naha? Ikufuru! Nani jhaibhwesya kusamehe dhambi isipokujha K'yara muene?”
Mara Yesu amanyili mu roho jha muene kyabhafikirileghe mu mioyo jha bhene. Kwandabha jha kiki mwifikirira aghu mu mioyo jha muenga?
Lelekhu lyepusi zaidi kujobha kwa munu jha apozili, 'Dhambi sya jhobhi sisamehibhu' au kujobha 'Jhemajhi, tolajhi kitanda kyajhobhi na ugendajhi?'
Lakini ili bhabhwesiajhi kumanya mwana ghwa Adamu ajhele ni mamlaka gha kusamehe dhambi paduniani, an'jobhili jhola j'ha apozili,
“Nikujobhela bhebhe, jhemayi, tolayi nkeka ghwa jhobhi, na ulajhi kunyumba kwa jhobhi.”
Akajhema ni mara jhejhuejhu akatola nkeka ghwa muene, na akalota kwibhala ku nyumba palongolo pa kila munu, Efyo bhanu bhoha bhashangele na bhampelili K'yara bhutukufu, na bhakajobha “kamwe tubhwajhilepi kubhona lijambo kama e'le.”
Akalota kabhele kando jha nyanja, ni bhumati bhuoha bhwa bhanu bhakahida kwa muene, na akabhamanyisya.
Bho ib'eta akambona Lawi mwana ghwa Alfayo atamili pa sehemu jha kubhonganila kodi na akan'jobhela, “Nikisiayi.” Akajhema ni kun'kesiya.
Ni bhwakati Yesu ilya kyakulya munyumba jha Lawi, bhabhonganiya kodi bhingi ni bhanu bhabhajhele ni dhambi bhajhele bhilya ni Yesu ni bhanafunzi bha muene, kwandabha bhajhele bhingi ni bhene bhakan'kesiya.
Bhwakati bhaandishi, ambabho bhajhele Mafarisayo, bho bhabhuene Yesu elya ni bhanu bhenye dhambi ni bhabhonganiya kodi, akabhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene, “Kwa ndabha j'hakiki ilya ni bhakusanya kodi ni bhanu bhabhaj'hele ni dhambi?”
Bhwakati Yesu ap'heliki aghu akabhajobhela,” Bhanu bhabhajhele ni afya mu mb'ele bhikandonda lepi tabibu; ni bhanu bhatamu tu ndo bhakandonda. Nahidi lepi kubhakuta bhanu bhabhajhele ni haki, lakini bhanu bhenye dhambi.”
Bhanafunzi bha Yohana ni Mafarisayo bhajhele bhifuanana. Ni baadhi j'ha bhanu bhakahida kwa muene ni kun'jobhela, “Kwa j'ha kiki bhanafunzi bha Yohana ni Mafarisayo bhifunga, lakini bhanafunzi bha jhobhi bhifunga lepi?
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Je bhabhayele hudhuriri ku harusi bhibhuesya kufunga bhwakati bhwa harusi back ajhele pamonga nabhu? Kwa fyofyoha fela bwana harusi akajhiayi bado ajhele pamonga nabhu bhibhwesya lepi kufunga.”
Lakini magono ghibetakuhida bhwakati bwana harusi paibetakubhosibhwa kwa bhene, ni khila ligono elu bhene bhibeta kufunga.
Ajhelepi munu jha ihona kipandi kipya Kya nghobho mu liguanda lilala, na kubetakujha mpasuko bhubhibhi.
Ajhelepi munu jha isopa divai mpya mu firiba fya fichakele, Kama ndo naha divai ibetakujobha fimba ni fyoha fibhele divai ni firiba tubetakufuana. Badala j'hiake, bhakajhe divai mpya mu firiba fipya.”
Mu ligono lya sabato Yesu akap'eta mu baadhi jha mig'onda ni bhanafunzi bha muene bhakajhanda kutola baadhi jha masuka gha ngano.
Ni Mafarisayo bhakan'jobhela, “Langai, kwa ndabha ya kiki bhibhomba khenu kinyume ni sheria mu ligono lya Sabato?”
Akabhajobhela, “Mwasomilepi khela kya akibhombili Daudi bho ajhele mu bhuhitaji ni njala —muene pamonga ni bhanu bhabhaj'hele pamonga nabhu?
Jinsi kyaalotili mu nyumba j'ha K'yara bhwakati Abiathari aj'he kuhani mbaha na akalya nkate ghwa ghubhakibhu palongolo — ambao j'ha jhele kinyume kya sheria kwa munu jhejhioha jhola kulya isipokujha makuhani na abhapelili hata baadhi jha bhala bhabhajhe pamonga nakhu?”
Yesu akajobha, “Sabato jhabhombiki kwa ndabha j'ha mwanadamu, siyo mwanadamu kwa ndabha jha Sabato.
Henu, Mwana ghwa Adamu ndo Bwana, hata kwa Sabato.”
Ni kabhele akajhingila mugati mu lisinagogi na m'ola jaajhele ni munu jhaapoozili kibhoko.
Baadhi jha bhanu bhankeseleleghe kwa bhuharibifu kulola Kama ibetakujobha ligono lya Sabato ili kwamba bhan'shtakiajhi.
Yesu akan'jobhela munu jha apoozili kibhokho,” Jhinukayi na ujhemayi katikati jha bhumati obho.”
Kisha akabhajobhela bhanu, “Je ni halali kubhomba khenu kinofu ligono lya Sabato au kubhomba ghaghabelili kuj'ha gha haki; kuokola maisha, au kukoma?” Lakini bhakabakila kinunu.
Akabhalanga kwa ligoga, akajhaihuzunika kwa ndabha j'ha bhubomolaji bhwa mioyo ghyabhene na akan'jobhela munu jhola, “Nyosiajhi kibhokho Kya jhobhi”. Akabhunyoosya ni Yesu akamponesya kibhokho Kya muene.
Mafarisayo bhakalota kwibhala na mara bhakabhomba njama pamonga ni Maherode dhidi jha muene ili kun'koma.
Kisha Yesu pamonga ni bhanafunzi bha muene, bhakalota kubahari, ni bhumati mbaha bhwa bhanu ghwabhakesisi kuh'omela Galilaya ni Bhuyahudi
ni kuh'omela Yerusalemu ni kuh'omela Idumaya ni palongolo jha Yorodani hi jirani jha Tiro ni Sidoni, bhumati mbaha, bhobhup'eliki khila khenu Kya abhombekai, bhahidili kwa muene.
Na abhajobhili bhanafunzi bha muene kuandala bhuatu bhudebe kwa ndabha jha bhumati ili kwamba bhasihidi kun'komanila.
Kwa kujha aponisi bhingi, ili kila munu jha ajhele ni malombosi ajhele ni shauku jha kun'fikila ili an'kamulayi.
Popoha pala roho bhachafu bho bhikambona, bhabinili pasi mbele jha muene ni kuleta na bhajobhili, “Bhebhe ndo Mwana ghwa k'yara”.
Akabhakuta kwa msisitizo bhasibhombi amanyikanikayi.
Akalota panani pa kid'onda, na akabhakuta bha abhalondeghe, na bhakabhoka.
Akakabhachagula kumi ni bhabhele (abhakutili mitume), ili. kwamba bhajhelayi pamonga ni muene na abhwesiaghe kubhatuma kuhubiri,
ni kujha ni mamlaka gha kubhosya mapepo.
Na akabhachagula kumi ni bhabhele: Simoni, j'haampelili lihina lya Petro,
Yakobo mwana ghwa Zebedayo, ni Yohana ndongo munu Yakobo, j'haampelili lihina lya Bonagesi, abhu ndo bhana bha ngurumo,
ni Andrea, Filipo, Bartholomayo, Mathayo, Tomaso, Yakobo mwana wa Alfayo, Thadayo, Simoni Mkananayo
ni Yuda Iskariote, ambaj'he an'saliti.
Kisha akalota kunyumba, ni bhumati bhwa bhanu bhakahida pamonga kabhele, hata bhasibhwesi kulya kabhele hata nkate.
Familia jha muene bho bhapeliki habari ejhu bhakalota kun'kamula, kwani bhajobhili, “Arukibhu ni kuhala”.
Bhaandishi bhabhahidili kuh'oma Yerusalemu bhajobhili, “Apagewe ni Beelzebuli,” ni, “Kwan'tawala ghwa mapepo ibhosya mapepo”.
Yesu akabhakuta kwa muene ni kujobha nabhu kwa mifuanu, “Jinsi gani lisyetani kibhwesiayi kumbosya lisyetani?
Kama bhufalme bhugawanyiki bhwene, bhufalme obhu ghwibhwesya lepi kujhema.
Kama nyumba jhigabhwanyiki jhiene, jhibhwesya lepi kujhema.
Kama lisyetani libeta kujhinuka kinyume kyake liene, libhwesya lepi kujhema, na kubetakujha lifikili mwisho bhwake.
Lakini ajhelepi hata mmonga jhaibhwesya kujhingila mugati mu nyumba jha munu mwenye nghofu ni kuheja fenu fya muene bila kunfunga mwenye nghofu hoti, na Kisha ni kubhonganiya Kya kijhele mu nyumba.
Bhukweli nikabhajobhela, dhambi syoha. sya bhana bha bhanu sibetakusamehebhwa, pamonga ni kufufulibhwa ambasyo bhitamka,
lakini jhejhioha jhaibeta kun'situ Roho Mtakatifu ibetalepi kusamehebhwa kamwe bali ajhele ni hatia jha dhambi jha milele”.
Yesu alijobhili ele kwa ndabha bhajobhaghe, “Ajhe ni roho bhachafu”.
Kisha nyinamunu ni bhalongomunu bhakahida ni kujhema kwibhala. Bhakan'tuma munu kun'kuta.
Ni bhumati bhwa bhanu bhwabhujhele bhutamili karibu nu muene bhakan'jobhela, “Nyinu aku ni bhalongobhu bhajhe kwibhala, na bhikulonda bhebhe”.
Akabhajibu, “Niani nyina bhangu ni ndongobhangu?”
Akabhalanga bhabhatamili bhan'syonguiki ni kujobha, Lakini, Langayi, abha ndo bha nyina bhangu ni bhalongobhangu!
Jhejhioha j'haibhomba mapenzi gha K'yara, munu oj'hu ndo ndongobhangu, ndo nd'ombo bhangu, ni nyina bhangu”.
Kabhele ajhandili kumanyisya kandokando jha bahari. Ni bhumati mbaha bhwakibhongeniye bhwanzunguiki bhukajhingila mugati mu bhuatu mu bahari, ni kutama. Bhumati bhuoha bhwajhele pembeni mu bahari bhufukweni.
Ni kubhafundisya mambo mingi kwa mifuanu, ni kujobha kwa bhene kwa mafundisu ghake.
Mup'elekesiajhi, mpanzi alotili kupanda.
Bhoipanda, baadhi jha mbeyu syabinili munjela, ni fidege fikahida fikalya.
Mbeyu senge syabinili mu muamba, ambako kwa jhelepi ni bhud'opi bhwingi. Mara syajhomili, kwa ndabha syajhelepi ni bhud'opi bhwa kutosya.
Lakini lijobha bho lih'omili, syajhomili, na kwandabha syajhelepi ni mizizi, syajhomili.
Mbeyu senge syabinili katikati jha mifwa. Mifwa ghyakhotili ghikasizuila, na syahoguili lepi matunda ghoghoha ghala
Mbeyu s'enge syabinili mu bhud'opi bhunofu na syahogwili matunda bhwakati syahogwili ni kujhongeseka, s'enge syahoghwili mara thelathini zaidi, ni s'enge sitini, ni s'enge mia”.
Na akajobha, “Jhejhioha jha ajhele ni mbolokoto na apelekayi!”
Yesu bho ajhemuene, bhala bhabhajhe karibu nakhu ni bhala kumi ni bhabhele bhakan'kotili kuhusu mifuano.
Akabhajobha kwa bhene, “Kwa muenga mupelibhu siri sya bhufalme bhwa K'yara. Lakini kwa bhajhele kwibhala khila khenu mifuanu,
ili bhakalangajhi, ndo bhilola, lakini bhilola lepi, ni kwa ejhu pa bhip'eleka, lakini bhijhelebhwa lepi, amasivo bhabhayeli ni K'yara ngaabhasamee.”
Na akajobha kwa bhene,” Je mwijhelebhwa lepi mifuano obho? Mwibeta mu bhuli mifuano ghenge?
Mpanzi apandili lilobhi.
Baadhi ndo bhaka bhabhabinili palubhafu mu nj'hela, mahali lilobhi pa lipandibhu. Na bho bhalip'eliki, mara lisyetani likahida ni kulotela lilobhi ambalyo lapandibhu mugati mwa bhene.
Na baadhi ndo bhala bha bhapandibhu panani pa muamba, ambabho pabhakalipheleka lilobhi, manyata bhakalipokela kwa furaha.
Na bhajhelepi ni mizizi ghyoghyoha mugati mwa bhene, lakini bhuvumilivu kwa muda bhufupi. Halafu tabu ni malombosi pafihida kwa ndabha jha lilobhi, mara bhikwikungufula.
Na bhangi ndo bhala bhanandibhu mu mifwa, bha kalip'eleka lilobhi,
lakini malombosi gha dunia, bhusiobhi bhwa mali, ni tamaa sya mambo ghangi ghakabhajhingila ni kulijhoghaniya lilobhi na lisindwa kuhogola matunda.
Kisha bhajhele bhala ambabho bhapandibhu mu bhud'opi bhunofu. Bhikalipeleka lilobhi nikulipokela ni kuhogola matunda: baadhi thelathini, ni baadhi sitini, ni baadhi miamoja.”
Yesu akabhajobhela,”Je huwa ghwilela taa mugati mu nyumba ni kujhibheka basi pa kind'onga au pasi pa kitanda? Jhiletibhwa mugati ni kubhekibhwa panani pa kiango.
Kwa kujha kyalepi khenu kyokyoha kyakikifighili ambakyo kibetalepi kumanyikana na jhijhelepi siri ambayo jhibetalepi kubhakibhwa bhwasi.
Akajhelayi mwenye mb'olokoto na apelekajhi!”
Akabhajobhela,”Mujhelayi makini kwa khela kya mukakip'eleka, kwa kujha kup'emu kya mwip'ema, ndo kyamwibeta kup'emibhwa na jhibetakujhongesibhwa kwa muenga.
Kwandabha muene jha ajhe nakhu ibetakukabha zaidi, na jhola jha abelili kujha nakhu ibetakunyakibhwa ni fela fidebe fya aj'he nakhu.”
Na akajobha, “Bhufalme bhwa K'yara bhufananisibhu ni munu jha apandili mbeyu mu bhud'opi.
Bho alili pakilu ni kujhumuka lukhela, ni mbeyu sikachipula ni kukhola ingawa amanyilepi Kya jhitokili.
Dunia jhipisya mbeyu jhiene; kwanza matondo, halafu maua, halafu mbeyu syasikomele.
Ni bhwakati mbeyu pa jhibetakujha jhifundili mara jhipelekibhwa mundu, kwa ndabha mavuno ghawadili.”
Na akajobha, “tubhufananisiajhi bhufalme bhwa K'yara ni khenu gani, au titumilajhi mfuanu bholoki kubhujhelesela?
Ni Kama mbeyu jha haradali, ambapo bho jhipandibhu jhidusu kuliko mbeyu sioha paduniani.
Hata, bhwakati jhipandibhu, j'hikhola ni kujha mbaha zaidi jha mimea ghioha ghya pa bustani, na jhibhomba matafi mabhaha hata fidege fya kumbinguni fibhwesya kubhomba fisuisi fya kubhene mu kivuli lyake.”
Kwa mifuanu mingi jhafundisi na ajobhili lilobhi kwa bhene Kwa kadiri kyabhabhwesili kujhelebhwa,
na ajobhili lepi nabhu bila mifano. Lakini bhwakati bho ajhele muene, akabhajhelesya kila khenu bhanafunzi bha muene.
Mu ligono e'lu, bhwakati bhwa kimihi bho bhufikili kwa bhene, “Tubhoki lubhafu longi”.
Hivyo bhakabhuleka bhumati, bhakan'tola Yesu, bhwakati obhu bhajhele mugati mu bhuatu, Miatu jhenge jhajhele pamonga ni muene.
Ni mpongo bhukali bhwa linyegha bhukajha bhwijhingisya masi mu bhuatu ni bhuatu tayari bhwa melili masi.
Lakini Yesu muene ajhele mu shetri, agonili mu mto, bhakan'jobhela, bhakajhanda kun'jhumusiya, “Mwalimu, ghwijali lepi tete twifwa?”
Na akajhumuka akabhukemela mp'ongo ni kujhijobhela bahari, “' J'higudamayi amani”. Mp'ongo ukagudama, na kwajhele ni bhutulivu ghubhakibhu.
Na akabhajobhela, “Kwa ndabha jha kiki mwitila? Je mjhelepi ni imani bado?”
Bhajhingilibhu ni hofu mbaha mugati mwa bhene na bhakajobhesana bhene kwa bhene, “Ojho niani kabhele, kwa ndabha hata mp'ongo ghwa bhahari bhukan'tii?”.
Bhakahidili hadi lubhafu l'ongi lwa bahari mu mkoa ghwa Gerasi
Ni ghafla bhwakati Yesu ipita mugati mu bhuatu, munu jhaajhele ni roho chafu akahida kwa muene kuhomela kumakaburi.
Munu ojhu atameghe ku makaburi. Ajhelepi jhaabhwesili kunsifila, ajhelepi hata ku minyororo.
Akongibhu bhwakati bhwingi ni p'engu ni minyororo. Ahidumuili minyororo ni p'engu syake syadumuiki. Ajhelepi hata mmonga jha ajhe ni nghofu sya kun'shinda.
Pakilu ni pamusi ajhele kumakaburi ni kufidonda alelili ni kwidumula muene kwa maganga makali.
Bho ambwene Yesu kwa patali ojumbili kwa muene ni kujhinama mbele jha muene.
Al'elili kwa sauti mbaha, “Ghwilonda nikubhombilayi kiki, Yesu, Mwana ghwa K'yara j'haajhele kunani Sana? Nikus'okha kwa K'yara muene usin'tesi.”
Kwa kujha amali kun'jobhela, “Umbokajhi bhebhe roho n'chafu.”
Nu muene akan'kota, “Lihina lya bhebhe niani?” Nu muene akan'jibu, “Lihina lya nene ni Legion, kwa kujha tujhe twebhingi.”
Akan'sihi kabhele asibhap'eleki kwibhala ku mkoa.
Henu likundi libhaha lya maghorobhi likajhele lilasibhwa panani pa kid'onda,
naghu ghakan'sihi ni kujobha, “Tutumajhi ku maghorobhi; tujhingilayi mugati mwa bhene.”
Efyo akagharuhusu; roho bhachafu bhakabhoka kulota ku maghorobhi, naghu ghakajumba pasi pa kid'onda mpaka mu masi ni karibila maghorobhi elfu mbili ghajiembili mu bahari.
Nibhala bhabhajhele bhikaghalesya maghorobhi bhakajumba ni kupisya taarifa jha kyah'omili mu mji ni mundu. Ndipo bhanu bhingi bhakahoma kulota kulola kya kutokili.
Ndipo bhakahida kwa Yesu na bhambwene munu jha apagewe ni pepo— ajhele ni jeshi — atamili pasi, afwekibhu, na ajhele ni luhala lwa muene timamu, na bhakatila.
Bhala bhabhabhuene kya kyah'omili kwa jha apagewe ni pepo bhabhajobhili Kya kih'omili kwa bhene ni pia kuhusu maghorobhi.
Nabhu bhakajhanda kun'sihi abhokayi mu mkoa ghwa bhene.
Na bhoijhingila mubhwatu, munu jha apagewe ni mapepo an'sokili bhalotayi pamonga ni muene.
Lakini ambelekelili, lakini an'jobhili, “Lotajhi kunyumba jha jhobhi ni kwa bhanu bha j'hobhi, na ubhajobhilayi akibhombili Bwana, ni rehema jha akup'elili.”
Efyu akalota ni kujhanda kutangasya mambo mabhaha ambagho Yesu aghabhombili kwa muene mu Dekapoli, na khila mmonga ashangele.
Na bhwakati Yesu ilobhoka kabhele lubhafu lwa bhubhele, mugati mu bhuatu, bhumati mbaha bhwa syonguiki kumbonganila, bho ajhele kando jha bahari.
Na mmonga ndongosi ghwa sinagogi jhaakutibhweghe Yairo, ahidili, na bho ambwene, abinili mu magolo gha muene.
Akan'soka zaidi ni zaidi, akajobha, “Mwalibhangu n'debe mkaribishaji kufwa. Nikus'oka uhidayi na ubhekayi mabhokho gha jhobhi panani pa muene ili abhwesiayi afya jha kutama au kuishi.”
Efyo akalota pamonga naku, ni bhumati mbaha bhwan'kesisi nabhu bhandondamili karibu bhakajha bhan'syonguiki
Kwa jhele ni n'dala ambajhe lilopa lya muene kyah'omili kwa miaka kumi na mibhele.
Atesiki fya kutosha kwa matibabu mingi na atumili khila khenu kya ajhele nakhu. Hata efyu asaidiki lepi kwa kyokyoha khela, lakini badala jhiake ajhongesiki kujha ni hali jhibhibhi.
Ap'eliki habari kuhusu Yesu. Hivyo akahida kunyuma jha muene bhwakati igenda mu bhumati, nu muene aligusili liguanda lya muene.
Kwa kujha ajobhili, “kama nighakamuili maguanda gha muene tu, nibetakujha n'sima.”
Bho arikamuili kuh'oma lilopa kabhele kwa lekili, na akip'eliki mu mb'ele ghwa muene kujha aponisibhu kuh'omela mu malombosi gha muene.
Ni ghafla Yesu agunduili mu mb'ele ghwa muene kujha nghofu lip'onguiki. Na ageuke khoni ni khoni ni mu bhumati bhwa bhanu ni kukhota, “Niani jha akamuili liguanda lya nene?”
Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'jobhela, “Ulolili bhumati obho bhukulundamili, bhukulundamili, ni bhabhe ghwi jobha, Niani akukamuili?”'
Lakini Yesu akalenga khoni ni khoni ili ambonayi jha abhombili ele.
N'dala, amanyili kya kih'omili kwa muene atilili ni kutetemeka. Ahidili ni kubina chini mbele jha muene ni kun'jobhela bhukweli bhuoha.
Akajobha kwa muene “Mwalibhangu, imani jha jhobhi jhikubhombili ujhiaghe ghwa n'sima. Ujhendelelayi kujha ni imani na uponyisibhwayi matamu gha jhobhi ghoha”
Bho ilongela, baadhi jha jha bhanu bhahidili kuh'oma kwa te ndongosi ghwa sinagogi, bhakajha bhijobha “Mwalibhu afuili. Kwandabha jhakiki ghwijhendelela ku ndombosya mwalimu?”
Lakini Yesu bho ap'eliki kya bhilongela, akan'jobhela ndo ngosi ghwa sinagogi, “Usitili. Aminiayi tu”
Anduhuswili lepi j'hejhioha jhola kulongosana naku, isipokujha Petro, Yakobo, ni Yohana, ndongu munu Yakobo.
Bhakahida kunyumba kwa kiongozi ghwa sinagogi nu muene akabhona fuju, kulela kwingi ni kuombolesya.
Bho ajhingili mugati munyumba, akabhajobhela “Kwandabha jha kiki mwisikitika na kwandabha jha kiki mwilela? Muana afuili lepi bali agonili.”
Bhakan'heka, lakini muene, akabhahomesya bhoha kwibhala, akan'tola dadi ghwa muene ni mabhu ni bhala bhabhajhe pamonga nakhu, ni kujhingila mugati mwa ajhele muana.
Aukamuili kibhoko kya muana ni kun'jobhela, “Talitha koum,” ambayo ni kujobha, “Mmenja n'debe, nikujobhela, jhumukai.”
Ghafla muana akajhumuka ni kugenda (kwandabha ajhele ni miaka kumi ni mibhele). Ni ghafla bhakamuliki ni mshangao mbaha.
Akabhaamuru kwa nghofo kujha ajhelepi jhejhioha jhailondeka kumanya kuhusu ele. Na abhajbhili bhampelayi m'meja yola kyakulya.
Na akabhoka apu ni kulota kumjini kwa bhene ni bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'kesya.
Sabato bho jhifikili ajhandili kufundisya mu sinagogi. Bhanu bhingi bhampelekisi na bhasyangasibhu. Bhakajobha “Akabhili ndaku mafundisu agha?” “Ndo hekima jhelekhu jha apelibhu?” “Ibhomba bhuli miujiza eghe kwa mabhoko gha muene?”
“Je ojho si ndo jhola selemala, mwana ghwa Mariamu ni ndongo bhabhi bha Yakobo, Yose, Yuda ni Simoni? Je, bhal'omb'o munu si ndo bhitama bahapa pamonga ni tete?” Na bhafurahisibhu lepi ni Yesu.
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Nabii idula lepi heshima, isipokujha mu mji bhwa muene ni mwa bhalongo munu ni munyumba jha muene.”
Abhwesilepi kubhomba miujiza Apu, ila akabhabhekela bhatamu bhaolebe mabhoko kumutu bhakaponyesibhwa.
Asyangesibhu sana kwandabha jha kutokuamini kwa bhene. Kisha akafigendela fejiji fya jirani fikumanyisya.
Akabhakuta bhala bhanafunzi kumi na bhabhele akajha nela kubhalaghisya bhabhele bhabhele. Abhapelili mamlaka juu jha pepo bhabhibhi,
ni kubhaamuru bhasiloli kyokyohakila isipokujha ndonga tu. Bhasitoli nkate, bhwala nkoba, bhwala fedha, mu kibindu;
Lakini bhafwalajhi filatu na siyo makanzu mabhele.
Na akabhajobhela, “Nyumba jhojhioha jha mwibeta kujhingila, mutamayi apu mpaka pa mwibeta kubhoka.
Na mji bhobhuoha bhwa bhabelili kubhapokela bhwala kubhap'elekesya mu bhokai kwa bhene, mukung'undai mafumbi gha magolo ghinu, ijhiayi bhushuhuda kwa bhene.”
Na bhene bhakalota kutangasya bhanu bhatubuajhi ni kuleka dhambi sya bhene.
Bhabhabhosili pepo bhingi, na bhabhabakili bhatamu mafuta hi kubhaponyesya.
Mfalme Herode bho ap'eliki aghu, kwa kujha lihina lya Yesu lyamalili kumanyikana sana. Baadhi bhakajobha, “Yohana mbatizaji afufuiki ni kwa ndabha ej'he nghofu jha miujiza jhibhomba mbombo mugati mwa muene.”
Baadhi jha bhene bhakajobha, “Ojho ndo Eliya,” bado bhangi bhakajobha, “Ojho ndo nabii, kama mmonga ghwa bhala manabii bha muandi.”
Lakini Herode bho ap'eliki agha akajobha, “Yohana, jhanin'dumuili mutu afufulibhu.”
Maana Herode muene alaghisi Yohana akamulibhwayi na amfungili mu ligereza kwandabha jha Herodia (n'dala ghwa kakajhake Filipo) kwa ndabha muene ajhele an'gegili.
Kwandabha Yohana an'jobhili Herode, “Halali lepi kun'gega n'dala ghwa kakajhaku.”
Lakini Herodia ajhandili kun'dadila kun'koma lakini abhwesi lepi,
maana Herode an'tilili Yohana; amanyili kujha n'kolo haki na n'takatifu, na andekili kinofu. Na bhoajhendelili kump'elekesya ahuzuniki sana, lakini ah'obhelili kump'elekesya.
Hata bho nghufikili bhwakati muafaka jhifikili ni kukaribila ligono lya kuhogoleka Herode akabhajhandalila maofisa bha muene karamu, ni makamanda ni bhalongosi bha Galilaya.
Ndipo mwali ghwa Herodia akajhingila ni kukina mbele jha bhene, akamfurahisya Herode ni bhageni bhabhatamili bhwakati bhwa kyakulya kya kimihi. Ndipo mfalme akan'jobhela mwali, “Nis'okajhi kyokyoha kya ghwilonda nani nikupela.”
Akandapila ni kujobha, kyokyoha kyaghwibeta kunis'oma, nibetakupela, hata nusu jha bhufalme bhuangu.”
Akah'oma kwibhala akan'kota nyinamunu, “Nis'okajhi kiki?” Akajobha, “Mutu ghwa Yohana Mbatisiaji.”
Na mara jhejhuejhu akajhingila kwa mfalme akajhanda kujobha, “Nilonda nipelayi mu sahani, mutu ghwa Yohana Mbatisiji.”
Mfalme asikitishibhu sana, lakini kwa ndabha jha kiapo kya muene ni kwa ndabha jha bhahesya abhwesilepi kumbelekelela liombi lya muene.
Efyo, mfalme akabhatuma askari Kati jha bhalinzi bha muene ni kubhalaghisya kulota kundetela mutu ghwa Yohana. Mlinzi akalota kun'dumula mutu kwa ajhele mu kifungu.
Akaghuleta mutu ghwa muene mu sahani ni kumpela mwali, ni mwali akampela nyinamunu.
Na bhanafunzi bha muene bho muene bho bhapheliki aghu, bhakalota kuulota mb'ele ghwa muene bhakal'ota kuusiela kumakaburi.
Ni mitume, bhabhonganiki pamonga mb'ele jha Yesu bhakamb'ola ghoha gha bhabhombili ni ghabhafundisi.
Nu muene akabhajobhela, “Muhidayi mwebhene mahali pa faragha na tup'omosekajhi kwa muda.” Bhanu bhingi bhakajha bhihhida ni kubhoka, hata bhakabhili lepi nafasi jha kulya.
Kabhele bhakakuela mashua bhakalota mahali pa faragha bhene.
Lakini bhabhabhuene bhibhomba ni bhingi bhakabhamanya kwa pamonga bhajumbili kwa magolo kuh'omela miji ghioha, nabhu bhakafika kabla jha bhene.
Bho bhafikili pwani, abhubhuene bhumati mbaha na akabhahurumila kwa ndabha bha jhele kama ng'osi syasidulili n'dimaji. Na akajhanda kubhafundisya mambo mingi.
Muda bho bhulotili sana, bhanafunzi bhakan'hidila bhakan'jobhela, “Apa ndo mahali pa faragha ni muda ghulotili.
Ubhalaghajhi bhalotajhi miji ghya jirani ni fijiji ili bhakih'emelilayi kya kulya.”
Lakini akabhajibu akajobha,”Mubhapelayi muenga kyakulya.” Bhakan'jobhela, “Twibhwesya kulota kubhahemelela kyakulya ni mikate ghuaghejhe ni thamani jha dinari mia mbili ni kubhapela bhaliajhi?”
Akabhajobhela,” Mujhele ni mikate milenga? Mulotajhi mukalangayi, “bhobhakabhili bhakan'jobhela, “Mikate mihanu ni somba sibhele.”
Akabhaamuru bhanu bhatamajhi mu makundi mu mat'ondo mabhesi.
Bhakabhatamika mu makundi; makundi gha mamia kwa hamsini.
Kisha akalota mikate mihanu ni somba sibhele, ni kulanga kunani, akaghibariki kisha akabhapela bhanafunzi bha muene bhabhakajhi mbele jha bhumati. Kisha aghabhili somba sibhele kwa bhanu bhoha.
Bhalili bhoha hadi bhatoshiki.
Bhabhongeniyi fipandi fya mikate ghyaghibakiri, fyamemili fikapu kumi ni fibhele ni pia fipandi fya somba.
Na bhajhele bhagosi elfu tano bhabhalili mikate.
Mara akabhajobhela bhakwelayi mu mashua bhalotayi sehemu jh'enge, hadi Bethsaida, bhwakati muene akabhalagha makutano.
Bhobhamalili kubhoka, akalota kukid'onda kus'oma.
Bhojhifikili kimihi ni mashua gha bhene bhwakati obhu jhajhele katikati jha bahari nu muene ajhele muene pa ndema.
Na abhabhuene bhitaabika kufigha ngafi kwa ndabha mp'ongo ghwabhazuili. Bhojhikalibili lukhela, akabhalotela, akajhaigenda panani pa masi na alondeghe kubhap'eta.
Lakini bho bhambwene igenda panani pa masi, bhakajhingibhwa ni bhuogha bhakidhanila ndo lijhogijhogi hata bhakajhanda kujhwegha njwegho.
Kwa ndabha bhambwene bhakajhingibhwa ni hofu. Mara akajobha nu muene akabhajobhela, “Mujhelayi bhajasiri! ndo nene! Musijhi ni bhuogha.”
Akajhingila mu mashua ni mp'ongo ukalekaghwa gudeme ni bhene bhakan'shangala kabisa.
Kabhele bhajhelibhu lepi maana jhajhele mikate. Maana akili sya bhene syajhele ni bhuelebhwa bhudebe.
Na bhene bho bhalobhwiki kwiselya, bhafikili nchi jha Genesareti mashua jhasopili nanga.
Bhobhah'omili mu mashua, mara bhakammanya.
Bhakajumba kutangasya mu mkoa bhuoha na bhakajhanda kubhaleta bhatamu mu machela, khila bhobhip'eleka ihida.
Popoha pa ajhingili mu fijiji; au mjini, au mu nchi, bhabhabhekili bhabhine mahali pa soko, na bhakan'sihi abharuhusiajhi kun'kamula pindo lya liguanda lya muene. Na bhoha bhabhan'kamuili bhaponyisibhu.
Mafarisayo ni baadhi jha bhaandishi ghaghah'omili Yerusalemu bhabhonganiki kun'syong'oka muene.
Na bhabhuene bhanafunzi bha muene bhilya mikate kwa mabhoko najisi ambaghyo bhasambi lepi.
(kwa Mafarisayo ni bhajhahudi bhoha bhilya lepi mpaka bhasambaji mabhoko gha bhene kinofu; bhikamulila bhutamaduni bhwa bhaseya bhwakati.
Mafarisayo bhikherebhuka kuh'omela mahali pa soko bhilya lepi mpaka bhajhoghayi hosi. Na kujha sheria s'enge ambalyo bhakasikesya kabisa, pamonga ni kusuka fikombi, masufuria, fenu fya shaba, ni hata fiti fya fitumika bhwakati bhwa kyakulya.)
Mafarisayo ni bhaandishi bhakan'kota Yesu, “Kwa ndabha j'ha kiki bhanafunzi bhajobhibhiishi lepi Kul'hengana ni tamaduni sya bhaseya, kwandabha jha kiki bhilya mikate bota kusamba mabhoko?”
Lakini muene akabhajobhela, “Isaya atabiri kinofu kuhusu muenga bhanafiki, ajhandiki, 'bhanu abha bhakaniheshimu kwa milomo ghya bhene, lakini miteema ghya bhene ghijhele patali ninene.
Bhakanibhombela ibada syasibelili kujha ni maana, bhifundisya sheria sya bhanadamu Kama mapokeo gha bhene.'
Mujhilekili sheria jha K'yara ni kusikamulila kwa bhwujhofu sheria sya bhanadamu.”
Na akajobha kwa bhene, “Muj'hibelili amri jha K'yara kwa bhujhojhofu ni ili kujha mutunzayi tamaduni sya muenga!
Kwa kujha Musa ajobhili, 'mun'heshimuajhi dadi waku ni nyinuaku,' na 'Jhejhioha jhaibetakun'jobhela mabhibhi dadimunu au nyinamunu hakika ibetakufwa.'
Lakini mwijobha, 'kama munu akajobhayi kwa dadi munu au nyina, “Msaada bhobhuha ambabho nga mup'okili kwa nene ndo hazina jha hekalu,”' (ejhu ndo kujobha kujha, 'jhihomesibhu kwa K'yara')
Kama ukanduhusu lepi kubhomba lijambo lyolyoha kwa ndabha jha dadimunu au nyinamunu.
Mukajhibhomba amri jha K'yara kujha bure kwa kulota tamaduni sya jhomu. Ni mambo mingi ghya namna ejhu jha mukajhibhomba.”
Akabhakuta makutano kabhele ni kubhajobhela, “Munip'elekesiajhi nene muenga mwe bhoha, na munu njelebhwajhi.
kijhelepi kyokyoha kuh'omela kwibhala kwa bhanu ambakyo kibhwesya kun'chafula munu pa kijhingila kwa muene. Bali kyakikamp'ita munu ndo kyakikanchafula.
(Zingatilayi: mstari obho, “Kama munu jhejhioha ajhe ni mbolokhoto sya kup'eleka, na ap'elekayi” bhujhelepi mu nakala sya muandi).
Yesu bho abhalikili makutano ni kujhingila mu nyumba, bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'kota kuhusu mfano obho.
Yesu akajobha, Ni muene pia mujhelibhu lepi? Mwibhona lepi kyokioha kya kikanjhingila munu kibhwesya lepi kunchafula,
Kwandabha kibhwesya lepi kul'ota mu n'teema ghwa muene, lakini kijhingita mu lileme lya muene na kisha kip'eta kulota ku choro.” kwa majhelesu agha Yesu asibhombili fyakulya fyoha kujha safi.
Akajobha, “kyakikampita munu ndo kyakikan'chafula.
Kwa kujha kih'omela mugati mwa munu, kunja mu muoyo, ghih'oma mabhwasu maovu, zinaa, bhuheji, bhukoma,
bhuasherati, tamaa sibhibhi, bhuovu, bhusiobhi, kuhongana, bhwifu, kashfa, majivuno, bhujinga.
Maovu agha ghoha ghih'omela mugati, ndo ghala ghakan'chafula munu.”
Ajhinuiki pala ni kubhoka kulota ku mkoa ghwa Tiro ni sidoni. Akajhingila mugati na ambwene lepi munu jhejhioha umanyajhi kujha ajhele apu, lakini jhabhwesekene lepi kumfigha.
Lakini ghafla n'dala ambajhe mwana munu ajhele ni roho bhachafu, ap'eliki habari sya muene, akahida ni kubina mmagolo gha muene.
N'dala ojhu ajhele Myunani, ghwa kabila lya kifoeniki. An'sokili muene abhosiajhi pepo kuh'omela kwa mwali munu.
Yesu akan'jobhela n'dala, “Bhalekayi bhana bhalekayi bhana bhalesibhwayi hoti, kwa kujha sawalepi kutola n'kata ghwa muana ni kusopela libhwa.”
Lakini n'dala akan'jibu ni kujobha,
Akabhajobhela, “Kwa kujha ujobhili naha, ujhe huru kulota. Pepo amalili kumboka mwalibhu.”
N'dala akaghibariki kunyumba jha muene ni kun'kolela mwalimunu agonili pa kitanda, ni pepo amalili kumbokha.
Yesu akabhomba kabhele kwibhala jha mkoa ghwa Tiro ni kup'etela Sidoni kulotela Bahari jha Galilaya mpaka kanda jha Dikapolisi.
Na bhakandeta munu kiziwi na akajha ibhwesyalepi kulongela kinofu, bhakan'soka Yesu abhekayi mabhoko panani pa muene.
An'homisi kwibhala ku lukhomanu kwa seri na akabheka fikonji fya muene mu mbolokhoto sya muene ni baada jha kufunya mata, agusili bhulimi bhwa muene.
Akalanga kunani ku mbinguni ahemili ni kun'jobhela, “Efata,” ejhu ndo kujobha “fungukajhi!”
Ni muda bhola bhola mb'olo khoto sikafunguka, na kyakikazuili bhulimi kyaharibibhu na akabhwesya kulongela kinofu.
Na abhaamuili bhasin'jobheli munu jhejhioha. Lakini kadiri kya abhaamuili, ndo jinsi kyabhatangasili habari esu kwa bhwingi.
Hakika bhasyangesibhu ni kujobha, “Abhombili kila khenu kinofu. Hata abhabhombili viziwi kup'eleka ni mabubu kulongela.”
Mu magono aghu, kwa jhele kabhele ni bhumati mbaha na bhajhelepi ni kyakulya. Yesu akabhakuta bhanafunzi bha muene akabhajobhela,
“Nikabhuhurumila bhumati obho bhajhendelili kujha nani kwa magono madatu na bhajhelepi ni kyakulya.
Nibetakubhatabhwanya bhalotajhi ku nyumba sya bhene bila kulya bhibhwesya kusirika munjhela ni njala. Na baadhi jha bhene bhahomili patali sana.”
Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'jibu, Twibeta kukabha ndaku mikate ghya kufuana kubhasibisya bhanu abha mu lieneo ele lya lilekibhu?”
Akabhakhota, “mujhele ni fipandi filenga fya mikate” bhakajobha, “Saba”.
Abhuamuili bhumati bhutamayi pasi. Akalota mikate saba akan'shukuru k'yara, ni kujhimetula. Akabhap'ela bhanafunzi bha muene bhaibhekajhi palongolo pa bhene, ni bhene bhakajhibhaka palongolo jha bhumati.
Pia bhajhele ni somba sidebe, ni baada jha kushukuru, abhaamuili bhanafunzi bha muene bhabhagabhilayi ele pia.
Bhalili na bhatoshiki. Na bhabhongeniye fipandi fya libakili findonga fibhaha saba.
Bhakaribili bhanu elfu nne. Na abhalikili bhalotayi.
Mara akajhingila mu mashua ni bhanafunzi bha muene, na bhakalota mu bhukanda bhwa Dalmanuta.
Kisha Mafarisayo bhakapita kwibhala ni kujhanda kubishana ni muene. Bhalondeghe abhapelayi ishara kuh'omela kumbinguni, kwa kun'jaribu.
Akatafakari kwa kina mu muoyo mwa muene akajobha, “Kwandabha jhakiki kizazi ekhe kilonda ishara? Nikabhajobhela muenga kweli, jhijhelepi ishara jha jhibeta kupisibhwa kwa kizazi ekhe.”
Kisha akabhaleka, akajhingila mugati mu mashua kabhele, akabhoka kulota lubhafu l'ongi.
Bhwakati abhu bhanafunzi bhajhebhelili mikate. Bhajhelepi ni mikate zaidi jha kipandi kimonga kyakikajhele mu mashua.
Abhaonyili ni kujobha, “Mujhelayi mchu na mkil'endayi dhidi jha chachu jha Mafarisayo ni chachu jha Herode.
Bhanafunzi bhakajobhesana bhene kwa bhene, “Kwandabha tudulili mikate.”
Yesu alimanyili elu, na akabhajobhela, “kwa ndabha jhakiki mwijobhesana kuhusu kudula mikate? Mmanyili lepi? mwijhelabhwa lepi? mioyo ghya muenga mijhojhofu?
Mujheni mihu, mwilola lepi? mujheni mbolokhoto, mwip'eleka lepi? mwikhomboka lepi?
Bho nijhigabhwenye mikate mihanu kwa bhanu elfu tano, mwatolili fikapu filenga fya fimemili fipandi fya mikate?” Bhakan'jibu, “kumi ni fibhele.”
“na bho nijhigabhwenye mikate saba kwa bhanu elfu nne, mwatolili fikapu filenga?”
Bhakajobha, “saba.” Akabhajobhela, “Badomwijhelebhwa lepi?”
Bhakahida Bethsaida. Bhanu abhu bhakandeta kwa Yesu munu kibofu ni kun'sihi Yesu an'kamulayi. Yesu akan'kamula kwa kibhoko
kya muene jhola kipofu ni kun'sihi Yesu an'kamulayi. Yesu akan'kamula kwa kibhoko Kya muene jhola kipofu ni kundongosya kwibhala ku Kijiji. Bho afunyili mata panani pa mihu gha muene ni kunyosya mabhoko gha muene panani pa muene, akan'kota, “Ghwilonda kyokyoha khela?”
Alolili kunani ni kujobha, “Nibhona bhanu bhibhonekana Kama mab'ehe gha ghigenda.”
Ndipo akanyosya kabhele mabhoko gha muene kunani pa mihu gha muene, munu jhola akafumbula mihu gha muene, akalota kabhele, na akalota khila khenu kinofu.
Yesu akandeka alotayi kunyumba ni akan'jobhela, “Usijhingili ku mjini.”
Yesu akabhoka ni bhanafunzi bha muene kulota fijiji fya Kaiseria jha Filipi. Bho bhajhele munjela akabhakhota bhanafunzi, “Bhanu bhijobha nene na niani?”
Bhakan'jibu bhakajobha, “Yohana Mbatisiaji. Bhangi bhijobha, 'Eliya' na bhangi, 'Bhebhe mmonga ghwa Manabii.”
Akabhakota, “Lakini muenga mwijobha nene na niani?” Petro akan'jobhela, “Bhebhe ndo kristu.”
Yesu akabhaonya bhasimb'oli munu jhejhioha kun'husu muene.
Ni kujhanda kubhafundisya kujha Mwana ghwa Adamu lazima atesekajhi kwa mambo mingi, na ibetakubelibhwa ni bhalongosi ni makuhani bhabhaha, ni bhaandishi na ibetakukomibhwa, ni baada jha magono madatu ibetakufufuka.
Ajobhili agha kwa bhuwazi. Ndipo Petro akan'tola palubhafu ni kujhanda kum'besya.
Lakini Yesu asanuiki ni kubhalanga bhanafunzi bha muene ni kun'kemela Petro ni kujobha, “p'etayi kunyuma jha nene lisyetani! Ghwijali lepi mambo gha K'yara, isipokujha mambo gha bhanu.”
Kisha akabhukuta bhumati bhwa bhanafunzi bha muene pamonga ni kubhajobhela, “Kama kuna munu ilonda kunikesya, akibelayi muene, atolayi n'salaba ghwa muene na anikesiayi.
Kwa kujha jhejhioha jhailonda kughaokola maisha gha muene ibetakughayasya, na jhejhioha jha ibetakughajhasya maisha gha muene ibetakughaokola kwa ndabha jha nene.
Jhikamfaidisya kiki munu, kukabha bhulimwengu bhuoha, ni Kisha kukabha hasara jha maisha gha muene?
Munu ibhwesya kuh'omesya kiki badala jha maisha gha muene?
Jhejhioha jha ikanibhonela soni ni nene mu kizazi ekhe kya bhazinzi hi kizazi Kya bhenye dhambi, Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakumbonela soni paibetakuhida mu bhufalme bhwa dadimunu pamonga ni malaika bhatakatifu.
Na ajobhili kwa bhene, “Hakika nijobha kwa jhomu, baadhi jha muenga kuna bhanu bhabhajhemili bhibetalepi kubhonja mauti kabla jha kuubhona bhufalme bhwa K'yara ghwihida kwa nghofu.”
Ni baada jha magono sita, Yesu akabhatola Petro, Yakobo ni Yohana pamonga ni muene kukid'onda, bhene. Ndipo akajhanda kubadilika mbele jha bhene.
Maguanda gha muene ghakajhanda kung'ara sana, mabhalafu zaidi kuliko mng'arishaji jhejhioha pa duniani.
Ndipo Eliya pamonga ni Musa bhakahomela pa longolo pa bhene, na bhajhele bhilongela ni Yesu.
Petro akajibu akan'jobhela Yesu, “Mwalimu kinofu tete kujha apa na tujengayi fibanda fidatu, kimonga kwa ndabha jha bhebhe, kimonga kya Musa ni khenge kya Eliya.”
(Kwa kujha bhamanyilepi Kya kujobha, bhatili sana.)
Libhengu lya homili ni kubhafueka. Ndipo sauti ikah'oma mumabhangu jhikajha j'hijobha, “Ojho ndo mwanabhangu mpendwa. Mup'elekesiayi muene.”
Ghafla, bho bhilanga, bhambwene lepi jhejhioha pamonga naku, isipokujha Yesu tu.
Bho bhiselela kih'omela kukid'onda, abhaamuili kutokun'jobhela munu jhejhioha jhola gha bhaghabhuene, mpaka Mwana ghwa Adamu paibetakufufuka kuh'omela kwa bhafu.
Ndipo bhaghatunzili mambo aghu bhene. Lakini bhajadiliene bhene kwa bhene kiki maana ghake “kufufulibhwa kuh'omela kwa bhafu”
Bhakan'kota Yesu, “Kwa ndabha j'ha kiki bhanafunzi bhaandishi bhijobha lazima Eliya ahidayi hoti?”
Akabhajobhela, “hakika Eliya ibetakuhida hosi kuokola fenu fyoha. Kwandabha jhakiki jhilembibhu Mwana ghwa Adamu lazima akabhayi mateso hoti mingi na achukibhwayi?
Lakini nijobha kwa muenga Eliya amalili kuhida, na bhambombili Kama kya bhalondeghe, kama vile majhandiku kyaghijobha kuhusu muene.”
Na bho bhakherebhuiki kwa bhanafunzi, bhabhuene likundi libhaha lya bhanu libhazunguiki ni Masadukayo bhajhele bhibishana nabhu.
Na mara bho bhambwene, likundi lyoha lyasyangele ni kun'jumbilila kumponesya.
Abhakotili bhanafunzi bha muene, “Mwibishana nabhu juu jha kiki?”
Mmonga ghwa bhene mulikundi akan'jibu, “Mwalimu, nikandetili mwanabhangu kwa bhebhe; ajhe ni roho jhichafu ambajho jhiikamfwanya ashindwayi kulongela,
na ghakan'sababishila kutetemeka ni kum'binisya pasi, ni kuh'oma povu mu ndomo ni kusiagha minu ni kukakamala. Nikabhas'omili bhanafunzi bha j'hobhi kumb'osya pepo, lakini bhashindilu.
Abhajibili, “kizazi kyakibeli kuamini, nibetakutama namu kwa muda gani? Nibetakutolana namu mpaka ndahi? Mundetayi kwa nene.”
Bhandetili mwana munu. Roho n'chafu bho ambwene Yesu, ghafla alimtii kwa kujhonganika. N'gosi abinili pasi ni kuh'omesya povu mu ndomo.
Yesu akan'kota dadimunu, “Ajhele kwa hali ejhe kwa muda gani?” Dadimunu akajobha, “kuh'omela bhuana.
Mara jhenge ibina mu muoto au mu masi, ni kujaribu kunjasya. Kama ghwibhwesya kubhomba kyokyoha tuhurumilayi na utusaidilayi.”
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Kama ujhe tayari? Khila khenu kibhwesekana kwa jhejhioha jha iamini.”
Ghafla dadi ghwa mwana alelili ni kujobha, “Niamini! Nisaidilayi kutokuamini kwa nene.”
Bhwakati Yesu abhwene likundi likhembelela kwa bhene, an'kemili roho n'chafu ni kujobha, “bhebhe roho bubu ni kiziwi, nikuamuru undekayi, usijhingili kwa muene kabhele.”
Akatela kwa ngofu ni kun'hangaisya muana ni roho ambokili. Muana abhonekene kama afuili, Ndipo bhingi bhakajobha, “Afuili,”
Lakini Yesu akan'tola kwa mabhoko akanjinula, ni muana akajhema.
Bhwakati Yesu ajhingili mugati, bhanafunzi bha muene bhan'kotili faragha, “Kwa ndabha jha kiki twashindilu kumbosya?”
Akabhajobhela, “kwa namna ejhe ghibhoka lepi isipokujha kwa maombi.”
Bhakabhoka pala ni kup'etela Galilaya, Alondelepi munu jhojhioha jhola amanyayi pa bhajhele,
kwa kujha afundisieghe bhanafunzi bha muene. Akabhajobhela, “Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakufikisibhwa mu mabhoko gha bhanu na bhibetakun'koma. Paibetakujha afuili, baada jha magono madatu ibetakufufuka kabhele. “
Lakini bhajhelibhulepi majhelesu agha, na bhatilili kun'kota.
Ndipo bhafikiri Karperinaumu. Bhwakati bhajhele munyumba abhakhotili, “Mujadilieghe kiki mu nj'ela”?
Lakini bhajhele kimya. Kwani bhajhele bhibishana mu njela kujha niani ajhele mbaha zaidi.
Atamili pasi abhakutili kumi ni bhabhele pamonga, na ajobhili nabhu, “Kama jhejhioha ilonda kujha ghwa kuanza, ndo lazima ajhelayi ghwa mwishu na n'tumishi ghwa bhoha.”
An'tolili muana ndebe akambeka katikati jha bhene. Akan'tola mu mabhoko gha muene, akajobha,
“Jhojhioha jha ikampokela muana kama ojho kwa lihina lya nene, pia anipokili nene, na ikajhiajhi munu anipokili, akanipokelalepi nene tu, lakini pia jhaanitumili.”
Yohana akan'jobhela, “Mwalimu tukambwene munu ibhosya pepo kwa lihina lya bhebhe na tukambwene, kwa ndabha akatufuayi lepi.”
Lakini Yesu akajobha, “Musimbesi, kwa kujha ajhelepi jhaibetakubhomba mbombo mbaha kwa lihina lya nene ni ndipo baadaye ajobhayi lilobhi lyolyoha juu jha nene.
Jhejhioha jha ajhele kinyume ni tete basi ajhele lubhafu kwa tete.
Jhojhioha jhaibetakupela kikombi kya masi gha kunywa kwa ndabha ujhe ni Kristu, bhukweli nikabhajobhela ibetalepi kujasya thawabu jha muene.
Jhejhioha jha ikabhakosela abha bhadebe bhabhakaniamini nene, ngajhijhele kinofu kwa muene kufungibhwa liganga lya kusyaghila ku n'singu ni kutaghibhwa ku bahari.
Kama kibhoko Kya bhebhe kikukosili kidumulayi. Ni heri kujhingila mu bhusima bila kibhoko kuliko kujhingila mu hukumu ujhele ni mabhoko ghoha mu muoto “bhwabhwisimalepi”.
(Zingatilayi: Mistari ejhe, “Mahali ambapo masomi ghifwa lepi ni muoto bhwabhwisima lepi.” bhujhelepi mu nakala sya muandi).
Kama kigolo kya bhebhe kikukosili dumulayi. Ni kinofu kwa bhebhe kujhingila mu bhuzima ukajhiajhi kilema, kuliko kutaghibhwa mu hukumu ni magolo ghoha mabhele.
(Zingatilayi: N'sitari obho, “Mahali ambapo masomi ghifwa lepi ni muoto bhwabhwisima lepi” bhujhelepi mu nakala sya muandi).
Kama lihu lya bhebhe likakukoselayi, libhosiayi. Ni kinofu kwa bhebhe kujhingila mu bhufalme bhwa K'yara ni lihu limonga, kuliko kujha ni mihu ghoha mabhele ni kutaghibhwa kuzimu.
Mahali pa paj'hele ni masomi ghaghifwa lepi ni muoto bhwa bhwisimalepi.
Kwa kujha kila mmonga ibetakukolesibhwa ni muoto.
Muinyu bhunofu, kama muinyu bhujasili ladha jhiake, ghibetakujhibhomba bhuli jhijhiajhi ni ladha kabhele? Mujhelayi ni muinyu miongoni mwa muenga mwejihomu, na mujhelayi ni amani kwa khila mmonga.”
Yesu akabhoka lieneo elu ni kulota mu mkoa ghwa Uyahudi ni lieneo lya kiholo Yorodani, ni makutano bhakan'kesya kabhele. Abhamanyisi kabhele, kama kyajhikajhele kawaida jha muene kubhomba.
Ni Mafarisayo bhakahida kun'jaribu ni kunkota, “Ni halali kwa n'gosi kundekan'dala munu?”
Yesu akabhajibu, “Musa abhaamuiri kiki?”
Bhakajobha, “Musa aruhusili kulemba cheti kya kulekana ni kumb'enga n'dala.”
Ni kwa ndabha ghya mioyo ghya jhomu ndio maana abhajhandikili sheria ejhe,” Yesu abhajobhili.
“Lakini kuhoma mwanzo ghwa bhuumbaji, 'K'yara abhabhombili n'gosi ni n'dala.'
wa ndabha ejhe n'gosi ibetakundeka dadimunu ni nyinamunu na ibetakuungana ni n'dala munu.
na abhu bhabhele bhibetakujha mb'ele umonga; kwa kujha sio bhabhele kabhele, bali mb'ele bhumonga.
Henu, kyaakiunganishi K'yara, mwanadamu asikitenganisi.
Bhobhafikili mugati mu nyumba bhanafunzi bha muene bhan'kota kabhele kuhusu ele.
Akabhajobhela, “Jhijhioha jhaibetakundeka n'dala munu ni kun'gega n'dala jhongi ibetakujha abhombili bhuzinzi.
N'dala ni muene akandekayi n'gosi munu ni kulota kugegikibhwa ni n'gosi jhongi ibetakujha abhombili bhuzinzi.”
Na bhene, bhakandetela bhana bhabhi bhadebe ili abhagusayi, lakini bhanafunzi bhakabhabesya.
Lakini Yesu bho amanyili elu, afurahisibhulepi akabhajobhela, “bharuhusujhi bhana bhadusu bhahidayi kwa nene, na musibhabesi, kwa ndabha bhabhajhe kama abha bhufalme bhwa mbingu ndo ghwa bhene.
Bhukweli nikabhajobhela, jhejhioha jhaapokili lepi bhufalme bhwa K'yara kama mwana n'debe hakika ibhwesyalepi kujhingila mu bhufalme bhwa K'yara.
Kisha akabhatola bhana mu mabhoko gha muene na akabhabariki khoni abhabhakhili mabhoko gha muene panani pa bhene.
Na bho ajhandili safari jha muene munu mmonga akan'jumbilila ni kupiga magoti mbele jha muene, akan'kota, Mwalimu nnofu, niketajhi kiki ili nibhwesijhi kubhurithi bhuzima bhwa milele?”
Ni Yesu akajobha, “Kwa ndabha jha kiki ukanikuta mwema? Ajhelepi jha ajhe mwema, isipokujha K'yara muene.
Usimanyi amri: 'Usikomi, usizini, usiheji, usijobhi bhudesi, usikofi, un'heshimuajhi dadiwaku ni nyinawaku'.”
Munu jhola akajobha, “Mwalimu, agha ghoha nimalikughatii kuh'omela bhusongolo bhwa nene.”
Yesu akandanga ni kun'gana. Akan'jobhela, “Up'hong'okibhu khenu kimonga. Ghwilondeka kuhemelesya fenu fyoha fya ujhe nafu na ubhapelayi maskini, na ibetakujha ni hazina kumbinguni. Ndipo uhidayi unikesa.”
Lakini akatitamaa kwa ndabha jha majhelesu agha; abhokhili kwa huzuni, kwa ndabha ajhele ni malisimehele.
Yesu akalanga sehemu syoha ni kubhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene, “Ni jinsi gani kya jhijhele panonono kwa tajiri kujhingila mu bhufalme bhwa K'yara!
Bhanafunzi bhashangisiibhu ni malobhi agha. Lakini Yesu akabhajobhela kabhele, “Bhana, ni jinsi gani kyajhijhela panonono kujhingila mu bhufalme bhwa K'yara!
Ni rahisi kwa ngamia kuholota mu lilende lya sindanu, kuliko munu tajiri kujhingila mu bhufalme bhwa K'yara.”
Bhashangele sana ni kujobhesana, “Hivyo niani ibetakuokoka”
Yesu akabhalanga ni kujobha, “Kwa binadamu j'hibhwesekanalepi, lakini kwa K'yara lepi. Kwa kujha kwa K'yara ghoha ghibhwesekana.”
Petro akayanda kulongela naku, “Langajhi tulekili ghoha na tukukesili.”
Yesu akajobha, “Bhukweli ni kabhajobhela muenga, ajhelepi jha alekili nyumba, au kaka, au dada, au mabhu, au tata, au bhana, au ndema, kwa ndabha jha nene, ni Injili,
ambajhe ibetalepi kujhamb'elela zaidi jha mara mia zaidi jha henu apa pa duniani: nyumba, kaka, dada, mabhu, bhana, ni ndema, kwa malombosi, ni bhulimwengu bhwa bhwihida, bhuzima bhwa milele.
Lakini bhingi bhabhajhe bha kuanza bhibetakujha bha mwishu na bhabhajhele bhamuishu bhibetakujha bha kuanza.”
Bho bhajhe munjela, kulota Yerusalemu, Yesu abhalongolili palongolo pa bhene. Bhanafunzi bhashangele ni bhala bhabhak'hesieghe kunyuma bhatilili. Ndipo Yesu akabhabhosya pa lubhafu kabhele bhala kumi ni bhabhele ni kujhanda kubhajobhela ambakyo kibetakun'tokela henu naha:
“Langayi, twilota mpaka Yerusalemu, ni Mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakufikisibhwa kwa makuhani ni bhaandishi. Bhibetakun'hukumu afuayi na bhibetakun'deta kwa bhanu bha Mataifa.
Bhibetakun'hukumu, bhibetakunfunyila mata, bhibetakuntobha ndonga, ni kun'koma. Lakini baada jha magono madatu ibetakufufuka.”
Yakobo ni Yohana, bhana bha Zebedayo, bhakahida kwa muene ni kujobha, “Mwalimu, twisoka utubhombelajhi kyokioha kila kya twibeta kus'oma.”
Akabhajobhela, “Mwilonda nibhabhombilajhi kiki?”
Bhakajobha, “Turuhusiajhi tutamajhi pamonga ni bhebhe mu bhutukufu bhwa jhobhi mmonga kibhoko jhobhi kya kulia ni jhongi kibhoko kya kushoto.”
Lakini Yesu abhajibili, “Mumanyilepi kya mwisoma. Mwibhwesya kunywelela kikombi ambakyo nibetakunywelela au kusindamala bhubatizo bhwa nibeta kubatisibhwa?”
Bhakan'jobhela, “Twibhwesya” Yesu akabhajobhela, “Kikombi Kya nibetakunywelela, mwibetakunywelela. Ni bhubatizo ambabho kwa bhene nibatisibhu, mwibetakubhusindamala.
Lakini jhaibetakutama kibhoko Kyangu kya kuume au kibhoko Kya nene kya kushoto sio nene ghwa kupisya lakini ni kwa bhala ambabho jhimalikuandalibhwa.”
Bhala bhangi bhanafunzi kumi bho bhap'eliki agha, bhakajhanda kubhadadila Yakobo ni Yohana.
Yesu akabhakuta kwa muene ni kujobha, “Mmanyili kujha bhala bhabhidheminibhwa kujha bhatawala bha bhanu bha mataifa bhikabhatawala, ni bhanu bha bhene mashuhuri bhikabhalasya mamlaka juu jha bhene.”
Lakini jhilondeka lepi kujha naha kati jha jhomu. Jhojhioha jha ibetakujha mbaha kati jha muenga lazima abhatumikilayi.
na jhejhioha jha ibetakujha ghwa kuanda kati jha muenga na lazima ajhelayi n'tumwa ghwa bhoha.
Kwa kujha mwana ghwa Adamu ahidilepi kutumikibhwa bali kutumika, ni kughabhosya maisha gha muene kujha fidia jha bhangi.”
Bhakahida Yeriko. Wakati ibhoka Yeriko ni bhanafunzi bha muene ni likundi libhaha, mwana ghwa Timayo, Batimayo, kipofu n'somaji, alikaa kando jha barabara.
Bho ap'eliki kujha Yesu Mnazareti, akajhanda kujhuegha ni kujobha, “Yesu, Mwana ghwa Daudi, nihurumilayi!”
Bhingi bhan'kemili jhola kipofu, bhakan'jobhela agudamayi. Lakini akalela kwa sauti zaidi, “Mwana ghwa Daudi, nihurumilayi!”
