Yesu akajhema ni kuamuru akutibhwayi. Bhakan'kuta kipofu jhola, bhakajobha, “Jhiajhi shujaa! Jhinukayi! Yesu ikukuta.”
Akalitaga pa lubhafu likoti lya muene, akajumba zaidi, ni kuhida kwa Yesu.
Yesu akan'jibhu ni kujobha, “ghwilonda nikukhetelayi kiki?” Jola n'gosi kipofu akan'jibu, “Mwalimu, nilonda kulola.”
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Lotayi. Imani jha jhobhi jhikuponisi. Bahuapu mihu gha muene ghakajhanda kulola; na akan'kesiya Yesu mu nj'ela.
Wakati obhu bho bhahidili Yerusalemu Bho bhakaribili Besthfage ni Bethania, pa kid'onda kya Mizeituni, Yesu abhatumili bhabhele miongoni mwa bhanafunzi bha muene
ni kubhajobhela, “mulotayi mu kijiji kya kikabiliana ni tete. Mara pa mwibeta kujhingila omu, mwibeta kurikolela mwanapunda ambajhe akwellibhu lepi. Mun'kongajhi na mundetayi kwa nene.
Na kama jhajhioha akabhajobhelayi, “kwa ndabha jha kiki mwibhomba na ha?, mwilondeka kujobha, 'Bwana akandonda na mara abetakun'kerebhusya apa'.”
Bhakalota ni kunkolela mwanapunda akongibhu kwibhala pa ndiangu pa mtaa ghwa ghujhele bhuwasi, na bhene bhakajhanda kumbopola.
Na baadhi jha bhanu bhajhele bhajhemili pala ni kabhajobhela, “Mwikheta kiki, kumbopola mwanapunda ojhu?”
Bhakabhajobhela kama Yesu kya abhajobhili, na bhanu bhakabhaleka bhalotayi.
Bhanafunzi bhabhele bhakandeta mwanapunda kwa Yesu na bhatandiki mavazi gha bhene panani pa muene ili Yesu abhwesiajhi kun'kwela.
Bhanu bhingi bhatandiki mavazi gha bhene mu njela, na bhangi bhatandiki matawi gha bhadumuili kuh'omela mu n'gonda.
Bhala bhabhalotili palongolo pa muene ni bhala bhabhamfwatili bhapigili njuegho, “Hosana! Abarikibhu jha ihida kwa lihina lya Bwana.
Ubarikibhwayi bhufalme bhwa bhwihida bhwa dadi jhitu Daudi! Hosana kwa jha ajhe kunani”
Ndipo Yesu akajhingila Yerusalemu ni kulota kulihekalu na alangili khila khenu. Henu, wakati ghwa malikulota, alotili Bethania pamonga nabhu kumi ni bhabhele.
Ligono lya lafwatili, wakati bhikherebhuka kuh'omela Bethania, ajhele ni njala.
Na akaghubhona libehe lya mtinghwa ghwajhele ni mat'ondo kwa patali, akalota kulenga kama ngaabhwesili kyokyoha khela munani mu libehe. Ni wakati alotili apu, akabhilepi kyokyoha isipokujha mat'ondo, kwa kujha jhajhelepi majira gha mtini.
Abhojobhili, “Ajhelepi jhejhioha jha ibeta kulya litunda kuh'omela kwa bhebhe kabhele”. Ni bhanafunzi bha muene bhakap'eleka.
Bhakahida Yerusalemu, nu muene akajhingila mu lihekalu ni kujhanda kubhapisya kwibhala bhabhigolesya ni bhabhigola mugati mu lihekalu. Ap'enduili meza sya bhabadilishaji bha fedha ni fiti fya bhala bhabhagole sieghe nj'ebha.
Anduhuswili lepi jhejhioha kup'enda kyokyoha mu hekalu kyakyabhwesili kugolesibhwa.
Abhafundisi ni kujobha, “Je jhajhandikibhu lepi, 'nyumba jha nene ibetakujha nyumba jha sala kwa mataifa ghoha'? Lakini mujhibhombili pango lya bhanyang'anyi”.
Makuhani bhabhaha ni bhaandishi bhap'eliki gha ajobhili, na bhene bhakalonda njela jha kun'koma. Hata naha bhantilili kwandabha bhumati bhwasangesibhu ni mafundisho gha muene.
Ni kila bhwakati kimihi jhikahidayi, bhabhokili kumjini.
Wakati bhigenda lukhela bhaghu bhene libehe lya mtini bhujhomili mpaka mu mizizi ghiake.
Petro akakhomboka ni kujobha, “Rabi! Langayi, libehe lya mti ni lyawalilaanili lijhomili”.
Yesu abhajibili, “Mujhelayi ni imani kwa K'yara.
Muaminiayi nikabhajobhela kujha khila jha akubhujibhela kid'onda ekhe, bhokayi, na ukakiteghayi ghwa muene mu bahari, 'na kama ajhelepi ni mashaka mu muoyo ghwa muene lakini iamini kujha kya akijobhili kubeta kuh'omela, naha K'yara ibetakubhomba.
Henu nikabhajobhela: Khila khenu kya mwis'oma ni kukota kwa ndabha jha muene, muaminiayi kujha mupokili, ni fyene fibetakujha fya muenga.
Wakati mwijhema ni kus'oma mwilondeka kusamehe kyokyoha kyamujhenaku dhidi jha jhejhioha, ili kujha dadi jhime jhaajhe kumbinguni abhasameajhi pia muenga makosa gha jhomu.
(Zingatilayi: N'sitari obho, “Lakini mukabelayi kusamehe, wala Dadi jhinu jha ajha kumbinguni ibetalepi kusamehe dhambi sya jhomu” bhujhelepi mu nakala sya muandi).
Bhakahida Yerusalemu kabhele. Ni Yesu bho igenda mu lihekalu, makuhani bhabhaha, bhaandishi ni bhaseya bhakahida kwa muene.
Bhan'jobhili, “Kwa mamlaka ghaloki ghwibhomba mambo agha?” Na niani akupelili mamlaka gha kubhomba agha?”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Nibeta kubhakhota liswali limonga. Munijobhilayi ni nena nibeta kujobhela kwa mamlaka ghaloki nibeta kubhomba mambo agha.
Je, bhubatisu bha Yohana bhwahomili kumbinguni au kwa bhanadamu? Munijibuajhi.”
Bhakajadiliana miongoni mwa bhene ni kusindana ni kujobha, “Kama tukajihakiki, 'Kuh'omela kumbinguni,' ibeta kujobha, 'Kwa ndabha jha kiki mwabelili kumwamini?'
Lakini kama tukajobhai, 'Kutoka kwa bhanadamu,'...” Bhabhatilili bhenu, kwa kujha bhoha bhakamulili kujha Yohana ajhele nabii.
Ndipo bhakan'jibu Yesu ni kujobha, “Tumanyili lepi. Ndipo Yesu akabhajobhela, “Wala nene nikabhajobhela lepi ni kwa mamlaka gani nikabhajobhela lepi ni kwa mamlaka gani nibhomba mambo agha.
Kisha Yesu akayanda kubhafundisya kwa mifano. Akajobha, “Munu apandili n'gonda ghwa mizabibu, akalisyongosela bhuzio, na akagima lilenda lya kusindika mvinyo. Akajenga mnara ni kisha akalipangisya n'gonda ghwa mizabibu kwa bhakulima bha mizabibu. Kisha asafiri safari jha patali.
Wakati bho bhufikili, an'tumili n'tumishi kwa bhakulima bha mizabibu kutola kuh'omela kwa bhene baadhi jha matunda gha n'gonda ghwa mizabibu.
Lakini bhan'kamuili, bhan'tobhili, ni kumb'enga bila kyokyoha.
Akan'tuma kwa bhene kabhele n'tumishi jhongi, bhakan'jeruhi kumutu ni kun'ketela mambo gha soni.
Bado an'tumili jhongi, ni ojho mmonga bha n'kamili. Bhabhaketili bhangi bhingi mambo kama bhaghabhuene, bhakabhatobha ni bhangi kubhakhoma.
Ajhe bado ni munu mmonga zaidi ghwa kun'tuma, mwana mpendwa. Ni muene ajhele ghwa mwishu jha atumibhu kwa bhene. Akajobha, “Bhibeta kun'heshimu mwanabhangu”.
Lakini bhapangaji bhajobhisene bhene kwa bhene, “Ojho ndo mrithi. Mhidayi, hebu na tun'komayi, ni bhurithi bhwibeta kujha bhwa tete.”
Bhakamvamila, bhakan'koma ni kum'tagha kwibhala mu n'gonda ghwa mizabibu.
Henu, Je! ibeta kuketa kiki mmiliki ghwa n'gonda ghwa mizabibu? ibeta kuhida ni kubhajhangamisya bhakulima bha mizabibu kulikabidhi n'gonda ghwa mizabibu kwa bhangi.
Mbwajhilepi kusoma liandiku ele? “Liganga ambalyo bhajenzi bha libelili, limalikujha liganga lya palubhafu.
Ela lyahomili kwa Bwana na lya ajabu pamihu pa tete.”
Bhakalonda kunikamula Yesu, Lakini bhabhatilili makutano kwani bhamanyili kujha ajobhili mfuano bhola kwandabha jha bhene. Hivyo bhakandeka ni kubhoka.
Kisha bhakabhatuma Mafarisayo ni Maherodia ili kuntegha kwa malobhi.
Bho bhafikili, bhakan'jobhela, Mwalimu, tumanyili kujha ghwijali lepi maoni gha jhejhioha jhola na ghwilasya lepi bhupendulu kati jha bhanu. Ghwimanyisya njela jha K'yara mu bhukweli. Je! ndo haki kulepa kodi kwa Kaisari au la? Je! Twibhwesya kulepa au la?
Lakini Yesu amanyili bhunafiki bhwa bhene ni kubhajobhela, “Kwa ndajhakiki mkanijaribu? Munipelayi dinari nibhwesiajhi kujhilanga.”
Bhakaleta jhimonga kwa Yesu, Akabhajobhela, “Je! ijhe sura jha niani ni maandishi ghaghajhele apa gha niani? Bhakajobha, “Kaisari.”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Mumpelayi Kaisari fenu fya Kaisari ni K'yara fenu fya K'yara.” Bhakan'staajabu.
Kisha Masadukayo, bhabhijobha bhujhelepi bhufufuo, bhakandotela. Bhakan'kota, bhakajobha,
“Mwalimu, Musa atujhandikili kujha, 'Ndongo ghwa munu afuili ni kundeka n'dala munu kumbele kwa muene, lakini aleki lepi muana, munu ibetakun'tola n'dala ghwa ndongo munu, ni kwikabhela bhana kwandabha jha ndongo munu.'
Kwajhele ni bhanandugu saba ghwa kwanza atolili n'dala ni kisha akafwa, alekili lepi bhana.
Kisha ghwa pili an'tolili ni muene akafwa alekilepi bhana. Ni ghwa tatu jhajhe mebhu.
Ni ghwa saba afuili bila kuleka bhana. Mwishowe ni n'dala ni muene akafwa.
Wakati ghwa bhufufuo, pabhibeta kufufuka kabhele He! ibeta kujha n'dala, ghwa niani? Kwani bhala bhanandugu bhoha saba bhajhele bhagosi munu.”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Je! Ejhe sababu lepi kujha mu potosibhu, kwa ndabha mumanyilepi mayandiku wala ngofu sya K'yara?”
Wakati bhwa kufufuka kuh'omela kwa bhafu, bhibeta lepi kugega, wala kujhingila mu ndobho, bali bhibeta kujha kama malaika bha kumbinguni.
Lakini, kuhusu bhafu bha bhifufulibhwa, Je! Mwasomilepi kuhomela kitabu kya Musa, Mu bahari sya kichaka, jinsi K'yara kyaajobhili ni kun'jobhela, 'Nene ndo K'yara ghwa Ibrahimu ni K'yara ghwa Isaka, ni K'yara ghwa Yakobo?'
Muene K'yara ghwa bhafulepi, bali bhabhajhe hai. Ndo bhukweli mupotuiki.”
Mmonga ghwa bhaandishi akahida ni kup'elekesya mazungumzo gha bhene; abhwene kujha Yesu abhajitili kinofu. “Je! amri jheleku jha muhimu zaidi kuliko senge?”
Yesu akan'jibu, “Jhaijhele jha muhimu ejhe, “Pelekayi, Israeli, Bwana K'yara ghwitu, Bwana ndo mmonga.
Lazima un'ganayi Bwana K'yara ghwa jhobhi muoyo ghwa jhobhi bhuoha, kwa roho jha jhobhi, kwa luhala kwa jhobhi lwoha, ni kwa ngofu sya jhobhi syoha.'
Amri jha pili ejhe, 'Lazima un'ganayi jirani ghwa jhobhi kama kyaukigana ghwa jobhi.' Ijhelepi amri jhenge mbaha zaidi jha e'se.”
Mwandishi akajobha, “Knofu Mwalimu! Ujobhili bhukweli kujha K'yara ni mmonga, ni kujha ajhelepi jhongi zaidi jha muene.
Kun'gana muene kwa muoyo bhuoha, ni kwa bhufahamu bhuoha, ni kwa nghofu syoha nikun'gana jirani kama muene ni muhimu kuliko matoleo gha dhabihu sya kuteketesibhwa.”
Wakati Yesu abhuene ahomisi lijibu lya busara akan'jobhela, “Bhebhe ujhelepi patali ni bhufalme bhwa K'yara.” Baada jha hapo ajhelepi hata mmonga jhe athubutiuli kun'kota Yesu maswali ghoghoha.
Ni Yesu akajibu bho ifundisya mu hekalu, akajobha, “Je! bhaandishi bhijobha bhuli kujha Kristu ndo mwana ghwa Daudi?
Daudi muene mu Roho mtakatifu, ajobhili, 'Bwana ajobhili kwa Bwana ghwa nene tamayi mu kibhoko kya nene kya kuume, mpaka nibhabhombajhi maaduibha bhebhe kujha pasi pa magolo gha bhebhe.'
Daudi muene akan'kuta Kristu, 'Bwana' Je! ni mwana ghoa Daudi kwa jinsi gani?” Ni likusanyiku libhala lyamp'elekisi kwa furaha.
Mu mafundisho gha muene na Yesu ajobhili, “Mukitahadhariajhi ni bhaandishi, bhabhinoghela kugenda ni likanzu litali ni kusalimibhwa mu masoko.
ni kutama mu fiti fya bha bhaha mu masinagogi ni mu sikukuu mu maeneo gha bhabhaha.
Pia bhilya nyumba sya bhajana bhis'oma maombi matali ili bhanu bha bhabhonayi. Bhanu abha bhibeta kupokela hukumu mbaha.”
Kisha Yesu atumili pasi karibu ni lisanduku lya sadaka mugati mu lihekalu; ajhele ilola bhanu bha bhajhele bhisopa hela sya bhene mu kisanduku. Bhanu bhingi matajiri bhabhekili kiasi kibhaha kya pesa.
Kisha n'dala mjane maskini akahida ni kus'opa fipandi fibhele, thamani jha senti.
Kisha akabhakuta bhanafunzi bha muene ni kubhajobhela, “Muaminiajhi nikabhajobhela, N'dala ojho mjane asopili kiasi kibhaha zaidi jha bhuoha ambabho bhamalikusopa lya sadaka.
Kwani bhoha bhasopili kutokana ni bhwingi bhwa mapato gha bhene. Lakini n'dala mjane ojho, kutokana ni umasikini bhwa muene, asopili hela jhioha ambajho alondekeghe kuitumila kwa maisha gha muene.”
Yesu bho igenda kuh'omela ku lihekalu mmonga ghwa bhanafunzi bha muene akan'kota, “Mwalimu, langayi maganga agha gha kusyangasya ni majengo!”
Akan'jobhela, ghwilola majengo agha mabhaha? Lijhelepi hata liganga limonga lyalibetakubakila panani pa lenge ambalyo libetakubinisibhwa pasi”.
Na muene bho atamili panani pa kidonda kya Mizeituni kunyuma ku lihekalu, Petro, Yakobo, Yohana ni Andrea bhakan'kota kwa siri,
Tujobhilayi, mambo agha ghibeta kujha ndali? Na kiki dalili gha mambo agha kuh'omela?”
Yesu akajhanda kubhajobhela, “Mujhiajhi makini kwamba asihidi munu kubhapotosya.
Bhingi bhibeta kuhida kwa lihina lya nene bhibeta kujobha, 'Nene ndiye', na bhibetakubhapotosya bhingi.
Pa mwibeta kup'eleka vita ni tetesi sya vita, musitili; mambo agha ghilondeka kuh'omela lakini mwisho bado.
Taifa libeta kujhinuka kinyume ni litaifa l'enge, ni bhufalme kinyume ni bhufalme. Pibeta kujha ni matetemeku sehemu mbalimbali ni njala. Obho ndo mwanzo ghwa bhutungu.
Mujhelayi mihu. Bhibetakubhapeleka mpaka mabarazani, na mwibetakupingibhwa mu masinagogi. Mwibetakujhemikibhwa mbele jha bhatawala ni bhafalme kwa ndabha jha nene, kama bhushuhuda bhwa bhene.
Lakini injili lazima hoti ihubiribhwayi kwa mataifa ghoha.
Pabhibeta kubhakamula ni kubhakabidhi, musitili kuhusu khela kya mwibeta kujobha. Ndani jha muda obhu, mwibetakupelibhwa kiki kya kujobha; Mwibeta lepi kujha muenga mwilongila, bali Roho mtakatifu.
Ndugu ibetakun'shtaki ndugu kukomibhwa, Dadi ni mwana munu. Bhana bhibeta kujhama kinyume ni Dadi jhabhi ni kusababisya kukomibhwa.
Mwibetakudadibhwa ni khila munu kwa ndabha jha lihina lya nene. Lakini jha ibetakuvumilila mpaka kumuisu, munu ojhu ibeta kuokoka.
Pamwibetakubhona lichukizo lya bhuharibifu lijhemili pala palilondeka lepi kujhema (jhaisoma na amanyayi), ndipo bhabhajhele mugati mwa Yuda bhajumbililayi kukidonda,
nu muene jha ajhele kunani pa nyumba asiseleli pasi pa nyumba, au kutola kyokyoha kyekijhele kwibhala,
na jhaajhele kun'gonda asikerebhuki kulota liguanda lya muene.
Lakini ole bhabhi bhadala bha bhajhele ni luleme ni bhabhijhong'esya mu magono aghu!
Mus'omelayi kujha jhisih'omeli wakati bhwa mepu.
Kwani pibeta kujha ni malombosi mabhaha, ambagho ghabhwayilepi kuh'omela, kuhomela K'yara abhubhombili bhulimwengu, mpaka henu, ijhelepi, wala jhibetalepi kuh'omela kabhele.
Mpaka Bwana paibetakup'ongosya magono, ghujhelepi mb'ele ghwa ghwibeta kuokoka, lakini kwa ndabha jha bhateule, jhaibeta kubhahagula, ibetakup'ongosya namba sya magono.
Wakati obhu kama munu jhejhioha ibetakubhajobhela, langai, Kristu ajhele apa!' au 'Langai, ajhe pala!' musiamini.
Kwani bhakristu bha bhudesi ni manabii bha bhudesi bhibeta kuh'omela ni kulasya ishara ni maajabu ili kwamba, bhabhakofiajhi, yamkini hata bhateule.
Mujhiaji mihu! Nimelikubhajobhela agha ghoha kabla jha bhwakati.
Lakini baada jha mal'ombosi gha magono aghu, lijobha libeta kus'opibhwa ngisi, muesi ghwibeta lepi kupisya mwanga ghwake,
Matondo ghibeta kubina kuh'omela kunani ni nghofu syasijhele kumbinguni sibetakutikisika.
Ndipo pabhibeta kumbona mwana ghwa Adamu ihida mumabhengu kwa nghofu mbaha ni bhutukufu.
Ndipo paibeta kutuma malaika bha muene na ibeta kubhabhonganya pamonga bhateule bha muene kuh'omela pande mbaha nne sya dunia, kuh'omela mwisho ghwa dunia mpaka mwisho ghwa mbingu.
Kwa mtini mwikimanyisijhi. Kama tawi kyalibhwesya kupisya ni kubheka haraka mat'ondo ghake, ndipo mwibeta kumanya kujha kilolelu kijhe karibu.
Ndo kyajhijhele pamwibetakubhona mambo agha ghih'omela, mumanyayi kujha ajhele karibu, ni malango.
Bhokweli, nikabhajobhela, kizazi ekhe kibetap'etalepi patali kabla mambo agha ghah'omili lepi.
Mbingu ni nchi sibeta kup'eta, lakini malobhi ghangu ghibeta lepi kup'eta kamwe.
Lakini kuhusu ligono elu au saa ajhelepi jha ibeta kumanya, hata malaika bha kumbinguni, wala mwana, ila Dadi.
Mujhelayi mihu Langayi, kwa ndabha mumanyilepi ni muda bholoki ghibeta kuh'omela. (zingatilayi: N'sitari obho, “Mujhelayi bhaangalifu, mulangayi na mus'okayi kwa ndabha...” bhujhelepi mu nakala sya muandi).
Ni kama munu jhailota ku safuari: alekili nyumba jha muene, ni kumbeka n'tumwa ghwa muene kujha ntawala ghwa nyumba, khila mmonga ni mbombo jha muene. Ni kumwamuru mlinzi kutama mihu.
Henu mujhelayi mihu! kwani mumanyilepi bwana ghwa nyumba pa ibeta kubhujhe kunyumba, jhibhwesekana kimihi kilukya manane, wakati likongobha palibeta kubheka, au lukhela.
Kama ahidili ghafla, asikukoleli ugonili.
Khela kyanikakijobha kwa bhebhe, nikakijobha kwa kila munu: Mukeshayi”!
Ghajhele magono mabhele tu baada jha sikukuu jha Pasaka ni jha mikate jhajhibeli kusopibhwa chachu. Makuhani bhabhaha ni bhaandishi bhalondeghe namna jha kunkamula Yesu kwa hila hi kwekoma.
Kwa kujha bhajobhili, “Sio bhwakati bhwa sikukuu, bhanu bhasije bhakabhomba ghasia.”
Wakati Yesu ajhele Bethania kunyumba kwa Simoni mkoma, ni bhwakati ilota kumeza, n'dala mmonga akahida kwa muene ni chupa jha marashi gha nardo safi ghaghajhele ni gharama mbaha sana, ajhikaguili chupa ni kujhimimina panani pa mutu ghwa muene.
Lakini kwajhele ni baadhi jha bhene bhadadili. Bhajobhisene bhene kwa bhene bhakajobha, “Kiki sababu jha bhopotevu obho?
Manukato agha ngaghabhwesili kugolesibhwa kwa zaidi jha dinari mia tatu, ni kupelibhwa maskini.” Na bhene bhakan'kemela.
Lakini Yesu akajobha, “Mundekayi muene kwandabha jha kiki mkandombosya? Abhombili khenu kinofu kwa nene.
Magono ghoha maskini mujhenabhu, ni wakati bhuoha pa mwilonda mwibhwesya kubhomba manofu kwa bhene, lakini mwajhedumu nani wakati bhuoha.
Abhombili kila kya ibhwesya: Abhubakili mb'ele bhwangu mafuta kwa ndabha jha maziko.
Kweli nikabhajobhela khila mahali injili pajhihubiribhwa mu bhulimwengu bhuoha, khela kya abhombili n'dala ojho kibeta kujobhibhwa kwa ukumbusho ghwa muene.
Kisha Yuda Iskariote, mmonga ghwa kumi ni bhabhele, alotili kwa bhabhaha bha makuhani ili kwamba abhwesaijhi kun'kabidhi kwa bhene.
Wakati bhabhaha bha makuhani bhobhap'eliki ni kuahidi kumpela hela. Akayanda kulonda nafasi jha kun'kabidhi kwa bhene.
Muligono lya kuanza lya n'kate bhwa bhusopibhulepi chachu, wakati bhapisili mwanakondoo ghwa Pasaka, bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'jobhela, “Wilonda tulatayi ndaku tukaandalayi ili ubhwesiayi kulya mlo ghwa Pasaka?”
Abhatumili bhanafunzi bha muene bhabhele ni kubhajobhela, “Mlotayi ku mjini, ni n'gosi ambaye ap'endili kibhegha ibeta kubhonana namu. Mun'kesiajhi.
Nyumba jha ibeta kujhingila, mun'kesiajhi na mun'jobhilayi n'kolo nyumba ejhu, 'Mwalimu ijobha, “kyendaku chumba kya bhahesya mahali pa nibeta kulya Pasaka ni bhanafunzi bhangu?”
Akabhalasya chumba kya kunena kibhaha kya kijhele ni samani ambakyo kijhele tayari. Mubhombayi maandalizi kwa ndabha jha tete pala.”
Bhanafunzi bhakabhoka kulota kumjini; bhakolili khila khenu kama kya abhajobhili, ni kuandala mlo ghwa Pasaka.
Wakati jhifikili kimihi, akahida ni bhala kumi ni bhabhele.
Na bhobhakajhikaribila meza ni kulya, Yesu akajobha, “Kweli nikabhajobhela mmonga jha ilya pamonga nani ibeta kunisaliti.”
Bhoha bhasikitika, ni mmonga baada jha jhongi bhakan'jobhela, “Hakika nene lepi?”
Yesu abhajibili ni kubhajobhela, “Ni mmonga kati jha kumi ni bhabhele kati jha jhomu, mmonga ambaj'he henu ijhina nongi mu bakuli pamonga ni nene.
Kwa kujha mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakulota kama vile maandiku kyaghijobha juu jha muene. lakini ole bhwake munu jhola ambajhe kup'etela muene mwana ghwa Adamu ibetakusalitibhwa! Ngajhijhele kinofu zaidi kwa muene kama munu jhola ngaabeleghe kuhogoleka.”
Na wakati bhilya, Yesu atolili nkate akabhubariki, ni kubhu metula. Abhapelili akajobha, “Mutolayi. Obho ndo mb'ele bhwangu.”
Atolili kikombi, ashukuili, ni kubhap'ela, na bhoha bhanywelili.
Abhajobhili, “Ejhe ndo lilopa lya nene lya agano, lilopa lya libeta kujhitika kwa ndabha jha bhingi.
Kweli nikabhajobhela, nibetalepi kunywa kabhele mu lizao ele lya mzabibu mpaka ligono lela panibeta kunywa mpya mu bhufalme bhwa K'yara.”
Bho bhamalili kujhemba nyembu bhalotili kwibhala ku Kid'onda kya Mizeituni.
Yesu abhajobhili, Muenga mwebhoha mwilota kwitenga patali kwa ndabha jha nene, kwa kujha jhitembibhu, 'Nibeta kun'tobha mchungaji ni kondoo bhibeta kutabhwanyika.'
Lakini baada jha kufufuka kwa nene, nibetakubhalongolela palongolo pa jhomu Galilaya.”
Petro an'jobhili, “Hata kama bhoha bhibetakuleka, nene nikupela lepi.”
Yesu an'jobhili, “Kweli nikujobhela, pakilu apa, kabla jha likongobhe kubheka mara sibhele, ghwibetakujha unibelili mara sidatu.”
Lakini Petro akajobha, “Hata jhibetakunilazimu kufwa pamonga nabhu, nikubela lepi. “Bhola bhapisili ahadi jhela jhela.
Bhakahida pa lieneo lyalikutibhwa Gethsemane ni Yesu akabhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene, “Mutamanyi apa wakati ni sali.”
Abhatolili Petro, Yakobo, ni Yohana pamonga ni muene, akayanda kuhuzunika ni kutaabika sana.
Abhajobhili, “Ntema bhwangu bhujheni huzuni sana, hata kufwa. Mubakilayi apa na Mukeshayi”.”
Yesu akalota palongolo kidogo, akabina pasi, akas'oma, kama jhibhwesekana, kujha saa ejhe ngajhinjhepwiki.
Ajobhili, “Aba, Dadi, Mambo ghoha kwa bhebhe ghibhwesekana. Nibhosilayi kikombi ekhe. Lakini sio kwa mapenzi gha nene, bali mapenzi gha bhebhe.”
Akakerebhuka ni kubhakolela bhagonili, na akan'jobhela Petro, “Simoni, je ugonili? Ubhwesilepi kukesha hata lisaa limonga?
Mukeshayi na ms'omayi musihidi kujhingila mu majaribu. Hakika roho i radhi, lakini ni mb'ele ndo dhaifu.”
Alotili kabhele ni kus'oma, na atumili malobhi ghalaghala.
Ahidili kabhele abhakolili bhagonili, kwa kujha mihu gha bhene gha jhele masitu na bhamanyilepi kiki kya kun'jobhela.
Akahida mara jha tatu ni kubhajobhela, “Bado mugonili ni kup'omoseka? Jhitosya saa jhifikili. Langayi! Mwana ghwa Adamu isalitibhwa mu mabhoko gha bhenye dhambi.
Mujhumukayi, tubhoki. Langayi, jhola jhaibetakunisaliti ikaribila.”
Mara tu bho akona ilongela, Yuda, mmonga ghwa bhala kumi ni bhabhele, afikili, ni likundi libhaha lya bhanu kuh'omela kwa bhabhaha bha makuhani, bhaandishi ni bhaseya bhenye mapanga ni mabonga.
Wakati obhu nsaliti ghwa muene ajhele amalili kubhapela ishara, akajobha, jhola jhanibetakumbusu, ndijhe. Munkamulayi ni kundongosya pasi, pa bhulinzi.”
Wakati Yuda bho afikili, moja kwa moja akalota kwa Yesu ni kujobha, “Ni kumbusu.
Kisha bhakambeka chini jha ulinzi ni kun'kamula.
Lakini mmonga kati jha bhene jha ajhemili karibu naku achomuili bhupanga bhwa muene akan'tobha n'tumishi ghwa kuhani mbaha ni kun'dumula mb'olokoto.
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Muhidili kunikamula kwa mapanga ni mabonga kama mnyang'anyi?
Wakati khila ligono najhele pamonga namu ni kufundisya hekaluni, mwanikamuili lepi. Lakini ele libhombiki ili maandiku ghatimilayi.
Ni bhala bhoha bhabhajhe ni Yesu bhakandeka bhakayanda kujumba.
N'songolo mmonga anfwatili jhaafwatili lishuka tu jha akifwekili kun'syong'hoka; bhan'kamuili lakini
abhaponyuiki akalileka lishuka pala akajumba ngoli.
Bhandongwisi Yesu kwa kuhani mbaha. Pala bhakusanyiki pamonga ni muene makuhani bhabhaha bhoha, bhaseya ni bhaandishi.
Petro ni muene akan'kesya Yesu kwa patali, kulotela mu ua bhwa kuhani mbaha. Atamili pamonga ni bhalinzi bhabhajhele karibu ni muoto bhijhota ili kukabha joto.
Wakati obhu makuhani bhabhaha bhoha ni libaraza lyoha bhajhele bhilonda bhushahidi dhidi jha Yesu ili bhabhwesiayi kun'koma. Lakini bhaukabhilepi.
Kwa kujha bhanu bhingi bhabetili bhushahidi bhwa bhudesi dhidi jha muene, lakini hata ushaidi bhwa bhene bhwawaningene lepi.
Baadhi bhajhemili ni kuleta bhushahidi bhwa bhudesi dhidi jha bhene; bhakajhabhijobha,
“Twamp'eliki ijobha, 'Nibetakuliharibu lihekalu ele lya litengenesibhu kwa mabhoko, ni ndani jha magono madatu nikalijenga l'enge lya lijengibhu lepi kwa mabhoko.”'
Lakini hata bhushahidi bhwa bhene bhwawaningene lepi.
Kuhani mbaha akajhema katikati jha bhene ni kun'kota Yesu,”Je, ujhelepi ni lijibu? Bhanu abha bhushudila kiki dhidi jha bhebhe?”
Lakini atamili kinunu na ajibilepi kyokioha khela. Mara kuhani mbaha akan'kota kabhele, “Je bhebhe ndo Kristu, mwana ghwa Mbarikiwa?”
Yesu akajobha, “Nene ena. Na ghwibetakumbona Mwana ghwa Adamu atamili kibhoko Kya kulia bhwa nghofu ihida ni mmabhengu gha mbinguni.”
Kuhani mbaha araruili maguanda gha muene ni kujobha, “Je wakona wilonda mashahidi?
Mup'eliki kufuru. Bhuamuzi bhwa muenga bholoki?” Na bhoha bhan'hukumuili kama mmonga jhailondeka kufwa.
Baadhi bhakajhanda kun'funyila mata ni kun'gupika pa mihu ni kun'tobha ni kun'jobhela, “Tabiriayi!” Maafisa bhan'tolili ni kun'tobha.
Ni Petro bho ajhe akona ajhe pasi pa lufuka, mtumishi mmonga ghwa bhadala bha kuhani mbaha akahida kwa muene.
Ambwene Petro pa ajhemili ijhota muoto, na andangili ni kun'hegerela. Kisha akajobha, “Nabhi pia ghwajhele ni Mnazareti, Yesu”.
Lakini abelili, akajobha, “Nimanyilepi wala nijhelebhwa lepi kuhusu khela kya wijobha!” Kisha akabhoka akalota kwibhala pa lufuka.
Lakini n'tumishi ghwa kidala pala, ambwene na ajhandili kun'jobhela kabhele bhala ambabho bhajhele bhajhemili pala, “Munu ojho ni mmonga kati jha bhene!”
Lakini abelili kabhele. Baadaye kidogo bhala bhabhajhemili pala bhan'jobhili Petro, “Hakika bhebhe ndo mmonga kati jha bhene, kwa ndabha bhebhe pia wa Mgalilaya.”
Lakini akayanda kwibheka muene pasi jha laana ni kulapa, “Nimanyilepi munu ojhu jha mwikanijobhela.”
Kisha likongobhe lyabhekili kabhele mara jha pili. Kisha Petro akhombwiki malobhi ambagho Yesu ghaan'jobhili: “Kabla jha likongobhe kubheka mara mbili wibetakunibela mara sidat.” Na abinili pasi ni kulela.
Lubhuliku bhabhaha bha makuhani bhabhonene pamonga ni bhaseya ni bhaandishi ni libaraza lyoha lya bhaseya. Kisha bhakan'kota, “Bhebhe ndo Mfalme ghwa bhayahudi?”
Akan'jibu, “Bhebhe ujobhili naha.”
Bhabhabha makuhani bhakajhelesya mashitaka mingi juu jha Yesu.
Pilato akan'kota kabhele, “Ghwijibhu lepi kyokyoha? Ghwilola lepi kya bhikushitaki kwa mambo mingi?
Lakini Yesu an'jibilepi Pilato, ni hiyo jhan'syangese.
Kwa kawaida wakati bhwa sikukuu ibhopolibhwa mfungwa mmonga, mfungwa jhabhans'oili.
Bhajhele bhahalifu gerezani, miongoni mwa bhauaji bhabhamali kuasi bhabhitumikila makosa gha bhene. Ajhele munu mmonga jhaikutibhwa Baraba.
Umati ukahida kwa Pilato, ni kun'jobhela abhombayi kama kyaabhombili kunyuma.
Pilato akabhajibu ni kujobha, mwilonda nibhafungulilayi Mfalme ghwa bhayahudi?”
Kwa kujha amanyili ni kwa ndabha jha wivu ghwa bhabhaha bha makuhani bhabhan'kamuili Yesu ni kundeta kwa muene.
Lakini bhabhaha bha makuhani bhachochili umati kujhuegha kwa sauti kujha abhopolibhwayi Baraba badala jha muene.
Pilato akabhajibu kabhele ni kujobha, “Nin'ketayi kiki Mfalme ghwa bhayahudi?
Bhakapiga kelele kabhele, Nsulubisighi!”
Pilato Akajobha, “Abhombili lijambo leleku libhibhi?” Lakini bhazidili kupiga kelele zaidi ni zaidi “Nsulubisiayi.”
Pilato akabhuridhisha bhumati, akabhafungulila Baraba. Akan'tobha Yesu mijeledi kisha akambosya ili asulubibhwayi.
Askari andongwisi hadi mugati mu lufuka (bhola bhwa bhajhele mugati mu kambi) na bhakibhongeniye pamonga kikosi kya Askari.
Bhakamfwatika Yesu liguanda lya rangi jha zambarau, na bhasokwiti litaji lya mifwa bhakamfwatika.
Bhakajhanda kundhihaki ni kujobha, “Salam, Mfalme ghwa bhayahudi!”
Bhakan'komalela kumutu kwa lilasi ni kunfunyila mata. Bhakapiga magoti mbele jha muene kwa kun'heshimu.
Bhobhamalili kundhihaki, bhakamfula likanzu lela lya rangi jha zambarau ni kumfwatika maguanda gha muene, ni kumpisya kwibhala kulota kunsulubisya.
Bhakandasimisya mp'eta njela kun'tangatila, jhaajhele ijhingila kumjini kuh'omela kun'gonda. Akutibhweghe Simon Mkirene (Dadi munu Iskanda ni Rufo); Bhakandasimisya kup'enda n'salaba ghwa Yesu.
Askari bhampeliki Yesu mahali papikutibhwa Goligotha (maana jha tafsiri ejhe ndo, sehemu jha fuvu lya mutu).
Bhakampela mvinyo bhwa bhuchanganyibhu ni manemane, lakini anywilepi.
Bhakan'sulubisya ni kugabhana maguanda gha muene bhakaghapigila kura kuamula kipandi kyaibeta kukabha khila askari.
Jhikaya saa tatu lukhela bhan'sulubisi.
Bhakabheka panani pa muene ubao bhwabhujhandikibhu shitaka, “Mfalme ghwa. bhayahudi.”
Bhan'sulubisi pamonga ni majambazi bhabhele, mmonga lubhafu lwa muene lwa kulia ni jhongi lubhafu lwa kushoto kwa muene.
(Zingatilayi: Mstari obho, “Ni mayandiku ghakatimila ghaghane nibhu” bhujha lepi mu nakala sya muandi).
Ni bhene bhakajhabhip'eta bhakandigha bhakajha bhihugusya mitu ghya bhene ni kujobha, “Aha! bhebhe jhaghwibeta kubomola hekalu ni kulijenga kwa magono madatu,
ukiokolayi ghwajhobhi na uselelayi pasi kuh'omela pa n'salaba apu!”
Kwa namna jhelajhela bhabhaha bha makuhani bhandhihakili ni kujobhesana, pamonga ni bhaandishi ni kujobha, “Abhaokuili bhangi, lakini ibhwesyalepi kuiokola muene.
Kristu Mfalme ghwa Israel, selelayi pasi henu kuh'omela pa n'salaba, ili tubhwesijhi kulola ni kuamini.” Ni bhala bha bhasulubibhu pamonga ni muene pia bhandhihakili.
Bhojhifikili saa sita, giza likahida kunani jha nchi jhioha hadi saa tisa.
Wakati ghwa saa tisa, Yesu apigili kelele kwa sauti mbaha, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” jhimaanisya “k'yara ghwangu, K'yara ghwangu, kwa ndabha jha kiki undekili?”
Baadhi jha abhu bhabhajhemili bho bhap'ehki bhakajobha, “Langayi, akan'kuta Eliya.”
Munu mmonga akajumba akamemesya siki mu sponji ni kujhibheka panani pa libehe lya lilasi, akampela ili anyuayi. Munu mmonga akajobha, “Lendayi tuloli kama Eliya ibetakun'selesya pasi.”
Kisha Yesu akalela kwa sauti mbaha ni kufwa.
Lipazia lya hekalu likagabhwanyika fipandi fibhele kuhomela kunani mpaka pasi.
Ofisa mmonga jha ajhemili kundanga Yesu, bhoabhuene afuili kwa jinsi jhela, akajobha, “Kweli munu ojho ajhele mwana ghwa K'yara.”
Bhajhele pia bhadala ambabho bhalangeghe kwa patali. Miongoni mwa bhene ajhele Mariamu Magdalena, Mariamu (nyinamunu Yakobo n'debe ghwa Yose), ni Salome.
Wakati bhajhele Galilaya bhan'kesisi ni kuntumikila. Ni bhadala bhangi bhingi pia bhaambatene naku hadi Yerusalemu.
Bhokijhingili kimihi, ni kwa kujha jhajhele ligono lya maandalio, ligono kabla ya sabato,
Yusufu ni Arimathaya akahida pala. Ajhele mjumbe ghwa baraza jhaiheshimibhwa munu jha autarajili bhufalme bhwa K'yara. Kwa ujasiri akalota kwa Pilato,
ni kubhusoma mb'ele ghwa Yesu. Pilato akayangasibhwa kujha Yesu tayari amalikufwa; akan'kuta jhola afisa ni kun'kota kama Yesu tayari amalikufwa.
Bhoakabhili bhuhakika kwa afisa kujha Yesu tayari amalikufwa anduhuswiri Yusufu kuutola mb'ele.
Yusufu ajhele tayari amalikugola sanda. Akan'selesya kuhomela pa n'salaba, akan'konga kwa sanda hi kumbeka mugati mu likaburi lyalagimibhu mu muamba. Kisha aliviringisi liganga lela pa ndiangu ghwa likaburi.
Mariamu Magdalena ni Mariamu nyinamunu Yose bhebhuene sehemu jha asyelibhu Yesu.
Wakati sabato jhimaliki, Mariamu Magdalena ni Mariamu nyinamunu ni Yakobo, ni Salome, bhahemili manukato manofu, ili bhabhwesiajhi kuhida ni kubhubaka mafuta mb'ele ghwa Yesu kwa ndabha jha maziku.
Lubhuliku ligono lya kuanza jha juma, bhakalota kulikaburi wakati lijobha lih'omili.
Bhakajha bhijobhesana bhene kwa bhene, “Niani ibetakuliviringisya liganga kwa ndabha jha tete ili tujhingilayi mu likaburi?”
Wakati bhalolili bhambwene munu tayari amalili kulibelendusya liganga, ambalyo lyajhele libhaha sana.
Bhakajhingila mu likaburi na bhambwene n'songolo afwalili lijoho libhalafu, atamili lubhafu lwa kulia na bhasyangele.
Akabhajobhela, “Musilili. Mukandonda Yesu, ghwa Nazareti, jhaasulubibhu. Afufuiki! Ajhelepi apa. Langayi mahali pala pa bhambekili.
Mulotayi, mukabhajobhilayi bhanafunzi bha muene ni Petro jha kujha abhalongolili kulota Galilaya. Okhu mwibetakumbona, Kama kyaabhajobhili.”
Bhakabhoka ni kujumba kuhoma mu likaburi; bhatetemiki na bhasyangesibhu. Bhajobhilepi kyokyoha kwa munu jhojhioha ndabha bhatilili sana.
Manyata ligono lya kuanza lya juma, baada jha kufufuka an'tokili hosi Mariamu Magdalena, ambajhe kuh'omela kwa muene ambosisi mapepo saba.
Abhokili ni kubhajobhela bhala ambabho bhajhele pamonga naku, wakati bhihuzunika ni kupisya mahosi.
Bhap'eliki kujha n'sima na abhonekene ni muene, lakini bhabeli kumwamini.
Baada jha aghu akakitokesya kwa namna tofauti tofauti kwa bhangi bhabhele kabhele, wakati bhigenda kuhomela mu nchi.
Bhakalota kubhajobhela bhanafunzi bha muene bhangi bha bhabhabakili, lakini bhabelikubhaamini.
Yesu baadaye akakih'omesya kwa bhala kumi na moja bho bhajhegheme mu meza, ni kubhakemela kwa kutokuamini kwa bhene ni bhunonono bhwa mioyo, kwa ndabha bhabelikubhaamini bhala bhabhambwene baada jha kufufuka kuh'omela kwa bhafu.
Akabhajobhela, “Mulotayi ku bhulimwengu bhuoha, ni kuhubiri injili kwa viumbe fyoha.
Yejhioha jhaibetakuamini ni kubatisibhwa ibetakuokolibhwa, ni jhola jhaibetalepi kuamini ibetakuhukumulibhwa.
Ishara e'se sibetakuambatana ni bhoha bha bhiamini. Kwa lihina lya nene bhibetakubhosya pepo. Bhibetakujobha kwa lugha mpya.
Bhibetakukamula lijhoka kwa mabhoko gha bhene, na hata Kama bhanywili khenu kyokioha kya kufisha kibetalepi kubhadhuru. Bhibeta kukabha mabhoko kwa bhatamu, na bhene bhibetakujha bhasima”.
Baada jha Bwana kujobha nabhu, ibetakutolibhwa kunani kumbinguni ni kutama kibhoko kya kulia kya K'yara.
Bhanafunzi bhakabhoka ni kuhubiri khila mahali, wakati Bwana ibhomba mbombo nabhu ni kulithibitisya lilobhi kwa miujiza ni ishara sibetakulongosana nabhu.
Bhamehele bhakitahidi kubheka simulizi mpangilio kuhusu masuala ambagho ghatimisibhu kati jhitu,
Kama kyabhatupelili tete, ambabho kuhomela kubhuandu twajhele mashahidi bha mihu ni bhatumishi bha bhajumbe.
Hivyo ni nene kabhele, baada jha kuchungusya kwa uangalifu chanzo kya mambo ghoha agha kuhoma kubhuandu - nibhuene ni kinofu kwa nene kabhele kukuj'handikila mu mpangilio bhuake - mheshimibhwa Theofilo.
Ili kwamba abhwesiajhi kumanya ukweli ghwa mambo ghaufundisibhu.
Katika magono gha Herode, mfalme ghwa Yudea, pajhele ni kuhani fulani jhaakutibhweghe Zakaria, bhwa lukholo lwa Abiya. N'dala munu ahomili mu bhabinti bha Haruni, ni lihina lya muene akutibhweghe Elizabeth.
Bhoha bhajhele ni haki mbele sya k'yara; Bhagendili bila lawama mu amri syoha ni malagisu gha Bwana.
Lakini bhajhelepi ni muana, kwandabha Elizabeth ajhe tasa, ni kwa wakati obho bhuoha bhoha bhabhele bhajhele bhaseya sana.
Henu jhatokili kujha Zakaria ajhele ku uwepo bhwa K'yara, akajhendelela ni wajibu bhwa kikuhani ku utaratibu bhwa zamu jha muene.
Kulengana ni desturi jha kuchagula ndo kuhani jholekhu jhaibetakuhudumu, jha ahagulibhu kwa kura kujhingila mu hekalu lya Bwana ni kabhele ngaafukizi uvumba.
Likundi lyoha lya bhanu likajha lis'oka kwibhala wakati bhwa kufukizibhwa kwa uvumba.
Henu malaika bha Bwana bhan'tokili ni kujhenia lubhafu lwa kulia bhwa madhabahu gha kufukizila.
Zakaria atishiki bho ambwene; hofu jhambinili.
Lakini malaika akan'jobhela, “Usitili Zakaria, kwandabha maombi gha jhobhi nighap'eliki. N'dala bhu Elizabeth ibeta kuhogola mwana. Lihina lya muene wibetakun'kuta Yohana.
Wibetakujha ni furaha ni uchangamfu, ni bhingi bhibeta kuhobhokela kuhogoleka kwa muene.
Kwa kujha wibetakujha wembahe pa mihu gha Bwana. Ibetalepi kunywa divai wala kinywaji kikali, na ibeta kujha ajasibhu ni Roho mtakatifu kuhomela mu lileme lya nyinamunu.
Ni bhanu bhingi bha Israel bhibeta kugeusibhwa kwa Bwana k'yara ghwa bhene.
Ibeta kulota palongolo pa mihu pa Bwana ku Roho ni nghofu sya Eliya. Ibeta kubhomba naha ili kukerebhusya mioyo ghya Dadi kwa bhana, ili kwamba bhabhibela kutii bhibeta kulota mu hekima jha bhenye haki. Ibeta kubhomba naha ili kubheka tayari kwa Bwana bhanu ambabho bhaandalibhu kwa ndabha jha muene.”
Zakaria akan'jobhela malaika, “Nibetakubhwesya bhuli kumanya ele? kwandabha nene ne n'seya ni n'dala bhangu miaka ghya muene ghimehele sana.”
Malaika ajibili ni kun'jobhela, “Nene ne Gabrili, ambajhe nijhema palongolo pa K'yara. Nalaghisibhu kukujobhela, kukuletela habari ejhe njema.
Na langayi, wibetalepi kulongela, wibetakujha kununu, wibetalepi kulongela mpaka ligono lela mambo agha pa ghibeta kuhomela. Ejhe Kwandabha ghwa shindilu kukiera malobhi ghangu ambagho ghibeta kutimisibhwa kwa wakati mwafaka.”
Henu bhanu bhakajha bhakandela Zakaria. Bhasyangesibhu kujha ajhele itumila muda ghumehele mu hekalu.
Lakini bho ahomili kwibhala, abhwesilepi kulongela nabhu. Bhakatambula kujha ibeta kujha akabhili maono bho ajhe mu hekalu. Ajhendelili kulasya ishara ni kubakila kinunu.
Ikatokela kwamba lgono lya huduma jha muene bhosimaliki kukerebhuka kunyumba jha muene.
Baada jha Zakaria kukerebhuka kunyumba kuhoma ku huduma jha muene jhe hekalu, n'dala munu ajhe ni luleme. Ni muene abhokilepi panyumba jha muene kwa muda bhwa miezi mitano. Akajobha,
“Ele ndo Bwana alibhombi kwa nene bho anilangili kwa upendeleo ili kujhibhosya soni jha nene palongolo pa bhanu.”
Henu, pa mwesi ghwa sita bhwa luleme lwa Elizabeth, k'yara an'jobhili malaika Gabrieli kulota ku mji ghwa Galilaya bhwawikutibhwa Nazareti,
Kwa bikra jha aposibhu ni n'gosi ambajhe lihina lya muene lyajhele Yusufu. Muene ajhele bhwa lukholo lwa Daudi, ni lihina lya bikra ojhu ajhele Mariamu.
Akahida kwa muene ni kujobha, “salaam, bhebhe jhe upokili neema mbaha! Bwana apendisibhu nabhi”
Lakini malobhi gha malaika ghan'changenye na ajhelibhu lepi kwandabha jha kiki malaika ajobhili salaam ejhe jha ajabu kwa muene.
Malaika akan'jobhela, “Usitili, Mariamu, kwandabha ukabhili neema kuhoma kwa k'yara.
Na langayi, na wibeta kuhogola muana. Ni bhebhe wibetakun'kuta lihina lya muene 'Yesu.'
Ibeta kujha mbaha ne ibeta kukutibhwa mwana jha ajhee panani sana. Bwana k'yara ibeta kump'ela kiti kya enzi kya Daudi dadimunu.
Ibeta kutawala panani pa lukholo lwa Yakobo milele ni ufalme bhwa muene wibetalepi kujha ni mwisho.
Mariamu akan'jobhela malaika, e'le libetakutokela kwa muda gani, ndabha nibhwajhi lepi kugona ni n'gosi jhejhioha?
Malaika ajibili ni kun'jobhela, “Roho mtakatifu ibeta kuhidila juu jha bhebhe, ni nghofu jha ajhekunani sana jhibeta kuhida panani pa bhebhe. kwa hiyo, mtakatifu jha ibeta kuhogoleka ibeta kukutibhwa mwana ghwa K'yara.
Na langayi, ndongo bhu Elizabeth ajhe ni luleme lwa mwana mu umri bhwa muene bhwa useya. Obho ndo mwesu ghwa sita kwa muene, ambajhe ambajhe akutibhweghe mgumba.
Kwandabha lijhelepi libeta kubwesekana kwa k'yara.”
Mariamu akajobha, “Langayi, nene na n'tumishi n'dala ghwa Bwana. Lekajhi jhijhelayi naha kwa nene sawasawa ni ujumbe bhwa jhobhi.” Kisha malaika akandeka.
Ndipo katika magono aghu Mariamu abhokili manyata alotili ku nchi jha vilima, ku mji katika nchi jha Yudea.
Alotili munyumba jha Zakaria ni kumponesya Elizabeth.
Bho ap'eliki salamu jha Mariamu, muana mulileme lya muene arukili, ni Elizabeth akamemesibhwa ni Roho mtakatifu.
Apazili sauti jha muene ni kujobha kwa sauti mbaha, “ubarikibhu bhebhe zaidi miongoni mwa bhadala, ni muana jha ajhele mu lileme lya jhobhi abarikibhu.
Na jhijhebhuli kwa nene kujha, mabhu ghwa Bwana bhangu jhilondekaghe ahidayi kwa nene?
Kwa kujha langayi, bhojhipelekiki mie mb'olokhoto mwa nene sauti jha kuponesya kwa jhobhi, muana mulileme lya nene aruki kwa furaha.
Na abarikibhu n'dala jhola ambajhe akyeriri jha kujha ngeuhomili ukamilifu bhwa mambo ghala ghaajobhibhu kuhoma kwa Bwana.”
Mariamu akajobha, nafsi jha nene jhikan'sifu Bwana,
ni roho jha nene jhibiobhwiki kwa k'yara mwokozi ghwangu.
Kwandabha ajhilangili hali jha pasi jha n'tumishi bhwa muene n'dala. Langayi, tangu henu mu fizazi fyoha bhibeta kunikuta mbarikibhwa.
Kwandabha muene jha ajhe muweza abhombi mambo mabhaha kwa nene, ni lihina lya muene ni takatifu.
Rehema jha muene jhidumu kuh'oma kizazi hadi kizazi kwa bhale bhabhaken'heshimu muene.
Alasili nghofo kwa kibhoko kya muene; abhatawenye bhela bhabhikifuneghe panani pa mabhwasu gha mioyo ghya bhene.
Abhaselisi pasi bhana bha bhafalme kuhoma pa fiti fya bhene fya enzi ni kubhajhinula panani bhabhejhele bha hali jha pasi.
Abheshibishi bhenye njala kwa fenu finofu, bali matajiri abhabhengili mabhoko mat'opu.
Ahomisi msaada kwa Israeli n'tumishi ghwa muene, ili kukhomboka kulasya rehema.
(Kama kyaajobhili kwa bhadadi jhitu) kwa Abrahamu ni uzao bhwa muene milele.”
Mariamu atamili ni Elizabeth yapata miesi midatu efe ndo akakerebhuka kunyumba jha muene.
Henu wakati bhwajhele uwadili kwa Elizabeth kwifungula mwana bhwa muene ni kwifungula mwana ghwa kigosi.
Majirani bha muene ni bhalongo munu bhap'eliki jinsi Bwana kya ajhikuzili rehema kwa muene, na bhahobhwiki pamonga ni muene.
Henu jhatokili ligono lya nane kwamba bhahidili kun'tahiri muana. Jhilondekaghe kun'kuta lihina lya muene, “Zekaria,” kwa kuzingatila lihina lya Dadimunu,
Lakini nyinamunu ajibili ni kujobhoha, “Lepi; ibeta kukutibhwa Yohana.”
Bhakan'jobhela ajhelepi hata mmonga kwa bhalongobhu jhaikutibhwa kwa lihina e'le.”
Bhakambombela ishara Dadimunu kuashiria muene alondeghe lihina akutibhwayi niani.
Dadi munu alondeghe kibao kya kulembela, na akalemba, “Lihina lya muene Yohana.” Bhoha bhasyangesibhu ni e'le.
Ghafla ndomo ghwa muene ghwafungulibhu ni lumilu lwa muene lwajhele huru. Akalongela ni kun'sifu k'yara.
Hofu jhikabhahidila bhoha bhabhaishieghe karibu nabhu. Mambo agha ghakaenela mu nchi jhioha jha vilima vya Yudea.
Na bhoha bhabhap'eliki bhaghatunzili mu mioyo ghya bhene, bhakajobha, “Muana ojho kujha ghwa namna jheleku?” kwandabha kibhoko kya Bwana kyajhele pamonga naku.
Dadimunu Zekaria amemesibhu ni Roho mtakatifu na ahomisi unabii, akajobha,
“Asifibhwayi Bwana, k'yara ghwa Israeli, kwandabha asaidili na ashughulikili wokovu bhwa bhanu bha muene.
Atujhimelili pembe jha wokovu mu nyumba jha mtumishi bhwa muene Daudi, kuh'oma miongoni mwa mtumishi bhwa muene Daudi,
Kama kyaajobhili kwa kinywa kya manabii bha muene bhabhajhele kuhoma muandi.
Ibeta kutuokola kuhoma kwa bhaadui bhitu ni kuhoma mumabhoko gha bhoha bha bhatudadili.
Ibeta kubhomba naha kulasya rehema kwa Dadi jhitu ni kukhomboka agano lya muene takatifu,
Kiapo kyaajobhili kwa Abrahamu Dadi jhitu.
Alapili kuthibitisya kwamba ngajhibhwesekene kun'tumikila muene bila bhuogha baada jha kuokolebhwa kuhoma mu mabhoko jha maadui bhitu.
Mu utakatifu ni haki palongolo pa tete magono ghitu ghoha.
Ena, ni nabii ghwa ajhele panani sana, kwa kujha wibetakulota palongolo pa mihu pa Bwana ili kubhajhendalila njela, kubhaandala bhanu kwa ndabha jha ujio bhwa muene,
kujha bhibeta kuokolibhwa kwa njela jha kusamehebhwa dhambi sya bhene.
Ele libeta kuhomela kwa ndabha jha huruma jha k'yara ghwitu, sababu ambajho lijobha kuhomela kunani libeta kutu hidila,
Kajhangasya kwa bhene bhabhitama mu ngisi ni mu kivuli kya mauti. Ibeta kubhomba naha kujhilongosya magolo ghitu ku njela jha amani.”
Henu, muana jhola akakhola ni kujha mwenye nghofu mu roho na atamili nyikani mpaka ligono lya kwitokesya kwa muene kwa Israeli.
Henu mu magono aghu, jhatokili kwamba Kaisari Agusto ahomisi lilaghisu kujhelesya kujha jhitolibhwayi sensa jha bhanu bhoha bhabhiishi pa dunia.
Ejhe jhajhele sensa jha kwanza jhajhabhombiki wakati Krenio ndo gavana bhwa Siria.
Efyo, kila mmonga akalota kumjini kwa muene kujhandikisya sensa.
Ni muene Yusufu akabhoka kabhele mu mji bhwa Nazareti okhu Galilaya ni kusafiri Yudea mu mji bhwa Bethlehemu, bhwa umanyikene kama mji bhwa Daudi, kwandabha jhatokili mu lukholo lwa Daudi.
Alotili okhu kwijhandikisya pamonga ni Mariamu, ambajhe amposili na akajha ilolelela muana.
Henu jhatokili kujha, bhobhajhele khola wakati bhwa muene bhwa kwifungula muana bhwa wadili.
Akahogola muana ghwa kigos, mzalibhwa bhwa muene bhwa kuanza, akan'syongosela ngobho mb'ele bhuoha kun'kenga muana ni mepu. Ndipo akambeka mu kihori kya kulesela bhanyama kwandabha jhajhelepi nafasi mu nyumba jha bhahesya.
Katika eneo e'lu, bhajhele bhachungaji bhabhatameghe kumigonda bhakajha bhilenda makundi gha kondoo bha bhene pakiru.
Ghafla, malaika bha Bwana akabhatokela, ni bhutukufu bhwa Bwana bhwa langele kubhasyongoka, na bhajhe ni bhuogha sana.
Ndipo malaika akabhajobhela, “Musitili, kwa ndabha ni kabhaletela habari jhinofu ambajho jhileta furaha mbaha kwa bhanu bhoha.
Lelu mwokozi ahogoliki kwandabha jhinu kumjini kwa Daudi! muene ndo Kristu Bwana!
Ejhe, ndo ishara jha mwibetakupelibhwa, bhwa mwibetakunkolela muana akongibhu nghobho na agonili mu liholi lya kulesela bhanyama.”
Ghafla kwajhele ni kijeshi kibhaha lya kumbinguni lyaungena Ni malaika ojhu bhakansifu k'yara bhakajobha,
“Utukufu kwa K'yara j'ha ajhele kunani, ni amani ij'helayi pa duniani kwa bhoha bhaipendesibhwa nabhu.”
Ikajha kwamba malaika bhobhamalikubhoka kulota kumbinguni, bhachungaji bhakajobhe sana bhene kwa bhene, “Tulotayi henu khola Bethlehemu, na tukalolayi khenu ekhe ambakyo kih'omili, ambakyo Bwana atujobhili.”
Bhakaharakisya khola, na bhan'kolili Mariamu ni Yusufu, na bhambwene muana agonili mu liholi lya kulesele bhanyama.
Na bhobhabhuene naha, bhakabhajulisha bhanu khela kyabhajobhibhu kuhusu muana.
Bhoha bhabhepeliki habari ejhe bhasyangesibhu ni khela kyakyajobhibhu ni bhachungaji.
Lakini Mariamu ajhendelili kufikiri kuhusu ghoha ghaamali kughap'eleka, aghatunzili mu muoyo ghwa muene.
Bhachungaji bhakakerebhuka bhakantukusya ni kun'sifu k'yara kwandabha jha khila khenu kyabhamali kup'eleka ni kulola, kama tukyajhikajhele jhinenibhu kwa bhene.
Bhojhifikili ligono lya nane na jhajhele ndo wakati bhwa kun'tahiri muana, bhakan'kuta lihina Yesu, lya amalikupelibhwa ni jhola malaika kabla jha luleme kut'ongibhwa mulileme.
Zao lyalilondekeghe lya utakaso bho sipetili, kul'engana ni sheria jha Musa, Yusufu ni Mariamu bhakampeleka ku hekalu khola Yerusalemu kumb'eka palongolo pa Bwana.
Kama kyajhalembibhu mu sheria sya Bwana, “khila n'gosi jhaafungulibhu lileme ni ibetakukutibhwa jhaapisibhu bhakfu kwa Bwana.”
Bhabhu ni bhene bhahidili kupisya sadaka kulengana ni khela kyakijobhibhwa mu sheria jha Bwana, Jozi jha jhebha au makinda mabhele gha njebha.”
Langayi, pajhele ni munu mu Yerusalemu ambajhe lihina lya muene akutibhweghe Simeoni. Munu ojho ajhele mwenye haki ni mcha Mungu. Muene akajha ilendela kwandabha jha mfariji ghwa Israeli, ni Roho mtakatifu ajhele panani pa muene.
Jhamali kufunulibhwa kwa muene kupetela Roho mtakatifu kujha muene ngaafwilepi kabla jha kumbona kristu Bwana.
Ligono limonga ahidili mugati mu hekalu, alongosibhu ni Roho mtakatifu. Ambapo bhazazi bhandetili muana, Yesu, kumbombela ghala ghaghalondekejhe jha sheria,
Ndipo Simeoni ampokili mu mabhoko gha muene, ni kun'sifu k'yara ni kujobha,
“Henu ruhusuayi n'tumishi ghwa jhobhi alotayi kwa amani Bwana, kulengana ni lilobhi lya jhobhi.
Kwa kujha mihu ghangu ghaubhwene wokovu bhwa jhobhi,
ambabho bhubhonekene kwa mihu gha bhanu bhoha.
Muene ndo nuru kwandabha jha ufunuo kwa bhamataifa ni utukufu bhwa bhanu Israeli.”
Dadi ni Mabhu ghwa bhana bhasyangesibhu kwa mambo ghaghalongeliki juu jha bhene.
Ndipo Simeoni akabhabariki ni kujobha Mariamu nyinamunu, “Pelekesiajhi kwa ndabha jha kujhagha ni kuokoka kwa bhanu bhingi mu Israeli na ndo ishara ambajho bhanu bhingi bhibeta kujhipinga.
Kabhele ndo upanga bhwawibeta kuhoma nafsi jha jhobhi ghwe muene, ili kwamba mabhwasu gha mioyo jha bhingi jhidhihirikayi”.
Nabii n'dala jhaakutibhweghe Ana ajhele mu hekalu. Muene ajhele binti ghwa Fanueli kuhoma kabila lya Asheri. Ajhele ni miaka ghimehele sana. Ni muene atamili ni n'gosi kwa miaka sana baada jha kubhonana,
Na ndipo akajha mjane kwa miaka themanini na nne. Ni muene abhwayilepi kubhoka mu hekalu na akajha ijhendelela kumwabudu K'yara pamonga ni kufunga ni kus'oka, kiru ni musi.
Na kwa wakati obhu ahidili pala pa bhajhele akajhanda kun'shuru k'yara. Alongili kumhusu muana kwa khila munu ambajhe alendeleleghe ukombozi bhwa Yerusalemu.
Bho bhamalili khila khenu kya bhalondeghe kubhomba kulengana ni sheria jha Bwana, bhakakerebhuka Galilaya, kumjini kwa bhene, Nazareti.
Muana akholili, na ajhe ni nghofu, akajhongeseka katika hekima, ni neema jha K'yara jhajhele panani pa muene.
Bhazazi bha mwene khila mwaka bhalotili Yerusalemu kwandabha jha sikukuu jha Pasaka.
Bhoajhe ni umri wa miaka kumi hi mibhele, bhakalota kabhele wakati muafaka kidesturi kwandabha jha sikukuu.
Baada jha kubhakila magono ghoha kwandabha jha sikukuu bhajhandili kukerebhuka kunyumba. Lakini n'gosi Yesu abakili kunyuma m'ola mu Yerusalemu ni bhazazi bha muene bhamanyilepi e'le.
Bhadhanieghe ajhele mu likundi lya bhasafirieghe nalu, hivyo bhasafiri safari jha ligono. Ndipo bhakajhanda kundonda miongoni mwa bhalongo munu ni marafiki bha bhene.
Bhobhashindilu kun'kabha, bhakakerebhuka Yerusalemu ni kujhanda kundonda omu.
Jhatokili kwamba baada jha magono madatu, bhakan'kabha mu hekalu, akajha atamili pagati pa bhalimu, akabhap'elekesya ni kubhakhota maswali.
Bhoha bhabhampelekisi bhasyangesibhu ni ufahamu bhwa muene ni majibu gha muene.
Bho bhambwene, bhastajabili. Nyinamunu akan'jobhela, “Mwanabhangu, kwandabha jhakiki ukatubhombela naha? Pelekesiajhi, Dadi waku ni nene tukulondili kwa wasiwasi mbaha.”
Akabhajobhela, “kwandabha jhakiki mnilondeghe? Mwamanyilepi kujha lazima nijhelayi mu nyumba jha dadi jhangu?
Lakini bhanjelibhu lepi kiki akimaanishieghe kwa malobhi aghu.
Ndipo akalota pamonga nabhu mpaka kunyumba Nazareti na ajhele mtii lwa bhene. Nyinamunu ahifadhili mambo ghoha mu muoyo ghwa muene.
Lakini Yesu ajhendelili kukhola katika hekima ni kimo, na ajhongesiki kuganikibhwa ni k'yara ni bhanu.
Henu, mu mwaka ghwa kumi na tano bhwa utawala bhwa Kaisari Tiberia, wakati Pontio Pilato ajhe gavana ghwa Uyahudi, Herode ajhele mbaha ghwa mkoa ghwa Galilaya, ni Filipo ndogomunu ajhele mbaha ghwa mkoa bhwa Iturea ni Trakoniti, ni Lisania ajhele mbaha ghwa mkoa bhwa Abilene,
ni bhwakati bhwa ukuhani mbaha bhwa Anasi ni Kayafa, Lilobhi lya k'yara lyan'hidili Yohana mwana ghwa Zakaria, jangwani.
Asafiri mu mkoa bhuoha kusyongoka kiholo Yorodani, akihubiri bhubatisu bhwa toba kwandabha jha msamaha bhwa dhambi.
Kama kya jhilembibhu mu kitabu kya malobhi gha nabii Isaya, “sauti jha munu jha ajhe munyika,” Mujhitengenesiajhi tayari njela jha Bwana, mughatengenesiajhi mapito gha muene ghaghanyokili.
Kila libondi libeta kujasibhwa, kila kid'onda fibeta kusawazishibhwa, barabara syasibedeme sibeta kunyosibhwa, ni njela sya siparasibhu sibetakulainishibhwa.
Bhanu bhoha bhibetakubhubhona wokovu bhwa K'yara.”
Efyo, Yohana akabhajobhela makutano mabhajha gha bhanu bhabhan'hidili bhabhwesiajhi kubatisibhwa ni muene, “Muenga uzao bhwa lijhoka bhenye sumu, niani abhaonyili kujhijumba gadhabu jhajhihida?
Muhogolayi matunda ghaghiyendana ni toba, na musijhendi kujobha mgati mwa jhomu, “Tujhe ni Ibrahimu ambajhe Dadi jhitu kwa ndabha nikabhajobhela jha kujha k'yara ibhwesya kunjinulila Ibrahimu bhana hata kutokana ni maganga agha.
Tayari libhagu limelikubhekibhwa mu mzizi bhwa libehe. Efyo, khila libehe lya lihogolalepi matunda manofu, lidumulibhwa ni kutaghibhwa mu muoto.
Kisha bhanu mu makutano bhan'tokili bhakajobha, “Henu twilondeka tukheta bhuli?”
Ajibili ni kujobhoha, “Kama munu ajhe ni kanzu sibhele jhilondeka ampelayi kanzu jhimonga jhinu jha adulili, na ambajhe ajhe ni kyakulya na abhombayi mebhu.”
Kisha baadhi jha bhatoza ushuru bhahidili kabhele kubhatisibhwa, na bhan'jobhili, “Mwalimu twilondeka kubhomba kiki?
Akabhajobhela, “musikusanyi hela nisu kuliko kya mwilondeka kubhonganiya.”
Baadhi jha maaskari kabhele bhakan'kota bhakajobha, “Ni teta je? Twilondeka tuketajhi kiki?” Akabhajobhela, “Musitoli hela kwa munu jhejhioha kwa nghofu, na musin'tuhumu munu jhejhioha kwa udesi. Muridhikayi kwa mishahara jhinu.”
Henu, kwa kujha bhanu bhajhele ni shauku jha kundendela Kristo jhaibeta kuhida, khila mmonga akajhaibhwasya mu muoyo bhwa muene kuhusu Yohana kama muene ndo kristo.
Yohana ajibili ni kubhajobhela bhoha, “Nene nikabhabatisya muenga kwa masi, lakini ajhe mmonga jhaihida ambajhe muene ajhe ni nghofu kuliko nene, na nilondeka lepi hata kuhobhosya mighojhi jha filatu fya muene. Ibeta kubhabatisya muenga kwa Roho mtakatifu ni kwa muoto.
Pepeto lya muene lijhele mumabhoko gha muene bhwa kupepetela ngano ni kujhibhonganiya ngano mu ghala lya muene. Lakini, ibeta kughateketesya makapi kwa muoto ambabho bhwibhwesya lepi kusimika.
Kwa maonyo ghangi ghamehele kabhele, ahubiri habari jhinofu kwa bhanu.
Yohana an'kemili kabhele Herode mbaha ghwa mkoa kwa kun'gega Herodia, n'dala ghwa ndongo munu ni kwa maovu ghangi ghamehele ambagho Herode aghabhombili.
Lakini baadajhe Herode abhombili uovu bhongi bhubhibhi sana. An'kongili Yohana muligereza.
Kisha jhatokili kwamba, wakati bhanu bhoha bhibatisibhwa ni Yohana, ni muene Yesu abatisibhu kabhele. Wakati bho isoka, mbingu syafunguiki.
Roho mtakatifu akaselela panani pa muene kwa mfano ghwa kiwiliwili kama njebha, wakati bhobhuobhu sauti ikahida kuhomela kumbinguni jhajobhili, “Bhebhe ghwa mwanabhangu mpendwa. Nipendesibhu sana ni bhebhe.”
Henu Yesu muene, bhoajhandi kufundisya, ajhele ni umri upatao miaka thelathini. Ajhele mwana (kama kyajhejobhibhu) ghwa Yusufu, mwana ghwa Eli,
Mwana ghwa Mathati, mwana ghwa Lawi, mwana ghwa Melki, mwana ghwa Yana, mwana ghwa Yusufu,
mwana ghwa Matathia, mwana ghwa Amosi, mwana ghwa Nuhumu, mwana ghwa Esli, mwana ghwa Nagai,
mwana ghwa Maati, mwana ghwa Matathia, mwana ghwa Semeini, mwana ghwa Yusufu, mwana ghwa Yuda,
mwana ghwa Yoanani, mwana ghwa Resa, mwana ghwa Zerubabeli, mwana ghwa Shealtieli, mwana ghwa Neri,
mwana ghwa Melki, mwana ghwa Adi, mwana ghwa kosamu, mwana ghwa Elmadamu, mwana ghwa Eri,
mwana ghwa Yoshua, mwana ghwa Eliezeri, mwana ghwa Yorimu, mwana ghwa Matathi, mwana ghwa Lawi,
mwana ghwa Simeoni, mwana ghwa Yuda, mwana ghwa Yusufu, mwana ghwa Yonamu, mwana ghwa Eliyakimu,
mwana ghwa Melea, mwana ghwa Mena, mwana ghwa Nathani, mwana ghwa Daudi,
mwana ghwa Yese, mwana ghwa Obedi, mwana ghwa Boazi, mwana ghwa Salmoni, mwana ghwa Nashoni,
mwana ghwa Abinadabu, mwana ghwa Aramu, mwana ghwa Hesroni, mwana ghwa Peresi, mwana ghwa Yuda,
mwana ghwa Yakobo, mwana ghwa Isaka, mwana ghwa Ibrahimu, mwana ghwa Tera, mwana ghwa Nahori,
mwana ghwa Seruig, mwana ghwa Ragau, mwana ghwa Pelegi, mwana ghwa Eberi, mwana ghwa Sala,
mwana ghwa Kenani, mwana ghwa Arfaksadi, mwana ghwa Shemu, mwana ghwa Nuhu, mwana ghwa Lameki,
mwana ghwa Methusela, mwana ghwa Henoko, mwana ghwa Yaredi, mwana ghwa Mahalalei, mwana ghwa Kenani,
mwana ghwa Enoshi, mwana ghwa Sethi mwana ghwa Adamu, mwana ghwa k'yara.
Kisha, Yesu bho amemili Roho mtakatifu, akerebhwiki kuhoma ku kiholo Jordani, na alongosibhu ni Roho mu jangwa.
Kwa magono arobaini, na okhu ajaribibhu ni ibilisi. Wakati obhu alilepi kyokyoha, ni mwisho bhwa wakati akipeliki njala.
Ibilisi akan'jobhela, “Kama bhebhe mwana ghwa K'yara, liamuruajhi liganga ele kujha n'kate.”
Yesu akan'jibu, “Jhilembibhu; 'munu ibeta lepi kuishi kwa n'kate bhuene.”
Kisha Ibilisi akendongosya panani pa kilele kya kid'onda ni kundasya falme syoha sya dunia kwa muda mfupi.
Ibilisi akan'jobhela, “Nibetakupela mamlaka gha kutawala falme ese syoha pamonga ni fahari syake. Nibhwesya kuketa naha kwandabha fyoha fikabidhibhu kwa nene nifitawaleyi, na nibhwesya kumpela jhejhioha jha nilonda kumpela.
Kwa hiyo, kama wibetakunijhinamila ni kuniabudu, fenu efe fyoha fibetakujha fya bhebhe.”
Lakini Yesu ajibili ni kun'jobhela, “Jhilembibhu, “lazima umwabuduajhi Bwana k'yara ghwa jhobhi, na lazima un'tumililayi muene tu.”
Baadaye Ibilisi andonguisi Yesu hadi Yerusalemu ni kumbeka sehemu jha panani kabisa jha lijengo lya hekalu ni kun'jobhela, “kama bhebhe ndo mwana ghwa K'yara, kisopayi pasi kuhomela apu.
Kwandabha jhilembibhu, “Ibetakubhalangisya malaika bha muene bhahidayi kukutunze ni kukul'enda,
na bhibetakujhinula panani mu mabhoko gha bhene ili kwamba usilamasi magono gha jhobhi panani pa maganga.”
Yesu ajibili an'jobhili, “Jhinenibhu, “usin'jaribu Bwana K'yara ghwa jhobhi.”
Ibilisi bho amali kun'jaribu Yesu, akabhoka ni kundeka hadi wakati bhongi.
Kisha Yesu akerebhwiki Galilaya kwa nghofu sya Roho, ni habari kun'husu muene sya jhemili ni kusambala mu mikoa ghioha ghya jirani.
Afundisi mu masinagogi gha bhene, ni kila mmonga an'sifili.
Ligono limonga alotili Nazareti, mji ambabho alelibhu ni kukholela. Kama kyajhijhele desturi jha muene ajhingili mu sinagogi ligono lya sabato naajhemili kusoma maandiku.
Akabidhibhu gombo lya nabii Isaya, hivyo, afunguili gombo na alondili sehemu jha jhilembibhu,
Roho ghwa Bwana ajhele panani pa nene, kwandabha anisopili mafuta kuhubiri habari jhinofu kwa maskini. Anilaghisi kutangasya uhuru kwa bhafungwa, ni kubhafuanya bhabhibela bhabhwesiajhi kulola kabhele. kubhabheka huru bhala bhabhigandamisibhwa,
Kubhutangasya mwaka ambabho Bwana ibetakulasya wema bhwa muene.”
Kisha akalifunga gombo, akan'kerebhusila ndongosi ghwa sinagogi ni kutama pasi. Mihu gha bhanu bhoha bha bhajhele mu sinagogi ghanda ngili muene.
Akajhanda kulongela nabhu akajobha, “Lelu lijhandiku e'le litimisibhu mu mb'olokoto sya jhomu.”
Khila mmonga pala ashuhudili kya ajobhili Yesu, na bhingi miongoni mwa bhene bhasyangesibhu ni malobhi gha hekima ghaghajhele ghihomela mu kinywa kya muene. Bhakajha bhijobha, “ojho ndo n'songolo tu ghwa Yusufu, naha lepi?”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “hakika mwibeta kujobha methali ejhe kwa nene, “Tabibu, ukiponesijhi ghwe muene. Kyokyoha kyatupeliki wibhombha Karperinaumu, kibhombayi hapa kabhele pakijiji kya jhobhi.”
Kabhele ajobhili, “hakika nikabhajobhela muenga, ajhelepi nabii jha ikakubalika mu nchi jha muene.”
Lakini nikabhajobhela ukweli muenga kujha kwajhele ni bhajane bhingi Israeli mu kipindi kya Eliya, wakati mbingu jhidendibhu kusijhi ni fula kwa miaka midatu ni nusu, wakati kujhele ni njala mbaha mu nchi jhioha.
Lakini Eliya atumibhu lepi kwa jhejhioha mmonga ghwa bhene, lakini kwa mjane mmonga tu jhaatameghe sarepta karibu ni mji bhwa Sidoni.
Kabhele, kwajhele ni bhakoma bhamehele Israeli katika kipindi kya Elisha nabii, lakini ajhelepi hata mmonga bhabhi jha aponyisibhu isipokujha Naamani munu ghwa Siria.
Bhanu bhoha mu sinagogi bhamemibhu ni gadhabu bho bhaghapheliki agha ghoha.
Bhajhemili ni kun'sukumila kwibhala jhe mji nikundongosya hadi kuligema lya kundonda bhwa mji ambabho mji bhwa bhene ghwajengibhu panani pake, ili bhabhwesiajhi kun'tegha pasi.
Lakini ap'etili salama pagati pa bhene kwilotela.
Kisha aselelili Kapernaumu, mu mji ghwa Galilaya. Sabato jhimonga akajha ifundisya bhanu mu lisinagogi.
Bhasiyangesibhu ni mafundisu gha muene, kwandabha afundisi kwa mamlaka.
Henu ligono elu mu sinagogi, kwajhele ni muene ghe ajhele ni roho chafu jha pepo, na alelili kwa sauti jha panani,
“Tujhe ni kiki nabhi, Yesu ghwa Nazareti? Uhidili kutujhangamisya? Nimanyili kujha bhebhe ndo niani! Bhebhe ghwe mtakatifu ghwa K'yara!”
Yesu an'kemili pepo akajobha, “Gudamayi kununu, na umbo kayimunu ojho!” Pepo jhola bho an'sopili munu jhola pasi pagati pa bhene, ambokili munu jhola bila jha kun'sababishila maumivu ghoghoha ghala.
Bhanu bhoha bha syangele, na bhajhendelili kulongelela lijambo elu kila mmonga ni njinu. Bhakajobha, “Ndo malobhi gha aina jheleku agha?” Akabhaamuru roho kwa mamlaka ni nghofu na bhibhoka.”
Efyo, habari juu jha Yesu syajhenili khila sehemu mu maeneo ghaghisyonghoka mkoa oghu.
Kisha Yesu akabhoka mu mji obhu ni kujhingila mu nyumba jha Simoni. Henu, n'kwibhi ghwa Simoni akajha ilwala homa jhikali, na bhakan'sihi kwa niaba jha muene.
Efyo, Yesu akan'hegelela, akajhikemela home jhela ni kupona. Ghafla akajhema ni kujhanda kubhatumikila.
Lijobha bho lijhibhela, bhanu bhake ndetela Yesu khila n'tamu ni kubhaponesya bhohba.
Mapepo kabhele ghabhapitili bhamehele ghakajhe ghilela kwa sauti ni kujobha, “bhebhe ndo mwana ghwa K'yara!” Yesu abhakemili mapepo ni kubharuhusu bhalongelayi, kwandabha bhamanyili kwamba muene ajhele ndo Kristu.
Bho kubhebhele, alotili lieneo lya libeli kujha ni bhanu. Makutano gha bhanu bhajhele bhakandonda na bhakahida mu lieneo lya ajhele. Bhakajaribu kun'besya asiloti patali ni bhene.
Lakini akabhajobhela, “Lazima kabhele nihubiriajhi habari sinofu sya ufalme bhwa K'yara mu miji ghenge, ghimehele kwandabha ejhe ndo sababu nalaghisibhu apa.”
Kisha ajhendelili kuhubiri mumasinagogi mu uyahudi jhioha.
Basi jhatokili bhanu bho bhabhonganiki ni kun'syong'oka Yesu ni kupelekesya lilobhi lya K'yara ambapo ajhemili kando jha ziwa Genesareti.
Abhuene mashua sibhele sisopi nanga palubhafu me nyanja. Bhalobhi bhajhe bhamali kupita na bhakajha bhisuka, mikwabhu ghya bhene.
Yesu akajhingila mu mojawapo mu s'ela mashua, ambajho jhajhele jha Simoni ni kun'soka ajhipelekayi mu masi patali kidogo ni pandema. Kisha atamili ni kumanyisya kuhomela mu mashua.
Kulongela, akan'jobhela Simoni, “Jhipelekajhi mashua jha jhobhi kulosi ni kuselesya mikwabhu ghya jhobhi ili kulobha somba.”
Simon akajibi ni kujobha, Bwana, tubhombi mbombo kiru khoha na tukabhi lepi kyokyoha, lakini kwa lilobhi lya jhobhi, nikeselesya mikwabhu.
Bho bhabhombi nahu, bhabhongeniye kiasi kibhaha kya somba ni mikwabhu ghya bhene ghikajhenda kuhatuka.
Efyo bhakabhaashirila bhashirika bha bhene mu mashua senge ili bhahidayi ni kubhatangasila. Bhakahida bhakasimemesya mashua syoha, kiasi kwamba sikajhanda kujhibhila.
Lakini simoni Petro, bhoabhwene naha, abinili pa magoti gha Yesu akajobha, “Bhokayi kwa nene, kwandabha nene ne munu jha nijheni dhambi Bwana.”
Kwandabha asyangesibhu, ni bhanu bhoha bhabhajhele pamonga nabhu, kwa bhalobhi bha somba bhabhajhele bhaubhombili.
E'le lyabhajumuishi Yakobo ni Yohana bhana bha Zebedayo, ambabho bhajhele bhashiriki bha Simoni. Ni Yesu akan'jobhela Simoni, “Usitili, kwa ndabha kwabhwanji henu ni kuj'hendelela wibeta kulobha bhanu.”
Bhobhamali kusileta mashua sya bhene kundema, bhalekili khila khenu ni kun'kesya muene.
Jhatokili bho ajhe mu mji umongawapo, munu jha amemili ukoma ajhele okhu. Wakati ambwene Yesu, abinili wakati ijhinamisya uso bhwa muene pasi ni kun'soka, akajobha, Bwana, ikajhiajhi wilonda, ghwibhwesya kunitakasa.”
Kisha Yesu anyosisi kibhoko kya muene ni kun'gusa, akajobha. “Nilonda.” Ni lisaa lelalela ukoma ukamalika.
“Akandaghisya asin'jobheli munu jhejhioha, lakini akan'jobhela, “Lotayi na ukakilasiajhi kwa makuhani na uhomesiajhi sadaka jha utakaso bhwa jhobhi, sawasawa ni khela Musa kyaakiamuiri kwa nushuhuda bhwa jhobhi.”
Lakini habari kuhusu muene sya jhenili patali zaidi ni umati mbaha bhwa bhanu ukahida pamonga kump'elekesya ifundisya ni kuponyesya matamu gha bhene.
Lakini mara kwa mara akitengili faragha ni kus'oka.
Jhatokili ligono limonga kati jha e'lu akajha ifundisya, na bhajhele Mafarisayo ni bhalimu bha sheria bhatemili apu ambabho bhahidili kuhomela fijiji fimehele tofauti mu mkoa ghwa Galilaya ni Yudea, na kabhele kuhomela mji bhwa Yerusalemu. Ngofu jha Bwana jhajhele pamonga naku kuponesya.
Bhanu kadhaa bhahidili, bhampendili mu n'keka munu jhaapoozili, na bhakalonda njela jha kunjingisya mugati eli kun'gonesya pasi mbele jha Yesu.
Bhakibhi lepi njela jha kunjhingisya mugati kwandabha jha umati, hivyo bhakwelili panani pa paa lya nyumba ni kun'selesya munu jhola pasi kupetela ku figae, panani n'keka ghwa muene pagati pa bhanu, palongolo kabisa jha Yesu.
Akajhe ilanga imani jha bhene, Yesu akajobha, “Rafiki, dhambi sya jhobhi usamehibhu.”
Bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo bhakajhanda kuhoji e'lu, bhakajobha, “Ojho ndo niani jhailongela makufuru? Niani jhaibhwesya kusamehe dhambi ila K'yara muene?”
Lakini Yesu, amanyili kiki kyabhafikirileghe, abhajibili ni kubhajobhela, “kwandabha mwikotana e'le mu mioyo ghya jhomu?
Kheleku rahisi kujobha, 'Dhambi sya jhobhi sisamehibhu' au kujobha jhemayi ugendayi?'
Lakini mumanyajhi kujha mwana ghwa Adamu ajhe ni mamlaka pa duniani gha kusamehe dhambi, Nikujobhela bhebhe, 'Jhinukayi, tolayi n'keka bhwa jhobhi na alotayi kunyumba jha jhobhi.”'
wakati bhobhuobhu akajhema mbele jha bhene ni kutola n'keka ghwa muene bhwaagonili. Kisha akabhujha kunyumba jha muene akin'tukusya K'yara.
Khila mmonga asyangele ni kun'tukusya k'yara bhamemibhu ni hofu, bhakajobha, “Tughabhwene mambo ambagho ghakawaida lepi lelu.”
Baada jha mambo agha kuhomela, Yesu abhokili okhu ni kumbona mtoza ushuru jhaakutibhweghe Lawi atamili lieneo lya kutolela kodi. Akan'jobhela, “Nikesiajhi.”
Efyo Lawi akajhema ni kun'kesiya, akaleka khila khenu kunyuma.
Kisha Lawi aandele kunyumba jha muene karamu mbaha kwandabha jha Yesu. bhajhele bhatoza ushuru bhamehele khola ni bhanu bhingi bhabhatamili pameza bhakajha bhilya pamonga nabhu.
Lakini Mafarisayo bhene bhakajhe bhakebhadadila bhanafunzi, bhakajobha, “kwandabha jha kiki mwilya ni kunywa ni bhatoza ushuru pamonga ni bhanu bhamana, bhabhajhe ni dhambi?”
Yesu akabhaji, “Bhanu bhabhajhele mu afya jhinofu bhilondelepi tabibu, bhela tu bhabhikandonda mmonga.
Nahidilepi kubhakuta bhanu bhabhajhe ni hakebhajhi kutubu, bali kubhakuta bhenye dhambi bhabhwesiajhi kutubu.”
Bakan'jobhela, “Bhanafunzi bha Yohana mara nyingi bhifunga ni kus'oka, ni bhanafunzi bha Mafarisayo bhibhomba mebhu. Lakini bhanafunzi bha jhobhi bhilya ni kunywa.”
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Jhibhwesekana munu jhejhioha akabha bhomba bhabhahudhuriri mu harusi jha Bwana harusi kufunga wakati Bwana Arusi bado ajhe pamonga nabhu?
Lakini magono ghibeta kuhida wakati Bwana Arusi pa ibeta kubhosibhwa kwa bhene, ndipo ku magono aghu bhibeta kufunga.”
Kisha Yesu alongelili kabhele kwa bhene kwa mfano. “Ajhelepi jhachatule kipandi kya nghobho kuhoma mu nghobho mpya ni kukitumila kurekebisya liguanda lya muandi. Kama abhombi naha ibeta kuhatula nghobho mpya, ni kipandi kya nghobho kuhoma liguanda lipya ngakifwayi lepi kutumika ni nghobho jha liguanda lya muandi.
Kabhele, ajhelepi munu ambajhe ibheka divai mpya mu firiba fya fichakele. Kama aketili naha divai mpya ngejhi kayuili khenu khela, ni divai ngejhijhitiki, ni firiba ngafiharibiki.
Lakini divai mpya lazima ibhekibhwayi mu firiba fipya.
Na ajhelepi munu baada jha kunywa divai jha muandi, wibetalepi kulonda mpya kwandabha bhijobha, 'Jha muandi ndo bora.”'
Henu jhatokili kusabato kwamba Yesu akajha ipeta mu mig'onda ghya nafaka ni bhanafunzi bha muene bhakajha bhijhabha masuke, bhakaghasugula kati jha mabhoko gha bhene bhakalya nafaka.
Lakini baadhi jha Mafarisayo bhakajobha, “kwandabha kiki mwibhomba khenu ambakyo halali lepi kisha na kukibhomba ligono lya sabato”?
Yesu, akabhajibu, akajobha, “Mwabhajhi lepi kusoma khele Daudi akiketili bho ajhe ni njala, muene ni bhagosi bhabhajhe pamonga nabhu?
Alotili mu nyumba jha k'yara na atolili mikate ni kulya baadhi, ni kujhihomesya baadhi bhanu bhabhajhe naku kulya, hata kama jha jhele halali kwa makuhani kulya.”
Kisha akabhajobhela, “Mwana ghwa Adamu ndo Bwana ghwa sabato.”
jhatokili mu sabato jhenge kwamba alotili mugati mu masinagogi ni kubhafundisya bhanu okhu. Pajhele ni munu ambajhe kibhoko kya kuha kyapoozili.
Bhaandishi ni Mafarisayo bhakajha bhakandanga kwa makini kulola kama ngaamponyili mu ligono lya sabato, ili bhakabhayi sababu jhe jhakun'takila kwa kubhomba likosa.
Lakini amanyili kiki kyabhifikilila ni kujobha kwa munu jhaapozili kibhoko, “Jhemayi, jhema apa pagati pa khila mmonga.” Efyo munu ajhu akajhinuka ni kujhema pala.
Yesu akajobha kwa bhene, “Nikabhakhota muenga, halali ligono lya sabato kubhomba manofu au kubhomba madhara, kuokola maisha au kughaharibu?” Kisha akabhalenga bhoha ni kun'jobhela munu jhola,
“Nyoosyajhi kibhoko kya jhobhi.” Akakheta mebhu kibhoko kya muene kyaponyisibhu.
Lakini bhamemibhu ni hasira bhakalongelesana bhane kwa bhene kuhusu kiki bhakikhetayi kwa Yesu.
Jhatokili magono aghu alotili ku kid'onda kus'oka. Ajhendelili kiru khoha kun'soka k'yara.
Bho jhifikili lukhela, abhakutili bhanafunzi bha muene ni kubhechagula kumi ni bhabhele kati jha bhene, ambabho kabhele abhakutili “mitume.”
Mahina gha bhala mitume ghajhele Simoni (ambajhe kabhele an'kutili Petro) na Andrea munu, Yakobo, Yohana, Filipo, Bartolomayo,
Mathayo, Tomaso na Yakobo mwana ghwa Alfayo, Simoni, ambajhe akutibhu Zelote,
Yuda mwana ghwa Yakobo ni Yuda Iskariote, ambajhe ajhele msaliti.
Kisha Yesu akaselela pamonga nabhu kuhoma ku kid'onda ni kujhema mahali tambarare. Idadi mbaha jha bhanafunzi bha muene bhajhele okhu, pamonga ni idadi mbaha jha bhanu kuhoma Uyahudi ni Yerusalemu, ni kuhoma pwani jha Tiro ni Sidoni.
Bhahidili kumpelekesya ni kuponyisibhwa matamu gha bhene. Bhanu bhabhasumbuli bhweghe ni pepo bhachafu bhaponyisibhu pia.
Khila mmonga pa kusanyiku e'lu ajaribu kun'gusa kwandabha nghofu sya uponyajhi syajhele sihomela mwa muene, na abhaponyisi bhoha.
Kisha akabhalanga bhanafunzi bha muene, ni kujobha, “Mbarikibhu muenga mwe maskini, kwandabha ufalme bhwa K'yara ndo bhwa jhomu.
Mbarikibhu muenga jhe mujhele ni njala henu kwa ndabha mwibeta kushibishibhwa. Mbarikibhu muenga jha mwilela henu kwandabha mwibeta kuheka.
Mbarikibhu muenga ambabho bhanu pabhibeta kubhachukila ni kubhatenga ni kubhashutumu muenga kwamba ndo bhaovu, kwandabha jha mwana ghwa Adamu.
Muhobhokajhi ligono e'lu ni kurukaruka kwa furaha, kwandabha hakika mwibeta kujha ni thawabu mbaha kumbinguni kwandabha bhadadi jhabhi bhabhabhombili mebhu manabii.
Lakini o'le bhinu bhamujhe mataji! kwandabha mumalikukabha farajha jha jhomu.
O'le bhinu bhamushibili henu! Kwa maana mwibeta kubhona njala baadaje. Ole bhinu bhe mwiheka henu! Kwandabha mwibeta kuombolesya ni kulela baadaye.
Ole bhinu, pamwibetakusifibhwa ni bhanu bhoha! kwandabha bhadadi jhabhi bhabhabhombili manabii bha udesi fefuefu.
Lakini nijobha kwa muenga jha mukanipelekesya, mubhaganayi maadui bhinu ni kukheta manofu kwa bhakabhadadila.
Mubhabarikiajhi bhala bhabhekebhalaani muenga na mubhaombelayi bhala bhala bhabhe kabhabhonela.
Jhaikutobha litama limonga, un'geuzilayi ni la pili. Kama munu akunyakili lijoho lya jhobhi usimbesi ni likanzu.
Mpelayi khila kya ikusoka. Kama munu akunyakili khenu ambakyo mali gha jhobhi, usin'soki akukerebhusilayi.
Kama mgani bhanu bhabhakhetelayi, namu mukhetayi mebhu.
Kama mwibeta kubhagana bhanu bhabhaganili muenga tu, hivyo thawabu jhelekhu kwa muenga? kwandabha hata bhenye dhambi bhabhaganili bhala bhabhaganili.
Kama mwibeta kubhakhetela manofu bhala bhabhakabhaketela muenga manofu, hiyo thawabu jheleku kwa muenga? kwandabha hata bhenye dhambi bhikheta mebhu.
Kama mwikopesya fenu kwa bhanu ambabho mwitegemela bhakabhakerusila, ejhu ndo thawabu jheleku kwa muenga? Hata bhenye dhambi bhikopesya bhenye dhambi, na bhitegemela kupokela kiasi kekuekhu kabhele.
Lakini mubhaganayi maadui bhinu na mubhakhetelayi manofu. Mubhakopesiajhi ni msihofu kuhusu kukerusibhwa, ni thawabu jha muenga jhibeta kujha mbaha. Mwibetakujha bhana bha ajhe kunani, kwandabha muene ndo mwema na mwema kwa bhanu bhabhaduli shukrani ni bhaovu.
Mujhelayi ni huruma, kama Dadi jhinu kyaajhe ni huruma.
Msihukumu, namu mwibeta kuhukumibhwa. Musilaani, namu mwibetalepi laanibhwa. mubhasameheajhi bhamana, namu mwibeta kusamehebhwa.
Mubhapelayi bhangi, namu mwibeta kupelibhwa. Kiasi kya ukarimu - kyakishindilibhu, kusukibhwa ni kujhitika - kibeta kujhitika pa magoti gha jhomu. Kwandabha jha kup'emu kyokyoha kyamwitumila kupemela, kip'emu ekhu kibetakutumika kubhap'emela muenga.”
Kisha akabhajobhela mfano kabhele. “Je, munu kipofu ibhwesya kundongosya munu jhongi kipofu? Kama kyaajhele efu, basi bhoha bhibetakudumbukila mu lilende, je bhidumbukila lepi?
Mwanafunzi ijha lepi mbaha kuliko mwalimu ghwa muene lakini khila munu akafundisibhwayi kwa ukamilifu ijha kama mwalimu ghwa muene.
Na kwandajha kiki basi ukakilanga kibanzi mu lihu lya ndongobhu na wakati riboriti lijhe mu lihu lya jhobhi ukalibhona lepi?
Wabhwesya bhuli kun'jobhela ndongobhu, 'Ndongo, nis'oka nikubhosiajhi kibanzi kyekijhele mu lihu lya bhebhe,' nabhi wilange lepi liboriti lyalijhele mu lihu lya jhobhi? Mnafiki bhebhe! kwanza libhosyajhe boriti mu lihu lya bhebhe, ndipo wibeta kulola kinofu kibanzi mu lihu lya ndongobhu.
Kwandabha lijhelepi libehe linofu lyalihogola matunda mabaya, wala lijhelepi libehe libaya lihogola matunda manofu.
Kwandabha khila limanyikana kwa matunda ghaki. Kwandabha bhanu bhijhabha lepi tini kuhoma mu mifwa, wala bhijhabha lepi tini kuhoma mu mifwa, wala bhijhabha lepi zabibu kuhoma mu michongoma.
Munu mwema katika hazina jha muene mu muoyo bhwake ipisya ghaghajhele mabovu. kwandabha kinywa kya muene ijobha ghala ghaghakaumemesya muoyo ghwa muene.
Kwanda jha kiki mkanikuta, 'Bwana, Bwana', na bado mkaghabhomba lepi ghala ghanijobha?
Khila munu jhaihida kwa nene ni kughap'eleka malobhi ghangu ni kughatendela mbombo, nibeta kubhalasya kya ajhele.
Iwaningana ni munu jhaijenga nyumba jha muene, ambajhe igima pasi sana, ni kujenga msingi bhwa nyumba panani pa mwamba imara. Mafuriko bho ghahidili, mahemu gha masi ghajhitobhili nyumba, lakini ghabhwesilepi kujhihugusya, kwa ndabha jhajengibhu kinofu.
Lakini jhejhioha jhe ep'eleka lilobhi lyangu na alitii lepi; mfano bhuake ndo munu jhaajengili nyumba panani pa ardhi bila msingi, kiholo bho kiselili lwa nghofu, nyumba jhela jhakabhili maangamizi mabhaha.
Baada jha Yesu kumala khila khenu kya ajobheghe kwa bhanu bhabhamp'elekisieghe, akajhingila Kapernaumu.
Mtumwa fulani ghwa akida, jhaajhe ghwa thamani sana kwa muene, ajhen'tamu sana na ajhele karibu kufwa.
Lakini bho ap'eliki kuhusu Yesu, jhola Akahida andaghisi ndongosi ghwa kiyahudi kun'soka ahidayi kumwokola mtumwa ghwa muene ili asifi.
Bhobhafikiri karibu ni Yesu, bhan'sihili kwa bidii ni kujobha, “akestahili kwamba ghwilondeka kubhomba naha kwandabha jha muene,
Kwandabha aliganili litaifa lya tete, na ndo jhaajengili lisinagogi kwandabha jha tete”.
Yesu akajhendelela ni safari jha muene pamonga nabhu. Lakini kabla jha kulota patali ni nyumba, afisa mmonga abhalaghisi marafiki zake kulongela naku. “Bwana, usikitondesi ghwe muene kwandabha nene nilondeka lepi bhebhe kujhingila mu dari jhangu.
Kwandabha ejhe nafikiririlepi hata nene nemwene kujha nilondeka kuhida kwa bhebhe, lakini jobhayi lilobhi tu ni mtumishi ghwa nene ibeta kupona.
Kwani ni nene ne munu jha nibhekhibhwa mu mamlaka na nijhe ni askari chini jha nene. Wijobha kwa ojho “Lotayi” na ilota, nikwajhongi, “Hidayi” ni muene ihida, ni kwa mtumishi ghwa nene 'bhomba ekhe', ni muene ibhomba”.
Yesu bhoapeliki agha ashangele, ni kubhageukila makutano bhabhan'kesieghe ni kujobha. “Nikabhajobhela hata mu Israeli, nibhwayilepi kubhona munu mwenye imani kama ejho.
Kisha bhala bhabhalaghisibhu bhakherebhuiki kunyumba ni kun'kolela mtumishi amalikupona.
fulani baada jha agha, jhatokili kujha Yesu ajhe isafiri kulota mji bhwabhukutibhweghe Naini. Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakalota pamonga nabhu bhakaambatana ni umati bhwa bhanu.
Bhoafikiri karibu ni lango lya jiji langayi, munu jhaafwili ajhele ap'endibhu, na ndo muana ghwa pekee kwa nyinamunu jhaajhe mjane, ni umati bhwa bhawakilishi kuhoma mu jiji bhajhele pamonga nakhu.
Bho ambwene, Bwana akan'hegelela kwa huruma mbaha sana juu jha muene ni kun'jobhela, “Usileli”.
Kisha akahegelela palongolo akaligusa lijeneza ambalyo bhap'endili mb'ele, na bhala bhabhap'endili bhakajhema akajobha “N'songolo nijobha jhumukayi”
Mfu akajhinuka ni kutama pasi ni kujhanda kulongela. Kisha Yesu akan'kabidhi kwa nyinamunu.
Kisha hofu ikabhamema bhoha. Bhakajhendelela kun'tukusya k'yara bhakajobha “Nabii mbaha ajhinulibhu miongoni mwa jhotu” ni “k'yara abhalangili bhanu bha muene”
Ese habari sinofu sya Yesu syajhenili Yudea jhioha ni mikoa ghioha ghya jirani.
Bhanafunzi bha Yohana bhakan'jobhili mambo agha ghoha.
Ndipo Yohana akabhakuta bhabhele bha bhanafunzi bha muene ni kubhalaghisya kwa Bwana kujobha “Bhebhe ndo jhola jhaihida, au ajhe munu jhongi tundendelelajhi?
Bhobhafikiri karibu ni Yesu abha bhakajobha, “Yohana mbatizaji atulaghisi kwa bhebhe kujobha, 'Bhebhe ndo jhola jhaihida au ajhe jhongi tundendelelajhi?”
Kwa wakati obho abhaponyisi bhanu bhingi bhenye matamu ni malombosi, kuhoma kwa roho bhachafu ni kwa bhanu bhenye upofu wabhapelili kulanga.
Yesu ajibili ni kujobha kwa bhene. “Baada jha kujha mlotili kwa muhomili mwibeta kumjulisha Yohana kya mukibhwene ni kup'eleka. Bhenye upofu bhipokela kulola ni fiwete bhibeta kugenda, bhenye ukoma bhitakasika viziwi bhibeta kup'eleka, bhafu bhifufulibhwa ni kujha hai kabhele, masikini bhijobhibhwa habari jhinofu.
Na munu jhaibeta kuleka lepi kuniamini nene kwa matendo ghangu abarikibhu”.
Baada jha bhala bhabhalaghisibhu ni Yohana kukerebhuka kwa bhahomili, Yesu akajhanda kujobha kwa makutano juu jha Yohana, “Mwalotili kwibhala kulanga kiki, litasi likajha lihugunisibhwa ni mp'ongo?
Lakini Mwalotili kwibhala kulola kiki, munu jhaafwalili kinofu? Langajhi bhanu bhala bhabhifuala maguanda gha kifalme ni kuishi maisha gha starehe bhajhe mu nafasi sya bhafalme.
Lakini mwilota kwibhala kulola kiki, Nabii? Ndio, nijobha kwa muenga ni zaidi sana kuliko nabii.
Ojho ndo jhaajhandikibhu, “Langayi, nikandaghisya mjumbe ghwa nene palongolo pa mihu gha jhomu, jhaibeta kujhandala njela kwandabha jha nene,
Nijobha kwa muenga, kati jha bhala bhabhahogoliki ni n'dala, ajhelepi mbaha kama Yohana, lakini munu jha ajhele muhimu lepi sana jhaibeta kuishi ni K'yara mahali pa ajhele muene, ibeta kujha mbaha kuliko Yohana.”
Ni bhanu bhobhap'eliki agha pamonga ni bhatoza ushuru, bhatangasisi kujha k'yara ndo ajhe ni huruma ni haki. Bhajhele kati jha bhene bhala bhabhabatisibhu kwa ubatizo bhwa Yohana.
Lakini Mafarisayo ni bhataaalamu bha sheria sya kiyahudi, ambabho bhabatisibhulepi ni muene bhabelili hekima sya k'yara kwandabha jha bhene.
Kabhele nibhwesya kubhalenganisya ni. kiki bhanu bha kizazi ekhe? bhajhe bhuli hasai?
Bhiwaningana ni bhana bhabhikina maeneo gha soko, bhabhitama ni kukutana mmonga baada jha jhongi bhijobha, 'Tukobhili filimbi kwandabha jha muenga na mwakinilepi. Tuombolisi na mulelilepi.'
Yohana mbatizaji ahidili alilepi n'kate wala kunywa divai, na mwajobhili “Ajheni pepo.
Mwana ghwa munu ahidili alili ni kunywa na mwajobhili, “Langayi ndo mlafi na ndefi, rafiki ghwa bhatoza ushuru ni bhenye dhambi!
Lakini hekima itambuliki kujhe ijhe ni haki kwa bhana munu bhoha”
Mmonga ghwa Mafarisayo ans'okili Yesu alotayi kulya pamonga ni muene. Baada jha Yesu kujhingila mu nyumba jha farisayo, ajheghemili mu meza ili aliayi.
Langayi kwajhele ni n'dala mmonga katika jiji e'lu jhaajhe ni dhambi. Agunduili kujha atamili kwa farisayo, akaleta chupa jha manukato.
Ajhemili kunyuma jha muene karibu ni magolo gha muene khoni ilela. Kabhele ajhandili kulobhanisya magolo gha muene kwa mahosi, ni kujhifuta kwa niwili sya mutu bhwa muene akaibusu magolo gha muene ni kujhibaka manukato.
Ni jhola Farisayo jhaamwaliki Yesu bho abhuene naha, akawasya muene akajobha, “Kama munu ojho ngaajhe nabii, ngaamanyi ojho niani na ni aina jheleku jha n'dala jhaikan'gusa, jhakujha mwenye dhambi.
Yesu ajibili ni kujobha, “Simoni nijhe ni khenu kyakijobhela.”akajobha” “kijobha tu Mwalimu!”
Yesu akajobha “kwajhele ni bhaefaiwa bhabhele kwa mkopeshaji mmonga. Mmonga akabha wa idaibhwa dinari Mia tano ni bhwa pili adaibhu dinari hamsini.
Na bhobhajhelapi ni hela jha kundapa akabha samehe bhoha. Henu nieni jha ibeta kurigana zaidi?
Simoni ajibilili ni kujobha, “Nidhani jha asamehibhu nesu.” Yesu akanijobhla, “Uhukumuili kwa usahihi.”
Yesu akanigeukila n'dala ni kujobha kwa Simoni, “Umbwene n'dala ojho. Nijhingili munyumba jha jhobh. Unipelihitapi masi kwandabha jha magolo gha nene, lakini ojho, kwa mahosi gha muene alobhani si magolo gha nene ni kuifuta kwa njuili sya muene.
Wanibusuililepi, lakini muene, tangia ajhingili o'mo alekilepi kunibusu magola gha nene.
Gwa jhibaki lepi magolo gha need nene mafuta, lakini ajhibakili magolo gha nene kwa manukato.
Kwa lijambo ele, nikujobhela kujha ni dhambi semehele na asamehibhu nesu, na kabhele aganili nesu. Lakini jha asamehibhu kidebe, igana kidebe tu.”
Baadajhe akan'jobhela n'dala, “Dhambi sya bhebhe simalikusamehebhwa”
Bhala bhabhatamili pameza pamonga ni muene bhakajhanda kujobhesana bhene kwa bhene, “Ojho niani mpaka isamehe dhambi?”
Ni Yesu akan'jobhela n'dala, “Imani jha jhobhi jhikuokwili. Lotayi kwa amani”
Jhatokili muda mfupi baada jha kwamba Yesu ajhandili kusafiri mu miji ni jiji mbalimbali, akihubiri ni kutangasya habari sinofu sya ufalme bhwa K'yara ni bhala kumi ni bhabhele bhalotili pamonga nakhu,
khelakhela, bhadala fulani bhabhaponyisibhu kuhoma kwa roho bhachafu ni matamu mbalimbali. Bhajhele ndo Mariamu jhaakutibhu Magdalena ambajhe ajhele abhosibhu mapepo saba.
Yohana ndala ghwa Kuza ni meneja ghwa Herode, Susana, ni bhadala bhangi bhingi, bhabhapisili mali jha muene Kwandabha jha bhene.
Ni baada jha umati bhwa bhanu kubhonganika pamonga bhakajha ni bhanu bha bhahideghe kwa muene kuhoma miji mbalimbali, akalongela nabhu kwa kutumila mifuanu. “
Mpandaji akalota kupanda mbeyu, bho apandili, baadhi sya mbeyu e'su sya binili kando jha jhela syakanyibhu pasi pa magolo, ni fidege fya angani fyalili.
Mbeyu senge syabinili panani pa udongo bhwa miamba na bho simelili ni kujha miche bho sibholili kwa ndabha jha kutokujha ni unyevunyevu.
Mbeyu s'enge syabinili mu mumabehe gha mifwa, ni ejhu mabehe ghya mifwa ghyakholili pamonga ni mifwa ghela ni mbeyu syasongibhu.
Lakini mbeyu s'enge syabinili mu udongo bhwawilondeka na syahoguili mazao mara mia nesu. “Baada jha Yesu kujobha mambo agha akwesi sauti, “Jhejhioha jha ajhe ni mb'olokoto na ap'elekayi.”
Kabhele bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'kota ndabha jha mfano obhu,
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Mupelibhu upendeleo bhwa kumanya siri jha ufalme bhwa K'yara, lakini bhanu bhamana bhibetakufundisibhwa tu kwa mifuano, ili kwamba 'bhakabhonayi bhasibhone na bhakap'elekayi bhasichelibhwi.'
Na ejhe ndo maana jha mfano obho. Mbeyu ndo lilobhi lya K'yara.
Mbeyu s'ele syasabinili kando jha njela ndo bhanu bhabhip'eleka litobhi, ni baadaye mwovu shetani akalilota patali mu mioyo, ili kwamba bhasiamini ni kuokolibhwa.
Kisha ni s'ela syasibinili mu muamba ndo bhanu bhala bhabhip'oleka lilobhi ni kulipokela kwa furaha lakini bhajhelepi ni mizizi gheghioha, bhiamini ku kwa muda mfupi, ni wakati bhwa majaribu bhibina.
