Ni ligono lya pili lyake umati mbaha bhahidili ku sikukuu. Bho bhap'eliki Yesu ihida Yerusalemu,
bhakalota matawi gha mabhehe gha mitende ni kuhoma kwibhala kulota kumlaki ni kujhuegha, “Hosana! Abarikibhu muene jha ihida kwa lihina lya Bwana, Mfalme ghwa Israeli.”
Yesu an'kabhili mwana-punda akakuela; kama vile kyajhalembibhu,
“Usitili, binti Sayuni; langayi, Mfalme ghwa jhobhi ihida, akwelili mwana-punda.”
Bhanafunzi bha muene bhaghajhelibhu lepi mambo agha hapo hoti; lakini Yesu bho atukusibhu, ndipo bhakhombuiki jha kujha mambo agha alembibhu muene ni kwamba bhabhombili mambo agha kwa muene.
Basi likundi lele lya bhanu bhabhajhele pamonga ni Yesu wakati an'kutili Lazaro kuhomela mu likaburi, bhakashuhudila kwa bhangi.
Na jhajhele kwa ndabha ejhe kwamba likundi lya bhanu bhalotili kumlaki kwa ndabha bhap'eliki jha kujha ajhibhombili ishara ejhu.
Mafarisayo bhakajobhesana bhene kwa bhene, “Langayi, henu mwibhwesya lepi kubhomba kyokyoha; langayi, ulimwengu ulolili kwa muene.”
Henu baadhi jha Bhayunani bhajhele miongoni mwa bhala bhabhajhele bhilota kuabudu ku sikukuu.
Abha bhandotili Filipo, ambajhe ahomili Bethsaida jha Galilaya, bhakans'oka bhakajobha, “Bwana, tete twilonda kumbona Yesu.”
Filipo akalota akan'jobhela Andrea; Andrea ni Filipo bhakalota ni kun'jobhela Yesu.
Yesu akabhajibu akajobha, “Saa jhifikiri kwa ndabha jha Muana ghwa Adamu kutukusibhwa.
Aminiayi, aminiayi, nikabhajobhela chembe jha ngano jhikabelayi kubina palifu jhikafwa, jhitama mebhwa jhiene; bali jhikafuayi jhihogola matunda mingi.
Jhaabhuganili uhai bhwa muene ibetakubhujhasya; bali jhaabhudadili uhai bhwa muene pa uloimwengu obho ibetakubhusalimisya hata uzima bhwa milele.
Munu jhejhioha jhaibetakunitumikila nene, na anikesiajhi; nani pa nijhele ndipo ni n'tumishi ghwangu paibetakujha. Munu jhejhioha jhaibetakunitumikila, Dadi ibetakun'heshi.
Henu roho jha nene ifadhaiki: nani nijobhabhuli? Dadi, uniokolayi katika lisaa e'le? Lakini kwa kusudi e'le nijhifikili lisaa e'le.
Dadi, ulitukusiajhi lihina lya jhobhi.” Kisha sauti ikahida kuh'omela kumbinguni ni kujobha, “Nilitukuisi nani nibetakulitukusya kabhele.”
Basi n'kutano ghwajhemili palubhafu pa muene bhap'eliki, bhakajobha kujha kujhe ni ngurumo. Bhangi bhakajobha, “Malaika ajobhi naku.”
Yesu akajibu ni kujobha, “Sauti ejhe jhikahidi lepi kwa ndabha jha nene, bali kwandabha jha muenga.
Henu hukumu jha ulimwengu obhu jhijhele: Henu mbaha ghwa ulimwengu obhu isopibhwa kwibhala.
Ni nene panibetakujhinulibhwa panani pa nchi, nibetakubhatafuta bhoha kwa nene.”
Aghajobhili aghu kulasya kujha mauti gani gha ibetakufwa.
Mkutano bhukan'jibu, “Tete tup'eliki ku sheria kujha Kristu ibetakutamisya hata milele. Ni bhe ghwijobhuli, 'Mwana ghwa Adamu lazima ajhinulibhwayi kunani'? Ojho Muana ghwa Munu niani?”
Basi Yesu akabhajobhela, “Nuru jhijhepamonga namu muda kidogo. Mulotayi kwa kujha mujhe ni nuru, ili kwamba ngisi jhisibhabhwesi. Jhailota ku ngisi amanyilepi kwa ilota.
Mujhe ni nuru mujhiaminiajhi nuru ejhu ili mukabhayi kujha bhana bha nuru.” Yesu ajobhili aghu ni kisha akabhoka akakifigha bhasimboni.
Ingabhwa Yesu abhombili ishara simehele namna ejhu mbele jha bhene, bado bhabelikumwamini
ili litimilayi lilobhi lya nabii Isaya, lyaalijobhili: “Bwana, niani jhaasisadiki habari sya tete? Ni kibhoko kya Bwana afunulibhu niani?”
Ndio sababu bhene bhabeli kun'kiera, ndabha Isaya ajobhi kabhele,
“Abhapofuisi mihu, ni kujhibhomba minonono mioyo jha bhene; bhasihidi bhakalota kwa mihu gha bhene ni kumanya kwa mioyo ghya bhene, ni kuongoka nani kubhaponyesya.”
Isaya ajobhili malobhi agha kwa kujha aubhwene utukufu bhwa Yesu ni kujobha habari sya muene.
Bhalakini, hata bhabhaha bhingi bhan'kyeriri Yesu; lakini kwa ndabha jha Mafarisayo, bhakiririlepi ili bhasihidi kutengibhwa ni sinagogi.
Bhaganili sifa sya bhanadamu kuliko sifa syasihomela kwa K'yara.
Yesu akakuesya sauti ni kujobha, “Jhaibetakuniamini, akaniamini nene tu bali ni muene jhaanitumili nene,
ni jhaibetakunibhona nene ibetakumbona muene jha anilaghisi.
Nene nihidili kama nuru pa ulimwengu ili khila munu aniaminiayi nene asitami mu ngisi.
Ikajhelayi munu jhejhioha ibetakughap'eleka malobhi ghangu lakini akaghakamula lepi, nene nikan'hukumu lepi; ndabha nahidilepi ili kuhukumu ulimwengu bali nibhuokolayi ulimwengu.
Jhaibetakunibela nene ni kughabela malobhi ghangu ajhele jhaibetakun'hukumu: lilobhi e'lu lyanilijobhili ndo lyalibetakun'hukumu ligono lya mwishu.
Ndabha nene najobhilepi kwa nafsi jha nene tu. Bali Dadi jha anipeliki, muene angaghisi ghaibetakujobha ni kughapanga.
Nani nimanyili kujha lilaghisu lya muene ni bhusima bhwa milele; basi aghu ndo ghanijobha nene - kama Dadi kyaanijobhili, ndo kyanibeta kujobha kwa bhene.”
Henu kabla ya ligono lya sikukuu jha pasaka, kwa ndabha Yesu amanyili kujha saa jha muene jhifikili ambajho ibetakuhoma mu dunia ejhe kulota kwa dadi, ikajha bhajhele pa dunia, abhaganili upeo.
Ni ibilisi ajhele abhekibhu tayari mu muoyo ghwa Yuda Iskariote, mwana ghwa simoni, kun'saliti Yesu.
Yesu amanyili kujha dadi abhekili fenu fyoha mu mabhoko gha muene ni kwamba ahomili kwa K'yara na ajhele ilotakabhele kwa K'yara.
Ajhemili pa kulya ni kutandika liguanda lya muene kwibhala. Kisha akalota litaulo ni kwik'onga muene.
Kisha akabheka masi mu bakuli ni kujhanda kubhasuka magolo bhanafunzi bha muene ni kubhafuta ni litaulo ambalyo akikongili muene.
Akahida kwa Simoni Petro, ni Petro akan'jobhela, “Bwana, ghwilonda kunisambisya magolo ghangu?”
Yesu akajibu ni kubhajobhela, “Lyanibhomba ulimanyilepi henu, lakini wibetakumanya baadaye.”
Petro akan'jobhela, “Wibetalepi kunisambisya magolo gha nene kamwe.” Yesu ajibili, “Ikajhelayi nibetalepi kusambisya wibetalepi kujha ni sehemu pamonga ni nene.”
Simoni Petro akan'jobhela, “Bwana, usinisambisi magolo ghangu tu, bali pia ni mabhoko ni mutu bhwangu.”
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Jhejhioha jha amalili kujhogha ilondeka lepi kujhogha isipokujha magolo gha muene, na ajhele kinofu mb'ele ghwa muene bhwoha; muenga mujhele mwe bhanofu lakini sio mwe bhoha.”
Kwa kujha Yesu amanyili jhola jhaibetakun'saliti; ejhe ndo sababu ajobhili, mwebhoha lepi jha mujhele kinofu.”
Wakati Yesu bho abhasambisi magolo gha bhene ni kutola livazi lya muene ni kutama kabhele, abhajobhili, “Je Mwijhelebhwa khela ambakyo nibhabhombili?
Mukanikuta nene “Mwalimu” ni Bwana ejhe mwijobha bhukweli, ndabha ndo kya nijhele.
Ikajhelayi nene Bwana ni Mwalimu, nibhasambisi magolo gha jhomu, namu kabhele jhikabhalondeka kubhasanbisya bhajhinyu magolo.
Kwa kujha nibhapelili mifuano ili kujha muenga mubhombayi kama nene kyanibhombili kwa muenga.
Aminiayi, Aminiayi, nikabhajobhela n'tumwa mbaha lepi kuliko bwana ghwa muene; wala jhola jha atumibhu mbaha kuliko jha antumili.
Ikajhiajhi umanyili mambo agha, ubarikibhu ukaghabhomba.
Nijobha lepi kuhusu muenga mwebhoha, kwa kujha nibhamanyili bhala ambabho ni bhachaguili - bali nijobha agha ili kwamba majhandiku ghabhwesyajhi kutimilizwa: 'Muene jha ilya nkate ghwangu, an'jhinulili kisigino kya muene.'
Nikabhajobhela ele henu kabla kyakona kuh'omela ili kwamba palibeta kuhomela, mubhwesyayi kukiera kujha nene NDO NE MUENE.
Aminiayi, aminiayi, nikabhajobhela, jhaikanipokela nene akampokela jhola jha anilaghisye nene.”
Wakati Yesu ajobhili agha, asumbuiki mu roho, ashuhudili ni kujobha, “Aminiayi, aminiayi, nikabhajobhela kujha mmonga bhinu ibetakunisaliti.”
Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakalolesana, bhakashangala kwandabha jha niani ajobhili.”
Pajhele pameza mmonga ghwa bhanafunzi bha muene ajhegheme pakifua kya Yesu jhola ambajhe Yesu an'ganili.
Simoni Petro akan'kota mwanafunzi ojho ni kujobha, “Tujobhilayi jholeku kwa muene ilongela.”
Mwanafunzi jhola jha ajhegheme pa kifua kya Yesu ni kun'jobhela, “Bwana, ndo niani?”
Kisha Yesu ajibili, “Ni kwa jhola ambajhe nibetakujhina kipandi kya n'kate ni kumpela.” Naha bho ajhinili n'kate, ampelili Yuda mwana ghwa Simoni Iskariote.
Ni baada jha n'kate, lisyetani lyan'jhingili. Kisha Yesu akan'jobhela, “Khela kya ghwilonda kukibhona ukibhombojhi manyata.”
Henu ajhelepi munu pameza amanyili ndabha jha Yesu kujobha lijambo e'le kwa muene.
Baadhi jha bhene bhadhanileghe kujha, kwandabha Yuda akamuili mfuku ghwa hela, Yesu an'jobhili, “Golayi fenu fyatwilonda kwa ndabha jha sikukuu,” au kwamba ilondeka kupisya khenu kwa maskini.
Baada jha Yuda kupokela n'kate, ahomili kwibhala manyata; na jhajhele pakilu.
Wakati Yuda abhokili, Yesu ajobhili, “Henu mwana ghwa Adamu atukusibhu, ni K'yara atukusibhu kup'etela muene.
K'yara ibetakun'tukusya kwa muene, ni ibetakun'tukusya manyata.
Bhana bhadebe, nijhele pamonga namu patali kidogo. Mwibetakunilonda, na kama kyanibhajobhili Bhayahudi, 'Kwanilota, mwibhwesya lepi kuhida.' henu nikabhajobhela muenga, pia.
Nikabhapela amri mpya, kujha mgananayi; kama nene kyanibhaganili muenga, fefuefu namu kya mwilondeka kuganana jhomu.
Kwandabha jha e'le bhanu bhibetakumanya kujha muenga ndo bhanafunzi bha nene, ikajhiajhi bhupendo bhwa khila mmonga ni jhongi.”
Simoni Petro an'jobhili, “Bwana, wilota ndaku?” Yesu ajibili, “Mahali panilota kwa henu wibetabhwesyalepi kunikesya, lakini wibetakunikesya baadajhe.”
Petro akan'jobhela, “Bwana, kwa ndabha jhakiki ni sikukhesi hata henu? Nene nikaghabhosya maisha gha nene kwa ndabha jha bhebhe.”
Yesu ajibili, “Je wibetakubhosya maisha gha jhobhi kwa ndabha jha nene? Aminiayi aminiayi nikujobhela, kabla jha likongobhe kubheka mara tatu wibetakujha unibelili.”
“Usiruhusu muoyo ghwa jhobhi kujha mu mahangaiko. Ukan'kiera K'yara basi nikierayi ni nene.
Mu nyumba jha Dadi jhangu ghajhele makazi ghamahele gha kutama; kama ngajhijhe lepi naha nganikujobhili, kwa vile nilota kuandalila mahali kwandabha jha bhebhe.
Kama nibetakulota kubhaandalila mahali, nibetakuhida kabhele kubhakaribisya kwa nene, ili mahali pa niyele namu mujhelayi.
Mumanyili paniyele namu mujhelayi.”
Tomaso an'jobhili Yesu, “Bwana, tumanyilepi mahali pa ghwilota; Je! Twibhwesya bhuli kujhimanya njela?
Yesu an'jobhili, “Nene ndo njela, kweli, ni uzima; ajhelepi jha ibhwesya kuhida kwa Dadi bila kup'etela kwa nene.
Kama ngamu nimanyili nene, ngamumanyili ni Dadi jhangu kabhele; kubhwanjila henu nikuyendelela mumanyili na nimalili kumbona muene.”
Philipo an'jobhili Yesu, “Bwana, tulasiajhi Baba, ni naha jhibetakujha jhitutosisi.”
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Nijhelepi namu kwa mda mrefu, na bado unimanyilepi nene, Philipo? Jhejhioha jha anibhwene nene ambwene Dadi; Namna jheleku ghwijobha, 'Tulaseajhi Dadi'?
Mwikieralepi kujha nene mugati mwa Dadi, ni Dadi ajhe mugati mwa nene? Malobhi ghanijobha kwa muenga nijobhalepi kwa kusudi lya nene; badala jhiakhe, Dadi jha itama mugati mwa nene jhaibhomba mbombo jhiakhe.
Nikierayi nene, kujha nijhe mugati mwa Dadi, ni Dadi ajhele mugati mwa nene kadhalika nikierayi nene kwandabha jha mbombo jhangu hosi.
Aminiayi, aminiayi, nikabhajobhela, jhaibetakunikiera, mbombo syanibhomba nene, ibetakusibhomba ni muene pia; na ibetakusibhomba hata mbombo mbaha kwandabha nilota kwa Dadi.
Kyokyoha kya mwibetakus'oka kwa lihina lya nene, nibetakubhomba ili Dadi abhwesyayi kutukusibhwa katika Muana.
Kama mwibetakus'oka khenu kyokyoha khela kwa lihina lya nene, e'lu nibetakubhomba.
Kama nibetakunigana, mwibetakusikamula amri sya nene.
Na nibetakun'soka Dadi, Ni muene ibetakubhap'ela N'saidizi jhongi ili kujha abhwesiajhi kujha pamonga namu milele,
Roho ghwa bhuwkeli. Ulimwengu ghwibhwesya lepi kumpokela muene kwa ndabha ukambona lepi, au kummanya muene. hata naha muenga, mummanyili muene, kwani itama pamonga namu na ibetakujha mugati mwa jhomu.
Nibetalepi kubhaleka mwejhomu; Nibetakukerebhuka kwa jhomu.
Kwa lukhombi, ulimwengu wibetalepi kunibhona kabhele, lakini muenga mkanibhona, kwandabha nitama, namu mwiishi pia.
Katika ligono e'lu mwibetakumanya kujha nene nijhele mugati mwa Dadi, ni kwamba muenga mujhele mugati mwawnene, ni nene nijhele mugati mwa jhomu.
Jhejhioha jha ibetakusikamula amri sya nene ni kusikesya, ndo mmonga jhaaniganili nene; na jhaibeta kunigana nene basi ibetakuganikibhwa ni Dadi jhangu, na nibetakun'gana na nibetakwilasya ne muene kwa muene.”
Yuda (siyo Iskariote) akan'jobhela Yesu, “Bwana, Je! Kheleku kibetakuh'omela kwamba wibetakwilasya ghwe muene kwa tete na siyo kwa ulimwengu?
Yesu ajibili akan'jobhela, “Kama jhejhioha jhaaniganili, ibetakulikamula lilobhi lyangu. Dadi jhangu ibetakun'gana, na twibetakuhida kwa muene ni kubheka makao gha jhotu pamonga ni muene.
Jhejhioha jha aniganilepi nene, ikamu lepi malobhi ghangu. Lilobhi ambalyo mkalip'eleka lya nene lepi bali lya Dadi jha anilaghisye.
Nighajobhili mambo agha kwa jhomu, wakati bado niishi miongoni mwa jh'omu.
Hata naha, Mfariji, Roho Mtakatifu, ambajhe Dadi ibetakundaghisya kwa lihina lya nene, ibetakubhamanyisya mambo ghoha ni kubhabhomba mkhomb'okayi ghoha ambagho maghajobhili kwa jhomu.
Amani nikabhap'ela amani jha nene kwa muenga. Nikabhap'ela lepi kama ulimwengu kyawipisya. Musijhibhombi mioyo jha muenge kujha ni mahangaiko, ni bhuogha.
Mwap'eliki kya nabhajobhili, 'Nibetakwilotela, na nibetakukerebhuka kwa jhomu.' Kama ngamuniganilli nene, ngamuhobhuiki kwandabha nilota kwa Dadi, kwa ndabha Dadi ndo mbaha kuliko nene.
Henu nimalikubhajobhela kabla jhakhona kuh'omela ili kwamba wakati ikahomelayi mubhwesyayi kukiera.
Nibetalepi kulongela namu malobhi mingi, kwa kujha mbaha ghwa dunia ejhe ihida. Muene ajhelepi ni nghofu juu jha nene,
lakini ili kwamba ulimwengu ukabhayi kumanya kujha nin'ganili Dadi, nibhomba ambakyo Dadi anilaghisi, kama vile kyaanipelili amri. Mujhinukayi, na mubhokayi mahali apa.
Nene na mzabibu ghwa bhukweli, ni dadi jhangu ndo n'kulima ghwa mizabibu.
Kila litafi mugati mwa nene ambalyo lihogola lepi litunda libhosibhwa ili libhwesiyi kuhogola zaidi.
Muenga tayari mujhele mwebhanofu kwandabha jha bhujumbe ambabho ni bhajobhili.
Mtamayi mgati mwa nene ni nene mwa muenga. Kama litafi kyalibhwesyalepi kuhogola lyene palibelikujha mu mzabibu, kadhalika namu, mkabelayi kutama mwanene.
Nene na mzabibu; muenga matafi. Jhaibetakudumu mugati mwa nene nani nibetakujha mwa muene, munu ojho ihogola matunda mini, kwa kujha pasipo nene wibhwesyalepi kubhomba khenu kyokyoha khela.
Ikajhiajhi munu jhejhioha ibetalepi kusalila mugati mwa nene ibetakutaghibhwa kama litafi ni kujhoma; bhanu bhibhonganya matafi ni kutagha mu muoto, ni kuteketela.
Ikajhiayi mwibetakudumu mugati mwa nene, ni kama malobhi ghangu ghatamisyi mwa muenga, mus'okayi lyolyoha lya mwilonda namu mwibetakubhombibhwa.
Katika e'le Dadi jhangu atukusibhu, kwamba mwihogola matunda mingi ni kwamba bhanafunzi bhanene.
Kama dadijhangu kya aniganili nene, nani pia nibhaganili muenga; mudumumuayi mu lipendo lyangu.
Ikajhiajhi mwibeta kusikamula amri sya nene, mwibeta kutamisya mu lipendo lya muene.
Nijobhili mambo agha kwa muenga ili furaha jha nene jhijhelayi mugati mwa muenga ili kwamba furaha jha muenga jhibhombekayi kujha timilifu.
Ejhe ndo amri jha nene, kwamba mgananayi jhomu kwa jhomu kama kyanibhaganili nene.
Ajhelepi munu jha ajhe ni bhupendo mbaha kuliko obho, kujha aghapisiayi maisha gha muene kwandabha jha bhalongomunu.
Muenga bhalongobhangu kama mwibetakubhomba ghala ghanibhalaghisi.
Nikabhakuta lepi bhatumwa, kwa kujha n'tumwa amanyilepi khela kyaibhomba bwana ghwa muene. Nibhakutili muenga marafiki, kwa ndabha nibhajobhili muenga mambo ghoha ambagho ni ghap'eliki kuhomela kwa Dadi.
Mwanichuguili lepi nene, bali nene nabhachaguili muenga ni kubhabheka mlotayi kuhogola matunda ni litunda lya muega libhwesyayi kutama. E'le lijhele naha ili kyamwis'oka kwa Dadi kwa lihina lya nene, ibetakubhapela.
Mambo agha nikabhalaghisya, kujha mgananayi khila munu ni njhinu.
Kamam ulimwengu ghwibetakubhadadila, mmanyayi kujha bhwanidadila nene kabla jha kubhadadila muenga.
Kama ngamujhele bha ulimwengu, ulimwengu gha ubhaganili kama ghwa bhene; Lakini kwa ndabha bhaulimwengu lepi na kwa ndabha nabhachaguili kuh'omela ku ulimwengu, kwandabha ejhe ulimwengu ukabhachukila.
Mkhombokayi lilobhi lya nabhajobhili, 'N'tumwa mbaha lepi kuliko bwana ghwa muene.' Ikajhelayi bhanitesisi nene, bhibetakubhatesya ni muenga pia; kama bhakamuili lilobhi lya nene, ngabhalikamuili lya jhomu pia.
Bhibetakubhabhombela mbombo agha ghoha kwandabha jha lihina lya nene, kwa ndabha bhammanyilepi jhola jhaanilaghisi.
Kama nganihidilepi ni kubhajobhela, ngabhajhelepi bhabhomba dhambi; lakini henu bhajhelepi ni udhuru kwa dhambi sya bhene.
Jhaakanida dila nene akan'dadila ni Dadi pia.
Ikajhiajhi nibhombilepi mbombo miongoni mwa bhene ambayo ajhelepi hata mmonga jha ajhibhombili, ngabhajhele bhaduli dhambi; lakini henu bhabhombili ghoha mabhele bhabhuene na bhanidadili nene ni Dadi jhangu.
E'le lihomlea ili lilobhi litimilayi ambalyo lilembibhu mu sheria sya bhene: 'Bhakanidadila nene bila sababu.'
Wakati mfariji ahidili, ambajhe nikandaghisya kwa muenga kuhomela kwa Dadi, ojho ndo, Roho ghwa kweli, ambajhe ihomela kwa Dadi, ibetakunishuhudila.
Namu pia mwibetakunishuhudila kwa ndabha nijhele pamonga nani kuhomela kubhwandelu.
Nibhajobhili mambo agha ili msibhwesi kukwazibhwa.
Bhibeta kubhapisya kwibhala mu masinagogi; hakika saa jhihida ambajho khila jha ibetakubhakhoma ibetakufikiri ibhomba mbombo jhinofu kwa ndabah jha K'yara.
Bhibetakubhabhombela mambo agha kwa ndabha bhammanyilepi Dadi wala bhanimanyilepi nene.
Nibhajobhili mambo agha ili kwamba wakati ukafikayi ghwa agha kutokela, mwibhwesya kughakhomboka na jinsi kyanibhajobhili mubhwesiajhi bhene. Nabhajobhilepi kuhusu mambo agha kuh'omela kubhwandelu kwa ndabha najhele pamonga namu.
Japokujha, henu nilota kwa jhola jhaanilaghisi; lakini ajhelepi kati jha muenga jha akanikota, “Wilotandakhu?”
Kwa ndabha nijobhili malobhi agha kwa muenga, huzuni imemili mu mioyo jha jhomu.
Hata naha, nikabhajobhela ukweli: ni vyema kwa muenga nikabhokayi; kwa ndabha nikabelakubhoka, mfariji ibetalepi kuhida kwa muenga; lakini nikalotayi nibetakundaghisya kwa muenga.
Akahidayi, mfariji ojhu ibetakuubitisha ulimwengu kuhusiana ni dhambi, kuhusiana ni haki na kuhusiana ni hukumu.
Kuhusiana ni dhambi, kwa ndabha bhabelikunikiera nene,
kuhusiana ni haki, kwa ndabha nilota kwa dadi, na mwibetalepi kunibhona kabhele'
ni kuhusiana ni hukumu kwa ndabha mbaha ghwa ulimwengu obho ahukumibhu.
Nijhenaku mingi gha kubhajobhela, lakini mwibetalepi kughatekelesya henu.
Lakini, muene, Roho ghwa kweli, akahidayi, ibetakubhalongosya mu bhukweli ghoha; kwa kujha ibetalepi kulongela kwa ndabha jha muene; lakini ghoha ghaibetakughap'eleka, ibetakughajobha mambo aghu; na ibetakughadhihirisha kwa jhomu mambo agha ghaghibetakuhida.
Muene jha ibetakunitukusya nene, kwa ndabha ibetakughatola mambo ghangu ni kughatangasya kwa muenga.
Fenu fyoha fya ajhenafu Dadi ndo fya nene; henu, nijobhili kujha Roho ibetakutola mambo ghangu ni kughadhihirisha kwa muenga.
Bado muda bhufupi, mwibetalepi kunibhona kabhele; ni baada jha muda bhufupi kabhele, mwibetakunibhona.”
Baadhi jha bhanafunzi bha muene bhakajobhesana, “Kiki yaakatujobhela, “muda bhufupi, na mwibetalepi kunibhona kabhele,' na, kisha, mda bhufupi mkanibhona,' na, 'kwandabha nilota kwa Dadi?”
Henu, bhakajobha, 'Khenu kheleku kyaijobha, 'Bado mda mfupi'? Tumanyilepi kyaijobha.
Yesu abhuene bhinoghela kun'kota, ni muene akabhajobhela, “Mwikikota, mwe bhene kuhusu e'le, kyanijobhili, 'Bado mda mfupi, mwibetalepi kunibhona kabhele; na baada jha muda mfupi mwibetakunibhona'?
Aminiayi, aminiayi, nikabhajobhela, mwibetakulela ni kuombolesya, lakini ulimwengu wibetakushangilila, mwibetakujha ni huzuni lakini huzuni jha muenga ibetakugeuka kujha furaha.
N'dala ijha ni huzuni wakati paijha ni uchungu kwandabha wakati ghwa kwifungula ufikili; lakini paikifungula muana, ikhomboka lepi kabhele maumivu kwandabha jha furaha jha muene kwamba muana ahogoliki pa duniani.
Muenga mujheni huzuni henu, lakini nibetakubhabhona kabhele; ni mioyo jha jhomu ibetakuhobhoka na ajhelepi jhaibeta kubhwesya kujhibhosya furaha jha muenga.
Ligono e'le mwibetata lepi kunikota maswali. Aminiayi, Aminiayi, nikabhajobhela,
Mkas'okayi kyokyoha kwa Dadi, ibetakubhap'ela kwa lihina lya nene; musokayi, namu mwibetakupokela ili kwamba furaha jha muenga ikamilikayi.
Nilongilili ni muenga kwa lugha jha jhibelikujhelebhweka, lakini saa jhihida ambapo nibetalepi kulongela kwa lugha jhajhiyeleweka lepi, lakini badala jhiake nibetakubhajobhela waziwazi kuhusu Dadi.
Ligono e'lu mwibetakus'oka kwa lihina lya nene, na nikabhajobhela lepi kujha nibetakus'oka kwa Dadi kwa ndabha jha muenga;
Kwa kujha Dadi muene abhaganili kwandabha mniganili nene na kwandabha muniamini kujha nihomili kwa Dadi.
Nah'omili kwa Dadi na nahidili ku ulimwengu; kabhele, nibhoka ulimwenguni na nilota kwa Dadi”.
Bhanafunzi bha muene bhakan'jobhela, “Ghwilola, henu ghwilongela wazi wazi na witumila lepi mafumbo.
Henu, tumanyili kujha umanyili mambo ghoha, na wilonda lepi munu jhejhioha akukotayi maswali. Kwandabha ejhe twikiera kujha ghwihomela kwa K'yara.
Yesu akabhajibu, “Henu muamini?”
Langayi, saa jhihida, ena na hakika jhifikili, ambapo mwibetakutabhwanyika khila mmonga ni kwa bhene mwibetakunileka najhoni. Lakini nijhelepi ne muene kwandabha Dadi ajhele nani.
Nikabhajobhela mambo agha ili kwamba mugati mwa nene mujhelayi ni amani. Duniani mujhe ni matatizo, lakini mukipelayi muoyo, nibhushindili ulimwengu.
Yesu aghajobhili mambo agha; kisha akajhinula mihu gha muene kulotela kumbinguni ni kujobha, “Dadi saa jhiwadili; n'tukusijhi mwanabhu ili ni muana ni muene akutukusiajhi bhebhe -
kama vile kyaghwampelili mamlaka juu jha fyoha fya fijhe ni mb'ele ili abhapelayi uzima bhwa milele bhala bhoha bha wampelili.
Obhu ndo uzima bhwa milele: kujha bhakumanyayi bhebhe, K'yara ghwa bhukweli ni ghwa pamisa, ni muene jhaandaghisi Yesu Kristu.
Nakutukusili hapa duniani, ni kujhikamilisya mbombo jha wanipelili kujhibhomba.
Henu, Dadi, unitukusiajhi nene pamonga ni bhebhe kwa bhutukufu bhola bhwa najhenabhu pamonga ni bhebeh kabla jha ulimwengu kubhombibhwa.
Nalifunuili lihina lya bhebhe kwa bhanu lya wanipelili hapa pa duniani. Bhajhele bhanu bha jhobhi; lakini ghwanikabidhi nene. na bhene bhalikamuili lilobhi lya jhobhi.
Henu bhamanyili kujha khila khenu kya unipelili nene kihomela kwa bhebhe,
kwa malobhi ghala ghawanipelili nene— Nimalikubhapela bhene malobhi aghu. Bhaghapokili ni kweli bhamanyili jha kujha bhebhe ndo jha unilaghisi.
Nikabhas'omela bhene. Nikabhusomela lepi ulimwengu bali bhala bha unipelili kwa kujha bhene bha jhobhi.
Fenu fyoha ambafyo fya nene ndo fya jhobhi, ni fela fya ujhe nafu bhebhe fya nene; nani nitukusibhwa kwa e'lu.
Nene nijhelepi kabhele ulimwenguni, bali bhanu bhajhele ulimwenguni, nani henu nihida kwa bhebhe. Dadi Mtakatifu, bhatunzayi kwa lihina lya jhobhi lela lya wanipelili tete, ili nabhene bhajhelayi ni umoja, kama vile nene ni bhebhe kyatujhele ni umoja.
Bho nijhe nabhu, nabhalendili kwa lihina lya wanipelili, nabhalendili na ajhelepi hata mmonga ghwa bhene jha ajhaghili isipokujha mwana upotevu, ili kwamba maandiku ghatimilayi.
Henu nihida kwa bhebhe; lakini nijobha agha ulimwenguni ili kwamba furaha jha nene ikamulisibhwayi mugati mwa bhene.
Nibhapelili lilobhi lya bhebhe; ulimwengu ubhadadili kwandabha bhenye bha ulimwenguni ubhadadili kwandabha bhene bha ulimwengu lepi, kama vile nene kyanijhelepi ghwa ulimwengu
Nikabhaombela lepi kujha ubhabhosiajhi ku ulimwengu bali ubhalendayi ni jhola mwovu.
Bhene sio bha dunia kama vile nene kyanibelikujha ghwa ulimwengu.
Ubhabhekayi bhakfu kwa jhobhi ghwa muene mu bhukweli; lilobhi lya jhobhi ndo bhukweli.
Wanilaghisi ku ulimwengu, nani nibhalaghisi ku ulimwengu.
Kwa ndabha jha bhene nene ne muene nikipisya kwa bhebhe ili kwamba ni bhene bhakipisyayi kwa bhebhe ku bhukweli.
Sio abha tu bhanikabhas'okela, bali ni bhala bhabhibeta kukiera kup'etela lilobhi lya bhene
ili kwamba nabhene bhajhelayi ni umoja, kama vile bhebhe Dadi, ujhe mugati mwa nene nani mugati mwa bhebhe. Nikabhasokela ili kwamba bhene pia bhajhelayi mugati mwa tete ili ulimwengu ubhwesujhi kukiera kujha bhebhe ndiye jha unilaghisi.
Utukufu bhola bhwa unipelili nene - nibhapelili bhene, ili kwamba bhabhwesiayi kujha ni umoja kama vile tete kyatujha ni umoja
-Nene mugati mwa bhene, nabhi mugati mwa nene, ili bhabhwesijhi kukamilisibhwa mu umoja; ili ulimwengu umanyayi kujha hakika bhebhe ndiye jha unitumili, ni kubhagana, kama vile bhebhe kyauniganili, nene.
Dadi khela kya unipelili nene - Ninoghela kujha bhene pia bhabhwesiajhi kujha pamonga nani mahali pa nijhele ili bhabhwesiayi kulola utukufu bhwa nene, bhola unipelili: kwa kujha bhebhe ghwaniganili nene kabla jha kubhomb'eka kwa misingi jha ulimwengu.
Dadi jha ujhe ni haki, ulimwengu bhwakumanyilepi bhebhe, lakini nene nikumanyili bhebhe; na bhamanyili kujhe ghwanilaghisi.
Nalibhombili lihina lya bhebhe limanyikinayi kwa bhene, na nibetakulibhomba limanyikinayi ili kwamba l'ela lipendo ambalyo kwa jhobhi ghwaniganili nene libhweajhi kujha mugati mwa bhene, ni nene nibhwesiajhi kujha mugayi mwa bhene.”
Baada jha Yesu kujobha malobhi agha, akabhoka ni bhanafunzi bha muene kul'otela bonde lya Kidron, ambako kwajhele ni bustani, ambako muene ni bhanafunzi bha muene bhakajhingila mugati.
Henu Yuda, jhola jhaalondeghe kun'saliti, ni muene alimanyili lilobhi e'lu, kwani Yesu ajhele illota lieneo lela mara kadhaa ni bhanafunzi bha muene,
Ni muene Yuda baada jhakubhona akabhili likundi lya maaskari ni maofisa kuhomela kwa bhabhaha bha makuhani, bhakahida ni taa, kurunzi ni silaha.
Nu muene Yesu, akajha amanyili khila khenu kyakibhombeleghe dhidi jha muene, akakitokesya pa longolo ni kubhakota, “Niani mukandonda?”
Ni bhene bhan'jibili, “Yesu Mnazareth.” Yesu akabhajobhela, “Ndo nene” Ni muene Yuda jha an'saliti, ajhele ajhemili pamonga ni bhala askari.
Henu bho abhajobhili, “Ndio nene” bhakerebhuiki kinyume bhakabina pasi.
Halafu akabhakota kabhele, “Niani mukandonda? Ni bhene bhakan'jibu kabhele “Yesu mnazareth.”
Yesu akabhajibu, “Nimalili kubhajobhela Ndio nene; henu kama mkanilonda nene, mubhalekayi bhangi abha bhalotayi.”
Agha ghajhele naha ili lilobhi lela litimilikayi; pa ajobhi pala; “Katika bhaukanipelili, nikanjasilepi hata mmonga.”
Ndipo Simoni Petro, jha ajhele ni upanga akaufuta ni kun'dumula mb'olokoto lya kulia n'tumishi ghwa Kuhani mbaha. Ni lihina lya muene n'tumishi jhola lya jhele Malko.
Yesu akan'jobhela Petro, “Ubhukerusiajhi upanga ghwa jhobhi mu ala jhike. Kwa ndabha jha kiki nisikinyweli kikombi khela kyaanipelili Dadi?”
Basi likundi lela lya askari ni jemedari, ni bhatumishi bha Bhayahudi, bhan'kamuili Yesu ni kun'konga.
Na bhene bhandonguisi mpaka kwa Anasi, kwani muene ajhele mkwe ghwa Kayafa, ambaye ajhele Kuhani mbaha kwa mwaka obhu.
Henu Kayafa ndo abhapelili ushauri Bhayahudi jhi kujha jhilondeka munu mmonga afuayi kwa ndabha jha bhanu.
Simoni Petro an'kesisi Yesu, mebhu ni bhanafunzi bhangi. Ni mwanafunzi jhola jha amanyikene kwa kuhani mbaha, ni muene akajhingila pamonga ni Yesu mu libehewa lya kuhani mbaha;
lakini Petro ajhemili kwibhala kundiangu. Mwanafunzi jhola jha amanyikene kwa kuhani mbaha apitili kwibhala akalota kulongela ni n'dala jhola n'tumishi jhaalendeghe ndiangu ni kunjhingisya Petro mugati.
Basi kijakazi jhola jha alandeghe pandiangu, an'jobhili Petro, “Je bhebhe sio ndo mmonga ghwa bhafuasi bha munu ojho?” Ni muene akajobha, “Ne lepi.”
Ni bhala bhatumishi ni bhabhaha bhajhemili mahali pala, bhakajha bhakosili muoto bhijhota kwa ndabha kwa jhele ni mepu, bhakajha bhijhota ili kukabha joto. Ni Petro ajhenabhu ijhota muoto ajhemili.
Kuhani mbaha akan'kota Yesu juu jha bhanafunzi bha muene ni mafundisu gha muene.
Yesu akajibu, “Nibhujobhili waziwazi bhulimwengu; Nene nafundisi mara kwa mara mu masinagogi ni mahekalu mahali ambapo bhayahudi bhikusanyika. Nani najobhilepi lyolyoha kwa kufigha.
Kwandabha jha kiki mwanikotili? Mubhakotayi bhabhanip'elekisi juu jha khela kya nikijobhili. Bhanu abha bhamanyili mambo ghala ghanighajobhili.
Yesu bho amalikujobha aghu, mmonga ghwa bhabhaha jha ajhemili akan'tobha Yesu kwa kibhoko kya muene ni kujobha, “Je, ndo jhilondeka naha kun'jibu kuhani mbaha?”
Ni Yesu akan'jibu, “Kama nijobhili lijambo lyolyoha linofu lepi basi ujhelayi shahidi kwa ndabha jha uovu, na kama nirijibili kinofu kwandabha jha kiki ukanitobha?
Ndipo Anasi ampeliki Yesu kwa Kayafa kuhani mbaha khoni akongibhu.
Henu Simoni Petro akajha ajhemili ijhota muoto. Halafu bhanu bhala bhakan'jobhela. “Je, bhebhe pia si mmonga ghwa bhanafunzi bha muene?” Akabele akajobha “Nene lepi.”
Mmonga ghwa bhatumishi bha kuhani mbaha ambajhe ajhele ndongomunu ghwa jhola jha adumulibhu mbolokhoto ni Petro akajobha, “Je sio bhebhe nikakubhwene naku ku bustani?”
Petro akabela kabhele, ni mara likongobhe likabheka.
Kisha bhakan'tola Yesu kuhoma kwa Kayafa mpaka ku Praitorio. Kwajhelukhela lubhuliku. Bhabhu bhene bhaijhingi lepi jhela Praitorio ili bhasihidi bhakanajisika ni kujhilya pasaka.
Henu Pilato akabhalotela akajobha. “Lishitaka lelekhu lyalikan'husu munu ojho?”
Bhakan'jibu ni kun'jobhela, “Munu ojho nga ajhiabhombi lepi makosa ngatundetili lepi kwa bhebhe.”
Pilato akabhajobhela, “Mun'tolayi mwejhomu, mukan'hukumuayi kul'engana ni sheria jha muenga.” Ni bhene Bhayahudi bhakan'jobhela, “Sheria jhikaturuhusu lepi tete kun'koma munu jhejhioha.”
Bhajobhili agha ili lilobhi lya Yesu litimilikayi, lilobhi ambalyo amalikujobha juu jha aina jha kifo kya kya muene.
Basi Pilato akajhingila kabhele Praitorio ankutilepi Yesu; akan'jobhela, “Je, bhebhe ndo mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi?”
Yesu an'jibili, “Je, bhebhe ukanikota lisuali e'le kwa ndabha wilonda kumanya au kwandabha bhangi bhakutumili ili unikotayi nene?”
Ni muene pilato akan'jibu, “Nene na Myahudi, au lepi?” Litaifa lya bhebhe ni kuhani mbaha ndo bhakuletili kwa nene; bhebhe uketili kiki?
Yesu akajibu; “Ufalme bhwa nene sio bhwa ulimwengu obho, kama ufalme bhwa nene ngabhujhele bhwa ulimwengu obho bhatumwa bha nene ngabhajhemili ili nisibhekibhu kwa bhayahudi. Kwa kweli ufalme bhwa nene bhwihomela lepi apa”
Basi Pilato akan'jobhela, “Je, bhebhe wa mfalme?” Yesu akajibu, “bhebhe ndo kya wijobha kujha nene na mfalme, Kwandabha ejhe nene nahogoliki na kwandabha nene nihidili pa ulimwengu ili nijhelayi shahidi ghwa kweli jhela. Jhejhioha jha ajhele ghwa ejhu kweli akajhipelekesya sauti jha nene.
Pilato akan'jobhela, “Kweli ndo kiki?” Ni muene bho amalikujobha agha akalota kwa Bhayahudi ni kujobha “Nikalibhona lepi likosa lyolyoha kwa munu ojho.
Muenga mujhele ni utamaduni bhwa ukanifuanya nimfungulilayi mfungwa mmonga wakati wa Pasaka. Je mwilonda nibhafungulilayi mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi.”
Kisha bhapigili majhuegha bhakajobha, ojho lepi, tufungulilayi Baraba.” Ni muene Baraba ajhele mnyang'anyi.
Basi Pilato akan'tola Yesu ni kun'tobha.
Maaskari bhala bhakasokota mifwa ni kutengenesya litaji. Bhakaibheka panani pa mutu ghwa Yesu ni kumfwatika liguanda lya zambarau.
Bhakan'hidila ni kujobha, “Bhebhe mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi! na kisha kun'tobha kwa mabhokho gha bhene.
Kisha Pilato akahoma kwibhala ni kubhajobhela bhanu, “Lngayi nikabhaletela kwa muenga munu ojho ila mumanya kujha nene nikajhibhona lepi hatia jha munu ojho.”
Henu Yesu akapita kwibhala akajha afwalili litaji lya mifwa ni liguanda lya zambarau. Ndipo Pilato akabhajobhela, “Mulangayi munu ojho apa!”
Kwa hiyo wakati kuhani mbaha na bhabhaha bho bhambwene Yesu, wakapiga makele bhakajobha, “N'sulubisiajhi, n'sulubisiajhi.” Pilato akabhajobhela, “Mun'tolayi mwebhene mkan'sulubisiajhi, kwa ndabha nene nibhonalepi hatia kwa muene.”
Bhayahudi bhakan'jibu Pilato, “Tete tujhe ni sheria, ni kwa sheria ejhe jhilondeka afuayi kwandabha muene akibhekeghe mwana ghwa K'yara.”
Pilato bho ap'eliki malobhi agha azidi kutila,
akajhingila Praitorio kabhele ni kun'jobhela Yesu, “Bhebhe wihomela ndaku? Hata naha, Yesu an'jibi lepi.
Kisha Pilato akan'jobhela, “Je, bhebhe wilongela lepi ni nene? Je, bhebhe umanyilepi kujha nene nijhe ni mamlaka gha kusulubisya?”
Yesu akan'jibu, “Ngaujhelepi ni nghofu dhidi jha nene kama ngaupelibhu lepi kuhomela kunani. Henu, munu jha anipisili kwa bhebhe ajhe ni dhambi mbaha.”
Kutokana ni lijibu e'le, Pilato alondeghe kundeka huru, lakini Bhayahudi bhakapiga majhueghu bhakajobha, “Kama wibetakundeka huru basi bhebhe sio rafiki ghwa Kaisari: Kila jhaikibheka mfalme ilota kinyume ni Kaisari.”
Pilato bho aghapeliki malobhi agha, akandeta Yesu kwibhala kisha akatama pa kiti kya hukumu mahali pala papimanyikana kama sakafu, lakini kwa Kiebrania, Gabatha.
Ligono lya maandalizi gha pasaka bho bhifikili, muda ghwa saa sita. Pilato akabhajobhela Bhayahudi, “Mulangayi mfalme ghwa jhomu ojho apa!”
Bhakapiga makelele, “Umbosiajhi, umbosiajhi, un'sulubisiajhi!” Pilato akabhajobhela, “Je, nin'sulubusuajhi mfalme ghwa jhomu?” Ni muene Kuhani mbaha akajibu, “Tete tujhelepi ni mfalme isipokujha Kaisari.”
Ndipo Pilato akandeta Yesu kwa bhene ili asulubibhwayi
Na bhene bhakantola Yesu, ni muene akapita, hali aup'endili n'salaba ghwa muene mpaka ku lieneo lyalikutibhwa fuvu lya mutu, kwa Kihebrania likutibhwa Golgotha.
Ndipo pa bhan'sulubisi Yesu, pamonga ni bhagosi bhabhele, mmonga lubhafu olo ni jhongi lubhafu olo, ni Yesu katikati jha bhene.
Kisha Pilato akajhandika alama ni kujhibheka panani pa n'salaba. Apu pajhandikibhu: YESU MNAZARETH, MFALME GHWA BHAYAHUDI.
Bhayahudi bhingi bhaisomili alama jhela kwani mahali pala pa asululibibhu Yesu pajhele karibu ni mji. Alama ejhu jhalembibhu Kiebrania, kwa Kirumi ni kwa Kiyunani.
Kisha bhabhaha bha makuhani ghwa Bhayahudi bhakan'jobhela Pilato, “Usilembi, 'Mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi; bali muene ajobhili nene ndo mfalme ghwa Bhayahudi.”
Ni muene Pilato akabhajibu, “Ghanijhandiki nijhandiki.”
Baada jha askari kun'sulubisya Yesu, bhakatola mavazi gha muene ni kughagabha katika mafungu mancheche, khila askari lifungu limonga, fefuefu ni kanzu, Henu kanzu jhela jhashonibhu lepi bali jhafumibhu jhioha kuhomela kunani.
Kisha bhakajobhesana bhene kwa bhene, “Tusijhikachuli, bali tupigayi kura ili tulolayi jhibetakujha jha niani?” Ele lyahomili ili lela liandiku litimizwajhi, lela lya lijobha bhagabhenye nghobho syangu, ni liguanda lya nene bhalipigili kura.”
Askari abhombi mambo agha. Nyinamunu Yesu, ndombo munu nyina ghwa Yesu, Mariamu n'dala ghwa Kleopa ni Mariamu Magdalena - bhadala abha bhajhele bhajhele bhajhemili karibu ni n'salaba ghwa Yesu.
Yesu bho ambwene nyinamunu ni jhola mwanafunzi jhaan'ganili bhajhemili karibu akan'jobhela nyinamunu, “N'dala, langayi, mwanabhu ojho apa!”
Kisha akan'jobhela jhola mwanafunzi, “Langayi, ojho apa nyinu waku. “Kuhomela saa ejhu mwanafunzi jhola akan'tola kulota kunyumba kwa muene.
Baada jha e'lu, Hali Yesu amanyili kujha ghoha ghamaliki ili kutimisya maandiku, akajobha, “Nibhona kiu,”
Khenu kyakikamemili Siki kyabhekibhu pala, henu bhakabheka sifongo jhajhimemili siki panani pa ufito ghwa hisopo, bhakambekela mundomo mwa muene.
Ni muene Yesu bho ajhibhonjili ejhu, akajobha, “Imaliki.” Kisha akajhinamisya mutu ghwa muene akajhikabidhi roho jha muene.
Kwa vile bhwajhele bhwakati bhwa maandalio, ni kwam ndabha mibhele jhilondekeghe lepi kubakila panani pa n'salaba wakati bhwa Sabato (kwa kujha Sabato jha jhele ligono lya muhimu), bhayahudi bhan'sokili Pilato kujha magolo gha bhene bhala bhabhasulubisibhu idenyibhwayi, ni kwamba mibhele ghya bhene iselesibhwayi.
Ndipo askari bhakahida ni kudenya magolo gha munu ghwa kwanza ni ghwa pili bhabhasulubisibhu pamonga ni Yesu.
Bhobhamfikirir Yesu bhan'kolili tayari amali kufwa, henu bhakadenya lepi magolo gha muene.
Hata naha, mmonga ghwa askari akan'homa Yesu ng'oha mu mbafu ni mara jhikahoma masi ni damu.
Ni muene jha alibhwene lela ahomisi bhushuhuda, ni bhushuhuda bhwa muene bhwa kweli. Muene amanyili kyaajobhili kya bhukweli ili namu pia mukierayi.
Mambo agha ghajhele ili lela lyalyanenibhu libhwesiyi kutimila, “Bhujhele hata umonga bhwa bhwibetakudenyibhwa.”
Kabhele liandiku lenge lijobha, “Bhibetakundangamuene jha ahomibhu”
Baada jha mambo agha Yusufu ghwa Arimathaya, kwa vile ajhele mwanafunzi ghwa Yesu, lakini kwa siri kwa kubhatila Bhayahudi, an'sokili Pilato kujha autolayi mb'ele bhwa Yesu.
Ni muene Pilato akampela ruhusa. Henu Yusufu akahida kuubhosya mb'ele ghwa Yesu. Ni muene Nicodemo ambajhe kubhwandelu an'kesisi Yesu pakilu ni muene akahida. Muene aletili mchanganyiiku ghwa manemane ni udi, kama uzito ghwa ratili mia moja.
Henu bhakautola mb'ele ghwa Yesu bhakaukonga sanda jha kitani ni pamonga ni ghala manukato, kama kyajhikajhele desturi jha bhayahudi wakati wa kusiela.
Mahali ambapo Yesu asulubisibhu kwajhele ni bustani; mugati mu jhela bustani kwajhele ni likaburi lipya ambalyo ajhelepi munu ambajhe abhwajhili kusyelibhwa omu.
Basi, kwa kujha jhajhele ligono lya maandalio kwa Bhayahudi, ni kwa vile lela likaburi lyajhele karibu, basi bhakan'goneka Yesu mugati omu.
Manyata ligono lya kuanza lya juma lubhuliku Mariamu Magdalena ahidili kulikaburi akalibhona liganga lele libhosibhu pa likaburi.
Kwa iyo akajumba mbio kulota kwa Simoni Petro ni kwa jhola mwanafunzi jhongi ambajhe Yesu an'ganili, kisha akabhajobhela, “bhan'tolili Bwana mu likaburi, natu tumanyilepi kwa bhambekili.”
Kisha Petro ni jhola mwanafunzi jhongi bhakabhoka, kulotela kulikaburi.
Bhoha bhakajha bhijumba kwa pamonga; mwanafunzi jhongi jhola ajumbili nesu kuliko Petro ni kubhwayi kufika kulikaburi.
Akajhema na kisha kuhongolela mu likaburi; akajhibhona sanda jhela jha kitani jhigonili, lakini ajhingilepi mugati.
Kisha Simoni Petro ni muene akahida akajhingila mugati mu likaburi. Akajhibhona sanda jha kitani jhela jhigonili pala
ni leso jhela jhajhele pamuto pa muene jhajhelepi pamonga ni sanda jha kitani bali jhajhele jhigonili pa lubhafu.
Ndipo mwanafunzi jhongi jhola ni muene akajhingila mu likaburi; akalola ni kukiera.
Kwa kujha hadi wakati obhu bhajhele bhaghamanyilepi maandiku kwamba ilimlazimu Yesu afufukayi kabhele katika bhafu.
Kisha bhanafunzi bhakalota kabhele kunyumba jha bhene.
Hata nahu, Mariamu ajhele ajhemili pa likaburi ilela, bho ijhendelela kulela akajhema kisha akalanga mulikaburi.
Akabhabhona malaika bhabhele bhenye sura sibhalafu bhatamili mmonga kumutu ni jhongi kumagolo mahali ambapo Yesu agonili.
Na bhene bhakan'jobhela, “N'dala, kwandabha jha kiki ghwilela?” Ni muene akabhajobhela, “Kwa ndabha bhan'tolili Bwana ghuangu, nani nimanyilepi kwa bhamp'ekili.”
Bho amalikujobha aghu, ageuiki ni kumbona Yesu akajha ajhemili. Lakini amanyilepi kujobha ojhu ajhele Yesu.
Ni muene Yesu akan'jobhela, “Mabhu, kwa ndabha jha kiki wilela? Ukandonda niani?” Ni muene khuni akajha amanyili kujha ndo mtunza bustani akan'jobhela, “Bwana, kama ndo bhebhe un'tolili, nijobhelayi kwa umb'ekili, ni nene nibetakun'tola.”
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Mariamu.” Ni muene akageuka muene ni kun'jobhela kwa Kiaramu, “Raboni,” yaani sawa nikujobha, “Mwalimu.”
Yesu akan'jobhela, “Usinigusi, kwani bado nakona kupaa kulota kwa dadi; bali ulotayi kwa bhalongobhangu ukabhajobhelayi kujha nibetakupaa kulota kwa Ddadi jhangu ambajhe pia ndo Dadi jhinu, K'yara ghwa nene na K'yara ghwa muenga.”
Mariamu Magdalena akahida kubhajobhela bhanafunzi, “Nimbwene Bwana,” na kwamba an'jobhili mambo agha.
Na bho jhifikili kimihi, ligono elu, ligono lya kuanza lya juma, ni milyangu jhikajha jhidendibhu mahali ambapo bhanafunzi bhajhele kwa kuhofela Bhayahudi, Yesu akahida ni kujhema katikati jha bhene ni kubhajobhela, “Amani ijhelayi kwa muenga.”
Bho amalikujobha aghu akabhalasya mabhokho gha muene ni lubhafu kwa muene. Na bhene bhanafunzi bho bhambwene Bwana bhahobhelili.
Kisha Yesu akabhajobhela kabhele, “Amani ijhelayi namu. Kama vile Dadi kyaanilaghisi nene, fefuefu nani nikabhatuma muenga.”
Yesu bho amalili kujobha aghu akabhavuvila akabhajobhela, Mupokelayi Roho Mtakatifu.
Jhejhioha jha mwibetakun'samehe dhambi, bhasamehibhu; ni bhala bha mwibetakubhafungila bhafungibhu.”
Thomaso, mmonga wa bhala kumi ni bhabhele, jhaakutibhu Dididmas, ajhelepi ni bhanafunzi bhajhinu Yesu bho ahiodili.
Bhanafunzi bhangi bhala bhakan'jobhela baadajhe, “Tumbwene Bwana.” N i muene akabhajobhela, “Kama nibetalepi kubhona alama sya misumari mu mabhoko gha muene, ni kubheka fikonji fya nene mu alama e'su, na pia kubheka kubhoko kyangu mu lubhafu kwa muene nibetalepi kukiera.”
Baada jha magono nane bhanafunzi bhajhele kabhele mu kichumba, ni Thomaso ajhele pamonga nabhu. Wakati miliangu idendibhu Yesu ajhemili katikati jha bhene na akajobha, “Amani na ijhelayi kwa muenga.”
Kisha akan'jobhela Thomaso, letayi kikonyi kya jhobhi na ulotayi mabhoko ghangu; letayi apa mabhoko gha jhobhi na ubhekayi mu lubhafu lwa nene; wala usijhi jhaibetakukiera bali jhaikiera.”
Ni muene Thomaso akajibu ni kun'jobhela, “Bwana ghuangu ni K'yara ghuangu.”
Yesu akan'jobhela, Kwa kujha unibhwene, ukieriri. Bhabarikibhu bhene bhabhikier, bila kubhona.”
Kisha Yesu abhombi ishara simehele mbele jha bhanafunzi, ambasyo sibhwajhilepi kulembibhwa mu kitabu ekhe;
bali e'se silembibhu ili kwamba mubhwesyayi kukiera kwamba Yesu ndo Kristu, mwana ghwa K'yara, na kwamba pamwikiera mujhiajhi ni uzima mu lihina lya muene.
Baada jha mambo aghu Yesu kwidhihirisha kabhele kwa bhanafunzi mu Bahari jha Tiberia; efe ndo kyaakidhihirishi muene:
Simoni Petro ajhele pamonga ni Thomaso jhaakutibhweghe Didimas, Nathanaeli ghwa Kana jha Galilaya, bhana bha Zebedayo ni bhanafunzi bhangi bhabhele bha Yesu.
Simoni Petro akabhajobhela, “Nene nilota kulobha somba.” Ni bhene bhakan'jobhela, “Tete, pia twilota pamonga ni bhebhe.” Bhakalota bhakajhingila mu mashua, lakini kinu kyoha eku bhakilepi khenu.
Ni lukhela bho kubhalele, Yesu ajhemili kundema, na bhene bhanafunzi bhamanyilepi kujha ndo Yesu.
Kisha Yesu akabhajobhela, “Bhasongolo, mujhe ni kyokyoha kya kulya?” Na bhene bakan'jibu, “Lepi.”
Akabhajobhela, “Muselesiajhi nkwabhu lubhafu kwa kuume bhwa mashua, na mu mwibeta kukabha kiasi.” Kwa hiyo bhakaselesya nkwabhu ni bhene bhabhwesilepi kufuta kabhele kwandabha jha bhwingi bhwa somba.
Basi mwanafunzi jhola ambajhe Yesu an'ganili akan'jobhela Petro, “Ndo Bwana.” Ni muene Simoni Petro bho apeliki kujha ndo Bwana, akakikonga liguanda lya muene (ndabha alifwali lepi kinofu), kisha akakisopa mu masi.
Bhanafunzi bhangi bhala bhakahida mu mashua (kwani bhajhelepi patali ni pwani, kama mita mia moja kuhomela ufukweni), na bhene bhakajha bhifuta mikwabhu ghela ambaghyo ghyamemili somba.
Bho bhafikili ufukweni, bhaghubhwene muoto ghwa mkaa pala ni panani pa muene kwajhele ni somba pamonga ni mkate.
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Muletayi baadhi jha somba sya mulobhili henu naha.”
Basi Simoni Petro akakuela ni kuukokota nkwabhu bhwa wamemili somba sibhaha, kiasi kya somba 153; japo bhajhebhingi, nkwabhu bhola bhwakachwiki lepi.
Yesu akabhajobhela, “Muhidayi mkabhayi kifungua kinywa.” Ajhelepi hata mmonga ghwa bhanafunzi jhaan'kotili, “Bhebhe ghwa niani?” Bhamanyili kujha ajhele Bwana.
Yesu akahida, akautola n'kate bhola, kisha akabhapela, akabhomba mebhu niku somba sela.
Ejhe jha jhele mara jha tatu kwa Yesu kwidhihirisha kwa bhanafunzi bha muene baada jha kufufuka kuhoma kwa bhafu.
Baada jha kufungula kinywa, Yesu akan'jobhela Simoni Petro, “Simoni mwana ghwa Yohana je, uniganili nene kuliko abha?” Petro akajibu, “Ena, Bwana; “Bhebhe umanyili kujha nene nikuganili.” Yesu akan'jobhela, “Lesyajhi bhanakondoo bha nene.”
Akan'jobhela mara jha pili, “Simoni mwana ghwa Yona, je, uniganili?” Petro akan'jobhela, “Ena, Bwana; bhebhe umanyili kujha nikuganili. “Yesu akan'jobhela, “Dimayi kondoo bhangu.”
Akan'jobhela kabhele mara jha tatu, “Simoni, mwana ghwa Yohana, Je uniganili?” Ni muene Petro ahuzuniki kwa vile kyaan'jobhili mara jha tatu, “Je Bhebhe uniganili?” Ni muene akan'jobhela, “Bwana, umanyili ghoha; umanyili kujha nikuganili.” Yesu akan'jobhela, Lesiajhi kondoo bha nene.
Aminiayi, aminiayi, nikujobhela, bho ghwen'songolo ghwasobhelili kufwala nghobho muene ni kulota kokuoha khola kwa ulondeghe; lakini paghwibetakujha ghwe nseya, ghwibetakugholosya mabhoko gha jhobhi, ni jhongi ibetakufwalika nghobho ni kukupeleka kwa ulondeghe lepi kulota.”
Yesu ajobhi agha ili kulasya ni aina jheleku jha kifo ambakyo Petro ngaan'tukuizi K'yara. Baada jha kujha ajobhili agha, akan'jobhela Petro, “Nikesiajhi.”
Petro akageuka ni kumbona jhola mwanafunzi ambajhe Yesu an'ganili akabhakesya- Ojho ndo ajhele akijheghemisi mu kifua kya Yesu wakati wa kyakulya kya kimihi ni kun'kota, “Bwana, niani jhaibetakusaliti?”
Petro ambwene ni kisha akan'kota Yesu, “Bwana, Ojho munu ibetakubhomba kiki?”
Yesu akan'jibu, “Kama nilonda abakilayi mpaka pa nibetakuhida, e'lu likuhusu kiki?” Nikesiajhi.”
Kwa hiyo habari ejhe jhikaenela miongoni mwa bhala ndugu, kwamba mwanafunzi ojhui ibetalepi kufwa. Lakini Yesu an'jobhilepi Petro kujha, mwanafunzi ojhu ifwa lepi, “Kama nilonda muene abakilayi mpaka pa nibetakuhida ghikuhusu kiki?”
Ojho ndo mwanafunzi jhaibetakupisya ushuhuda bhwa mambo agha, na ndo jhaalembili mambo agha, na tumanyili jha kujha ushuhuda bhwa muene bhwa bhukweli.
Kuna mambo ghangi ambagho Yesu aghabhombili. Kama kila limonga ngalijhandikibhu, nidhanila kwamba ulimwengu bhuene ngabhutoshilepi kufibheka fitabu ambafyo ngafilembibhu.
Kitabu kya muandi nakilembili, Theofilo nikajobha ghoha kwa yesu ghaabhanji kubhomba ni kumanyisya,
mpaka ligono muene apokelibhu kunani. Ej'ha jha jhele baada jha kupisya amri kup'etela Roho Mtakatifu kwa mitume bhabhajhele abhachaguili.
Baada jha malombosi gha muene, abhonekane kwa bhene ajha hai pia ni fitishu fingi kushuhudibhwa. Kwa magono arobaini akidhihirishi kwa bhene, naa ajobhili kuhusu bhufalme bhwa K'yara.
Bhoibhonana nabhu abhajubhili bhasibhoki Yerusalemu, lakini bhalendayi kwa ndabha jha ahadi jha Dadi, ambajho ajobhili, “Mwaip'eliki kuhomela kwa nene.
Kwamba Yohana abatili kwa masi, lakini mbatisibhwa kwa Roho Mtakatatifu mu magono agha madebe.”
Nabho bhabhonene pamonga bhakan'kota “Bwana, ivi obho ndo muda ambabho wibeta kubhakerebhusila Israeli bhufalme?”
Muene akabhajobhela, “Sawalepi kwa muenga kumanya bhwakati au majira ambayo Dadi akusudili kwa mamlaka gha muene.”
Lakini mwibeta kupokela nghofu bhwakati Roho mtakatifu paibeta kuhida kwa mwenga, ni muenga mwibe kujha mashahidi bha nene kuoha Yeresalemu ni Uyahudi jhioha ni Samaria mpaka mwisho ghwa nchi.”
Bwana Yesu bho amalili kujobha agha, bhakaj'ha bhilanga kunani, muene ajhinulibhu kunani, ni libhengu lyan'gupiki bhasimboni kwa mihu gha bhene.
Bhwakati bhilola kumbinguni ilota, ghafla bhanu bhabhele bhajhemili katikati jha bhene bhafwalili maguanda mabhalafu.
Bhakajobha, “Enyi bhanu bha Galilaya kwandabha jha kiki mwijhema apa mwilola kumbinguni.” Ojho Yesu jhaakwelili kunani kumbinguni ibeta kukerebhuka kwa namna jhela jhela kama kya mumbwene ilota kumbinguni.
Ndipo bhakakerebhuka Yerusalemu, kuhoma kukidonda kya mizeituni ambako okhu karibu ni Yerusalemu, mwendo ghwa ligono lya sabato.
Bho bhafihili bhakalota ghorofani ambako bhatamaghe. Nabhene ndo Petro, Yohana Yakobo, Andrea, Filipo, Thomaso, Bhatholomayo, Mathayo, Yakobo mwana ghwa Alfayo, Simoni Zelote ni Yuda mwana ghwa Yakobo.
Bhoha bhaungene kama munu mmonga, kwa juhudi bhajhe bhijhendelela ni maombi pamonga ni abhu bhajhela bhadala, Mariamu nyinamunu Yesu nibhakaka yake.
Katika magono ghala ajhemili katikati jha bhalongomunu, kama bhenu 120, akajobha.
Bhalonho bhangu, jhahele lazima maandiku ghatimisibhwayi, ambapo muandi Roho Mtakatifu ajobhili kwa kinywa kya muene Daudi, kuhusiana ni Yuda, ambajhe abha jhekisi bhala bhabharikamuili Yesu.
Kwa kujha muene ajhele mmonga bhitu na apokili fungu lya muene lye faida katika huduma ejhe.”
(Henu, munu ojho, ahemili lieneo kwa khela kya akipokili kwa uovu bhwa muene ni apuabinili kulongolasya mutu, mbhele ghwa kayuiki ni matumbu gha muene ghoha gajhele pabhwaka ghajhitiki.
Bhoha bha bhataniuli Yerusalemu bhabeliki kuhusu e'le, hivyo lieneo e'lu bhakalikuta kwa lihina lya bhene. “Akeldama” e'lu ndo “N'gonda ghwa damu.”)
“Mukitabu kya Zaburi ile mbibhu, lendayi eneo lya muene lijhelayi hame na asinihusibhu hata mmonga kutani apala, na Ruhusuajhi munu jhongi atolayi nafasi jha muenejha uongozi.
Ejhu, jha muhimu, henu, mmonga ghwa bhagosi ambabho bhalongosene ni tete bhwakati Bwana Yesu abhokili ni kujhingila kwa tete.
kubhwanjila ku ubatisu bhwa Yohana mpaka ligono lela bho atwalibhu kunani lazima ajhelayi shahidi bhwa ufufuo pamonga ni tete.
Bhakabhabheka palongolo bhagosi bhabhele, Yusufu jhaakutibhweghe Barnaba ambaye pia akutibhu Yusto ni Mathia.
Bhene bhasokili bhajobhili, “Bhebhe Bwana, jhaumanyi mioyo jha bhanu bhoha hivyo bhekayi wazi jholeku kati jha bhabhele abha ambajhe un'chaguili.
Kutola nafasi katika huduma jha utume, ambapo Yuda abhombi uovu ni kulota mahali pa muene.”
Bhakapiga kura kwa ajili jha bhene, ni kura jhikanibinila Mathia ambajhe abhalangibhu pamonga ni bhala mitume kumi na moja.
Bho jhifikili ligono lya Pentekoste, bhoha bhajhele pamonga sehemu jhimonga.
Ghafla bwatokili muungurumo kuhomela kumbinguni kama mp'ongo n'kali.
Ukameme mu nyumba jhioha mwa bhatamili. Apo syabhatokili ndimi kama ndimi sya muoto sigabhwanyiki, sikajha panani pa bhene kwa khila mmonga.
Bhene bhoha bhakamemesibhwa ni Roho mtakatifu na bhakayanda kujobha kwa lugha s'enge, kama vile Roho mtakatifu kya abhajalili kujobha.
Henu, bhahele bhayahudi bhabatameghe Yerusalemu, Bhacha K'yara kuhoma kila taifa pasi pa mbingu.
Ngurumo e'se bho sipelekibhu, likundi lya bhanu bhakahida pamonga ni bhakajha ni wasiwasi kwandabha khila munu abhapeliki bhilongela kwa kila munu ni lugha jha muene.
Bhaduele ni kusyangasibhwa, bhene bhajobhili, “Kweli abha bhoha bhilongela bha Galilaya lepi mbona?
Kwa ndaya kiki tete tukabhap'heleka, kila mmonga ku lugha sya tuhogoliki nasu?
Bhapartia ni Bhamedi ni Bhaelamu, niabhu bhabitama Mesopotamia, Uyahudi, ni Kapodokia ni mu Ponto ni Asia,
ku Frigia, Pamfilia, ku Misri ni sehemu jha Libya hata Kerene, nibhahesya kuh'omelaRumi,
Bhayahudi ni Bhaongofu Bhakrete ni Bhaarabu, tukabhap'eleka bhilongela kwa lugha sya tete kuhusu mbombo sya uweza bhwa K'yara.”
Bhoha bhaduele ni kutatanisibhwa; bhajobhesene bhene kwa bhene, “Ejhe ijhe ni maana gani?”
Lakini bhangi bhadhihakili bhakajobha, “Abha bhajasibhu kwa mvinyo mpya.”
Lakini Petro akjhema pamonga ni bhala kumi na moja, akakwesya sauti, akajobha, “Bhanu bha Yudea na bhoha bha mwitema apa Yerusalemu, e'le limanyikanayi kwa muenga, mup'elekesiajhi kwa makini malobi gha nene.
Bhanu abha bhagalilepi kama kya mwidhanila kwa ndabha henu lukhela saa tatu
Lakini lyajhele limalikujobhibhwa kup'etela nabii Yoeli:
Ibetakujha katika magono ghwa kumuishu, K'yara ijobha nibeta kujihitisya Roho bha jhoni kwa bhanu bhoha. Bhana bhinu ni bhali bhinu bhibeta kuhomesya unabii, Bhasoni golo bhibeta kulola maono, ni bhaseya bhinu bhibeta kulota ndoto.
Felafela juu jha bhatumishi bhangu nibhatumishi bhangu bhadala katika magono aghu, nibeta kujhatisya Roho bha jhoni, na bhene bhibeta kutabiri.
Nibeta kulasya maajabu kunani ni ishara pasi pa duniani, damu, muoto, ni mafusho gha liosi.
Nilijobha libeta kubadilisibhwa kujha ngisi ni mwesi kujha damu, kabla jhakuhida ligono libhaha ni lya ajabu jha Bwana.
Ibeta kujha kila mmonga ambajhe akalikuta lihina lya Bwana ibeta kuokoka.
Bhanu bha Israeli, mup'elekayi malobhi agha. Yesu gha Nazareti mwanadamu jha athibitishibhu ni K'yara kwa muenga kwa matendo gha uweza ni maajabu, ni ishara ambasyo K'yara kup'etela muene katikati jha muenga, kama mwejhomu kya mumanyili.
Kwa ndabha jha mpango ambajho ghwa kusudidibhu kuh'omela kubhuandu. Ni maarifa gha K'yara abhosibhu, ni muenga, kwa mabhobho gha bhanu bhahalifu, mwan'sulubishji ni kun'koma,
ambajhe K'yara an'jhiuili, akaubhosya uchungu bhwa mauti kwa muene, kwa ndabha jhabhwesekene lepi kwa muene kumilikibhwa ni obhu.
Hivyo Daudi ijobha kuhusu muene, nana bwene Bwana daima mbele jha mihu ghanghu, muene ajhele kibhoko kyangu kya kulia hivyo basi nibetalepi kuhegelesibhwa.
Kwa hiyo muoyo bhwa nene bhwa hobhwiki ni lumilu lwa nene ghwafurahishibhu. Pia mbele bhwangu wibeta kuishi mu bhujasiri.
Wibetalepi kujhileka nafsi jha nene jhilotayi kuzimu, wala wibetalepi kuruhusu mtakatifu ghwa jhobhi kulola uozo.
Bhebhe udhihirishi kwa nene jhele jha uzima; wibeta kunibhomba nijhela ni furaha pamihu pa jhobhi.
Ndongo, nibhwesya kulongela kwa muenga kwa bhujasiri kuhusu dadi hitu Daudi: muene lijhele pamonga natu hadi lelu.
Hivyo, ajhele nabii na amanyili kujha k'yara amalikupaa kwa kiapo kya muene, kwamba ibeta kubheka mmonga katika uzao bhwa muene pa kiti kya enzi.
Alibhwene e'le manyata ni kujobha kuhusu ufufuo bhwa Kristu, wala alekibhulepi kuzimu, wala mbele ghwa muene ghwa bholi lepi.
Yesu Ojho - K'yara amfufuili ambajhe twebhoha mashahidi.
Henu bho ajhinulibhu ku kibhoko kya kuume kya K'yara ni kupokela ahadi jha Roho mtakatifu kuh'omela kwa Dad, muene amimi ni ahadi ejhe, ambajhe muenga mwilola ni kup'eleka.
Kwani Daudi apai lepi kulota kumbinguni, lakini ijobha, 'BWANA ajobhili kwa Bwana ghwa nene,
“tamayi kibhoko kyangu kya kulia, mpaka panibeta kubhabhomba maadui bha jhobhi kigoda kwa ndabha jha magolo gha jhobhi.
Kwa hiyo nyumba jhioha jha Israeli na imananyayi kwa hakika kwamba K'yara ambombili muene kujha Bwana ni Kristu, Ojho Yesu ambajhe mwan'sulubisi.”
Henu bho bhap'eliki nahu, bhahomibhu mu miteema gha bhene bhakan'jobhela Petro ni mitume bhangi, “Ndongo, tuketabhuli?
Ni Petro atabhajobhela, “Mutubuayi na mubatisibhwayi, khila mmonga bhinu, kwa lihina lya Yesu Kristu kwa ndabha jha msamaha ghwa dhambi sya muenga na mwibeta kupokela zawadi jha Roho mtakatifu.
kwani kwa jhomo ndo ahadi ni kwa bhana bhinu ni kwa bhala bhoha bhabhahe kutali, bhanu bhingi na kwa kadri Bwana K'yara ghwelu pa ibeta kubhakuta.”
Kwa malobhi mingi ashuhudili ni kubhasihi ajobhili, “mwikiokolayi mbokayi mukizazi e'le kiovu.”
(ndipo bhakaghepokela malobhi gha muene ni kubatisibhwa, hapo bhakajhongeseka mu ligono e'le kama nafsi elfu tatu.
Bhakayendelela ni mafundisu gha mitume ni ushirikiano, katika kuumetula n'kate ni mu maombi.
Hofu ikahida juu jha khila nafsi ni maajabu ghamehele ni ishara sikabhombibhwa kup'etela mitume.
bhohe bhabhakyeri'ri pamonga ni kujha ni fenu fya bhene kwa pamonga,
na bhahemelisi fenu ni miliki sya bhene ni kugabhwanya kwa bhoha kul'engana ni hitaji lya khila mmonga.
Hivyo ligono baada jha ligono bhajhendilili bhakajha ni lengo limonga mu hekalu, na bhametuili n'kate mu kaya, na bhashirki kya kulya kwa furaha ni unyenyekevu bhwa miteema.
Bhan'sifili K'yara na bhajhele ni kibali ni bhanu bhoha. Bwana abhajhongisi ligono kwa ligono ambabho bhajhele bhiokoliwa.
Henu Petro ni Yohana bhakajha bhitola kuhekalu bhwakati wa maombi, saa tisa.
Munu fulani, kiwete kuhomela kuhogoleka akajha ip'endibhwa kila ligono kugonekibhwa pa ndiangu ghwa hekalu bhukutibhwege mzuri, ili abhwesiajhi kus'oka sadaka kuh'oma kwa bhanu bhabheloleghe mu hekalu.
Bhoabhhwene Petro ni Yohana bhikaribila kujhingila mu hekalu, as'okili sadaka.
Petro, akan'kesila mihu, pamonga ni Yohana, ajobhili, “tu langayi tete.”
Kiwete akabhalanga, akajha elolelela kukabha khenu fulani kuhoma kwa bhene.
Lakini Petro akajobha, “hela ni dhahabu nene njelepi nafu, lakini kyani jhenaku kuhomesya kwabhebhe. Katika lihina lya Yesu Kristu ghwa Nazareth, gendaya.”
Petro akan'tala kwa kibhoko kya muene kya kulia, ni kunjinula kunani: mara jhejhuejhu magologha muene ni fifundo fya mafupa gha muene fyakabhi nghofu.
Aruki kunani, munu kiwete ajhemili ni kujhanda kugenda. Akajhingila mu hekalu pamonga ni Petro ni Yohana akajhaigenda, iruka, ni kun'sifu K'yara.
Bhanu bhoha bhambwene igenda ni kun'sifu K'yara.
Bhakamanya kujha ajhele munu jhola ambajhe ajhe atameghe ni kus'oka sadaka pa ndiangu ghunofu ghwa hekalu. Bhajhe ni mshangao ni kustaajabu kwa ndabha jhakhela kya kihomili kwa bhene.
Namna kya abhakemulili bha Petro ni Yohana bhanu bhoha kwa pamonga bhakajumbilila mu ukumbi bhwabhukutibhweghe bhwa Sulemani bhakajha bhishangale sana.
Petro bho alibhwene e'le, muene akabhajibu bhanu, “Enyi bhanu bha Israrel, kwandajhekiki mwishangala? Kwandajhakiki mukaghalasya mihu gha jhomu kwa tete, kama kwamba tumbombili ajha agendayi kwa nghofu sya jhoto bhene au uchaji bhwa jhoto?”
K'yara ghwa Ibrahimu, ni ghwa Isaka, ni ghwa Yakobo, K'yara ghwa bha dadi hitu, an'tukuisi n'tumishi ghwa muene Yesu. Ojho ndo ambajhe muenga mwan'kabidhi ni kum'bela mbele jha mihu gha Pilato, japo muene aamuli kundeka huru.
Mwam'belili n'takatifu ni mwenye haki ni badala jhiake mkalonde n'komi alekibhwayi huru.
Muenga mwan'komili mfalme ghwa uzima ambajhe K'yara amfufuili kuhomela kwa bhafu-tete ndo mashahidi bha e'le.
Henu kwa imani kwa lihina lya muene, munu ajho ambajhe mukambona ni kumanya, abhombiki kujha ni nghofu. Imani ambajho jhip'otela kwa Yesu impelili muene afya ejhe kamilifu, mbele jha muenga mwebhoha.
Henu, ndongo, nimanyili kujha mwabhombili katika ujinga, ndiyo kya bha bhabhombili bhalongosi bha jhomu.
Lakini mambo ambagho K'yara abhajobhili manyata kwa vinywa fya manabii bhoha, kwamba Kristu ojhu ibetakuteseka, henu aghatimisi.
Kwa hiyo mutubuajhi na mgeukayi, ili kwamba dhambi sya muenga sibhwesiajhi kubhosibhwa kabisa, kusudi sihidayi nyakati sya kuburudika kutokana na uwepo bhwa Bwana;
ni kwamba abhwesiajhi kun'tuma Kristu ambajhe ataulibhu kwa ndabha jhinu, Yesu.
Muene ndo ambajhe lazima mbingu simpokelayi mpaka bhwakati bhwa kukerusibhwa kwa fenu fyoha ambafyo K'yara alonelili muandi kwa finywa fya manabii bha takatifu.
Hakika musa ajobhili; Bwana k'yara ibetakujhinula nabii kama nene kuh'omela kwa bhalongobhinu. Mwibeta kump'elekesya khita khenu ambakyo ibeta kubhajobhela muenga.
Jhibeta kutokela kujha khila munu ambahe ip'elekesya lepi kwa nabii. Ojho ibeta kujhangamisi bhwa kabisa abhokayi kkati jhe bhanu.
Ena, ni manabii bhoha kuhomela Samweli ni bhala bhabhakesisi baada jha muene, bhalongelili ni kutangasya magono agha.
Muenga mwe bhana bha manabii ni bha agano ambalyo K'yara alibhombili pamonga ni mababu, kama kya ajobhili kwa Abrahamu katika mbeyu jha bhebhe familia syoha sya dunia sibetakubarikibhwa.'
Baada jha K'yara kunjinula n'tumishi ghwa muene, an'daghisi kwa muenga hotiili abbabarikiayi muenga kwa kugeuka kuhomela mu uovu bha muenga.”
Bwakati Petro ni Yohana bhilongela ni bhanu, akuhani ni bhalinzi bha hekalu ni Masudukayo bhakabhalotela.
Bhadadilili nesu kwa ndabha Petro ni Yohana bhajhe bhakabhafundisya bhanu kuhusu Yesu ni kutangasya juu jha kufufuka kwa muene kuh'omela kwa bhafu.
Bhakabhakamula ni kubhabheke mu ligereza hadi lukhela kabhele, kwani jha tayari kimili.
Lakini bhanu bhingi bhabhap'eliki ujumbe bhakyeriri; ni idadi jha bhagosi bhajhele bhakimini bhakadilibhu kujha elfu tano.
Hata bhojhifikili likhela ligono lya lyefuatili bhabhaha bha bhene bhasaeya ni bhaandishi, kwa pamonga bhakibhongenuye Yerusalemu.
Anasi kuhani mbaha ajhele, ni Kayafa, ni Yohana, ni Iskanda, ni bhoha bhabhajhele ni ndongo ghwa kuhani mbaha.
Bhobhabhabhekili Petro ni Yohana katikati jha bhene bhakabhakota, “Kwa uwezo bholoki, au kwa lilina lelaku mmbombi agha?”
Kisha Petro, akajha ameniuli Roho mtakatifu, akabhajobhela, “Muenga bhabhaha bha bhanu, ni bhaseya,
kama teteligono lya lelu tuikotibhwa kuhusu litendo linofu lyalibhombibhu kwa munu ojho n'tamu - kwanda jhakiki munu ajho tumponisi?
Hebu limanyikanayi e'tu kwa muenga ni kwa bhanu bhoha, bha Israeli kwamba kwa lihina lya yesu Kristu ghwa Nazareth, ambajhe fuwan'sulubisi, ambajhe K'yara amfufuili kuhoma kwa bhafu, ni kwa njela jha muene kwamba munu ajho ijhema apa mbele jhe muenga ni afya jhioha.
Yesu kristu ndo liganga ambalyo muenga bhajenzi mwalizalaulili, lakini bado libhombibhu kujha liganga libhaha lya palubhafu.
Ujhelepi wokovu kwa munu ojho jhongi ghoa jhoha kwa mena lijhepi liganga lenge pasi pa mbingu lya bhapelibhu bhangi bhanu ambalyo kwa e'lu twibhwesya kuokolibhwa.
Henu bho bhabhuene bhujasiri bhwa Petro ni Yohana, ni kugundula kujha bhajhele bhanubhe kawaida bhabhaduli elimu, bhashangele, bhakamanya kujha Petro ni Yohana bhajhele pamonga ni Yesu.
Kwa ndabha bhambwene munu jhola jhaaponysibhu ajhemili pamonga nibhene, bhajhelepi ni khenu kya kujobha dhidi jha e'le.
Lakini bho bhamalili kumuamuru mitume bhabhokayi mbele jha mkutano ghwa baraza, bhalongili bhene kwa bhene.
Bhajobhili tubeta kubhabhomba bhuli bhanu abha? Ni kweli kujha muujiza ghwa ajabu ubhombiki kup'etela bhene umanyikene ni khila mmonga jha itama Yerusalemu; twibhwesya lepi kulibela e'lu.
Lakini, ili kwamba lijambo e'le lisijheneli miongoni mwa bhanu, hebu tubhaonyayi bhasijobhi kabhele kwa munu jhejhioha kwa lihina e'le.
Bhakabhakuta Petro ni Yohana mugati ni kubhaamuru kamwe bhasiojobhi wala kufundisya kwa lihina lya Yesu.
Lakini Petro ni Yohana bhajobhili ni kubhajobhela, “kama ndo sahihi pamihu pa K'yara kubhatii muenga kuliko K'yara muhukumuayi mwebhene.
Ndabha tete twibhwesya lepikuleka kughenene mambo ambagho tughabhuene ni kughap'eleka.”
Baada jhe kubhaonya nesu Petro ni Yohana, bhakabhaleka bhalotayi. Bhabhwesilepi kukabha sababu jhejhioha jhe kubha adhibu kwa ndabha bhanu bhoha bha jhele bhakan'sifu K'yara kwa khela kya kya khele kibhombiki.
Munu jha apokili muujiza bhwa uponyaji ajhe ni umri zaidi jha miaka arobaini.
Baada jha kubhalaka huru, petro ni Yohana bhakahida kwa bhanu bhabhene ni kubhataarifu ghoha ambagho makuhani bhabhaha ni bhaseya gha bhabhajobhili.
Bhobhaghap'eliki, bhakakwesya sauti sya bhane kwa pamonga kwa K'yara nikujobha, “Bwana, bhebhe jhaubhombili mbingu ni dunia ni nyanja ni khila khenu mugati mwake.
Bhebhe ambajhe kwa Roho mtakatifu kwa kinywa kya dadi jhitu Daudi, n'tumishi ghwa jhobhi, ghwa jhobili, “Kwa ndaya kiki bhanu bha mataifa bhabhombili ghasia, ni bhanu bhamali kutafakari mambo ghaghifwayi lepi?
Bhafalme bha dunia bhakipangili pamonga, ni bhatawala bhakibhongiye ku pamonga dhidi jha Bwana dhidi jha Masihi bhake.”
Ni hakika, bhoha Herode ni Pontio Pilato, pamonga ni bhanu bha mataifa ni bhanu bha Israeli, bhabhonganiki kwa pamonga katika mji ajobho dhidi jha n'tumishi bhwa jhobhi mtakatifu Yesu, ambajhe ghwa mpakili mafuta.
Bhabhonganiki kwa pamonga kubhomba ghoha ambagho kibhoko kya jhobhi ni mapenzi gha jhobhi ghaamuiri kuhomela kubhwandelu kabla ghakona kuh'omela.
Henu, Bwana, ghalangayi matisho gha bhene, na ukabhajalilayi bhatumishi bha jhobhi kulijobha litobhi lya bhebhe kwa ujasiri bhuoha.
ili kwamba pa ghwinyosya kibhoko kya jhobhi koponyesya, ishara ni maajabu fisibhwese kuhomela kup'etela lihina lya n'tumishi ghwa jhobhi mtakatifu Yesu.”
Bho bhamali kus/oka, eneo ambalyo bhabhonganiki kwa pamonga lyatikisibhu, na bhoha bhamemesibhu Roho mtakatifu, na bhanenili litobhi lya K'yara kwa bhujasiri.
Idadi jhibhaha, jhaa bhala bhabhaamini bhajhele ni muoyo umonga ni Roho jhimonga: na ajhelepi hata mmonga ghoa bhene jhaajobhili kujha kyokyoha kyaimiliki lya jhele kya muene: badala jhiake bhajhele ni fenu fyoha fya shirika.
Kwa nghofu mbaha mitume bhakajhe bhitangasya ushuhuda ghwa bhene kuhus ufufuo bhwa Bwana Yesu, ni neema mbaha jhejhele panani pabhene bhoha.
Pajhelepi ni munu jhejhiojha miongoni mwa bhene jhaap'ongokibhu ni mahitaji, kwa ndabha bhanu bhoha bha jhele ni hatia sya fibhanja au nyumba, bhafihemilisi kikuleta hela jha fenu fya bhahemelisi
ni kufibheka pasi pa magolo gha mitume. Ni mgawanyo ghwa bhombiki, kwa khila muumini, kulengana ni khila mmonga fyaalo ndeghe.
Yusufu, mlawi, munu kuhoma kipro, apelibhu lihina lya Barnabasi ni mitume (ejho jhikatafiribhwayi, ndo muana ghwa faraja).
Akajha ni n'gonda, ahemelisi ni kuleta hela, akasibheka pasi pamagologha mitume.
Efyo, munu mmonga jha akutibhweghe Anania, ni Safira nkwibhi, bhehemelisi sehemu jha mali,
na afighili sehemu jha hela jhabhahemlisi (n'dala ghwa bhubhele amanyi e'lu), ni kuleta sehemu jha jhisiele ni kujhibheka mu magolo gha mitume.
Lakini Petro akajbha, Anania, kwa ndabha jhakiki ghwa shetani uumemisi muoyo ghoa jhobhi kujobha udesi kwa Roho mtakatifu ni kufigha sehemu jha maligha n'gonda?
Bhwakati lihemelesibhu lepi, lyajhelepi mali gha jhobhi? Ni baada jha kuhemelesibhwa, lya jhelepi pasi pa uamuzi bhwa jhobhi? Jhikajhebhuli ubhwasiajhi lijambo elu mu muoyo bhwa jhobhi? jhikajhebhuli ubhwasiajhi lijambo elu mu muoyo bhwa jhobhi? Ubhakosilepi bhanadamu bali un'kosi K'yara.”
Katika kup'eteleka malobhi agha Anania abinili pasi ni kufwa. Ni hofu mbaha jhabha hidili bhana bhabhap'eliki e'le.
Bhasongolo bhakahida palongolo ni kumbeka katika sanda, ni kumpeleka kwibhala ni kun'siela.
Baada jha masaa madatu ivi n'dala munu akajhingila mugati bila kumanya kyakikatokili.
Petro akan'jobhela, “Nijobhelayi, kama mwahemelisi n'gonda kwa thamani ejhu.” Akajobha, “Ena, kwa thamani ejhu.”
Kisha Petro akan'jobhela, “jhijhabhuli kwamba mupatene kwa pamonga kun'jaribu Roho ghwa Bwana? Langayi magolo ha bhale bhabhan'syelili n'gosibhu ijhe pandiangu, na bhibeta kupenda ni kupeleka kwibhala.”
Ghafla akabina mumagolo gha Petro, akafwa, ni bhala bhasongolo bhakahida mugati bhaka'kolela amalikufwa. Bhakampenda kumpeleka kwibhala, ni kun'siela karibu ni n'gosi.
Hofu mbaha jhikahida juu jhe kanisa lyoha, ni juu jha bhoha bhaghap'eliki mambo agha.
Ishara simehele ni maajabu fya jhele fihomele ni maajabu fya jhele fihomele miongoni mwa bhanu kup'etela mabhoko gha mitume. Bhajhele pamonga mu ukumbi bhwa sulemani.
Lakini, ajhelepi munu jhongi tofauti jha ajhele ni bhujasiri bhwa kuambatana ne bhene hata naha bhapelibhu heshima jhe panani ni bhanu.
Ni kabhele, bhaamini bhingi bhakajha bhijhongeseka kwa Bwana, idadi mbaha jha bhagosi ni bhadala,
kiasi kwamba hata akabhap'enda bhatamu mitaani, ni kubhagoneke pa fitanda ni mumakochi, ili kwamba Petro kama ipeta, kivuli kya muene kibhwesiajhi kuselele juu jha bhene.
Apu kabhele idadi mbaha jha bhanu bhakahida kuhoma miji jhajhisyonguiki Yerusalemu, bhakabhaleta bhatamu ni bhoha bhabhapagewe ni mapepo ni roho chafu, ne bhoha bhaponyibhu.
Lakini kuhani mbaha ajhinuiki, nibhoha bhabhajhe pamonga naku (ambaho bha dhahabu lya masudukayo); na bhamemili ni bhwifu.
Bhakanyosya mabhoko gha bhene kubhakamula mitume ni kubhabheka mu ligereza lya jumla.
Ni bhwakati wa pakilu malaika bha Bwana akaifungula miliangu ghya geraza ni kubhalongosya kwibhala ni kujobha,
“Mutolayi, mkajhemayi mulihekalu ni kubhajobhela bhanu malobhi ghoha gha uzima obho.”
Bhobhapeliki e'le, bhakajhingila muhekalu wakati bhwa kubhalala ni kumanyisya. Lakini, kuhani mbaha ahidili na bhoha bhajhenaku, nikukutisya baraza lyoha kwa pamonga, ni bhaseya bhoha bha bhanu bha Israeli, ni kubhalaghisya kuligereza ili kubhalata mitume.
Lakini bhatumishi bhabhalotili, bhabhakolilepi mu ligereza, bhakerbhuiki ni kuhomesya taarifa,
“Tukolili gereza lidendibhu kinofu, ni bhalinzi bhalinzi bhajhemili pa ndiangu lakini bhotwidendula twambwene lepi munu mugati.”
Henu bhwakati jemedari ghwa hekalu ni makuhani bhabhaha bhobhep'eliki malobhi aghu, bhajhingbhu ni shaka mbaha kwa ndabha jha bhene bhakajha bhiibhwesya, jhibeta kujhebhuli lijambo e'le.
Kisha mmonga akahida ni kubhajobhela, “Bhanu bha mubhabhekili muligereza bhajhemili mu hekalu na bhifundisya bhanu.”
Henu jemedari akalota pamonga ni bhatumishi, ni kubhaleta, lakini bila jhe kubhomba fuju, kwa ndabha bhabhatilili bhanu ngabhabhwesili kubhahomelela maganga.
Bhobhabhaletili bhabhebhekili palongolo pa baraza. Kuhani mbaha abhakotili,
akajobha, “Twabhajobhili mufundisiajhi kwa lihina ele, na bado mujhiniemisi Yerusalemu kwa lifundisu lya muenga, ni kulonda kuleta damu jhe munu ojho juu jha tete.”
Lakini Petro ni mitume bhakajibu, “azima tun'kesiajhi K'yara kuliko bhanu.
K'yara ghwa dadi jhitu amfufuili Yesu, jhamun'komili, kwa kun'tondeka panani pa libehe.
K'yara an'tukuisi katika kibhoko kya muene kya kuume ni kumbomba kujhe mbhaha ni mwokozi, kubhosya toba kwa Israeli, ni msamaha kwa dhambi.
Tete ndo mashahidi bha mambo agha, ni Roho mtakatifu ambajhe K'yara ambosisi kwa bhala bhabha kan'tii.”
Bhajumbe bha baraza bho bhap'eliki naha, bhakamlibhu ni ligoga bhakalonda kuhakoma mitume.
Lakini pharisayo jhaakutibhweghe Gamalieli, mwalimu ghwa sheria, jhaahashimibhweghe ni bhanu bhoha, ajhemili ni kubhaamuru mitume bhatolibhwayi kwibhala kwa muda bhufupi.
Kisha abhabhajobhela, “Bhagosi bha Israeli, mujhelayi makini sana ni khela kya mwependekesya kubhabhombela bhanu abha.
kwa ndabha muandi theuda ajhinuiki ni kwidayi kujha mun mbaha, ni idadi jha bhanu kama mia nne bhan'kesisi. Akomibhu, ni bhoha bhabhan'tieghe bhatawanyiki ni kujhagha.
Baada jha munu ojho, Yuda mgalilaya, ajhinuiki magono ghala gha kulekebibhwa sensa akafuta bhanu bhingi kunyma kwa muene. Ni muene kabhele ajhaghili ni bhoha bhabhan'tieghe bhatawanyiki.
Henu, nikabhajobhela, mukijhepusighe ni bhanu abha na mubhalekayi bhene, kwa ndabha, kama mpango obho au mbombo ejhe jha bhanu jhitaghibhwa.
Lakini kama jha K'yara, mwibetalepi kubhazuila: mwibhwesya kwikolela hata mwishindana ni K'yara.” Efyo, bhashawishiki ni malobhi gha muene.
Kisha bhakabhakuta mitume mugati ni kubhatobha ni kubhaamuru bhasijobhi kwa lihina lya Yesu, ni kubhaleka bhalotayi.
Bhabhokili mbele jha baraza bhahobhwiki kwa ndabha bha bhalangibhu kujha bhilondeke kutebhwa ni kutokuheshibhwa kwa ndabha jhe lihina e'lu.
Henu, khila ligono, mugati mu hekalu ni kuhomela kunyumba hadi nyumba bhajhendelili kumanyisya ni kuhubiri Yesu kujha ndo Masihi.
Henu katika magono agha, idadi jhe bhanafunzi jhijhogeseka, lalamiko lya bhayahudi bha kiyunani lyajhandili dhidi jha Baebrania kwa ndabha bhajane bha bhene bhajhela bhiyebhelibhwa mu mgao bhwa khila ligono bhwa kyakulya.
Mitume kumi ni bhabhele bhabhakutili kusanyiku lyoha lya bhanafunzi ni kujobha, “Sahihi lepi kwa tete kulileka lilobhi lya K'yara ni kuhudumila pa meza.
Kwa hiyo ndongo, muchagulayi bhagosi saba, kuhomela miongoni mwa muenga bhanu bhema, bhabhamemili roho ni hekima ambabho twibhwesya kubhakabidhi huduma ejhe.
Ni tete tubeta kujhendelela mu maombi ni mu huduma jha lilobhi.”
Hotuba jha bhene jhabhupendisi mkutano bhuoha. Hivyo bhakan'chagula stefano, munu jha ojhe ni imani ni Roho mtakatifu, ni Filipo, Prokoro, Nikanori, Timoni, Parmena, na Nikolai, mwongofu kuhoma Antiokia.
Bhaumini bhabhaletili bhanu abha mbele jha bhamitume, bhabhas'okili ni baadaye bhada bhabhekela mabhoko gha bhene.
Hivyo, lilobhi lya K'yara liaenili ni idadi jhe bhanafunzi, jhajhongesiki, okho Yerusalemu; ni idadi mbaha jha makuhani bhakaitii imani.
Ni Stefano, jhaamemili neema ni nghofu, akifanya maajabu ni ishara mbaha miongoni mwa bhanu.
Lakini apu bhajhinuiki baadhi jha bhanu bhafuasi bha sinagogi lya likutibhweghe sinagogi lya mahuru, ni la Bhakerene ni la Bhaeskandaria, ni baadhi kuhoma Kilikia ni Asia. Bhanu abha bha jhele bhihojiana ni Stefano.
Lakini bbwabhwesilepi kusindana ni hekima sya Roho ambajho Stefano ajhe itumila mu malongesi.
Kisha bhabhashawishi baadhi jha bhanu kwa siri kujobha, “Tup'eliki Stefano ilongela malobhi gha kufuru dhidi jha Musa ni dhidi jha K'yara.”
Bhabhashurutishi bhanu, bhaseya, ni bhaandishi, ni kun'dotela Stefano bhakan'kamula ni kundeta mbele jha baraza.
Bhakabhaleta mashahidi bha bhudesi, bhabhajobhili, “Munu ojho ilekalepi kujobha malobhi manofulepi dhidi jha lieneo ele takatifu ni sheria.
Kwani tup'eliki ijobha kujha ojho Yesu ghwa Nazareth ibeta kupa haribu mahali apa ni kusibadilisya desturi sya tukabisibhu ni Musa.”
Khila mmonga jha ajhe mu baraza, akajhelekesya mihu gha muene kundanga Stefano, nabhane bhakaubhona uso bhwa muene bhwajhele kama bhwa malaika.
Kuhani mbaha akajobha. “Mambo agha gha bhukweli”?
Stefano akajobha, “Bhalongo bhangu ni badadi jhangu munip'elekesiajhi nene: K'yara ghwa bhutukufu an'tokili dadi jhitu Abrahamu bhwakati ajhele Mesopotamia kabla hja, kutama Harani;
akan'jobhela, bhokayi katika nchi jha jhobhi ni bhanu bha jhobhi na ulotayi, mu nchi jha nibetakulasya'.
Kisha akabhoka mu nchi jha ukaldayo akatama Harani, kuhomela apu, Baada jha dadi munu kufwa, K'yara akandeta mu nchi ejhe, jhabhitama henu.
Ampelilepi kyokyoha kama urithi bwa muene, pajhelepi hata ni sehemu jha kubheka ligolo. Lakini Abrahamu ahaidibhu hata kabla jha kukabhe muana kujhanibetakupelibhwa nchi kama miliki jha muene ni uzao bhwa muene
K'yara ajobhi naku naha, jha kujha bhazao bha muene nghabhatamili mu nchi jha kubhuhesya ni bhenyeji bha okhubhibeta kubhabhomba bhatumwa bha bhene ni kubhabhomba fibaya kwa muda ghwa miaka mianne.
Ni K'yara akajobha nibetakulihukumu taifa ambalyo libeta kubhabhomba mateka, ni baada jha apu bhibhita kuhoma ni kuniabudu pa sehemu ejhe.
Na ampelili Abrahamu Agano lya tohara. Ivyo Abrahamu akajha ghwa ISaka akan'tahiri ligono lya nane; Isaka akajha dadi ghwa Yakobo ni Yakobo akajha dadi ghwa bhakhoko bhitu kumi ni bhabhele.
Bhakoko bhitu bhakambonela bhwifu Yusufu bhakan'hemesya katika nchi jh a Misri, ni K'yara ajhele pamonga ni muene,
ni kumwokola katika malombosi gha muene, ni kumpela fadhili ni hekima mbele jha Farao mfalme ghwa Misri. Farao akambeka kujha mtawala juu jha Misri ni juu jha nyumba jha muene jhioha.
Basi kwajhele ni njala mbaha ni malombosi mingi mu nchi jha Misri ni kanani, ni bhadidi jhitu bhakabhilepi kyakulya.
Lakini Yakobo bho apeliki kujha ni nafakaMisri, abhalaghisi bha dadi jhitu kwa mara jha kwanza.
Katika safari jha pili Yusufu akakilasya kwa bhalongo munu, familia jha Yusufu jhikamanyikana kwa Farao.
Yusufu abhalaghisi bhalongomunu kulota kun'jobhela Yakobo dadi jabhi ahidayi Misri, pamonga ni ndongo munu, jumla jha bhanu bhoha sabini na tano.
Hivyo Yakobo aselili Misri; kisha afuili pamonga ni bhadadi jhitu.
Bhakatolibhwa hata Shekemu bhakasyelibhwa mulikaburi ambalyo Abrahamu alihemili kwa fipandi fya hela kuhoma kwa bhana bha Hamori okhu Shekemu.
Bhwakati bhwa jhela ahidi ambayo K'yara aahidi Abrahamu bho bhukaribili, bhanu bho bhajhongesiki oku Misri,
Bhwakati obhu ajhinuiki mfalme jhongi Misri, mfalme jhaa manyilepi kuhusu Yusufu.
Mfalme jhongi ojho akabhakofya bhanu bhitu ni kubhabhomba mabhibhi bha dadi jhitu, ni kubhatagha bhana bhabhi bhadebe ili bhasiishi.
Katika kipindi khela Musa ahogoliki ajhele nnofu mbele jha K'yara alalibhu miesi midatu mu nyumba jha dadi munu.
Bhwakati ataghibhu, binti ghwa Farao antolili akandela kama mwana munu.
Musa amanyisibhu mafundisu ghoha gha kimisri; ajhele ni nghofu mu malobhi ni matendo.
Lakini baada jha kutimisya miaka arobaini, jhikanhidila mu muoyo bhwa muene kubhagendela bhalongo munu, bhana bha Israeli.
Bhoambwene mwisraeli ibhombibhwa mabhibhi, Musa an'telili ni kulepesya kisasi kwa jhaamboneleghe kwa kun'tobha Mmsri.
Afikineghe kujha bhalongo munu bhibeta kumanya kujha K'yara akabhaokola kwa mabhoko gha muene lakini bhamanyilepi.
Ligono lya lafwatili akalota kwa baadhi jha bhaisraeli bhahakomaneghe; akajaribu kubhapatenisya; akajobha Mabwana, muenga ndongo, mbona mwikoselana jhmu kwa jhomu?
Lakini jhaankosili jirani ghwa muene akansukumila patali ni kujobha, 'Niani akubhombili kujha mtawala ni mhukumu ghwa tete?
Bhebhe wilonda kunikoma kama kyaghwan'komili Mmisri golo”?
Musa ajumbili baada jha kupeleka nahu; akajha n'hesya mu nchi jha Midiani ambapo akajha dadi ghwa bhana bhabhele.
Baada jha miaka arobaini kup'eta, malaika akan'tokela mu jangwa lya kidonda sinai, katika mb'ele ghwa muoto mukichaka.
Bwakati Musa abubhwene muoto, ashangele ni kustajabila khela kya akibhwene, na bhoajeribu kukihegelela ili kukilanga sauti jha Bwana ikan'hidila ni kujobha,
“Nene ne K'yara ghwa bha dadi waku, K'yara ghwa Abrahamu, ni ghwa Isaka, ni ghwa Yakobo; Musa atetenuki na athubulepi kulanga.
Bwana akan'jobhela, “Fulayi filatu fya jhibhi, sehemu pa ujhemili ndo mahali patakatifu.
Nighabhuene mateso gha bhanu bhangu bhabhajhele Misri; Nip'eleliki kuluala kwa bhene, nani niselili ili nibhaokolayi; Henu hidayi, nibeta kulaghisya bhebhe Misri.'
Ojhi Musa jha bhambelili, wakati bhijobha, Niani akubhekili kujha mtawala ni mwamuzi ghwa tete? Ajhele ndo K'yara andaghisi kujha mtawala ni n'kombozi K'yara andaghisi kwa kibhoko kya malaika ambajhe an'tokili Musa mu kichaka.
Musa abhalonguisi kuhomela Misri baada jha kubhomba miujiza ni ishara kuimisri ni kubahari jha Shamu, ni kulijangwa kwa kipindi kya miaka arobaini.
Ndo Musa ojho jhaabhajobhili bhanu bha Israeli kujha, K'yara ibetakubhajhinubila nabii kuhomele miongonni mwa bhalongo bhinu, nabii kama nene.
Ojho ndo munu ambajhe ajhele ku n'kutano ku lijangwa ni malaika ambajhe alongi nakhu pa kidonda Sinai. Ojho ndo munu apokili lilobhi lyalijhe hai ni kutupela tete.
Ojho ndo munu ambajhe bhadadijhitu bhabeli kuntii; bhan'sukumili patali ni mu mioyo ghyabho bhageukili Misri.
Mu kipindi e'ku bhan'jobhili Haruni.'tutengeneselayi miungu ghyaghibetakutulongosya. Musa ojho, jhaatulongosiaghe kuhomela nchi jha Misri, tumanyilepi kyakin'kolili.'
Hiyo bhatengenisi liloli kwa magono aghu ni kupisya sadaka kwa sanamu ejhu na bhahobheleli kwa ndabha jha mbombo jhe mabhoko gha bhene.
Lakini K'yara abhageuzili ni kubhapela bhaabudu ajhi litondo lya kunani, kama kya jhilembibhu mu kitabu kya manabii, je, munihomesili nene sadaka sya bhanyama bha mubhachijhili ku jangwa kwa muda bhwa miaka arobaini nyumba jha Israeli?
Mujhedekili hema jha kubhonanila jha Moleki ni litondo lya K'yara refani, ni picha jha muteng'enisi ni kubhaabudu bhene: ne nibetakubhapeleka patali zaidi jha Babeli .
Bhadadi jhitu bha jhe ni hema lya kubhonanila jha bhushuhuda jangwani kama K'yara kyaamuili bhoilongela ni Musa, kwamba ngaaiteng'enisi kwa mfano bhwa bhola bhwaabhuene.
E'le ndo lihema ambalyobha dadi jhitu, kwa bhwakati ghwa bhene bhaletibhu mu nchi ni Joshua. Ejhhe jhatokili bhwakati bho bhajhingili kumiliki taifa ambalyo K'yara abhabhengili kabla jha uwepo ghwa bha dadi jhitu. Ejhe jha jhele naha mpaka magono gha Daudi,
ambajhe akabhaili kibanda makao kwa k'yara ghwa Yakobo
Lakini Sulemani an'jengili nyumba jha K'yara.
Hata naha jhe ajhe kunani itama lepi munyumba sya sijengebhu kwa mabhoko; ejhe kama nabii kya ajobhili,
Mbingu ndo kiti kyangu kya enzi, ni dunia ndo sehemu jha kubheka magolo gha jhoni. Nyumba jha aina jheleku mwibetakujenga? ijobha Bwana; jhjhendaku sehemu jha nene jha kup'omoseka?
Siyo kibhoko kya nene kya kibhombili agha ghoha?
Enye bhanu bha mujhe ni singu sikatafu mwam'belikuiribhwa mioyoni mb'olokolo, khila mara mukampinga Roho mtakatifu; mwibhombil.
Ni nabii jholeku katika manabii ambajhe bhadadi jhinu bhan'tesilipi? Bhabhakhomili manabii bhoha bhabhetokili kabla jha ujio bhwa mmonga mwenye haki,' ni henu mmalikujha mwebhasaliti ni bhauajhi bha muene kabhole,
enyi bhanu jha mwapokili sheria jhela jha laghisibhu ni malaika lakini mwajhikamuili lepi.”
Kisha bhajumbe bha baraza bhobhap'eliki mambo agha, bhanyanyibhu mioyo ghya bhene, bhakan'syaghila minu Stefano.
Lakini muene bho amemili Roho mtakatifu, alolili kumbinguni kwa makini ni kubhubhona utukufu bhwa K'yara; ni kumbona Yesu ajhemili kibhoko kya kuume kya K'yara.
Stefano akajobha, “Langayi nijhibhwene mbingu sifungwiki, ni Mwana gha Adamu ajhemili kibhoko kya kuume kya K'yara.”
Lakini bhajmbe bhe baraza bhapigili kelele kwa sauti mbaha, bhakaziba mb'olokoto sya bhene, bhakan'jumbilila kwa pamonga,
Bhakan'tagha kwibhala mu masi ni kun'tobha ni maganga; ni mashahidi bhakafula nghobho sya bhene kwibhala ni kubheka pasi karibu ni magolo gha n'songolo jhaakutibhweghe Sauli.
Bhwakati bhakan'tobha magangaa Stefano, ajhendelili kunkuta Bwana ni kujobha, “Bwana Yesu pokelayi roho jhangu,”.
Akapiga magoti ni kukuta kwa sauti mbaha, “Bwana, usibhabhalangili dhambi ejhe.” Bho ajobhi aghu akatili roho.
Sauli ajhele makubaliano gha kifo kya muene. Legono elu ndo ajhandili kubhatesya kinyume kya kanisa lya lyejhele Yerusalemu; na bhoha jha bhiamini bhabhatawanyiki mu majimbo gha Yudea ni Samaria, isipokujha mitume.
Bhanu bhacha mungu bhan'syelili Stefano ni kubhomba maombolez mabhaha juu jha muene.
Lakini Sauli alilizuru likanisa. Alotili nyumba kwa nyumba nikubhabuniza kwibhala bhadala ni bhagosi, ni kubhasopa mu ligereza.
Bhabhikeera ambabho bhatawanyiki bado bhalihubiri lilobhi.
Filipo asalili katika mji bhwa Samaria ni kun'tangasya Kristu okhu.
Baada jha makutano kup'eleka ni ishara syaabhombi Filipo; bhakabheka umakini juu jha khela kyaajobhili.
Kuhomela apu bhanu bhingi bhabhap'eliki pepo bhachafu bhakabhabhoka bhanu khoni bhilela kwa sauti mbaha, ni bhingi bhabhapoozili ni fiwete bhaponyisibhu.
Na kwajhele ni furaha mbaha mu mji.
Lakini pajhele ni munu mmonga mu mji bhola lihina lya muene Simoni ambajhe abhombeghe uhabhi; ambabho abhutimili kubhashangasya bhanu bha taifa la Samaria, wakati ijobha kujha muene ndo munu muhimu.
